426 static const trait_id trait_DEBUG_SILENT( "DEBUG_SILENT" );
427 static const trait_id trait_DEBUG_STAMINA( "DEBUG_STAMINA" );

498 static const std::set<material_id> ferric = { material_iron, material_steel, material_budget_steel, material_ch_steel, material_hc_steel, material_lc_steel, material_mc_steel, material_qt_steel };
499 
500 namespace io
501 {
502 
503 template<>
504 std::string enum_to_string<blood_type>( blood_type data )
505 {
506  switch( data ) {
507  // *INDENT-OFF*
508  case blood_type::blood_O: return "O";
509  case blood_type::blood_A: return "A";
510  case blood_type::blood_B: return "B";
511  case blood_type::blood_AB: return "AB";
512  // *INDENT-ON*
513  case blood_type::num_bt:
514  break;
515  }
516  cata_fatal( "Invalid blood_type" );
517 }
518 
519 } // namespace io
520 
521 void Character::queue_effect( const std::string &name, const time_duration &delay,
522  const time_duration &effect_duration )
523 {
524  std::unordered_map<std::string, std::string> ctx = {
525  { "npctalk_var_effect", name },
526  { "npctalk_var_duration", std::to_string( to_turns<int>( effect_duration ) ) }
527  };
528 
529  effect_on_conditions::queue_effect_on_condition( delay, effect_on_condition_add_effect, *this,
530  ctx );
531 }
532 
533 int Character::count_queued_effects( const std::string &effect ) const
534 {
535  return std::count_if( queued_effect_on_conditions.list.begin(),
536  queued_effect_on_conditions.list.end(), [&effect]( const queued_eoc & eoc ) {
537  return eoc.eoc == effect_on_condition_add_effect &&
538  eoc.context.at( "npctalk_var_effect" ) == effect;
539  } );
540 }
541 
542 // *INDENT-OFF*
543 Character::Character() :
544  id( -1 ),
545  next_climate_control_check( calendar::before_time_starts ),
546  last_climate_control_ret( false )
547 {
548  randomize_blood();
549  cached_organic_size = 1.0f;
550  str_cur = 8;
551  str_max = 8;
552  dex_cur = 8;
553  dex_max = 8;
554  int_cur = 8;
555  int_max = 8;
556  per_cur = 8;
557  per_max = 8;
558  set_dodges_left(1);
559  blocks_left = 1;
560  str_bonus = 0;
561  dex_bonus = 0;
562  per_bonus = 0;
563  int_bonus = 0;
564  lifestyle = 0;
565  daily_health = 0;
566  health_tally = 0;
567  hunger = 0;
568  thirst = 0;
569  sleepiness = 0;
570  sleep_deprivation = 0;
571  daily_sleep = 0_turns;
572  continuous_sleep = 0_turns;
573  radiation = 0;
574  slow_rad = 0;
575  set_stim( 0 );
576  arms_power_use = 0;
577  legs_power_use = 0;
578  arms_stam_mult = 1.0f;
579  legs_stam_mult = 1.0f;
580  set_stamina( 10000 ); //Temporary value for stamina. It will be reset later from external json option.
581  cardio_acc = 1000; // Temporary cardio accumulator. It will be updated when reset_cardio_acc is called.
582  set_anatomy( anatomy_human_anatomy );
583  update_type_of_scent( true );
584  pkill = 0;
585  // 55 Mcal or 55k kcal
586  healthy_calories = 55'000'000;
587  base_cardio_acc = 1000;
588  // this makes sure characters start with normal bmi
589  stored_calories = healthy_calories - 1'000'000;
590  initialize_stomach_contents();
591 
592  name.clear();
593  custom_profession.clear();
594 
595  *path_settings = pathfinding_settings{ 0, 1000, 1000, 0, true, true, true, true, false, true };
596 
597  move_mode = move_mode_walk;
598  next_expected_position = std::nullopt;
599  invalidate_crafting_inventory();
600 
601  set_power_level( 0_kJ );
602  cash = 0;
603  scent = 500;
604  male = true;
605  prof = profession::has_initialized() ? profession::generic() :
606  nullptr; //workaround for a potential structural limitation, see player::create
607  start_location = start_location_sloc_shelter_a;
608  moves = 100;
609  oxygen = 0;
610  in_vehicle = false;
611  controlling_vehicle = false;
612  grab_point = tripoint_zero;
613  hauling = false;
614  set_focus( 100 );
615  last_item = itype_null;
616  sight_max = 9999;
617  last_batch = 0;
618  death_drops = true;
619  nv_cached = false;
620  leak_level = 0.0f;
621  leak_level_dirty = true;
622  volume = 0;
623  set_value( "THIEF_MODE", "THIEF_ASK" );
624  for( const auto &v : vitamin::all() ) {
625  vitamin_levels[ v.first ] = 0;
626  daily_vitamins[v.first] = { 0,0 };
627  }
628  // Only call these if game is initialized
629  if( !!g && json_flag::is_ready() ) {
630  recalc_sight_limits();
631  calc_encumbrance();
632  worn.recalc_ablative_blocking(this);
633  }
634 }
635 // *INDENT-ON*
636 
637 Character::~Character() = default;
638 Character::Character( Character && ) noexcept( map_is_noexcept ) = default;
639 Character &Character::operator=( Character && ) noexcept( list_is_noexcept ) = default;
640 
641 void Character::setID( character_id i, bool force )
642 {
643  if( id.is_valid() && !force ) {
644  debugmsg( "tried to set id of a npc/player, but has already a id: %d", id.get_value() );
645  } else if( !i.is_valid() && !force ) {
646  debugmsg( "tried to set invalid id of a npc/player: %d", i.get_value() );
647  } else {
648  id = i;
649  }
650 }
651 
652 character_id Character::getID() const
653 {
654  return this->id;
655 }
656 
657 void Character::swap_character( Character &other )
658 {
659  npc tmp_npc;
660  Character &tmp = tmp_npc;
661  tmp = std::move( other );
662  other = std::move( *this );
663  *this = std::move( tmp );
664 }
665 
666 void Character::randomize_height()
667 {
668  // Height distribution data is taken from CDC distributes statistics for the US population
669  // https://github.com/CleverRaven/Cataclysm-DDA/pull/49270#issuecomment-861339732
670  const int x = std::round( normal_roll( 168.35, 15.50 ) );
671  init_height = clamp( x, Character::min_height(), Character::max_height() );
672 }
673 
674 item_location Character::get_wielded_item() const
675 {
676  return const_cast<Character *>( this )->get_wielded_item();
677 }
678 
679 item_location Character::get_wielded_item()
680 {
681  if( weapon.is_null() ) {
682  return item_location();
683  }
684  return item_location( *this, &weapon );
685 }
686 
687 void Character::set_wielded_item( const item &to_wield )
688 {
689  weapon = to_wield;
690 }
691 
692 std::vector<matype_id> Character::known_styles( bool teachable_only ) const
693 {
694  return martial_arts_data->get_known_styles( teachable_only );
695 }
696 
697 bool Character::has_martialart( const matype_id &m ) const
698 {
699  return martial_arts_data->has_martialart( m );
700 }
701 
702 int Character::get_oxygen_max() const
703 {
704  return 30 + ( has_bionic( bio_synlungs ) ? 30 : 2 * str_cur );
705 }
706 
707 bool Character::can_recover_oxygen() const
708 {
709  return get_limb_score( limb_score_breathing ) > 0.5f && !is_underwater() &&
710  !has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) && !( has_bionic( bio_synlungs ) &&
711  !has_active_bionic( bio_synlungs ) );
712 }
713 
714 void Character::randomize_heartrate()
715 {
716  // assume starting character is sedentary so we have some room to go down for cardio hr lowering
717  avg_nat_bpm = rng_normal( 70, 90 );
718 }
719 
720 void Character::randomize_blood()
721 {
722  // Blood type distribution data is taken from this study on blood types of
723  // COVID-19 patients presented to five major hospitals in Massachusetts:
724  // https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7354354/
725  // and is adjusted for racial/ethnic distribution in game, which is defined in
726  // data/json/npcs/appearance_trait_groups.json
727  static const std::array<std::tuple<double, blood_type, bool>, 8> blood_type_distribution = {{
728  std::make_tuple( 0.3821, blood_type::blood_O, true ),
729  std::make_tuple( 0.0387, blood_type::blood_O, false ),
730  std::make_tuple( 0.3380, blood_type::blood_A, true ),
731  std::make_tuple( 0.0414, blood_type::blood_A, false ),
732  std::make_tuple( 0.1361, blood_type::blood_B, true ),
733  std::make_tuple( 0.0134, blood_type::blood_B, false ),
734  std::make_tuple( 0.0437, blood_type::blood_AB, true ),
735  std::make_tuple( 0.0066, blood_type::blood_AB, false )
736  }
737  };
738  const double x = rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 );
739  double cumulative_prob = 0.0;
740  for( const std::tuple<double, blood_type, bool> &type : blood_type_distribution ) {
741  cumulative_prob += std::get<0>( type );
742  if( x <= cumulative_prob ) {
743  my_blood_type = std::get<1>( type );
744  blood_rh_factor = std::get<2>( type );
745  return;
746  }
747  }
748  my_blood_type = blood_type::blood_AB;
749  blood_rh_factor = false;
750 }
751 
752 field_type_id Character::bloodType() const
753 {
754  if( has_flag( json_flag_ACIDBLOOD ) ) {
755  return fd_acid;
756  }
757  if( has_flag( json_flag_PLANTBLOOD ) ) {
758  return fd_blood_veggy;
759  }
760  if( has_flag( json_flag_INSECTBLOOD ) ) {
761  return fd_blood_insect;
762  }
763  if( has_flag( json_flag_INVERTEBRATEBLOOD ) ) {
764  return fd_blood_invertebrate;
765  }
766  return fd_blood;
767 }
768 field_type_id Character::gibType() const
769 {
770  return fd_gibs_flesh;
771 }
772 
773 bool Character::in_species( const species_id &spec ) const
774 {
775  return spec == species_HUMAN;
776 }
777 
778 bool Character::is_warm() const
779 {
780  // TODO: is there a mutation (plant?) that makes a npc not warm blooded?
781  return true;
782 }
783 
784 const std::string &Character::symbol() const
785 {
786  static const std::string character_symbol( "@" );
787  return character_symbol;
788 }
789 
790 void Character::mod_stat( const std::string &stat, float modifier )
791 {
792  if( stat == "thirst" ) {
793  mod_thirst( modifier );
794  } else if( stat == "sleepiness" ) {
795  mod_sleepiness( modifier );
796  } else if( stat == "oxygen" ) {
797  oxygen += modifier;
798  } else if( stat == "stamina" ) {
799  mod_stamina( modifier );
800  } else if( stat == "str" ) {
801  mod_str_bonus( modifier );
802  } else if( stat == "dex" ) {
803  mod_dex_bonus( modifier );
804  } else if( stat == "per" ) {
805  mod_per_bonus( modifier );
806  } else if( stat == "int" ) {
807  mod_int_bonus( modifier );
808  } else if( stat == "healthy" ) {
809  mod_livestyle( modifier );
810  } else if( stat == "hunger" ) {
811  mod_hunger( modifier );
812  } else {
813  Creature::mod_stat( stat, modifier );
814  }
815 }
816 
817 int Character::get_fat_to_hp() const
818 {
819  int fat_to_hp = ( get_bmi_fat() - character_weight_category::normal );
820  fat_to_hp = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::FAT_TO_MAX_HP, fat_to_hp );
821  return fat_to_hp;
822 }
823 
824 creature_size Character::get_size() const
825 {
826  return size_class;
827 }
828 
829 std::string Character::disp_name( bool possessive, bool capitalize_first ) const
830 {
831  if( !possessive ) {
832  if( is_avatar() ) {
833  return capitalize_first ? _( "You" ) : _( "you" );
834  }
835  return get_name();
836  } else {
837  if( is_avatar() ) {
838  return capitalize_first ? _( "Your" ) : _( "your" );
839  }
840  return string_format( _( "%s's" ), get_name() );
841  }
842 }
843 
844 std::string Character::name_and_maybe_activity() const
845 {
846  return disp_name( false, true );
847 }
848 
849 std::string Character::skin_name() const
850 {
851  // TODO: Return actual deflecting layer name
852  return _( "armor" );
853 }

862  const std::string &/*npc_msg*/ ) const
863 {
864  Messages::add_msg( player_msg );

868 {
869  Messages::add_msg( params, msg );

880  const std::string &/*npc_speech*/ ) const

891 
892 int Character::effective_dispersion( int dispersion, bool zoom ) const
893 {
894  return get_character_parallax( zoom ) + dispersion;
895 }
896 
897 int Character::get_character_parallax( bool zoom ) const
898 {
899  /** @EFFECT_PER penalizes sight dispersion when low. */
900  int character_parallax = zoom ? static_cast<int>( ranged_per_mod() * 0.25 ) : ranged_per_mod();
901  character_parallax += get_modifier( character_modifier_ranged_dispersion_vision_mod );
902 
903  return std::max( static_cast<int>( std::round( character_parallax ) ), 0 );
904 }
905 
906 static double modified_sight_speed( double aim_speed_modifier, double effective_sight_dispersion,
907  double recoil )
908 {
909  if( recoil <= effective_sight_dispersion ) {
910  return 0;
911  }
912  // When recoil tends to effective_sight_dispersion, the aiming speed bonus will tend to 0
913  // When recoil > 3 * effective_sight_dispersion + 1, attenuation_factor = 1
914  // use 3 * effective_sight_dispersion + 1 instead of 3 * effective_sight_dispersion to avoid min=max
915  if( effective_sight_dispersion < 0 ) {
916  return 0;
917  }
918  double attenuation_factor = 1 - logarithmic_range( effective_sight_dispersion,
919  3 * effective_sight_dispersion + 1, recoil );
920 
921  return ( 10.0 + aim_speed_modifier ) * attenuation_factor;
922 }
923 
924 int Character::point_shooting_limit( const item &gun )const
925 {
926  // This value is not affected by PER, because the accuracy of aim shooting depends more on muscle memory and skill
927  skill_id gun_skill = gun.gun_skill();
928  if( gun_skill == skill_archery ) {
929  return 30 + 220 / ( 1 + std::min( get_skill_level( gun_skill ), static_cast<float>( MAX_SKILL ) ) );
930  } else {
931  return 200 - 10 * std::min( get_skill_level( gun_skill ), static_cast<float>( MAX_SKILL ) );
932  }
933 }
934 
935 aim_mods_cache Character::gen_aim_mods_cache( const item &gun )const
936 {
937  parallax_cache parallaxes{ get_character_parallax( true ), get_character_parallax( false ) };
938  return { get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_skill_mod, gun.gun_skill() ), get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_dex_mod ), get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_mod ), most_accurate_aiming_method_limit( gun ), aim_factor_from_volume( gun ), aim_factor_from_length( gun ), parallaxes };
939 }
940 
941 double Character::fastest_aiming_method_speed( const item &gun, double recoil,
942  const Target_attributes &target_attributes,
943  const std::optional<std::reference_wrapper<const parallax_cache>> parallax_cache ) const
944 {
945  // Get fastest aiming method that can be used to improve aim further below @ref recoil.
946 
947  skill_id gun_skill = gun.gun_skill();
948  // aim with instinct (point shooting)
949 
950  // When it is a negative number, the effect of reducing the aiming speed is very significant.
951  // When it is a positive number, a large value is needed to significantly increase the aiming speed
952  double point_shooting_speed_modifier = 0;
953  if( gun_skill == skill_pistol ) {
954  point_shooting_speed_modifier = 10 + 4 * get_skill_level( gun_skill );
955  } else {
956  point_shooting_speed_modifier = get_skill_level( gun_skill );
957  }
958 
959  double aim_speed_modifier = modified_sight_speed( point_shooting_speed_modifier,
960  point_shooting_limit( gun ), recoil );
961  // aim with iron sight
962  if( !gun.has_flag( flag_DISABLE_SIGHTS ) ) {
963  const int iron_sight_FOV = 480;
964  int effective_iron_sight_dispersion = effective_dispersion( gun.type->gun->sight_dispersion );
965  double iron_sight_speed = modified_sight_speed( 0, effective_iron_sight_dispersion, recoil );
966  if( effective_iron_sight_dispersion < recoil && iron_sight_speed > aim_speed_modifier &&
967  recoil <= iron_sight_FOV ) {
968  aim_speed_modifier = iron_sight_speed;
969  }
970  }
971 
972  // aim with other sights
973 
974  // to check whether laser sights are available
975  const int base_distance = 10;
976  const float light_limit = 120.0f;
977  bool laser_light_available = target_attributes.range <= ( base_distance + per_cur ) * std::max(
978  1.0f - target_attributes.light / light_limit, 0.0f ) && target_attributes.visible;
979  // There are only two kinds of parallaxes, one with zoom and one without. So cache them.
980  std::vector<std::optional<int>> parallaxes;
981  parallaxes.resize( 2 );
982  if( parallax_cache.has_value() ) {
983  parallaxes[0].emplace( parallax_cache.value().get().parallax_without_zoom );
984  parallaxes[1].emplace( parallax_cache.value().get().parallax_with_zoom );
985  }
986  for( const item *e : gun.gunmods() ) {
987  const islot_gunmod &mod = *e->type->gunmod;
988  if( mod.sight_dispersion < 0 || mod.field_of_view <= 0 ) {
989  continue; // skip gunmods which don't provide a sight
990  }
991  if( e->has_flag( flag_LASER_SIGHT ) && !laser_light_available ) {
992  continue;
993  }
994  bool zoom = e->has_flag( flag_ZOOM );
995  // zoom==true will access parallaxes[1], zoom==false will access parallaxes[0].
996  int parallax = parallaxes[static_cast<int>( zoom )].has_value() ? parallaxes[static_cast<int>
997  ( zoom )].value() : get_character_parallax( zoom );
998  parallaxes[static_cast<int>( zoom )].emplace( parallax );
999  // Maunal expansion of effective_dispersion() for performance.
1000  double e_effective_dispersion = parallax + mod.sight_dispersion;
1001 
1002  // The character can hardly get the aiming speed bonus from a non-magnifier sight when aiming at a target that is too far or too small
1003  double effective_aim_speed_modifier = 4 * parallax >
1004  target_attributes.size_in_moa ? std::min( 0.0, mod.aim_speed_modifier ) : mod.aim_speed_modifier;
1005  if( e_effective_dispersion < recoil && recoil <= mod.field_of_view ) {
1006  double e_speed = recoil < mod.field_of_view ? modified_sight_speed( effective_aim_speed_modifier,
1007  e_effective_dispersion, recoil ) : 0;
1008  if( e_speed > aim_speed_modifier ) {
1009  aim_speed_modifier = e_speed;
1010  }
1011  }
1012 
1013  }
1014  return aim_speed_modifier;
1015 }
1016 
1017 int Character::most_accurate_aiming_method_limit( const item &gun ) const
1018 {
1019  if( !gun.is_gun() ) {
1020  return 0;
1021  }
1022 
1023  int limit = point_shooting_limit( gun );
1024 
1025  if( !gun.has_flag( flag_DISABLE_SIGHTS ) ) {
1026  int iron_sight_limit = effective_dispersion( gun.type->gun->sight_dispersion );
1027  if( limit > iron_sight_limit ) {
1028  limit = iron_sight_limit;
1029  }
1030  }
1031 
1032  for( const item *e : gun.gunmods() ) {
1033  const islot_gunmod &mod = *e->type->gunmod;
1034  if( mod.field_of_view > 0 && mod.sight_dispersion >= 0 ) {
1035  limit = std::min( limit, effective_dispersion( mod.sight_dispersion, e->has_flag( flag_ZOOM ) ) );
1036  }
1037  }
1038 
1039  return limit;
1040 }
1041 
1042 double Character::aim_factor_from_volume( const item &gun ) const
1043 {
1044  skill_id gun_skill = gun.gun_skill();
1045  double wielded_volume = gun.volume() / 1_ml;
1046  // this is only here for mod support
1047  if( gun.has_flag( flag_COLLAPSIBLE_STOCK ) ) {
1048  // use the unfolded volume
1049  wielded_volume += gun.collapsed_volume_delta() / 1_ml;
1050  }
1051 
1052  double factor = gun_skill == skill_pistol ? 4 : 1;
1053  double min_volume_without_debuff = 800;
1054  if( wielded_volume > min_volume_without_debuff ) {
1055  factor *= std::pow( min_volume_without_debuff / wielded_volume, 0.333333 );
1056  }
1057 
1058  return std::max( factor, 0.2 ) ;
1059 }
1060 
1061 static bool is_obstacle( tripoint pos )
1062 {
1063  return get_map().coverage( pos ) >= 50;
1064 }
1065 
1066 double Character::aim_factor_from_length( const item &gun ) const
1067 {
1068  tripoint cur_pos = pos();
1069  bool nw_to_se = is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_south_east ) &&
1070  is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_north_west );
1071  bool w_to_e = is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_west ) &&
1072  is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_east );
1073  bool sw_to_ne = is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_south_west ) &&
1074  is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_north_east );
1075  bool n_to_s = is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_north ) &&
1076  is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_south );
1077  double wielded_length = gun.length() / 1_mm;
1078  double factor = 1.0;
1079 
1080  if( nw_to_se || w_to_e || sw_to_ne || n_to_s ) {
1081  factor = 1.0 - static_cast<float>( ( wielded_length - 300 ) / 1000 );
1082  factor = std::min( factor, 1.0 );
1083  }
1084  return std::max( factor, 0.2 ) ;
1085 }
1086 
1087 double Character::aim_per_move( const item &gun, double recoil,
1088  const Target_attributes &target_attributes,
1089  std::optional<std::reference_wrapper<const aim_mods_cache>> aim_cache ) const
1090 {
1091  if( !gun.is_gun() ) {
1092  return 0.0;
1093  }
1094  bool use_cache = aim_cache.has_value();
1095  double sight_speed_modifier = fastest_aiming_method_speed( gun, recoil, target_attributes,
1096  use_cache ? std::make_optional( std::ref( aim_cache.value().get().parallaxes ) ) : std::nullopt );
1097  int limit = use_cache ? aim_cache.value().get().limit :
1098  most_accurate_aiming_method_limit( gun );
1099  if( sight_speed_modifier == INT_MIN ) {
1100  // No suitable sights (already at maximum aim).
1101  return 0;
1102  }
1103 
1104  // Overall strategy for determining aim speed is to sum the factors that contribute to it,
1105  // then scale that speed by current recoil level.
1106  // Player capabilities make aiming faster, and aim speed slows down as it approaches 0.
1107  // Base speed is non-zero to prevent extreme rate changes as aim speed approaches 0.
1108  double aim_speed = 10.0;
1109 
1110  skill_id gun_skill = gun.gun_skill();
1111 
1112  aim_speed += sight_speed_modifier;
1113 
1114  if( !use_cache ) {
1115  // Ranges [-1.5 - 3.5] for archery Ranges [0 - 2.5] for others
1116  aim_speed += get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_skill_mod, gun_skill );
1117 
1118  /** @EFFECT_DEX increases aiming speed */
1119  // every DEX increases 0.5 aim_speed
1120  aim_speed += get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_dex_mod );
1121 
1122  aim_speed *= get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_mod );
1123  } else {
1124  aim_speed += aim_cache.value().get().aim_speed_skill_mod;
1125 
1126  aim_speed += aim_cache.value().get().aim_speed_dex_mod;
1127 
1128  aim_speed *= aim_cache.value().get().aim_speed_mod;
1129  }
1130 
1131  // finally multiply everything by a harsh function that is eliminated by 7.5 gunskill
1132  aim_speed /= std::max( 1.0, 2.5 - 0.2 * get_skill_level( gun_skill ) );
1133  // Use a milder attenuation function to replace the previous logarithmic attenuation function when recoil is closed to 0.
1134  aim_speed *= std::max( recoil / MAX_RECOIL, 1 - logarithmic_range( 0, MAX_RECOIL, recoil ) );
1135 
1136  // add 4 max aim speed per skill up to 5 skill, then 1 per skill for skill 5-10
1137  double base_aim_speed_cap = 5.0 + 1.0 * get_skill_level( gun_skill ) + std::max( 10.0,
1138  3.0 * get_skill_level( gun_skill ) );
1139  if( !use_cache ) {
1140  // This upper limit usually only affects the first half of the aiming process
1141  // Pistols have a much higher aiming speed limit
1142  aim_speed = std::min( aim_speed, base_aim_speed_cap * aim_factor_from_volume( gun ) );
1143 
1144  // When the character is in an open area, it will not be affected by the length of the weapon.
1145  // This upper limit usually only affects the first half of the aiming process
1146  // Weapons shorter than carbine are usually not affected by it
1147  aim_speed = std::min( aim_speed, base_aim_speed_cap * aim_factor_from_length( gun ) );
1148  } else {
1149  aim_speed = std::min( aim_speed,
1150  base_aim_speed_cap * aim_cache.value().get().aim_factor_from_volume );
1151 
1152  aim_speed = std::min( aim_speed,
1153  base_aim_speed_cap * aim_cache.value().get().aim_factor_from_length );
1154  }
1155  // Just a raw scaling factor.
1156  aim_speed *= 2.4;
1157 
1158  // Minimum improvement is 0.01MoA. This is just to prevent data anomalies
1159  aim_speed = std::max( aim_speed, MIN_RECOIL_IMPROVEMENT );
1160 
1161  // Never improve by more than the currently used sights permit.
1162  return std::min( aim_speed, recoil - limit );
1163 }
1164 
1165 int Character::get_dodges_left() const
1166 {
1167  return dodges_left;
1168 }
1169 
1170 void Character::set_dodges_left( int dodges )
1171 {
1172  dodges_left = dodges;
1173 }
1174 
1175 void Character::mod_dodges_left( int mod )
1176 {
1177  dodges_left += mod;
1178 }
1179 
1180 void Character::consume_dodge_attempts()
1181 {
1182  if( get_dodges_left() > 0 ) {
1183  mod_dodges_left( -1 );
1184  }
1185 }
1186 
1187 ret_val<void> Character::can_try_doge( bool ignore_dodges_left ) const
1188 {
1189  //If we're asleep or busy we can't dodge
1190  if( in_sleep_state() || has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ||
1191  has_effect( effect_winded ) || has_effect( effect_fearparalyze ) || is_driving() ) {
1192  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MELEE, "Unable to dodge (sleeping, winded, or driving)" );
1193  return ret_val<void>::make_failure();
1194  }
1195  //If stamina is too low we can't dodge
1196  if( get_stamina_dodge_modifier() <= 0.11 ) {
1197  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MELEE, "Stamina too low to doge. Stamina: %d", get_stamina() );
1198  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MELEE, "Stamina dodge modifier: %f", get_stamina_dodge_modifier() );
1199  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( !is_npc() ? _( "Your stamina is too low to attempt to dodge." )
1200  :
1201  _( "<npcname>'s stamina is too low to attempt to dodge." ) );;
1202  }
1203  // Ensure no attempt to dodge without sources of extra dodges, eg martial arts
1204  if( get_dodges_left() <= 0 && !ignore_dodges_left ) {
1205  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MELEE, "No remaining dodge attempts" );
1206  return ret_val<void>::make_failure();
1207  }
1208  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
1209 }
1210 
1211 float Character::get_stamina_dodge_modifier() const
1212 {
1213  const double stamina = get_stamina();
1214  const double stamina_min = get_stamina_max() * 0.1;
1215  const double stamina_max = get_stamina_max() * 0.9;
1216  const double stamina_logistic = 1.0 - logarithmic_range( stamina_min, stamina_max, stamina );
1217  return stamina_logistic;
1218 }
1219 
1220 void Character::tally_organic_size()
1221 {
1222  float ret = 0.0;
1223  for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts() ) {
1224  if( !part->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
1225  ret += part->hit_size;
1226  }
1227  }
1228  cached_organic_size = ret / 100.0f;
1229  //return creature_anatomy->get_organic_size_sum() / 100.0f;
1230 }
1231 
1232 float Character::get_cached_organic_size() const
1233 {
1234  return cached_organic_size;
1235 }
1236 
1237 int Character::sight_range( float light_level ) const
1238 {
1239  if( light_level == 0 ) {
1240  return 1;
1241  }
1242  /* Via Beer-Lambert we have:
1243  * light_level * (1 / exp( LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance) ) <= LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW
1244  * Solving for distance:
1245  * 1 / exp( LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance ) <= LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW / light_level
1246  * 1 <= exp( LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance ) * LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW / light_level
1247  * light_level <= exp( LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance ) * LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW
1248  * log(light_level) <= LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance + log(LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW)
1249  * log(light_level) - log(LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW) <= LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance
1250  * log(LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW / light_level) <= LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance
1251  * log(LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW / light_level) * (1 / LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR) <= distance
1252  */
1253 
1254  int range = static_cast<int>( -std::log( get_vision_threshold( get_map().ambient_light_at(
1255  pos() ) ) / light_level ) / LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR );
1256 
1257  // Clamp to [1, sight_max].
1258  return clamp( range, 1, sight_max );
1259 }
1260 
1261 int Character::unimpaired_range() const
1262 {
1263  return std::min( sight_max, 60 );
1264 }
1265 
1266 bool Character::overmap_los( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt, int sight_points ) const
1267 {
1268  const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = global_omt_location();
1269  const point_rel_omt offset = omt.xy() - ompos.xy();
1270  if( offset.x() < -sight_points || offset.x() > sight_points ||
1271  offset.y() < -sight_points || offset.y() > sight_points ) {
1272  // Outside maximum sight range
1273  return false;
1274  }
1275 
1276  const std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> line = line_to( ompos, omt );
1277  for( size_t i = 0; i < line.size() && sight_points >= 0; i++ ) {
1278  const tripoint_abs_omt &pt = line[i];
1279  const oter_id &ter = overmap_buffer.ter( pt );
1280  sight_points -= static_cast<int>( ter->get_see_cost() );
1281  if( sight_points < 0 ) {
1282  return false;
1283  }
1284  }
1285  return true;
1286 }
1287 
1288 int Character::overmap_sight_range( float light_level ) const
1289 {
1290  int sight = sight_range( light_level );
1291  if( sight < SEEX ) {
1292  sight = 0;
1293  }
1294  if( sight <= SEEX * 4 ) {
1295  sight /= ( SEEX / 2 );
1296  }
1297 
1298  if( sight > 0 ) {
1299  sight = 6;
1300  }
1301 
1302  sight += enchantment_cache->get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::OVERMAP_SIGHT );
1303 
1304  float multiplier = 1 + enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( enchant_vals::mod::OVERMAP_SIGHT );
1305 
1306  // If sight got changed due OVERMAP_SIGHT, process the rest of the modifiers, otherwise skip them
1307  if( sight > 0 ) {
1308  // The higher your perception, the farther you can see.
1309  sight += static_cast<int>( get_per() / 2 );
1310  // The higher up you are, the farther you can see.
1311  sight += std::max( 0, posz() ) * 2;
1312 
1313  // Binoculars double your sight range.
1314  // When adding checks here, also call game::update_overmap_seen at the place they first become true
1315  const bool has_optic = cache_has_item_with( flag_ZOOM ) ||
1316  has_flag( json_flag_ENHANCED_VISION ) ||
1317  ( is_mounted() && mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_MECH_RECON_VISION ) ) ||
1318  get_map().veh_at( pos() ).avail_part_with_feature( "ENHANCED_VISION" ).has_value();
1319 
1320  if( has_optic ) {
1321  multiplier += 1;
1322  }
1323  }
1324 
1325  if( sight == 0 ) {
1326  return 0;
1327  }
1328 
1329  sight = std::round( sight * multiplier );
1330  return std::max( sight, 3 );
1331 }
1332 
1333 int Character::clairvoyance() const
1334 {
1335  if( vision_mode_cache[VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE_SUPER] ) {
1336  return MAX_CLAIRVOYANCE;
1337  }
1338 
1339  if( vision_mode_cache[VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE_PLUS] ) {
1340  return 8;
1341  }
1342 
1343  if( vision_mode_cache[VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE] ) {
1344  return 3;
1345  }
1346 
1347  return 0;
1348 }
1349 
1350 bool Character::sight_impaired() const
1351 {
1352  const bool in_light = get_map().ambient_light_at( pos() ) > LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT;
1353  return ( ( has_effect( effect_boomered ) || has_effect( effect_no_sight ) ||
1354  has_effect( effect_darkness ) ) &&
1355  ( !has_trait( trait_PER_SLIME_OK ) ) ) ||
1356  ( underwater && !has_flag( json_flag_EYE_MEMBRANE ) &&
1357  !worn_with_flag( flag_SWIM_GOGGLES ) ) ||
1358  ( ( has_flag( json_flag_MYOPIC ) || ( in_light && has_flag( json_flag_MYOPIC_IN_LIGHT ) ) ) &&
1359  !worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_NEARSIGHT ) &&
1360  !has_effect( effect_contacts ) &&
1361  !has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) &&
1362  !has_flag( json_flag_ENHANCED_VISION ) ) ||
1363  has_trait( trait_PER_SLIME ) || is_blind();
1364 }
1365 
1366 bool Character::has_alarm_clock() const
1367 {
1368  map &here = get_map();
1369  return cache_has_item_with_flag( flag_ALARMCLOCK, true ) ||
1370  ( here.veh_at( pos() ) &&
1371  !empty( here.veh_at( pos() )->vehicle().get_avail_parts( "ALARMCLOCK" ) ) ) ||
1372  has_flag( json_flag_ALARMCLOCK );
1373 }
1374 
1375 bool Character::has_watch() const
1376 {
1377  map &here = get_map();
1378  return cache_has_item_with_flag( flag_WATCH, true ) ||
1379  ( here.veh_at( pos() ) &&
1380  !empty( here.veh_at( pos() )->vehicle().get_avail_parts( "WATCH" ) ) ) ||
1381  has_flag( json_flag_WATCH );
1382 }
1383 
1384 void Character::react_to_felt_pain( int intensity )
1385 {
1386  if( intensity <= 0 ) {
1387  return;
1388  }
1389  if( uistate.distraction_pain && is_avatar() && intensity >= 2 ) {
1390  g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::pain, _( "Ouch, something hurts!" ) );
1391  }
1392  // Only a large pain burst will actually wake people while sleeping.
1393  if( has_effect( effect_sleep ) && get_effect( effect_sleep ).get_duration() > 0_turns &&
1394  !has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
1395  int pain_thresh = rng( 3, 5 );
1396 
1397  if( has_bionic( bio_sleep_shutdown ) ) {
1398  pain_thresh += 999;
1399  } else if( has_trait( trait_HEAVYSLEEPER ) ) {
1400  pain_thresh += 2;
1401  } else if( has_trait( trait_HEAVYSLEEPER2 ) ) {
1402  pain_thresh += 5;
1403  }
1404 
1405  if( intensity >= pain_thresh ) {
1406  wake_up();
1407  }
1408  }
1409 }
1410 
1411 void Character::action_taken()
1412 {
1413  nv_cached = false;
1414 }
1415 
1416 int Character::swim_speed() const
1417 {
1418  int ret;
1419  if( is_mounted() ) {
1420  monster *mon = mounted_creature.get();
1421  // no difference in swim speed by monster type yet.
1422  // TODO: difference in swim speed by monster type.
1423  // No monsters are currently mountable and can swim, though mods may allow this.
1424  if( mon->swims() ) {
1425  ret = 25;
1426  ret += get_weight() / 120_gram - 50 * ( mon->get_size() - 1 );
1427  return ret;
1428  }
1429  }
1430  const body_part_set usable = exclusive_flag_coverage( flag_ALLOWS_NATURAL_ATTACKS );
1431  float hand_bonus_mult = ( usable.test( body_part_hand_l ) ? 0.5f : 0.0f ) +
1432  ( usable.test( body_part_hand_r ) ? 0.5f : 0.0f );
1433 
1434  // base swim speed.
1435  float swim_speed_mult = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::MOVECOST_SWIM_MOD, 1 );
1436  ret = ( 440 * swim_speed_mult ) + weight_carried() /
1437  ( 60_gram / swim_speed_mult ) - 50 * get_skill_level( skill_swimming );
1438  /** @EFFECT_STR increases swim speed bonus from PAWS */
1439  if( has_trait( trait_PAWS ) ) {
1440  ret -= hand_bonus_mult * ( 20 + str_cur * 3 );
1441  }
1442  /** @EFFECT_STR increases swim speed bonus from PAWS_LARGE */
1443  if( has_trait( trait_PAWS_LARGE ) ) {
1444  ret -= hand_bonus_mult * ( 20 + str_cur * 4 );
1445  }
1446  /** @EFFECT_STR increases swim speed bonus from swim_fins */
1447  if( worn_with_flag( flag_FIN, body_part_foot_l ) ||
1448  worn_with_flag( flag_FIN, body_part_foot_r ) ) {
1449  if( worn_with_flag( flag_FIN, body_part_foot_l ) &&
1450  worn_with_flag( flag_FIN, body_part_foot_r ) ) {
1451  ret -= ( 15 * str_cur );
1452  } else {
1453  ret -= ( 15 * str_cur ) / 2;
1454  }
1455  }
1456  /** @EFFECT_STR increases swim speed bonus from WEBBED and WEBBED_FEET */
1457  float webbing_factor = 60 + str_cur * 5;
1458  if( has_flag( json_flag_WEBBED_HANDS ) ) {
1459  ret -= hand_bonus_mult * webbing_factor * 0.5f;
1460  }
1461  if( has_flag( json_flag_WEBBED_FEET ) && is_barefoot() ) {
1462  ret -= webbing_factor * 0.5f;
1463  }
1464  /** @EFFECT_SWIMMING increases swim speed */
1465  ret *= get_modifier( character_modifier_swim_mod );
1466  ret += worn.swim_modifier( round( get_skill_level( skill_swimming ) ) );
1467  /** @EFFECT_STR increases swim speed */
1468 
1469  /** @EFFECT_DEX increases swim speed */
1470  ret -= str_cur * 6 + dex_cur * 4;
1471  if( worn_with_flag( flag_FLOTATION ) ) {
1472  ret = std::min( ret, 400 );
1473  ret = std::max( ret, 200 );
1474  }
1475  // If (ret > 500), we can not swim; so do not apply the underwater bonus.
1476  if( underwater && ret < 500 ) {
1477  ret -= 50;
1478  }
1479 
1480  ret += move_mode->swim_speed_mod();
1481 
1482  if( ret < 30 ) {
1483  ret = 30;
1484  }
1485  return ret;
1486 }
1487 
1488 bool Character::is_on_ground() const
1489 {
1490  return ( !enough_working_legs() && !weapon.has_flag( flag_CRUTCHES ) ) ||
1491  has_effect( effect_downed ) || is_prone();
1492 }
1493 
1494 bool Character::can_stash( const item &it, bool ignore_pkt_settings )
1495 {
1496  return best_pocket( it, nullptr, ignore_pkt_settings ).second != nullptr;
1497 }
1498 
1499 bool Character::can_stash( const item &it, int &copies_remaining, bool ignore_pkt_settings )
1500 {
1501  bool stashed_any = false;
1502 
1503  for( item_location loc : top_items_loc() ) {
1504  if( loc->can_contain( it, copies_remaining, false, false, ignore_pkt_settings ).success() ) {
1505  stashed_any = true;
1506  }
1507  if( copies_remaining <= 0 ) {
1508  return stashed_any;
1509  }
1510  }
1511  return stashed_any;
1512 }
1513 
1514 bool Character::can_stash_partial( const item &it, bool ignore_pkt_settings )
1515 {
1516  item copy = it;
1517  if( it.count_by_charges() ) {
1518  copy.charges = 1;
1519  }
1520 
1521  return can_stash( copy, ignore_pkt_settings );
1522 }
1523 
1524 void Character::cancel_stashed_activity()
1525 {
1526  stashed_outbounds_activity = player_activity();
1527  stashed_outbounds_backlog = player_activity();
1528 }
1529 
1530 player_activity Character::get_stashed_activity() const
1531 {
1532  return stashed_outbounds_activity;
1533 }
1534 
1535 void Character::set_stashed_activity( const player_activity &act, const player_activity &act_back )
1536 {
1537  stashed_outbounds_activity = act;
1538  stashed_outbounds_backlog = act_back;
1539 }
1540 
1541 bool Character::has_stashed_activity() const
1542 {
1543  return static_cast<bool>( stashed_outbounds_activity );
1544 }
1545 
1546 void Character::assign_stashed_activity()
1547 {
1548  activity = stashed_outbounds_activity;
1549  backlog.push_front( stashed_outbounds_backlog );
1550  cancel_stashed_activity();
1551 }
1552 
1553 bool Character::check_outbounds_activity( const player_activity &act, bool check_only )
1554 {
1555  map &here = get_map();
1556  if( ( act.placement != tripoint_abs_ms() && act.placement != player_activity::invalid_place &&
1557  !here.inbounds( here.getlocal( act.placement ) ) ) || ( !act.coords.empty() &&
1558  !here.inbounds( here.getlocal( act.coords.back() ) ) ) ) {
1559  if( is_npc() && !check_only ) {
1560  // stash activity for when reloaded.
1561  stashed_outbounds_activity = act;
1562  if( !backlog.empty() ) {
1563  stashed_outbounds_backlog = backlog.front();
1564  }
1565  activity = player_activity();
1566  }
1567  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER,
1568  "npc %s at pos %s, activity target is not inbounds at %s therefore "
1569  "activity was stashed",
1570  disp_name(), pos().to_string_writable(),
1571  act.placement.to_string_writable() );
1572  return true;
1573  }
1574  return false;
1575 }
1576 
1577 void Character::set_destination_activity( const player_activity &new_destination_activity )
1578 {
1579  destination_activity = new_destination_activity;
1580 }
1581 
1582 void Character::clear_destination_activity()
1583 {
1584  destination_activity = player_activity();
1585 }
1586 
1587 player_activity Character::get_destination_activity() const
1588 {
1589  return destination_activity;
1590 }
1591 
1592 void Character::mount_creature( monster &z )
1593 {
1594  tripoint pnt = z.pos();
1595  shared_ptr_fast<monster> mons = g->shared_from( z );
1596  if( mons == nullptr ) {
1597  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "mount_creature(): monster not found in critter_tracker" );
1598  return;
1599  }
1600 
1601  add_effect( effect_riding, 1_turns, true );
1602  z.add_effect( effect_ridden, 1_turns, true );
1603  if( z.has_effect( effect_tied ) ) {
1604  z.remove_effect( effect_tied );
1605  if( z.tied_item ) {
1606  i_add( *z.tied_item );
1607  z.tied_item.reset();
1608  }
1609  }
1610  z.mounted_player_id = getID();
1611  if( z.has_effect( effect_harnessed ) ) {
1612  z.remove_effect( effect_harnessed );
1613  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You remove the %s's harness." ), z.get_name() );
1614  }
1615  mounted_creature = mons;
1616  mons->mounted_player = this;
1617  avatar &player_avatar = get_avatar();
1618  if( is_avatar() && player_avatar.get_grab_type() != object_type::NONE ) {
1619  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You let go of the grabbed object." ) );
1620  player_avatar.grab( object_type::NONE );
1621  }
1622  add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You climb on the %s." ), z.get_name() );
1623  if( z.has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
1624  if( !z.type->mech_weapon.is_empty() ) {
1625  item mechwep = item( z.type->mech_weapon );
1626  set_wielded_item( mechwep );
1627  }
1628  add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You hear your %s whir to life." ), z.get_name() );
1629  }
1630  if( is_avatar() ) {
1631  if( player_avatar.is_hauling() ) {
1632  player_avatar.stop_hauling();
1633  }
1634  g->place_player( pnt );
1635  } else {
1636  npc &guy = dynamic_cast<npc &>( *this );
1637  guy.setpos( pnt );
1638  }
1639  z.facing = facing;
1640  // some rideable mechs have night-vision
1641  recalc_sight_limits();
1642  if( is_avatar() && z.has_flag( mon_flag_MECH_RECON_VISION ) ) {
1643  // mech night-vision counts as optics for overmap sight range.
1644  g->update_overmap_seen();
1645  }
1646  mod_moves( -100 );
1647 }
1648 
1649 bool Character::check_mount_will_move( const tripoint &dest_loc )
1650 {
1651  if( !is_mounted() || mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_COMBAT_MOUNT ) ) {
1652  return true;
1653  }
1654  if( mounted_creature && mounted_creature->type->has_fear_trigger( mon_trigger::HOSTILE_CLOSE ) ) {
1655  for( const monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
1656  if( critter.is_hallucination() ) {
1657  continue;
1658  }
1659  Attitude att = critter.attitude_to( *this );
1660  if( att == Attitude::HOSTILE && sees( critter ) && rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= 15 &&
1661  rl_dist( dest_loc, critter.pos() ) < rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() ) ) {
1662  add_msg_if_player( _( "You fail to budge your %s!" ), mounted_creature->get_name() );
1663  return false;
1664  }
1665  }
1666  }
1667  return true;
1668 }
1669 
1670 bool Character::check_mount_is_spooked()
1671 {
1672  if( !is_mounted() ) {
1673  return false;
1674  }
1675  // chance to spook per monster nearby:
1676  // base 1% per turn.
1677  // + 1% per square closer than 15 distance. (1% - 15%)
1678  // * 2 if hostile monster is bigger than or same size as mounted creature.
1679  // -0.25% per point of dexterity (low -1%, average -2%, high -3%, extreme -3.5%)
1680  // -0.1% per point of strength ( low -0.4%, average -0.8%, high -1.2%, extreme -1.4% )
1681  // / 2 if horse has full tack and saddle.
1682  // / 2 if mount has the monster flag COMBAT_MOUNT
1683  // Monster in spear reach monster and average stat (8) player on saddled horse, 14% -2% -0.8% / 2 = ~5%
1684  if( mounted_creature && mounted_creature->type->has_fear_trigger( mon_trigger::HOSTILE_CLOSE ) ) {
1685  const creature_size mount_size = mounted_creature->get_size();
1686  const bool saddled = mounted_creature->has_effect( effect_monster_saddled );
1687  const bool combat_mount = mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_COMBAT_MOUNT );
1688  for( const monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
1689  if( critter.is_hallucination() ) {
1690  continue;
1691  }
1692  double chance = 1.0;
1693  Attitude att = critter.attitude_to( *this );
1694  // actually too close now - horse might spook.
1695  if( att == Attitude::HOSTILE && sees( critter ) && rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= 10 ) {
1696  chance += 10 - rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() );
1697  if( critter.get_size() >= mount_size ) {
1698  chance *= 2;
1699  }
1700  chance -= 0.25 * get_dex();
1701  chance -= 0.1 * get_str();
1702  chance *= get_limb_score( limb_score_grip );
1703  if( saddled ) {
1704  chance /= 2;
1705  }
1706  if( combat_mount ) {
1707  chance /= 2;
1708  }
1709  chance = std::max( 1.0, chance );
1710  if( x_in_y( chance, 100.0 ) ) {
1711  forced_dismount();
1712  return true;
1713  }
1714  }
1715  }
1716  }
1717  return false;
1718 }
1719 
1720 bool Character::cant_do_mounted( bool msg ) const
1721 {
1722  if( is_mounted() ) {
1723  if( msg ) {
1724  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info, _( "You can't do that while mounted." ),
1725  _( "<npcname> can't do that while mounted." ) );
1726  }
1727  return true;
1728  }
1729  return false;
1730 }
1731 
1732 bool Character::is_mounted() const
1733 {
1734  return has_effect( effect_riding ) && mounted_creature;
1735 }
1736 
1737 void Character::forced_dismount()
1738 {
1739  remove_effect( effect_riding );
1740  bool mech = false;
1741  if( mounted_creature ) {
1742  auto *mon = mounted_creature.get();
1743  if( mon->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) && !mon->type->mech_weapon.is_empty() ) {
1744  mech = true;
1745  remove_item( weapon );
1746  }
1747  mon->mounted_player_id = character_id();
1748  mon->remove_effect( effect_ridden );
1749  mon->add_effect( effect_controlled, 5_turns );
1750  mounted_creature = nullptr;
1751  mon->mounted_player = nullptr;
1752  }
1753  std::vector<tripoint> valid;
1754  for( const tripoint &jk : get_map().points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
1755  if( g->is_empty( jk ) ) {
1756  valid.push_back( jk );
1757  }
1758  }
1759  if( !valid.empty() ) {
1760  setpos( random_entry( valid ) );
1761  if( mech ) {
1762  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You are ejected from your mech!" ),
1763  _( "<npcname> is ejected from their mech!" ) );
1764  } else {
1765  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You fall off your mount!" ),
1766  _( "<npcname> falls off their mount!" ) );
1767  }
1768  const int dodge = get_dodge();
1769  const int damage = std::max( 0, rng( 1, 20 ) - rng( dodge, dodge * 2 ) );
1770  bodypart_id hit( "bp_null" );
1771  switch( rng( 1, 10 ) ) {
1772  case 1:
1773  if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
1774  hit = body_part_foot_l;
1775  } else {
1776  hit = body_part_foot_r;
1777  }
1778  break;
1779  case 2:
1780  case 3:
1781  case 4:
1782  if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
1783  hit = body_part_leg_l;
1784  } else {
1785  hit = body_part_leg_r;
1786  }
1787  break;
1788  case 5:
1789  case 6:
1790  case 7:
1791  if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
1792  hit = body_part_arm_l;
1793  } else {
1794  hit = body_part_arm_r;
1795  }
1796  break;
1797  case 8:
1798  case 9:
1799  hit = body_part_torso;
1800  break;
1801  case 10:
1802  hit = body_part_head;
1803  break;
1804  }
1805  if( damage > 0 ) {
1806  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You hurt yourself!" ) );
1807  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
1808  deal_damage( nullptr, hit, damage_instance( damage_bash, damage ) );
1809  if( is_avatar() ) {
1810  get_memorial().add(
1811  pgettext( "memorial_male", "Fell off a mount." ),
1812  pgettext( "memorial_female", "Fell off a mount." ) );
1813  }
1814  check_dead_state();
1815  }
1816  add_effect( effect_downed, 5_turns, true );
1817  } else {
1818  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER,
1819  "Forced_dismount could not find a square to deposit player" );
1820  }
1821  if( is_avatar() ) {
1822  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
1823  if( player_character.get_grab_type() != object_type::NONE ) {
1824  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You let go of the grabbed object." ) );
1825  player_character.grab( object_type::NONE );
1826  }
1827  set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
1828  if( player_character.is_auto_moving() || player_character.has_destination() ||
1829  player_character.has_destination_activity() ) {
1830  player_character.clear_destination();
1831  }
1832  g->update_map( player_character );
1833  }
1834  if( activity ) {
1835  cancel_activity();
1836  }
1837  mod_moves( -get_speed() * 1.5 );
1838 }
1839 
1840 void Character::dismount()
1841 {
1842  if( !is_mounted() ) {
1843  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "dismount called when not riding" );
1844  return;
1845  }
1846  if( const std::optional<tripoint> pnt = choose_adjacent( _( "Dismount where?" ) ) ) {
1847  if( !g->is_empty( *pnt ) ) {
1848  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot dismount there!" ) );
1849  return;
1850  }
1851 
1852  remove_effect( effect_riding );
1853  monster *critter = mounted_creature.get();
1854  critter->mounted_player_id = character_id();
1855  if( critter->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) && !critter->type->mech_weapon.is_empty() &&
1856  weapon.typeId() == critter->type->mech_weapon ) {
1857  remove_item( weapon );
1858  }
1859  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
1860  if( is_avatar() && player_character.get_grab_type() != object_type::NONE ) {
1861  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You let go of the grabbed object." ) );
1862  player_character.grab( object_type::NONE );
1863  }
1864  critter->remove_effect( effect_ridden );
1865  critter->add_effect( effect_controlled, 5_turns );
1866  mounted_creature = nullptr;
1867  critter->mounted_player = nullptr;
1868  setpos( *pnt );
1869  mod_moves( -100 );
1870  set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
1871  }
1872 }
1873 
1874 float Character::stability_roll() const
1875 {
1876  /** @EFFECT_STR improves player stability roll */
1877 
1878  /** Balance and reaction scores influence stability rolls */
1879 
1880  /** @EFFECT_MELEE improves player stability roll */
1881  return ( get_melee() + get_str() ) * ( ( get_limb_score( limb_score_balance ) * 3 + get_limb_score(
1882  limb_score_reaction ) ) / 4.0f );
1883 }
1884 
1885 bool Character::is_dead_state() const
1886 {
1887  if( cached_dead_state.has_value() ) {
1888  return cached_dead_state.value();
1889  }
1890 
1891  cached_dead_state = false;
1892  // we want to warn the player with a debug message if they are invincible. this should be unimportant once wounds exist and bleeding is how you die.
1893  bool has_vitals = false;
1894  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
1895  if( bp->is_vital ) {
1896  has_vitals = true;
1897  if( get_part_hp_cur( bp ) <= 0 ) {
1898  cached_dead_state = true;
1899  return cached_dead_state.value();
1900  }
1901  }
1902  }
1903  if( !has_vitals ) {
1904  debugmsg( _( "WARNING! Player has no vital part and is invincible." ) );
1905  }
1906  return false;
1907 }
1908 
1909 void Character::set_part_hp_cur( const bodypart_id &id, int set )
1910 {
1911  bool is_broken_before = get_part_hp_cur( id ) <= 0;
1912  Creature::set_part_hp_cur( id, set );
1913  bool is_broken_after = get_part_hp_cur( id ) <= 0;
1914  // detect unbroken->broken (possible death) as well as broken->unbroken (possible revival)
1915  if( is_broken_before != is_broken_after ) {
1916  cached_dead_state.reset();
1917  }
1918 }
1919 
1920 void Character::mod_part_hp_cur( const bodypart_id &id, int set )
1921 {
1922  bool is_broken_before = get_part_hp_cur( id ) <= 0;
1923  Creature::mod_part_hp_cur( id, set );
1924  bool is_broken_after = get_part_hp_cur( id ) <= 0;
1925  // detect unbroken->broken (possible death) as well as broken->unbroken (possible revival)
1926  if( is_broken_before != is_broken_after ) {
1927  cached_dead_state.reset();
1928  }
1929 }
1930 
1931 void Character::on_try_dodge()
1932 {
1933  ret_val<void> can_dodge = can_try_doge();
1934  if( !can_dodge.success() ) {
1935  add_msg( m_bad, can_dodge.c_str() );
1936  return;
1937  }
1938 
1939  // Each attempt consumes an available dodge
1940  consume_dodge_attempts();
1941 
1942  const int base_burn_rate = get_option<int>( STATIC( "PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_BURN_RATE" ) );
1943  const float dodge_skill_modifier = ( 20.0f - get_skill_level( skill_dodge ) ) / 20.0f;
1944  burn_energy_legs( std::floor( static_cast<float>( base_burn_rate ) * 6.0f *
1945  dodge_skill_modifier ) );
1946  set_activity_level( EXTRA_EXERCISE );
1947 }
1948 
1949 void Character::on_dodge( Creature *source, float difficulty, float training_level )
1950 {
1951  // Make sure we're not practicing dodge in situation where we can't dodge
1952  // We can ignore dodges_left because it was already checked in get_dodge()
1953  if( !can_try_doge( true ).success() ) {
1954  return;
1955  }
1956 
1957  // dodging throws of our aim unless we are either skilled at dodging or using a small weapon
1958  if( is_armed() && weapon.is_gun() ) {
1959  recoil += std::max( weapon.volume() / 250_ml - get_skill_level( skill_dodge ), 0.0f ) * rng( 0,
1960  100 );
1961  recoil = std::min( MAX_RECOIL, recoil );
1962  }
1963 
1964  // Even if we are not to train still call practice to prevent skill rust
1965  difficulty = std::max( difficulty, 0.0f );
1966 
1967  // If training_level is set, treat that as the difficulty instead
1968  if( training_level != 0.0f ) {
1969  difficulty = training_level;
1970  }
1971 
1972  practice( skill_dodge, difficulty * 2, difficulty );
1973  martial_arts_data->ma_ondodge_effects( *this );
1974 
1975  // For adjacent attackers check for techniques usable upon successful dodge
1976  if( source && square_dist( pos(), source->pos() ) == 1 ) {
1977  matec_id tec = pick_technique( *source, used_weapon(), false, true, false );
1978 
1979  if( tec != tec_none && !is_dead_state() ) {
1980  if( get_stamina() < get_stamina_max() / 3 ) {
1981  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You try to counterattack, but you are too exhausted!" ) );
1982  } else {
1983  melee_attack( *source, false, tec );
1984  }
1985  }
1986  }
1987 }
1988 
1989 float Character::get_melee() const
1990 {
1991  return get_skill_level( skill_melee );
1992 }
1993 
1994 bool Character::uncanny_dodge()
1995 {
1996  bool is_u = is_avatar();
1997  bool seen = get_player_view().sees( *this );
1998 
1999  const units::energy trigger_cost = bio_uncanny_dodge->power_trigger;
2000 
2001  const bool can_dodge_bio = get_power_level() >= trigger_cost &&
2002  has_active_bionic( bio_uncanny_dodge );
2003  const bool can_dodge_mut = get_stamina() >= 300 && has_trait_flag( json_flag_UNCANNY_DODGE );
2004  const bool can_dodge_both = get_power_level() >= ( trigger_cost / 2 ) &&
2005  has_active_bionic( bio_uncanny_dodge ) &&
2006  get_stamina() >= 150 && has_trait_flag( json_flag_UNCANNY_DODGE );
2007 
2008  if( !( can_dodge_bio || can_dodge_mut || can_dodge_both ) ) {
2009  return false;
2010  }
2011  tripoint adjacent = adjacent_tile();
2012 
2013  if( can_dodge_both ) {
2014  mod_power_level( -trigger_cost / 2 );
2015  burn_energy_legs( -150 );
2016  } else if( can_dodge_bio ) {
2017  mod_power_level( -trigger_cost );
2018  } else if( can_dodge_mut ) {
2019  burn_energy_legs( -300 );
2020  }
2021 
2022  map &here = get_map();
2023  const optional_vpart_position veh_part = here.veh_at( pos() );
2024  if( in_vehicle && veh_part && veh_part.avail_part_with_feature( "SEATBELT" ) ) {
2025  return false;
2026  }
2027 
2028  //uncanny dodge triggered in car and wasn't secured by seatbelt
2029  if( in_vehicle && veh_part ) {
2030  here.unboard_vehicle( pos() );
2031  }
2032  if( adjacent.x != posx() || adjacent.y != posy() ) {
2033  set_pos_only( adjacent );
2034 
2035  //landed in a vehicle tile
2036  if( here.veh_at( pos() ) ) {
2037  here.board_vehicle( pos(), this );
2038  }
2039 
2040  if( is_u ) {
2041  add_msg( _( "Time seems to slow down, and you instinctively dodge!" ) );
2042  } else if( seen ) {
2043  add_msg( _( "%s dodges… so fast!" ), this->disp_name() );
2044 
2045  }
2046  return true;
2047  }
2048  if( is_u ) {
2049  add_msg( _( "You try to dodge, but there's no room!" ) );
2050  } else if( seen ) {
2051  add_msg( _( "%s tries to dodge, but there's no room!" ), this->disp_name() );
2052  }
2053  return false;
2054 }
2055 
2056 bool Character::check_avoid_friendly_fire() const
2057 {
2058  double chance = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::AVOID_FRIENDRY_FIRE, 0.0 );
2059  return rng( 0, 99 ) < chance * 100.0;
2060 }
2061 
2062 void Character::handle_skill_warning( const skill_id &id, bool force_warning )
2063 {
2064  //remind the player intermittently that no skill gain takes place
2065  if( is_avatar() && ( force_warning || one_in( 5 ) ) ) {
2066  SkillLevel &level = get_skill_level_object( id );
2067 
2068  const Skill &skill = id.obj();
2069  std::string skill_name = skill.name();
2070  int curLevel = level.level();
2071 
2072  add_msg( m_info, _( "This task is too simple to train your %s beyond %d." ),
2073  skill_name, curLevel );
2074  }
2075 }
2076 
2077 bool Character::has_min_manipulators() const
2078 {
2079  return get_limb_score( limb_score_manip ) > MIN_MANIPULATOR_SCORE;
2080 }
2081 
2082 /** Returns true if the character has two functioning arms */
2083 bool Character::has_two_arms_lifting() const
2084 {
2085  // 0.5f is one "standard" arm, so if you have more than that you barely qualify.
2086  return get_limb_score( limb_score_lift, body_part_type::type::arm ) > 0.5f;
2087 }
2088 
2089 std::set<matec_id> Character::get_limb_techs() const
2090 {
2091  std::set<matec_id> result;
2092  for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts() ) {
2093  if( !natural_attack_restricted_on( part ) ) {
2094  std::set<matec_id> part_tech = get_part( part )->get_limb_techs();
2095  result.insert( part_tech.begin(), part_tech.end() );
2096  }
2097  }
2098  return result;
2099 }
2100 
2101 int Character::get_working_arm_count() const
2102 {
2103  int limb_count = 0;
2104  body_part_type::type arm_type = body_part_type::type::arm;
2105  for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts_of_type( arm_type ) ) {
2106  // Almost broken or overencumbered arms don't count
2107  if( get_part( part )->get_limb_score( limb_score_lift ) * part->limbtypes.at( arm_type ) >= 0.1 &&
2108  !get_part( part )->is_limb_overencumbered() ) {
2109  limb_count++;
2110  }
2111  }
2112  return limb_count;
2113 }
2114 
2115 // working is defined here as not broken
2116 bool Character::enough_working_legs() const
2117 {
2118  int limb_count = 0;
2119  int working_limb_count = 0;
2120  for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts() ) {
2121  if( part->primary_limb_type() == body_part_type::type::leg ) {
2122  limb_count++;
2123  if( !is_limb_broken( part ) ) {
2124  working_limb_count++;
2125  }
2126  }
2127  }
2128 
2129  return working_limb_count == limb_count;
2130 }
2131 
2132 // working is defined here as not broken
2133 int Character::get_working_leg_count() const
2134 {
2135  int working_limb_count = 0;
2136  for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts() ) {
2137  if( part->primary_limb_type() == body_part_type::type::leg ) {
2138  if( !is_limb_broken( part ) ) {
2139  working_limb_count++;
2140  }
2141  }
2142  }
2143 
2144  return working_limb_count;
2145 }
2146 
2147 // this is the source of truth on if a limb is broken so all code to determine
2148 // if a limb is broken should point here to make any future changes to breaking easier
2149 bool Character::is_limb_broken( const bodypart_id &limb ) const
2150 {
2151  return get_part_hp_cur( limb ) == 0;
2152 }
2153 
2154 bool Character::can_run() const
2155 {
2156  return get_stamina() > 0 && !has_effect( effect_winded ) && enough_working_legs();
2157 }
2158 
2159 move_mode_id Character::current_movement_mode() const
2160 {
2161  return move_mode;
2162 }
2163 
2164 bool Character::movement_mode_is( const move_mode_id &mode ) const
2165 {
2166  return move_mode == mode;
2167 }
2168 
2169 bool Character::is_running() const
2170 {
2171  return move_mode->type() == move_mode_type::RUNNING;
2172 }
2173 
2174 bool Character::is_walking() const
2175 {
2176  return move_mode->type() == move_mode_type::WALKING;
2177 }
2178 
2179 bool Character::is_crouching() const
2180 {
2181  return move_mode->type() == move_mode_type::CROUCHING;
2182 }
2183 
2184 bool Character::is_prone() const
2185 {
2186  return move_mode->type() == move_mode_type::PRONE;
2187 }
2188 
2189 int Character::footstep_sound() const
2190 {
2191  if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_SILENT ) ) {
2192  return 0;
2193  }
2194 
2195  double volume = is_stealthy() ? 3 : 6;
2196  if( volume > 0 ) {
2197  volume *= current_movement_mode()->sound_mult();
2198  if( is_mounted() ) {
2199  monster *mons = mounted_creature.get();
2200  switch( mons->get_size() ) {
2201  case creature_size::tiny:
2202  volume = 0; // No sound for the tinies
2203  break;
2204  case creature_size::small:
2205  volume /= 3;
2206  break;
2207  case creature_size::medium:
2208  break;
2209  case creature_size::large:
2210  volume *= 1.5;
2211  break;
2212  case creature_size::huge:
2213  volume *= 2;
2214  break;
2215  default:
2216  break;
2217  }
2218  if( mons->has_flag( mon_flag_LOUDMOVES ) ) {
2219  volume += 6;
2220  } else if( mons->has_flag( mon_flag_QUIETMOVES ) ) {
2221  volume /= 2;
2222  }
2223  } else {
2224  volume = calculate_by_enchantment( volume, enchant_vals::mod::FOOTSTEP_NOISE );
2225  }
2226  }
2227  return std::round( volume );
2228 }
2229 
2230 int Character::clatter_sound() const
2231 {
2232  return worn.clatter_sound();
2233 }
2234 
2235 void Character::make_footstep_noise() const
2236 {
2237  if( is_hallucination() ) {
2238  return;
2239  }
2240 
2241  const int volume = footstep_sound();
2242  if( volume <= 0 ) {
2243  return;
2244  }
2245  if( is_mounted() ) {
2246  sounds::sound( pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::movement,
2247  mounted_creature.get()->type->get_footsteps(),
2248  false, "none", "none" );
2249  } else {
2250  sounds::sound( pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "footsteps" ), true,
2251  "none", "none" ); // Sound of footsteps may awaken nearby monsters
2252  }
2253  sfx::do_footstep();
2254 }
2255 
2256 void Character::make_clatter_sound() const
2257 {
2258 
2259  const int volume = clatter_sound();
2260  if( volume <= 0 ) {
2261  return;
2262  }
2263  sounds::sound( pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "clattering equipment" ), true,
2264  "none", "none" ); // Sound of footsteps may awaken nearby monsters
2265 }
2266 
2267 steed_type Character::get_steed_type() const
2268 {
2269  steed_type steed;
2270  if( is_mounted() ) {
2271  if( mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
2272  steed = steed_type::MECH;
2273  } else {
2274  steed = steed_type::ANIMAL;
2275  }
2276  } else {
2277  steed = steed_type::NONE;
2278  }
2279  return steed;
2280 }
2281 
2282 bool Character::can_switch_to( const move_mode_id &mode ) const
2283 {
2284  // Only running modes are restricted at the moment and only when its your legs doing the running
2285  return get_steed_type() != steed_type::NONE || mode->type() != move_mode_type::RUNNING || can_run();
2286 }
2287 
2288 void Character::expose_to_disease( const diseasetype_id &dis_type )
2289 {
2290  const std::optional<int> &healt_thresh = dis_type->health_threshold;
2291  if( healt_thresh && healt_thresh.value() < get_lifestyle() ) {
2292  return;
2293  }
2294  const std::set<bodypart_str_id> &bps = dis_type->affected_bodyparts;
2295  if( !bps.empty() ) {
2296  for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : bps ) {
2297  add_effect( dis_type->symptoms, rng( dis_type->min_duration, dis_type->max_duration ), bp.id(),
2298  false,
2299  rng( dis_type->min_intensity, dis_type->max_intensity ) );
2300  }
2301  } else {
2302  add_effect( dis_type->symptoms, rng( dis_type->min_duration, dis_type->max_duration ),
2303  bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID(),
2304  false,
2305  rng( dis_type->min_intensity, dis_type->max_intensity ) );
2306  }
2307 }
2308 
2309 void Character::process_turn()
2310 {
2311  // Has to happen before reset_stats
2312  clear_miss_reasons();
2313  migrate_items_to_storage( false );
2314 
2315  for( bionic &i : *my_bionics ) {
2316  if( i.incapacitated_time > 0_turns ) {
2317  i.incapacitated_time -= 1_turns;
2318  if( i.incapacitated_time == 0_turns ) {
2319  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s bionic comes back online." ), i.info().name );
2320  }
2321  }
2322  }
2323 
2324  for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
2325  mutation_reflex_trigger( mut );
2326  }
2327 
2328  Creature::process_turn();
2329 
2330  // If we're actively handling something we can't just drop it on the ground
2331  // in the middle of handling it
2332  if( activity.targets.empty() && activity.do_drop_invalid_inventory() ) {
2333  drop_invalid_inventory();
2334  }
2335  if( leak_level_dirty ) {
2336  calculate_leak_level();
2337  }
2338  process_items();
2339  leak_items();
2340  // Didn't just pick something up
2341  last_item = itype_null;
2342 
2343  cache_visit_items_with( "is_relic", &item::is_relic, [this]( item & it ) {
2344  it.process_relic( this, pos() );
2345  } );
2346 
2347  suffer();
2348  // NPCs currently don't make any use of their scent, pointless to calculate it
2349  // TODO: make use of NPC scent.
2350  if( !is_npc() ) {
2351  if( !has_effect( effect_masked_scent ) ) {
2352  restore_scent();
2353  }
2354  const int mask_intensity = get_effect_int( effect_masked_scent );
2355 
2356  // Set our scent towards the norm
2357  int norm_scent = 500;
2358  int temp_norm_scent = INT_MIN;
2359  bool found_intensity = false;
2360  for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
2361  const std::optional<int> &scent_intensity = mut->scent_intensity;
2362  if( scent_intensity ) {
2363  found_intensity = true;
2364  temp_norm_scent = std::max( temp_norm_scent, *scent_intensity );
2365  }
2366  }
2367  if( found_intensity ) {
2368  norm_scent = temp_norm_scent;
2369  }
2370 
2371  norm_scent = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SCENT_MASK, norm_scent );
2372  //mask from scent altering items;
2373  norm_scent += mask_intensity;
2374 
2375  // Scent increases fast at first, and slows down as it approaches normal levels.
2376  // Estimate it will take about norm_scent * 2 turns to go from 0 - norm_scent / 2
2377  // Without smelly trait this is about 1.5 hrs. Slows down significantly after that.
2378  if( scent < rng( 0, norm_scent ) ) {
2379  scent++;
2380  }
2381 
2382  // Unusually high scent decreases steadily until it reaches normal levels.
2383  if( scent > norm_scent ) {
2384  scent--;
2385  }
2386  }
2387 
2388  // We can dodge again! Assuming we can actually move...
2389  if( in_sleep_state() ) {
2390  blocks_left = 0;
2391  set_dodges_left( 0 );
2392  } else if( moves > 0 ) {
2393  blocks_left = get_num_blocks();
2394  set_dodges_left( get_num_dodges() );
2395  }
2396 
2397  // auto-learning. This is here because skill-increases happens all over the place:
2398  // SkillLevel::readBook (has no connection to the skill or the player),
2399  // player::read, player::practice, ...
2400  // Check for spontaneous discovery of martial art styles
2401  for( auto &style : autolearn_martialart_types() ) {
2402  const matype_id &ma( style );
2403 
2404  if( !martial_arts_data->has_martialart( ma ) && can_autolearn( ma ) ) {
2405  martial_arts_data->add_martialart( ma );
2406  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have learned a new style: %s!" ), ma.obj().name );
2407  }
2408  }
2409 
2410  // Update time spent conscious in this overmap tile for the Nomad traits.
2411  if( !is_npc() && ( has_trait( trait_NOMAD ) || has_trait( trait_NOMAD2 ) ||
2412  has_trait( trait_NOMAD3 ) ) &&
2413  !has_effect( effect_sleep ) && !has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
2414  const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = global_omt_location();
2415  const point_abs_omt pos = ompos.xy();
2416  if( overmap_time.find( pos ) == overmap_time.end() ) {
2417  overmap_time[pos] = 1_turns;
2418  } else {
2419  overmap_time[pos] += 1_turns;
2420  }
2421  }
2422  // Decay time spent in other overmap tiles.
2423  if( !is_npc() && calendar::once_every( 1_hours ) ) {
2424  const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = global_omt_location();
2425  const time_point now = calendar::turn;
2426  time_duration decay_time = 0_days;
2427  if( has_trait( trait_NOMAD ) ) {
2428  decay_time = 7_days;
2429  } else if( has_trait( trait_NOMAD2 ) ) {
2430  decay_time = 14_days;
2431  } else if( has_trait( trait_NOMAD3 ) ) {
2432  decay_time = 28_days;
2433  }
2434  auto it = overmap_time.begin();
2435  while( it != overmap_time.end() ) {
2436  if( it->first == ompos.xy() ) {
2437  it++;
2438  continue;
2439  }
2440  // Find the amount of time passed since the player touched any of the overmap tile's submaps.
2441  const tripoint_abs_omt tpt( it->first, 0 );
2442  const time_point last_touched = overmap_buffer.scent_at( tpt ).creation_time;
2443  const time_duration since_visit = now - last_touched;
2444  // If the player has spent little time in this overmap tile, let it decay after just an hour instead of the usual extended decay time.
2445  const time_duration modified_decay_time = it->second > 5_minutes ? decay_time : 1_hours;
2446  if( since_visit > modified_decay_time ) {
2447  // Reduce the tracked time spent in this overmap tile.
2448  const time_duration decay_amount = std::min( since_visit - modified_decay_time, 1_hours );
2449  const time_duration updated_value = it->second - decay_amount;
2450  if( updated_value <= 0_turns ) {
2451  // We can stop tracking this tile if there's no longer any time recorded there.
2452  it = overmap_time.erase( it );
2453  continue;
2454  } else {
2455  it->second = updated_value;
2456  }
2457  }
2458  it++;
2459  }
2460  }
2461  effect_on_conditions::process_effect_on_conditions( *this );
2462 }
2463 
2464 void Character::recalc_hp()
2465 {
2466  int str_boost_val = 0;
2467  std::optional<skill_boost> str_boost = skill_boost::get( "str" );
2468  if( str_boost ) {
2469  float skill_total = 0;
2470  for( const std::string &skill_str : str_boost->skills() ) {
2471  skill_total += get_skill_level( skill_id( skill_str ) );
2472  }
2473  str_boost_val = str_boost->calc_bonus( skill_total );
2474  }
2475  // Mutated toughness stacks with starting, by design.
2476  float hp_mod = 1.0f + enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( enchant_vals::mod::MAX_HP );
2477  float hp_adjustment = ( str_boost_val * 3 ) +
2478  enchantment_cache->get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::MAX_HP );
2479  calc_all_parts_hp( hp_mod, hp_adjustment, get_str_base(), get_dex_base(), get_per_base(),
2480  get_int_base(), get_lifestyle(), get_fat_to_hp() );
2481  cached_dead_state.reset();
2482 }
2483 
2484 void Character::calc_all_parts_hp( float hp_mod, float hp_adjustment, int str_max, int dex_max,
2485  int per_max, int int_max, int healthy_mod, int fat_to_max_hp )
2486 {
2487  for( std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &part : body ) {
2488  int new_max = ( part.first->base_hp + str_max * part.first->hp_mods.str_mod + dex_max *
2489  part.first->hp_mods.dex_mod + int_max * part.first->hp_mods.int_mod + per_max *
2490  part.first->hp_mods.per_mod + part.first->hp_mods.health_mod * healthy_mod + fat_to_max_hp +
2491  hp_adjustment ) * hp_mod;
2492 
2493  if( has_trait( trait_GLASSJAW ) && part.first == body_part_head ) {
2494  new_max *= 0.8;
2495  }
2496 
2497  float max_hp_ratio = static_cast<float>( new_max ) /
2498  static_cast<float>( part.second.get_hp_max() );
2499 
2500  int new_cur = std::ceil( static_cast<float>( part.second.get_hp_cur() ) * max_hp_ratio );
2501 
2502  part.second.set_hp_max( std::max( new_max, 1 ) );
2503  part.second.set_hp_cur( std::max( std::min( new_cur, new_max ), 0 ) );
2504  }
2505 }
2506 
2507 // This must be called when any of the following change:
2508 // - effects
2509 // - bionics
2510 // - traits
2511 // - underwater
2512 // - clothes
2513 // With the exception of clothes, all changes to these character attributes must
2514 // occur through a function in this class which calls this function. Clothes are
2515 // typically added/removed with wear() and takeoff(), but direct access to the
2516 // 'wears' vector is still allowed due to refactor exhaustion.
2517 void Character::recalc_sight_limits()
2518 {
2519  sight_max = 9999;
2520  vision_mode_cache.reset();
2521  const bool in_light = get_map().ambient_light_at( pos() ) > LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT;
2522  bool in_shell = has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL2 ) ||
2523  has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL3 );
2524 
2525  // Set sight_max.
2526  if( is_blind() || ( in_sleep_state() && !has_flag( json_flag_SEESLEEP ) && is_avatar() ) ||
2527  has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
2528  sight_max = 0;
2529  } else if( has_effect( effect_boomered ) && ( !has_trait( trait_PER_SLIME_OK ) ) ) {
2530  sight_max = 1;
2531  vision_mode_cache.set( BOOMERED );
2532  } else if( has_effect( effect_in_pit ) || has_effect( effect_no_sight ) ||
2533  ( underwater && !has_flag( json_flag_EYE_MEMBRANE ) && !worn_with_flag( flag_SWIM_GOGGLES ) ) ) {
2534  sight_max = 1;
2535  } else if( in_shell ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
2536  // You can kinda see out a bit.
2537  sight_max = 2;
2538  } else if( has_trait( trait_PER_SLIME ) ) {
2539  sight_max = 8;
2540  } else if( ( has_flag( json_flag_MYOPIC ) || ( in_light &&
2541  has_flag( json_flag_MYOPIC_IN_LIGHT ) ) ) &&
2542  !worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_NEARSIGHT ) && !has_effect( effect_contacts ) &&
2543  !has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) ) {
2544  sight_max = 12;
2545  } else if( has_effect( effect_darkness ) ) {
2546  vision_mode_cache.set( DARKNESS );
2547  sight_max = 10;
2548  }
2549 
2550  // Debug-only NV, by vache's request
2551  if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NIGHTVISION ) ) {
2552  vision_mode_cache.set( DEBUG_NIGHTVISION );
2553  }
2554  if( has_nv() ) {
2555  vision_mode_cache.set( NV_GOGGLES );
2556  }
2557  if( has_active_mutation( trait_NIGHTVISION3 ) || is_wearing( itype_rm13_armor_on ) ||
2558  ( is_mounted() && mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_MECH_RECON_VISION ) ) ) {
2559  vision_mode_cache.set( NIGHTVISION_3 );
2560  }
2561  if( has_active_mutation( trait_ELFA_FNV ) ) {
2562  vision_mode_cache.set( FULL_ELFA_VISION );
2563  }
2564  if( has_active_mutation( trait_CEPH_VISION ) ) {
2565  vision_mode_cache.set( CEPH_VISION );
2566  }
2567  if( has_active_mutation( trait_ELFA_NV ) ) {
2568  vision_mode_cache.set( ELFA_VISION );
2569  }
2570  if( has_active_mutation( trait_NIGHTVISION2 ) ) {
2571  vision_mode_cache.set( NIGHTVISION_2 );
2572  }
2573  if( has_active_mutation( trait_FEL_NV ) ) {
2574  vision_mode_cache.set( FELINE_VISION );
2575  }
2576  if( has_active_mutation( trait_URSINE_EYE ) ) {
2577  vision_mode_cache.set( URSINE_VISION );
2578  }
2579  if( has_active_mutation( trait_NIGHTVISION ) ) {
2580  vision_mode_cache.set( NIGHTVISION_1 );
2581  }
2582  if( has_trait( trait_BIRD_EYE ) ) {
2583  vision_mode_cache.set( BIRD_EYE );
2584  }
2585 
2586  // Not exactly a sight limit thing, but related enough
2587  if( has_flag( json_flag_INFRARED ) ||
2588  worn_with_flag( flag_IR_EFFECT ) || ( is_mounted() &&
2589  mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_MECH_RECON_VISION ) ) ) {
2590  vision_mode_cache.set( IR_VISION );
2591  }
2592 
2593  if( has_flag( json_flag_SUPER_CLAIRVOYANCE ) ) {
2594  vision_mode_cache.set( VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE_SUPER );
2595  } else if( has_flag( json_flag_CLAIRVOYANCE_PLUS ) ) {
2596  vision_mode_cache.set( VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE_PLUS );
2597  } else if( has_flag( json_flag_CLAIRVOYANCE ) ) {
2598  vision_mode_cache.set( VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE );
2599  }
2600 }
2601 
2602 static float threshold_for_range( float range )
2603 {
2604  constexpr float epsilon = 0.01f;
2605  return LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL / std::exp( range * LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR ) - epsilon;
2606 }
2607 
2608 float Character::get_vision_threshold( float light_level ) const
2609 {
2610  if( vision_mode_cache[DEBUG_NIGHTVISION] ) {
2611  // Debug vision always works with absurdly little light.
2612  return 0.01;
2613  }
2614 
2615  // As light_level goes from LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL to LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT,
2616  // dimming goes from 1.0 to 2.0.
2617  const float dimming_from_light = 1.0f + ( ( light_level - LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL ) /
2618  ( LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT - LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL ) );
2619 
2620  float range = get_per() / 3.0f;
2621  if( vision_mode_cache[NV_GOGGLES] || vision_mode_cache[NIGHTVISION_3] ||
2622  vision_mode_cache[FULL_ELFA_VISION] || vision_mode_cache[CEPH_VISION] ) {
2623  range += 10;
2624  } else if( vision_mode_cache[NIGHTVISION_2] || vision_mode_cache[FELINE_VISION] ||
2625  vision_mode_cache[URSINE_VISION] || vision_mode_cache[ELFA_VISION] ) {
2626  range += 4.5;
2627  } else if( vision_mode_cache[NIGHTVISION_1] ) {
2628  range += 2;
2629  }
2630 
2631  if( vision_mode_cache[BIRD_EYE] ) {
2632  range++;
2633  }
2634 
2635  range = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::NIGHT_VIS, range );
2636 
2637  // Clamp range to 1+, so that we can always see where we are
2638  range = std::max( 1.0f, range * get_limb_score( limb_score_night_vis ) );
2639 
2640  return std::min( LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW,
2641  threshold_for_range( range ) * dimming_from_light );
2642 }
2643 
2644 void Character::flag_encumbrance()
2645 {
2646  check_encumbrance = true;
2647 }
2648 
2649 void Character::check_item_encumbrance_flag()
2650 {
2651  if( worn.check_item_encumbrance_flag( check_encumbrance ) ) {
2652  calc_encumbrance();
2653  }
2654 }
2655 
2656 bool Character::natural_attack_restricted_on( const bodypart_id &bp ) const
2657 {
2658  return worn.natural_attack_restricted_on( bp );
2659 }
2660 
2661 bool Character::natural_attack_restricted_on( const sub_bodypart_id &bp ) const
2662 {
2663  return worn.natural_attack_restricted_on( bp );
2664 }
2665 
2666 std::vector<const item *> Character::get_pseudo_items() const
2667 {
2668  if( !pseudo_items_valid ) {
2669  pseudo_items.clear();
2670 
2671  for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
2672  std::vector<const item *> pseudos = bio.get_available_pseudo_items();
2673  for( const item *pseudo : pseudos ) {
2674  pseudo_items.push_back( pseudo );
2675  }
2676  }
2677 
2678  pseudo_items_valid = true;
2679  }
2680  return pseudo_items;
2681 }
2682 
2683 bool Character::practice( const skill_id &id, int amount, int cap, bool suppress_warning )
2684 {
2685  SkillLevel &level = get_skill_level_object( id );
2686  const Skill &skill = id.obj();
2687  if( !level.can_train() || in_sleep_state() ||
2688  ( static_cast<int>( get_skill_level( id ) ) >= MAX_SKILL ) ) {
2689  // Do not practice if: cannot train, asleep, or at effective skill cap
2690  // Leaving as a skill method rather than global for possible future skill cap setting
2691  return false;
2692  }
2693 
2694  // Your ability to "catch up" skill experience to knowledge is mostly a function of intelligence,
2695  // but perception also plays a role, representing both memory/attentiveness and catching on to how
2696  // the two apply to each other.
2697  float catchup_modifier = 1.0f + ( 2.0f * get_int() + get_per() ) / 24.0f; // 2 for an average person
2698  float knowledge_modifier = 1.0f + get_int() /
2699  40.0f; // 1.2 for an average person, always a bit higher than base amount
2700 
2701  const auto highest_skill = [&]() {
2702  std::pair<skill_id, int> result( skill_id::NULL_ID(), -1 );
2703  for( const auto &pair : *_skills ) {
2704  const SkillLevel &lobj = pair.second;
2705  if( lobj.level() > result.second ) {
2706  result = std::make_pair( pair.first, lobj.level() );
2707  }
2708  }
2709  return result.first;
2710  };
2711 
2712  const bool isSavant = has_trait( trait_SAVANT );
2713  const skill_id savantSkill = isSavant ? highest_skill() : skill_id::NULL_ID();
2714 
2715  amount = adjust_for_focus( std::min( 1000, amount ) ) * 100.0f;
2716 
2717  if( has_trait( trait_PACIFIST ) && skill.is_combat_skill() ) {
2718  amount /= 3.0f;
2719  }
2720 
2721  catchup_modifier = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::COMBAT_CATCHUP,
2722  catchup_modifier );
2723 
2724  if( isSavant && id != savantSkill ) {
2725  amount *= 0.5f;
2726  }
2727 
2728  if( amount > 0 &&
2729  static_cast<int>( get_skill_level( id ) ) > cap ) { //blunt grinding cap implementation for crafting
2730  amount = 0;
2731  if( !suppress_warning ) {
2732  handle_skill_warning( id, false );
2733  }
2734  }
2735  bool level_up = false;
2736  if( amount > 0 && level.isTraining() ) {
2737  int old_practical_level = static_cast<int>( get_skill_level( id ) );
2738  int old_theoretical_level = get_knowledge_level( id );
2739  get_skill_level_object( id ).train( amount, catchup_modifier, knowledge_modifier );
2740  int new_practical_level = static_cast<int>( get_skill_level( id ) );
2741  int new_theoretical_level = get_knowledge_level( id );
2742  std::string skill_name = skill.name();
2743  if( new_practical_level > old_practical_level ) {
2744  get_event_bus().send<event_type::gains_skill_level>( getID(), id, new_practical_level );
2745  }
2746  if( is_avatar() && new_practical_level > old_practical_level ) {
2747  add_msg( m_good, _( "Your practical skill in %s has increased to %d!" ), skill_name,
2748  new_practical_level );
2749  level_up = true;
2750  }
2751  if( is_avatar() && new_theoretical_level > old_theoretical_level ) {
2752  add_msg( m_good, _( "Your theoretical understanding of %s has increased to %d!" ), skill_name,
2753  new_theoretical_level );
2754  }
2755  if( is_avatar() && new_practical_level > cap ) {
2756  //inform player immediately that the current recipe can't be used to train further
2757  add_msg( m_info, _( "You feel that %s tasks of this level are becoming trivial." ),
2758  skill_name );
