5086  press_x( ACTION_SLEEP ) );
5087  } else {
5088  g->cancel_activity_query( _( "You're feeling tired." ) );
5089  }
5090  }
5091 
5092  if( current_stim < 0 ) {
5093  set_stim( std::min( current_stim + rate_multiplier, 0 ) );
5094  } else if( current_stim > 0 ) {
5095  set_stim( std::max( current_stim - rate_multiplier, 0 ) );
5096  }
5097 
5098  if( get_painkiller() > 0 ) {
5099  mod_painkiller( -std::min( get_painkiller(), rate_multiplier ) );
5100  }
5101 
5102  if( get_bp_effect_mod() > 0 ) {
5103  modify_bp_effect_mod( -std::min( get_bp_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5104  } else if( get_bp_effect_mod() < 0 ) {
5105  modify_bp_effect_mod( std::min( -get_bp_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5106  }
5107 
5108  if( get_heartrate_effect_mod() > 0 ) {
5109  modify_heartrate_effect_mod( -std::min( get_heartrate_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5110  } else if( get_heartrate_effect_mod() < 0 ) {
5111  modify_heartrate_effect_mod( std::min( -get_heartrate_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5112  }
5113 
5114  if( get_respiration_effect_mod() > 0 ) {
5115  modify_respiration_effect_mod( -std::min( get_respiration_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5116  } else if( get_respiration_effect_mod() < 0 ) {
5117  modify_respiration_effect_mod( std::min( -get_respiration_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5118  }
5119 
5120 }
5121 
5122 needs_rates Character::calc_needs_rates() const
5123 {
5124  const effect &sleep = get_effect( effect_sleep );
5125  const bool asleep = !sleep.is_null();
5126 
5127  needs_rates rates;
5128  rates.hunger = metabolic_rate();
5129 
5130  rates.kcal = get_bmr();
5131 
5132  add_msg_debug_if( is_avatar(), debugmode::DF_CHAR_CALORIES, "Metabolic rate: %.2f", rates.hunger );
5133 
5134  static const std::string player_thirst_rate( "PLAYER_THIRST_RATE" );
5135  rates.thirst = get_option< float >( player_thirst_rate );
5136 
5137  static const std::string player_sleepiness_rate( "PLAYER_SLEEPINESS_RATE" );
5138  rates.sleepiness = get_option< float >( player_sleepiness_rate );
5139 
5140  if( asleep ) {
5141  calc_sleep_recovery_rate( rates );
5142  } else {
5143  rates.recovery = 0;
5144  }
5145 
5146  if( has_activity( ACT_TREE_COMMUNION ) ) {
5147  // Much of the body's needs are taken care of by the trees.
5148  // Hair Roots don't provide any bodily needs.
5149  if( has_trait( trait_ROOTS2 ) || has_trait( trait_ROOTS3 ) || has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) {
5150  rates.hunger *= 0.5f;
5151  rates.thirst *= 0.5f;
5152  rates.sleepiness *= 0.5f;
5153  }
5154  }
5155 
5156  if( has_trait( trait_TRANSPIRATION ) ) {
5157  // Transpiration, the act of moving nutrients with evaporating water, can take a very heavy toll on your thirst when it's really hot.
5158  rates.thirst *= ( ( units::to_fahrenheit( get_weather().get_temperature(
5159  pos() ) ) - 32.5f ) / 40.0f );
5160  }
5161 
5162  rates.hunger = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::HUNGER, rates.hunger );
5163  rates.sleepiness = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SLEEPINESS,
5164  rates.sleepiness );
5165  rates.thirst = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::THIRST, rates.thirst );
5166 
5167  return rates;
5168 }
5169 
5170 void Character::calc_sleep_recovery_rate( needs_rates &rates ) const
5171 {
5172  const effect &sleep = get_effect( effect_sleep );
5173  rates.recovery = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SLEEPINESS_REGEN, 1 );
5174 
5175  // -5% sleep recovery rate for every main part below cold
5176  float temp_mod = 0.0f;
5177  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
5178  if( get_part_temp_cur( bp ) <= BODYTEMP_COLD ) {
5179  temp_mod -= 0.05f;
5180  }
5181  }
5182  rates.recovery += temp_mod;
5183 
5184  if( !is_hibernating() ) {
5185  // Hunger and thirst advance more slowly while we sleep. This is the standard rate.
5186  rates.hunger *= 0.5f;
5187  rates.thirst *= 0.5f;
5188  const int intense = sleep.is_null() ? 0 : sleep.get_intensity();
5189  // Accelerated recovery capped to 2x over 2 hours
5190  // After 16 hours of activity, equal to 7.25 hours of rest
5191  const int accelerated_recovery_chance = 24 - intense + 1;
5192  const float accelerated_recovery_rate = 1.0f / accelerated_recovery_chance;
5193  rates.recovery += accelerated_recovery_rate;
5194  } else {
5195  // Hunger and thirst advance *much* more slowly whilst we hibernate.
5196  rates.hunger *= ( 2.0f / 7.0f );
5197  rates.thirst *= ( 2.0f / 7.0f );
5198  }
5199  rates.recovery -= static_cast<float>( get_perceived_pain() ) / 60;
5200 }
5201 
5202 item Character::reduce_charges( item *it, int quantity )
5203 {
5204  if( !has_item( *it ) ) {
5205  debugmsg( "invalid item (name %s) for reduce_charges", it->tname() );
5206  return item();
5207  }
5208  if( it->charges <= quantity ) {
5209  return i_rem( it );
5210  }
5211  it->mod_charges( -quantity );
5212  item result( *it );
5213  result.charges = quantity;
5214  return result;
5215 }
5216 
5217 const profession *Character::get_profession() const
5218 {
5219  return prof;
5220 }
5221 
5222 std::set<const profession *> Character::get_hobbies() const
5223 {
5224  return hobbies;
5225 }
5226 
5227 bool Character::has_mission_item( int mission_id ) const
5228 {
5229  return mission_id != -1 && has_item_with( has_mission_item_filter{ mission_id } );
5230 }
5231 
5232 void Character::check_needs_extremes()
5233 {
5234  // Check if we've overdosed... in any deadly way.
5235  if( get_stim() > 250 ) {
5236  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5237  _( "You have a sudden heart attack!" ),
5238  _( "<npcname> has a sudden heart attack!" ) );
5239  get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_from_drug_overdose>( getID(), efftype_id() );
5240  set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5241  } else if( get_stim() < -200 || get_painkiller() > 240 ) {
5242  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5243  _( "Your breathing stops completely." ),
5244  _( "<npcname>'s breathing stops completely." ) );
5245  get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_from_drug_overdose>( getID(), efftype_id() );
5246  set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5247  } else if( has_effect( effect_jetinjector ) && get_effect_dur( effect_jetinjector ) > 40_minutes ) {
5248  if( !has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) ) {
5249  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5250  _( "Your heart spasms painfully and stops." ),
5251  _( "<npcname>'s heart spasms painfully and stops." ) );
5252  } else {
5253  add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "Your heart spasms and stops." ),
5254  _( "<npcname>'s heart spasms and stops." ) );
5255  }
5256  get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_from_drug_overdose>( getID(), effect_jetinjector );
5257  set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5258  } else if( get_effect_dur( effect_adrenaline ) > 50_minutes ) {
5259  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5260  _( "Your heart spasms and stops." ),
5261  _( "<npcname>'s heart spasms and stops." ) );
5262  get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_from_drug_overdose>( getID(), effect_adrenaline );
5263  set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5264  } else if( get_effect_int( effect_drunk ) > 4 ) {
5265  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5266  _( "Your breathing slows down to a stop." ),
5267  _( "<npcname>'s breathing slows down to a stop." ) );
5268  get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_from_drug_overdose>( getID(), effect_drunk );
5269  set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5270  }
5271 
5272  // check if we've starved
5273  if( needs_food() ) {
5274  if( get_stored_kcal() <= 0 ) {
5275  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You have starved to death." ) );
5276  get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_of_starvation>( getID() );
5277  set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5278  } else {
5279  if( calendar::once_every( 12_hours ) ) {
5280  std::string category;
5281  if( stomach.contains() <= stomach.capacity( *this ) / 4 ) {
5282  if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.1f ) {
5283  category = "starving";
5284  } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.25f ) {
5285  category = "emaciated";
5286  } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.5f ) {
5287  category = "malnutrition";
5288  } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.8f ) {
5289  category = "low_cal";
5290  }
5291  } else {
5292  if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.1f ) {
5293  category = "empty_starving";
5294  } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.25f ) {
5295  category = "empty_emaciated";
5296  } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.5f ) {
5297  category = "empty_malnutrition";
5298  } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.8f ) {
5299  category = "empty_low_cal";
5300  }
5301  }
5302  if( !category.empty() ) {
5303  const translation message = SNIPPET.random_from_category( category ).value_or( translation() );
5304  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, message );
5305  }
5306 
5307  }
5308  }
5309  }
5310 
5311  // Check if we're dying of thirst
5312  if( needs_food() && get_thirst() >= 600 && ( stomach.get_water() == 0_ml ||
5313  guts.get_water() == 0_ml ) ) {
5314  if( get_thirst() >= 1200 ) {
5315  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You have died of dehydration." ) );
5316  get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_of_thirst>( getID() );
5317  set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5318  } else if( get_thirst() >= 1000 && calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5319  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Even your eyes feel dry…" ) );
5320  } else if( get_thirst() >= 800 && calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5321  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You are THIRSTY!" ) );
5322  } else if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5323  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Your mouth feels so dry…" ) );
5324  }
5325  }
5326 
5327  // Check if we're falling asleep, unless we're sleeping
5328  if( get_sleepiness() >= sleepiness_levels::EXHAUSTED + 25 && !in_sleep_state() ) {
5329  if( get_sleepiness() >= sleepiness_levels::MASSIVE_SLEEPINESS ) {
5330  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Survivor sleep now." ) );
5331  get_event_bus().send<event_type::falls_asleep_from_exhaustion>( getID() );
5332  mod_sleepiness( -10 );
5333  fall_asleep();
5334  } else if( get_sleepiness() >= 800 && calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5335  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Anywhere would be a good place to sleep…" ) );
5336  } else if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5337  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You feel like you haven't slept in days." ) );
5338  }
5339  }
5340 
5341  // Even if we're not Exhausted, we really should be feeling lack/sleep earlier
5342  // Penalties start at Dead Tired and go from there
5343  if( get_sleepiness() >= sleepiness_levels::DEAD_TIRED && !in_sleep_state() ) {
5344  if( get_sleepiness() >= 700 ) {
5345  if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5346  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You're too physically tired to stop yawning." ) );
5347  add_effect( effect_lack_sleep, 30_minutes + 1_turns );
5348  }
5349  /** @EFFECT_INT slightly decreases occurrence of short naps when dead tired */
5350  if( one_in( 50 + int_cur ) ) {
5351  // Rivet's idea: look out for microsleeps!
5352  fall_asleep( 30_seconds );
5353  }
5354  } else if( get_sleepiness() >= sleepiness_levels::EXHAUSTED ) {
5355  if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5356  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "How much longer until bedtime?" ) );
5357  add_effect( effect_lack_sleep, 30_minutes + 1_turns );
5358  }
5359  /** @EFFECT_INT slightly decreases occurrence of short naps when exhausted */
5360  if( one_in( 100 + int_cur ) ) {
5361  fall_asleep( 30_seconds );
5362  }
5363  } else if( get_sleepiness() >= sleepiness_levels::DEAD_TIRED &&
5364  calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5365  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "*yawn* You should really get some sleep." ) );
5366  add_effect( effect_lack_sleep, 30_minutes + 1_turns );
5367  }
5368  }
5369 
5370  // Sleep deprivation kicks in if lack of sleep is avoided with stimulants or otherwise for long periods of time
5371  int sleep_deprivation = get_sleep_deprivation();
5372  float sleep_deprivation_pct = sleep_deprivation / static_cast<float>( SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MASSIVE );
5373 
5374  if( sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_HARMLESS && !in_sleep_state() ) {
5375  if( calendar::once_every( 60_minutes ) ) {
5376  if( sleep_deprivation < SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MINOR ) {
5377  add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
5378  _( "Your mind feels tired. It's been a while since you've slept well." ) );
5379  mod_sleepiness( 1 );
5380  } else if( sleep_deprivation < SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_SERIOUS ) {
5381  add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
5382  _( "Your mind feels foggy from a lack of good sleep, and your eyes keep trying to close against your will." ) );
5383  mod_sleepiness( 5 );
5384 
5385  if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
5386  mod_daily_health( -1, -10 );
5387  }
5388  } else if( sleep_deprivation < SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MAJOR ) {
5389  add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
5390  _( "Your mind feels weary, and you dread every wakeful minute that passes. You crave sleep, and feel like you're about to collapse." ) );
5391  mod_sleepiness( 10 );
5392 
5393  if( one_in( 5 ) ) {
5394  mod_daily_health( -2, -10 );
5395  }
5396  } else if( sleep_deprivation < SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MASSIVE ) {
5397  add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
5398  _( "You haven't slept decently for so long that your whole body is screaming for mercy. It's a miracle that you're still awake, but it feels more like a curse now." ) );
5399  mod_sleepiness( 40 );
5400 
5401  mod_daily_health( -5, -10 );
5402  }
5403  // else you pass out for 20 hours, guaranteed
5404 
5405  // Microsleeps are slightly worse if you're sleep deprived, but not by much. (chance: 1 in (75 + int_cur) at lethal sleep deprivation)
5406  // Note: these can coexist with sleepiness-related microsleeps
5407  /** @EFFECT_INT slightly decreases occurrence of short naps when sleep deprived */
5408  if( one_in( static_cast<int>( sleep_deprivation_pct * 75 ) + int_cur ) ) {
5409  fall_asleep( 30_seconds );
5410  }
5411 
5412  // Stimulants can be used to stay awake a while longer, but after a while you'll just collapse.
5413  bool can_pass_out = ( get_stim() < 30 && sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MINOR ) ||
5414  sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MAJOR;
5415 
5416  if( can_pass_out && calendar::once_every( 10_minutes ) ) {
5417  /** @EFFECT_PER slightly increases resilience against passing out from sleep deprivation */
5418  if( one_in( static_cast<int>( ( 1 - sleep_deprivation_pct ) * 100 ) + per_cur ) ||
5419  sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MASSIVE ) {
5420  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5421  _( "Your body collapses due to sleep deprivation, your neglected fatigue rushing back all at once, and you pass out on the spot." )
5422  , _( "<npcname> collapses to the ground from exhaustion." ) );
5423  if( get_sleepiness() < sleepiness_levels::EXHAUSTED ) {
5424  set_sleepiness( sleepiness_levels::EXHAUSTED );
5425  }
5426 
5427  if( sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MAJOR ) {
5428  fall_asleep( 20_hours );
5429  } else if( sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_SERIOUS ) {
5430  fall_asleep( 16_hours );
5431  } else {
5432  fall_asleep( 12_hours );
5433  }
5434  }
5435  }
5436 
5437  }
5438  }
5439 }
5440 
5441 void Character::get_sick( bool is_flu )
5442 {
5443  // Health is in the range [-200,200].
5444  // Diseases are half as common for every 50 health you gain.
5445  const float health_factor = std::pow( 2.0f, get_lifestyle() / 50.0f );
5446  const float env_factor = 2.0f + std::pow( get_env_resist( body_part_mouth ), 0.3f );
5447  const int disease_rarity = static_cast<int>( health_factor + env_factor );
5448  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "disease_rarity = %d", disease_rarity );
5449 
5450  if( one_in( disease_rarity ) ) {
5451  // Normal people get sick about 2-4 times/year. If they are disease resistant, it's 1 time per year.
5452  const int base_diseases_per_year = has_trait( trait_DISRESISTANT ) ? 1 : 3;
5453  const time_duration immunity_duration = calendar::season_length() * 4 / base_diseases_per_year;
5454 
5455  bool already_has_flu = has_effect( effect_flu ) ||
5456  count_queued_effects( "pre_flu" ) ||
5457  count_queued_effects( "flu" );
5458  bool already_has_cold = has_effect( effect_common_cold ) ||
5459  count_queued_effects( "pre_common_cold" ) ||
5460  count_queued_effects( "common_cold" );
5461 
5462  if( is_flu && !already_has_flu ) {
5463  // Total duration of symptoms
5464  time_duration total_duration = rng( 3_days, 10_days );
5465  // Time before first symptoms
5466  time_duration incubation_period = rng( 18_hours, 36_hours );
5467  // Time from first symptoms to full blown disease
5468  time_duration warning_period = std::min( rng( 18_hours, 36_hours ), total_duration );
5469 
5470  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Queuing flu: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h",
5471  to_hours<int>( incubation_period ),
5472  to_hours<int>( warning_period ),
5473  to_hours<int>( total_duration ) );
5474 
5475  queue_effect( "pre_flu", incubation_period, warning_period );
5476  queue_effect( "flu", incubation_period + warning_period, total_duration - warning_period );
5477  queue_effect( "flushot", incubation_period + total_duration, immunity_duration );
5478 
5479  } else if( !already_has_cold ) {
5480  // Total duration of symptoms
5481  time_duration total_duration = rng( 1_days, 14_days );
5482  // Time before first symptoms
5483  time_duration incubation_period = rng( 18_hours, 36_hours );
5484  // Time from first symptoms to full blown disease
5485  time_duration warning_period = std::min( rng( 18_hours, 36_hours ), total_duration );
5486 
5487  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Queuing cold: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h",
5488  to_hours<int>( incubation_period ),
5489  to_hours<int>( warning_period ),
5490  to_hours<int>( total_duration ) );
5491 
5492  queue_effect( "pre_common_cold", incubation_period, warning_period );
5493  queue_effect( "common_cold", incubation_period + warning_period, total_duration - warning_period );
5494  queue_effect( "common_cold_immunity", incubation_period + total_duration, immunity_duration );
5495  }
5496  }
5497 }
5498 
5499 bool Character::is_hibernating() const
5500 {
5501  // Hibernating only kicks in whilst Engorged; separate tracking for hunger/thirst here
5502  // as a safety catch. One test subject managed to get two Colds during hibernation;
5503  // since those add sleepiness and dry out the character, the subject went for the full 10 days plus
5504  // a little, and came out of it well into Parched. Hibernating shouldn't endanger your
5505  // life like that--but since there's much less fluid reserve than food reserve,
5506  // simply using the same numbers won't work.
5507  return has_effect( effect_sleep ) && get_kcal_percent() > 0.8f &&
5508  get_thirst() <= 80 && has_active_mutation( trait_HIBERNATE );
5509 }
5510 
5511 void Character::toolmod_add( item_location tool, item_location mod )
5512 {
5513  if( !tool && !mod ) {
5514  debugmsg( "Tried toolmod installation but mod/tool not available" );
5515  return;
5516  }
5517  // first check at least the minimum requirements are met
5518  if( !has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) && !can_use( *mod, *tool ) ) {
5519  return;
5520  }
5521 
5522  if( !query_yn( _( "Permanently install your %1$s in your %2$s?" ),
5523  colorize( mod->tname(), mod->color_in_inventory() ),
5524  colorize( tool->tname(), tool->color_in_inventory() ) ) ) {
5525  add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
5526  return; // player canceled installation
5527  }
5528 
5529  assign_activity( ACT_TOOLMOD_ADD, 1, -1 );
5530  activity.targets.emplace_back( std::move( tool ) );
5531  activity.targets.emplace_back( std::move( mod ) );
5532 }
5533 
5534 void Character::temp_equalizer( const bodypart_id &bp1, const bodypart_id &bp2 )
5535 {
5536  // Body heat is moved around.
5537  // Shift in one direction only, will be shifted in the other direction separately.
5538  const units::temperature_delta diff = ( get_part_temp_cur( bp2 ) - get_part_temp_cur( bp1 ) ) *
5539  0.0001; // If bp1 is warmer, it will lose heat
5540  mod_part_temp_cur( bp1, diff );
5541 }
5542 
5543 Character::comfort_response_t Character::base_comfort_value( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
5544 {
5545  // Comfort of sleeping spots is "objective", while sleep_spot( p ) is "subjective"
5546  // As in the latter also checks for sleepiness and other variables while this function
5547  // only looks at the base comfyness of something. It's still subjective, in a sense,
5548  // as arachnids who sleep in webs will find most places comfortable for instance.
5549  int comfort = 0;
5550 
5551  comfort_response_t comfort_response;
5552 
5553  bool plantsleep = has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH );
5554  bool fungaloid_cosplay = has_trait( trait_M_SKIN3 );
5555  bool websleep = has_trait( trait_WEB_WALKER );
5556  bool webforce = has_trait( trait_THRESH_SPIDER ) && ( has_trait( trait_WEB_SPINNER ) ||
5557  has_trait( trait_WEB_WEAVER ) );
5558  bool in_shell = has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL2 ) ||
5559  has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL3 );
5560  bool watersleep = has_trait( trait_WATERSLEEP ) || has_trait( trait_UNDINE_SLEEP_WATER );
5561 
5562  map &here = get_map();
5563  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( p );
5564  const maptile tile = here.maptile_at( p );
5565  const trap &trap_at_pos = tile.get_trap_t();
5566  const ter_id ter_at_pos = tile.get_ter();
5567  const furn_id furn_at_pos = tile.get_furn();
5568 
5569  int web = here.get_field_intensity( p, fd_web );
5570 
5571  // Some mutants have different comfort needs
5572  if( !plantsleep && !webforce ) {
5573  if( in_shell ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
5574  comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5575  // Note: shelled individuals can still use sleeping aids!
5576  } else if( vp ) {
5577  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> cargo = vp.cargo() ) {
5578  for( const item &items_it : cargo->items() ) {
5579  if( items_it.has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID ) ) {
5580  // Note: BED + SLEEP_AID = 9 pts, or 1 pt below very_comfortable
5581  comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5582  comfort_response.aid = &items_it;
5583  break; // prevents using more than 1 sleep aid
5584  }
5585  if( items_it.has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID_CONTAINER ) ) {
5586  bool found = false;
5587  if( items_it.num_item_stacks() > 1 ) {
5588  // Only one item is allowed, so we don't fill our pillowcase with nails
5589  continue;
5590  }
5591  for( const item *it : items_it.all_items_top() ) {
5592  if( it->has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID ) ) {
5593  // Note: BED + SLEEP_AID = 9 pts, or 1 pt below very_comfortable
5594  comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5595  comfort_response.aid = &items_it;
5596  found = true;
5597  break; // prevents using more than 1 sleep aid
5598  }
5599  }
5600  // Only 1 sleep aid
5601  if( found ) {
5602  break;
5603  }
5604  }
5605  }
5606  }
5607  int max_boardable_confort = 0;
5608  bool boardable = false;
5609  for( const vpart_reference board : vp->vehicle().get_all_parts() ) {
5610  if( !board.has_feature( "BOARDABLE" ) || board.pos() != p.raw() ) {
5611  continue;
5612  }
5613  boardable = true;
5614  int boardable_comfort = board.info().comfort;
5615  if( boardable_comfort > max_boardable_confort ) {
5616  max_boardable_confort = boardable_comfort;
5617  }
5618  }
5619  comfort += boardable ? max_boardable_confort : -here.move_cost( p );
5620 
5621  if( has_effect( effect_cramped_space ) ) {
5622  comfort = static_cast<int>( comfort_level::impossible );
5623  }
5624  }
5625  // Not in a vehicle, start checking furniture/terrain/traps at this point in decreasing order
5626  else if( furn_at_pos != furn_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
5627  comfort += 0 + furn_at_pos.obj().comfort;
5628  }
5629  // Web sleepers can use their webs if better furniture isn't available
5630  else if( websleep && web >= 3 ) {
5631  comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5632  } else if( !trap_at_pos.is_null() ) {
5633  comfort += 0 + trap_at_pos.comfort;
5634  } else {
5635  // Not a comfortable sleeping spot
5636  comfort -= here.move_cost( p );
5637  // Include comfort from terrain, if any
5638  comfort += ter_at_pos.obj().comfort;
5639  }
5640 
5641  if( comfort_response.aid == nullptr ) {
5642  const map_stack items = here.i_at( p );
5643  for( const item &items_it : items ) {
5644  if( items_it.has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID ) ) {
5645  // Note: BED + SLEEP_AID = 9 pts, or 1 pt below very_comfortable
5646  comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5647  comfort_response.aid = &items_it;
5648  break; // prevents using more than 1 sleep aid
5649  }
5650  if( items_it.has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID_CONTAINER ) ) {
5651  bool found = false;
5652  if( items_it.num_item_stacks() > 1 ) {
5653  // Only one item is allowed, so we don't fill our pillowcase with nails
5654  continue;
5655  }
5656  for( const item *it : items_it.all_items_top() ) {
5657  if( it->has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID ) ) {
5658  // Note: BED + SLEEP_AID = 9 pts, or 1 pt below very_comfortable
5659  comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5660  comfort_response.aid = &items_it;
5661  found = true;
5662  break; // prevents using more than 1 sleep aid
5663  }
5664  }
5665  // Only 1 sleep aid
5666  if( found ) {
5667  break;
5668  }
5669  }
5670  }
5671  }
5672  if( ( fungaloid_cosplay && here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FUNGUS, p.raw() ) ) ||
5673  ( watersleep && here.has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, p.raw() ) ) ) {
5674  comfort += static_cast<int>( comfort_level::very_comfortable );
5675  }
5676  } else if( plantsleep ) {
5677  if( vp || furn_at_pos != furn_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
5678  // Sleep ain't happening in a vehicle or on furniture
5679  comfort = static_cast<int>( comfort_level::impossible );
5680  } else {
5681  // It's very easy for Chloromorphs to get to sleep on soil!
5682  const std::unordered_set<ter_str_id> very_comfy_ters = { ter_t_dirt, ter_t_dirtmound, ter_t_pit, ter_t_pit_shallow };
5683  if( very_comfy_ters.find( ter_at_pos.id() ) != very_comfy_ters.end() ) {
5684  comfort += static_cast<int>( comfort_level::very_comfortable );
5685  }
5686  // Not as much if you have to dig through stuff first
5687  else if( ter_at_pos == ter_t_grass ) {
5688  comfort += static_cast<int>( comfort_level::comfortable );
5689  }
5690  // Sleep ain't happening
5691  else {
5692  comfort = static_cast<int>( comfort_level::impossible );
5693  }
5694  }
5695  // Has webforce
5696  } else {
5697  if( web >= 3 ) {
5698  // Thick Web and you're good to go
5699  comfort += static_cast<int>( comfort_level::very_comfortable );
5700  } else {
5701  comfort = static_cast<int>( comfort_level::impossible );
5702  }
5703  }
5704 
5705  if( comfort > static_cast<int>( comfort_level::comfortable ) ) {
5706  comfort_response.level = comfort_level::very_comfortable;
5707  } else if( comfort > static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable ) ) {
5708  comfort_response.level = comfort_level::comfortable;
5709  } else if( comfort > static_cast<int>( comfort_level::neutral ) ) {
5710  comfort_response.level = comfort_level::slightly_comfortable;
5711  } else if( comfort == static_cast<int>( comfort_level::neutral ) ) {
5712  comfort_response.level = comfort_level::neutral;
5713  } else {
5714  comfort_response.level = comfort_level::uncomfortable;
5715  }
5716  return comfort_response;
5717 }
5718 
5719 float Character::get_dodge_base() const
5720 {
5721  /** @EFFECT_DEX increases dodge base */
5722  /** @EFFECT_DODGE increases dodge_base */
5723  return get_dex() / 2.0f + get_skill_level( skill_dodge );
5724 }
5725 float Character::get_hit_base() const
5726 {
5727  /** @EFFECT_DEX increases hit base, slightly */
5728  return get_dex() / 4.0f;
5729 }
5730 
5731 std::string Character::get_name() const
5732 {
5733  return play_name.value_or( name );
5734 }
5735 
5736 std::vector<std::string> Character::get_grammatical_genders() const
5737 {
5738  if( male ) {
5739  return { "m" };
5740  } else {
5741  return { "f" };
5742  }
5743 }
5744 
5745 nc_color Character::symbol_color() const
5746 {
5747  nc_color basic = basic_symbol_color();
5748 
5749  if( has_effect( effect_downed ) ) {
5750  return hilite( basic );
5751  } else if( has_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
5752  return cyan_background( basic );
5753  }
5754 
5755  const field &fields = get_map().field_at( pos() );
5756 
5757  // Priority: electricity, fire, acid, gases
5758  bool has_elec = false;
5759  bool has_fire = false;
5760  bool has_acid = false;
5761  bool has_fume = false;
5762  for( const auto &field : fields ) {
5763  has_elec = field.first.obj().has_elec;
5764  if( has_elec ) {
5765  return hilite( basic );
5766  }
5767  has_fire = field.first.obj().has_fire;
5768  has_acid = field.first.obj().has_acid;
5769  has_fume = field.first.obj().has_fume;
5770  }
5771  if( has_fire ) {
5772  return red_background( basic );
5773  }
5774  if( has_acid ) {
5775  return green_background( basic );
5776  }
5777  if( has_fume ) {
5778  return white_background( basic );
5779  }
5780  if( in_sleep_state() ) {
5781  return hilite( basic );
5782  }
5783  return basic;
5784 }
5785 
5786 bool Character::check_immunity_data( const field_immunity_data &ft ) const
5787 {
5788  for( const json_character_flag &flag : ft.immunity_data_flags ) {
5789  if( has_flag( flag ) ) {
5790  return true;
5791  }
5792  }
5793  bool immune_by_body_part_resistance = !ft.immunity_data_body_part_env_resistance.empty();
5794  for( const std::pair<body_part_type::type, int> &fide :
5795  ft.immunity_data_body_part_env_resistance ) {
5796  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts_of_type( fide.first ) ) {
5797  if( get_env_resist( bp ) < fide.second ) {
5798  // If any one of a bodypart type is unprotected disregard this immunity type
5799  // TODO: mitigate effect strength based on protected:unprotected ratio?
5800  immune_by_body_part_resistance = false;
5801  break;
5802  }
5803  }
5804  }
5805  if( immune_by_body_part_resistance ) {
5806  return true;
5807  }
5808 
5809  bool immune_by_worn_flags = !ft.immunity_data_part_item_flags.empty();
5810  // Check if all worn flags are fulfilled
5811  for( const std::pair<body_part_type::type, flag_id> &fide :
5812  ft.immunity_data_part_item_flags ) {
5813  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts_of_type( fide.first ) ) {
5814  if( !worn_with_flag( fide.second, bp ) ) {
5815  // If any one of a bodypart type is unprotected disregard this immunity type
5816  // TODO: mitigate effect strength based on protected:unprotected ratio?
5817  immune_by_worn_flags = false;
5818  break;
5819  }
5820  }
5821  }
5822 
5823  if( immune_by_worn_flags ) {
5824  return true;
5825  }
5826 
5827  // Check if the optional worn flags are fulfilled
5828  for( const std::pair<body_part_type::type, flag_id> &fide :
5829  ft.immunity_data_part_item_flags_any ) {
5830  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts_of_type( fide.first ) ) {
5831  if( worn_with_flag( fide.second, bp ) ) {
5832  // For now a single flag will protect all limbs, TODO: handle optional flags for multiples of the same limb type
5833  return true;
5834  }
5835  }
5836  }
5837 
5838  return false;
5839 }
5840 
5841 bool Character::is_immune_field( const field_type_id &fid ) const
5842 {
5843  // Obviously this makes us invincible
5844  if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NODMG ) || has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
5845  return true;
5846  }
5847 
5848  // Check to see if we are immune
5849  const field_type &ft = fid.obj();
5850 
5851  if( check_immunity_data( ft.immunity_data ) ) {
5852  return true;
5853  }
5854 
5855  if( ft.has_elec ) {
5856  return is_elec_immune();
5857  }
5858  if( ft.has_fire ) {
5859  return has_flag( json_flag_HEATSINK ) || is_wearing( itype_rm13_armor_on );
5860  }
5861  if( ft.has_acid ) {
5862  return !is_on_ground() && get_env_resist( body_part_foot_l ) >= 15 &&
5863  get_env_resist( body_part_foot_r ) >= 15 &&
5864  get_env_resist( body_part_leg_l ) >= 15 &&
5865  get_env_resist( body_part_leg_r ) >= 15 &&
5866  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
5867  get_armor_type( damage_acid, body_part_foot_l ) >= 5 &&
5868  get_armor_type( damage_acid, body_part_foot_r ) >= 5 &&
5869  get_armor_type( damage_acid, body_part_leg_l ) >= 5 &&
5870  get_armor_type( damage_acid, body_part_leg_r ) >= 5;
5871  }
5872  // If we haven't found immunity yet fall up to the next level
5873  return Creature::is_immune_field( fid );
5874 }
5875 
5876 // FIXME: Relies on hardcoded damage type
5877 bool Character::is_elec_immune() const
5878 {
5879  return is_immune_damage( damage_electric );
5880 }
5881 
5882 bool Character::is_immune_effect( const efftype_id &eff ) const
5883 {
5884  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage types
5885  if( eff == effect_downed ) {
5886  return is_knockdown_immune();
5887  } else if( eff == effect_onfire ) {
5888  return is_immune_damage( damage_heat );
5889  } else if( eff == effect_deaf ) {
5890  return worn_with_flag( flag_DEAF ) || has_flag( json_flag_DEAF ) ||
5891  worn_with_flag( flag_PARTIAL_DEAF ) ||
5892  has_flag( json_flag_IMMUNE_HEARING_DAMAGE ) ||
5893  is_wearing( itype_rm13_armor_on ) || is_deaf();
5894  } else if( eff == effect_mute ) {
5895  return has_bionic( bio_voice );
5896  } else if( eff == effect_corroding ) {
5897  return is_immune_damage( damage_acid ) || has_trait( trait_SLIMY ) ||
5898  has_trait( trait_VISCOUS );
5899  }
5900  for( const json_character_flag &flag : eff->immune_flags ) {
5901  if( has_flag( flag ) ) {
5902  return true;
5903  }
5904  }
5905  return false;
5906 }
5907 
5908 bool Character::is_immune_damage( const damage_type_id &dt ) const
5909 {
5910  if( dt.is_null() ) {
5911  return true;
5912  }
5913  for( const std::string &fl : dt->immune_flags ) {
5914  if( has_flag( json_character_flag( fl ) ) || worn_with_flag( flag_id( fl ) ) ) {
5915  return true;
5916  }
5917  }
5918  return false;
5919 }
5920 
5921 bool Character::is_rad_immune() const
5922 {
5923  bool has_helmet = false;
5924  return ( is_wearing_power_armor( &has_helmet ) && has_helmet ) || worn_with_flag( flag_RAD_PROOF );
5925 }
5926 
5927 bool Character::is_knockdown_immune() const
5928 {
5929  // hard code for old tentacle mutation
5930  bool knockdown_immune = has_trait( trait_LEG_TENT_BRACE ) && is_barefoot();
5931 
5932  // if we have 1.0 or greater knockdown resist
5933  knockdown_immune |= calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0, enchant_vals::mod::KNOCKDOWN_RESIST ) >= 1;
5934  return knockdown_immune;
5935 }
5936 
5937 int Character::throw_range( const item &it ) const
5938 {
5939  if( it.is_null() ) {
5940  return -1;
5941  }
5942 
5943  item tmp = it;
5944 
5945  if( tmp.count_by_charges() && tmp.charges > 1 ) {
5946  tmp.charges = 1;
5947  }
5948 
5949  int str = get_arm_str();
5950 
5951  /** @ARM_STR determines maximum weight that can be thrown */
5952  if( ( tmp.weight() / 113_gram ) > str * 15 ) {
5953  return 0;
5954  }
5955  // Increases as weight decreases until 150 g, then decreases again
5956  /** @ARM_STR increases throwing range, vs item weight (high or low) */
5957  if( is_mounted() ) {
5958  auto *mons = mounted_creature.get();
5959  str = mons->mech_str_addition() != 0 ? mons->mech_str_addition() : str;
5960  }
5961  int ret = ( str * 10 ) / ( tmp.weight() >= 150_gram ? tmp.weight() / 113_gram : 10 -
5962  static_cast<int>(
5963  tmp.weight() / 15_gram ) );
5964  ret -= tmp.volume() / 1_liter;
5965  if( has_active_bionic( bio_railgun ) && tmp.made_of_any( ferric ) ) {
5966  ret *= 2;
5967  }
5968  if( ret < 1 ) {
5969  return 1;
5970  }
5971  // Cap at double our strength + skill
5972  /** @EFFECT_STR caps throwing range */
5973 
5974  /** @EFFECT_THROW caps throwing range */
5975  if( ret > round( str * 3 + get_skill_level( skill_throw ) ) ) {
5976  return round( str * 3 + get_skill_level( skill_throw ) );
5977  }
5978 
5979  return ret;
5980 }
5981 
5982 const std::vector<material_id> Character::fleshy = { material_flesh, material_hflesh };
5983 bool Character::made_of( const material_id &m ) const
5984 {
5985  // TODO: check for mutations that change this.
5986  return std::find( fleshy.begin(), fleshy.end(), m ) != fleshy.end();
5987 }
5988 bool Character::made_of_any( const std::set<material_id> &ms ) const
5989 {
5990  // TODO: check for mutations that change this.
5991  return std::any_of( fleshy.begin(), fleshy.end(), [&ms]( const material_id & e ) {
5992  return ms.count( e );
5993  } );
5994 }
5995 
5996 bool Character::is_blind() const
5997 {
5998  return worn_with_flag( flag_BLIND ) ||
5999  has_flag( json_flag_BLIND ) || get_limb_score( limb_score_vision ) <= 0;
6000 }
6001 
6002 bool Character::is_invisible() const
6003 {
6004  return has_flag( json_flag_INVISIBLE ) ||
6005  is_wearing_active_optcloak() ||
6006  has_trait( trait_DEBUG_CLOAK );
6007 }
6008 
6009 int Character::visibility( bool, int ) const
6010 {
6011  // 0-100 %
6012  if( is_invisible() ) {
6013  return 0;
6014  }
6015  // TODO:
6016  // if ( dark_clothing() && light check ...
6017  // or add STEALTH_MODIFIER enchantment to dark clothes
6018  int stealth_modifier = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::STEALTH_MODIFIER, 1 );
6019  return clamp( 100 - stealth_modifier, 40, 160 );
6020 }
6021 
6022 /*
6023  * Calculate player brightness based on the brightest active item, as
6024  * per itype tag LIGHT_* and optional CHARGEDIM ( fade starting at 20% charge )
6025  * item.light.* is -unimplemented- for the moment, as it is a custom override for
6026  * applying light sources/arcs with specific angle and direction.
6027  */
6028 float Character::active_light() const
6029 {
6030  float lumination = 0.0f;
6031 
6032  int maxlum = 0;
6033  cache_visit_items_with( "is_emissive", &item::is_emissive, [&maxlum]( const item & it ) {
6034  const int lumit = it.getlight_emit();
6035  if( maxlum < lumit ) {
6036  maxlum = lumit;
6037  }
6038  } );
6039 
6040  lumination = static_cast<float>( maxlum );
6041 
6042  float mut_lum = 0.0f;
6043  for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
6044  float curr_lum = 0.0f;
6045  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, float> &elem : mut->lumination ) {
6046  const float lum_coverage = worn.coverage_with_flags_exclude( elem.first.id(),
6047  { flag_ALLOWS_NATURAL_ATTACKS, flag_SEMITANGIBLE, flag_PERSONAL } ) / 100.0f;
6048  curr_lum += elem.second * ( 1 - lum_coverage );
6049  }
6050  mut_lum += curr_lum;
6051  }
6052 
6053  lumination = std::max( lumination, mut_lum );
6054 
6055  lumination = std::max( lumination,
6056  static_cast<float>( enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::LUMINATION, 0 ) ) );
6057 
6058  if( lumination < 5 && ( has_effect( effect_glowing ) || has_effect( effect_glowy_led ) ) ) {
6059  lumination = 5;
6060  }
6061  return lumination;
6062 }
6063 
6064 bool Character::sees_with_specials( const Creature &critter ) const
6065 {
6066  const double sight_range_electric = calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0,
6067  enchant_vals::mod::SIGHT_RANGE_ELECTRIC );
6068  const double motion_vision_range = calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0,
6069  enchant_vals::mod::MOTION_VISION_RANGE );
6070  const double sight_range_fae = calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0,
6071  enchant_vals::mod::SIGHT_RANGE_FAE );
6072  const double sight_range_nether = calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0,
6073  enchant_vals::mod::SIGHT_RANGE_NETHER );
6074  const double sight_range_minds = calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0,
6075  enchant_vals::mod::SIGHT_RANGE_MINDS );
6076  if( critter.is_electrical() && rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= sight_range_electric ) {
6077  return true;
6078  }
6079  if( critter.is_fae() && rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= sight_range_fae ) {
6080  return true;
6081  }
6082  if( critter.is_nether() && rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= sight_range_nether ) {
6083  return true;
6084  }
6085  if( critter.has_mind() && rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= sight_range_minds ) {
6086  return true;
6087  }
6088  if( rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= motion_vision_range ) {
6089  return true;
6090  }
6091 
6092  if( critter.digging() && has_active_bionic( bio_ground_sonar ) ) {
6093  // Bypass the check below, the bionic sonar also bypasses the sees(point) check because
6094  // walls don't block sonar which is transmitted in the ground, not the air.
6095  // TODO: this might need checks whether the player is in the air, or otherwise not connected
6096  // to the ground. It also might need a range check.
6097  return true;
6098  }
6099 
6100  return false;
6101 }
6102 
6103 bool Character::pour_into( item_location &container, item &liquid, bool ignore_settings )
6104 {
6105  std::string err;
6106  int max_remaining_capacity = container->get_remaining_capacity_for_liquid( liquid, *this, &err );
6107  int amount = container->all_pockets_rigid() ? max_remaining_capacity :
6108  std::min( max_remaining_capacity, container.max_charges_by_parent_recursive( liquid ).value() );
6109 
6110  if( !err.empty() ) {
6111  if( !container->has_item_with( [&liquid]( const item & it ) {
6112  return it.typeId() == liquid.typeId();
6113  } ) ) {
6114  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, err );
6115  } else {
6116  //~ you filled <container> to the brim with <liquid>
6117  add_msg_if_player( _( "You filled %1$s to the brim with %2$s." ), container->tname(),
6118  liquid.tname() );
6119  }
6120  return false;
6121  }
6122 
6123  if( amount == 0 ) {
6124  add_msg_if_player( _( "%1$s can't to expand to add any more %2$s." ), container->tname(),
6125  liquid.tname() );
6126  return false;
6127  }
6128 
6129  // get_remaining_capacity_for_liquid doesn't consider the current amount of liquid
6130  if( liquid.count_by_charges() ) {
6131  amount = std::min( amount, liquid.charges );
6132  }
6133 
6134  add_msg_if_player( _( "You pour %1$s into the %2$s." ), liquid.tname(), container->tname() );
6135 
6136  liquid.charges -= container->fill_with( liquid, amount, false, false, ignore_settings );
6137  inv->unsort();
6138 
6139  if( liquid.charges > 0 ) {
6140  add_msg_if_player( _( "There's some left over!" ) );
6141  }
6142 
6143  get_avatar().invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
6144 
6145  return true;
6146 }
6147 
6148 bool Character::pour_into( const vpart_reference &vp, item &liquid ) const
6149 {
6150  if( !vp.part().fill_with( liquid ) ) {
6151  return false;
6152  }
6153 
6154  //~ $1 - vehicle name, $2 - part name, $3 - liquid type
6155  add_msg_if_player( _( "You refill the %1$s's %2$s with %3$s." ),
6156  vp.vehicle().name, vp.part().name(), liquid.type_name() );
6157 
6158  if( liquid.charges > 0 ) {
6159  add_msg_if_player( _( "There's some left over!" ) );
6160  }
6161  return true;
6162 }
6163 
6164 float Character::rest_quality() const
6165 {
6166  map &here = get_map();
6167  const tripoint your_pos = pos();
6168  float rest = 0.0f;
6169  const float ur_act_level = instantaneous_activity_level();
6170  // Negative morales are penalties
6171  int cold_penalty = -has_morale( morale_cold );
6172  int heat_penalty = -has_morale( morale_hot );
6173  if( cold_penalty > 0 || heat_penalty > 0 ) {
6174  // Extreme temperatures have the body working harder to fight them, with less energy dedicated to healing, even just laying around will have you shivering or sweating.
6175  rest -= cold_penalty / 10.0f;
6176  rest -= heat_penalty / 10.0f;
6177  }
6178 
6179  if( has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
6180  // Beds should normally have a maximum of 2C warmth, rest == 1.0 on a pristine bed. Less comfortable beds provide less rest quality.
6181  // Cannot be lower than 0, even though some beds(like *the bare ground*) have negative floor_bedding_warmth. Maybe this should change?
6182  rest += ( std::max( units::to_kelvin_delta( floor_bedding_warmth( your_pos ) ), 0.f ) / 2.0f ) ;
6183  return std::max( rest, 0.0f );
6184  }
6185  const optional_vpart_position veh_part = here.veh_at( your_pos );
6186  bool has_vehicle_seat = !!veh_part.part_with_feature( "SEAT", true );
6187  if( ur_act_level <= LIGHT_EXERCISE ) {
6188  rest += 0.1f;
6189  if( here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "CAN_SIT", your_pos.xy() ) || has_vehicle_seat ) {
6190  // If not performing any real exercise (not even moving around), chairs allow you to rest a little bit.
6191  rest += 0.2f;
6192  } else if( floor_bedding_warmth( your_pos ) > 0_C_delta ) {
6193  // Any comfortable bed can substitute for a chair, but only if you don't have one.
6194  rest += 0.2f * ( units::to_celsius_delta( floor_bedding_warmth( your_pos ) ) / 2.0f );
6195  }
6196  if( ur_act_level <= NO_EXERCISE ) {
6197  rest += 0.2f;
6198  }
6199  }
6200  // These stack!
6201  if( ur_act_level >= BRISK_EXERCISE ) {
6202  rest -= 0.1f;
6203  }
6204  if( ur_act_level >= ACTIVE_EXERCISE ) {
6205  rest -= 0.2f;
6206  }
6207  if( ur_act_level >= EXTRA_EXERCISE ) {
6208  rest -= 0.3f;
6209  }
6210  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "%s resting quality: %.6f", get_name(), rest );
6211  return rest;
6212 }
6213 
6214 std::string Character::extended_description() const
6215 {
6216  std::string ss;
6217  if( is_avatar() ) {
6218  // <bad>This is me, <player_name>.</bad>
6219  ss += string_format( _( "This is you - %s." ), get_name() );
6220  } else {
6221  ss += string_format( _( "This is %s." ), get_name() );
6222  }
6223 
6224  ss += "\n--\n";
6225 
6226  const std::vector<bodypart_id> &bps = get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main );
6227  // Find length of bp names, to align
6228  // accumulate looks weird here, any better function?
6229  int longest = std::accumulate( bps.begin(), bps.end(), 0,
6230  []( int m, bodypart_id bp ) {
6231  return std::max( m, utf8_width( body_part_name_as_heading( bp, 1 ) ) );
6232  } );
6233 
6234  // This is a stripped-down version of the body_window function
6235  // This should be extracted into a separate function later on
6236  for( const bodypart_id &bp : bps ) {
6237  const std::string &bp_heading = body_part_name_as_heading( bp, 1 );
6238 
6239  const nc_color state_col = display::limb_color( *this, bp, true, true, true );
6240  nc_color name_color = state_col;
6241  std::pair<std::string, nc_color> hp_bar = get_hp_bar( get_part_hp_cur( bp ), get_part_hp_max( bp ),
6242  false );
6243 
6244  ss += colorize( left_justify( bp_heading, longest ), name_color );
6245  ss += colorize( hp_bar.first, hp_bar.second );
6246  // Trailing bars. UGLY!
6247  // TODO: Integrate into get_hp_bar somehow
6248  ss += colorize( std::string( 5 - utf8_width( hp_bar.first ), '.' ), c_white );
6249  ss += "\n";
6250  }
6251 
6252  ss += "--\n";
6253  ss += _( "Wielding:" ) + std::string( " " );
6254  if( weapon.is_null() ) {
6255  ss += _( "Nothing" );
6256  } else {
6257  ss += weapon.tname();
6258  }
6259 
6260  ss += "\n";
6261  ss += _( "Wearing:" ) + std::string( " " );
6262 
6263  const std::list<item> visible_worn_items = get_visible_worn_items();
6264  std::string worn_string = enumerate_as_string( visible_worn_items.begin(), visible_worn_items.end(),
6265  []( const item & it ) {
6266  return it.tname();
6267  } );
6268  ss += !worn_string.empty() ? worn_string : _( "Nothing" );
6269 
6270  return replace_colors( ss );
6271 }
6272 
6273 social_modifiers Character::get_mutation_bionic_social_mods() const
6274 {
6275  social_modifiers mods;
6276  for( const mutation_branch *mut : cached_mutations ) {
6277  mods += mut->social_mods;
6278  }
6279  for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
6280  mods += bio.info().social_mods;
6281  }
6282  return mods;
6283 }
6284 
6285 
6286 namespace
6287 {
6288 float _hp_modified_rate( Character const &who, float rate )
6289 {
6290  float const primary_hp_mod = who.enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( enchant_vals::mod::MAX_HP );
6291  if( primary_hp_mod < 0.0f ) {
6292  cata_assert( primary_hp_mod >= -1.0f );
6293  return rate * ( 1.0f + primary_hp_mod );
6294  }
6295 
6296  return rate;
6297 }
6298 } // namespace
6299 
6300 float Character::healing_rate( float at_rest_quality ) const
6301 {
6302  float const rest = clamp( at_rest_quality, 0.0f, 1.0f );
6303  // TODO: Cache
6304  float const base_heal_rate = is_avatar() ? get_option<float>( "PLAYER_HEALING_RATE" )
6305  : get_option<float>( "NPC_HEALING_RATE" );
6306  float const heal_rate = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::REGEN_HP,
6307  base_heal_rate );
6308  float awake_rate = ( 1.0f - rest ) * heal_rate;
6309  awake_rate *= enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::REGEN_HP_AWAKE,
6310  1 ) - 1;
6311  float const asleep_rate = rest * heal_rate * ( 1.0f + get_lifestyle() / 200.0f );
6312  float final_rate = awake_rate + asleep_rate;
6313  // Most common case: awake player with no regenerative abilities
6314  // ~7e-5 is 1 hp per day, anything less than that is totally negligible
6315  static constexpr float eps = 0.000007f;
6316  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "%s healing: %.6f", get_name(), final_rate );
6317  if( std::abs( final_rate ) < eps ) {
6318  return 0.0f;
6319  }
6320 
6321  return final_rate;
6322 }
6323 
6324 float Character::healing_rate_medicine( float at_rest_quality, const bodypart_id &bp ) const
6325 {
6326  float rate_medicine = 0.0f;
6327 
6328  for( const auto &elem : *effects ) {
6329  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_id, effect> &i : elem.second ) {
6330  if( i.first != bp ) {
6331  continue;
6332  }
6333  const effect &eff = i.second;
6334  float tmp_rate = static_cast<float>( eff.get_amount( "HEAL_RATE" ) ) / to_turns<int>
6335  ( 24_hours );
6336 
6337  if( bp == body_part_head ) {
6338  tmp_rate *= eff.get_amount( "HEAL_HEAD" ) / 100.0f;
6339  }
6340  if( bp == body_part_torso ) {
6341  tmp_rate *= eff.get_amount( "HEAL_TORSO" ) / 100.0f;
6342  }
6343  rate_medicine += tmp_rate;
6344  }
6345  }
6346 
6347  rate_medicine = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::REGEN_HP,
6348  rate_medicine );
6349  // Sufficiently negative rest quality can completely eliminate your healing, but never turn it negative.
6350  rate_medicine *= 1.0f + std::max( at_rest_quality, -1.0f );
6351 
6352  // increase healing if character has both effects
6353  if( has_effect( effect_bandaged ) && has_effect( effect_disinfected ) ) {
6354  rate_medicine *= 1.25;
6355  }
6356 
6357  if( get_lifestyle() > 0.0f ) {
6358  rate_medicine *= 1.0f + get_lifestyle() / 200.0f;
6359  } else {
6360  rate_medicine *= 1.0f + get_lifestyle() / 400.0f;
6361  }
6362  return _hp_modified_rate( *this, rate_medicine );
6363 }
6364 
6365 float Character::get_bmi() const
6366 {
6367  return get_bmi_lean() + get_bmi_fat();
6368 }
6369 
6370 float Character::get_bmi_lean() const
6371 {
6372  //strength BMIs decrease to zero as you starve (muscle atrophy)
6373  if( get_bmi_fat() < character_weight_category::normal ) {
6374  const int str_penalty = std::floor( ( 1.0f - ( get_bmi_fat() /
6375  character_weight_category::normal ) ) * str_max );
6376  return 12.0f + get_str_base() - str_penalty;
6377  }
6378  return 12.0f + get_str_base();
6379 }
6380 
6381 float Character::get_bmi_fat() const
6382 {
6383  return ( get_stored_kcal() / KCAL_PER_KG ) / ( std::pow( height() / 100.0f,
6384  2 ) * get_cached_organic_size() );
6385 }
6386 
6387 units::mass Character::bodyweight() const
6388 {
6389  return bodyweight_fat() + bodyweight_lean();
6390 }
6391 
6392 units::mass Character::bodyweight_fat() const
6393 {
6394  return units::from_kilogram( get_stored_kcal() / KCAL_PER_KG );
6395 }
6396 
6397 units::mass Character::bodyweight_lean() const
6398 {
6399  //12 plus base strength gives non fat bmi, adjusted by starvation in get_bmi_lean()
6400  //this is multiplied by our total hit size from mutated body parts (or lack of parts thereof)
6401  //for example a tail with a hit size of 10 means our lean mass is 10% greater
6402  //or if we chop off our arms and legs to get bionic replacements, we're down to about 42% of our original lean mass
6403  return get_cached_organic_size() * units::from_kilogram( get_bmi_lean() * std::pow(
6404  height() / 100.0f,
6405  2 ) );
6406 }
6407 
6408 float Character::fat_ratio() const
6409 {
6410  return bodyweight_fat() / bodyweight();
6411 }
6412 
6413 units::mass Character::bionics_weight() const
6414 {
6415  units::mass bio_weight = 0_gram;
6416  for( const bionic_id &bid : get_bionics() ) {
6417  if( !bid->included ) {
6418  bio_weight += item::find_type( bid->itype() )->weight;
6419  }
6420  }
6421  return bio_weight;
6422 }
6423 
6424 void Character::reset_chargen_attributes()
6425 {
6426  init_age = 25;
6427  init_height = 175;
6428 }
6429 
6430 int Character::base_age() const
6431 {
6432  return init_age;
6433 }
6434 
6435 void Character::set_base_age( int age )
6436 {
6437  init_age = age;
6438 }
6439 
6440 void Character::mod_base_age( int mod )
6441 {
6442  init_age += mod;
6443 }
6444 
6445 int Character::age( time_point when ) const
6446 {
6447  int years_since_cataclysm = to_turns<int>( when - calendar::turn_zero ) /
6448  to_turns<int>( calendar::year_length() );
6449  return init_age + years_since_cataclysm;
6450 }
6451 
6452 std::string Character::age_string( time_point when ) const
6453 {
6454  //~ how old the character is in years. try to limit number of characters to fit on the screen
6455  std::string unformatted = _( "%d years" );
6456  return string_format( unformatted, age( when ) );
6457 }
6458 
6459 struct HeightLimits {
6460  int min_height = 0;
6461  int base_height = 0;
6462  int max_height = 0;
6463 };
6464 
6465 /** Min and max heights in cm for each size category */
6466 static const std::map<creature_size, HeightLimits> size_category_height_limits {
6467  { creature_size::tiny, { 58, 70, 87 } },
6468  { creature_size::small, { 88, 122, 144 } },
6469  { creature_size::medium, { 145, 175, 200 } }, // minimum is 2 std. deviations below average female height
6470  { creature_size::large, { 201, 227, 250 } },
6471  { creature_size::huge, { 251, 280, 320 } },
6472 };
6473 
6474 int Character::min_height( creature_size size_category )
6475 {
6476  return size_category_height_limits.at( size_category ).min_height;
6477 }
6478 
6479 int Character::default_height( creature_size size_category )
6480 {
6481  return size_category_height_limits.at( size_category ).base_height;
6482 }
6483 
6484 int Character::max_height( creature_size size_category )
6485 {
6486  return size_category_height_limits.at( size_category ).max_height;
6487 }
6488 
6489 int Character::base_height() const
6490 {
6491  return init_height;
6492 }
6493 
6494 void Character::set_base_height( int height )
6495 {
6496  init_height = height;
6497 }
6498 
6499 void Character::mod_base_height( int mod )
6500 {
6501  init_height += mod;
6502 }
6503 
6504 std::string Character::height_string() const
6505 {
6506  const bool metric = get_option<std::string>( "DISTANCE_UNITS" ) == "metric";
6507 
6508  if( metric ) {
6509  std::string metric_string = _( "%d cm" );
6510  return string_format( metric_string, height() );
6511  }
6512 
6513  int total_inches = std::round( height() / 2.54 );
6514  int feet = std::floor( total_inches / 12 );
6515  int remainder_inches = total_inches % 12;
6516  return string_format( "%d\'%d\"", feet, remainder_inches );
6517 }
6518 
6519 int Character::height() const
6520 {
6521  const double base_height_deviation = base_height() / static_cast< double >
6522  ( Character::default_height() );
6523  const HeightLimits &limits = size_category_height_limits.at( get_size() );
6524  return clamp<int>( std::round( base_height_deviation * limits.base_height ),
6525  limits.min_height, limits.max_height );
6526 }
6527 
6528 int Character::base_bmr() const
6529 {
6530  /**
6531  Values are for males, and average!
6532  */
6533  const int equation_constant = 5;
6534  const int weight_factor = units::to_gram<int>( bodyweight() / 100.0 );
6535  const int height_factor = 6.25 * height();
6536  const int age_factor = 5 * age();
6537  return metabolic_rate_base() * ( weight_factor + height_factor - age_factor + equation_constant );
6538 }
6539 
6540 int Character::get_bmr() const
6541 {
6542  return base_bmr() * std::ceil( clamp( activity_history.average_activity(), NO_EXERCISE,
6543  maximum_exertion_level() ) );
6544 }
6545 
6546 
6547 void Character::set_activity_level( float new_level )
6548 {
6549  if( new_level <= NO_EXERCISE && in_sleep_state() ) {
6550  new_level = std::min( new_level, SLEEP_EXERCISE );
6551  }
6552 
6553  activity_history.log_activity( new_level );
6554 }
6555 
6556 void Character::reset_activity_level()
6557 {
6558  activity_history.reset_activity_level();
6559 }
6560 
6561 std::string Character::activity_level_str() const
6562 {
6563  return activity_history.activity_level_str();
6564 }
6565 
6566 void Character::mend_item( item_location &&obj, bool interactive )
6567 {
6568  if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ) {
6569  uilist menu;
6570  menu.text = _( "Toggle which fault?" );
6571  std::vector<std::pair<fault_id, bool>> opts;
6572  for( const auto &f : obj->faults_potential() ) {
6573  opts.emplace_back( f, !!obj->faults.count( f ) );
6574  menu.addentry( -1, true, -1, string_format(
6575  opts.back().second ? pgettext( "fault", "Mend: %s" ) : pgettext( "fault", "Set: %s" ),
6576  f.obj().name() ) );
6577  }
6578  if( opts.empty() ) {
6579  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s doesn't have any faults to toggle." ), obj->tname() );
6580  return;
6581  }
6582  menu.query();
6583  if( menu.ret >= 0 ) {
6584  if( opts[menu.ret].second ) {
6585  obj->faults.erase( opts[menu.ret].first );
6586  } else {
6587  obj->faults.insert( opts[menu.ret].first );
6588  }
6589  }
6590  return;
6591  }
6592 
6593  const inventory &inv = crafting_inventory();
6594 
6595  struct mending_option {
6596  fault_id fault;
6597  std::reference_wrapper<const fault_fix> fix;
6598  bool doable;
6599  time_duration time_to_fix = 1_hours;
6600  };
6601 
6602  std::vector<mending_option> mending_options;
6603  for( const fault_id &f : obj->faults ) {
6604  for( const fault_fix_id &fix_id : f->get_fixes() ) {
6605  const fault_fix &fix = *fix_id;
6606  mending_option opt{ f, fix, true };
6607  for( const auto &[skill_id, level] : fix.skills ) {
6608  if( get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( skill_id ) < level ) {
6609  opt.doable = false;
6610  break;
6611  }
6612  }
6613  opt.doable &= fix.get_requirements().can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component );
6614  mending_options.emplace_back( opt );
6615  }
6616  }
6617 
6618  if( mending_options.empty() ) {
6619  if( interactive ) {
6620  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s doesn't have any faults to mend." ), obj->tname() );
6621  if( obj->damage() > obj->degradation() ) {
6622  const std::set<itype_id> &rep = obj->repaired_with();
6623  if( rep.empty() ) {
6624  add_msg( m_info, _( "It is damaged, but cannot be repaired." ) );
6625  } else {
6626  const std::string repair_options =
6627  enumerate_as_string( rep.begin(), rep.end(), []( const itype_id & e ) {
6628  return item::nname( e );
6629  }, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
6630 
6631  add_msg( m_info, _( "It is damaged, and could be repaired with %s. "
6632  "%s to use one of those items." ),
6633  repair_options, press_x( ACTION_USE ) );
6634  }
6635  }
6636  }
6637  return;
6638  }
6639 
6640  int sel = 0;
6641  if( interactive ) {
6642  uilist menu;
6643  menu.text = _( "Mend which fault?" );
6644  menu.desc_enabled = true;
6645  menu.desc_lines_hint = 0; // Let uilist handle description height
6646 
6647  constexpr int fold_width = 80;
6648 
6649  for( mending_option &opt : mending_options ) {
6650  const fault_fix &fix = opt.fix;
6651  const nc_color col = opt.doable ? c_white : c_light_gray;
6652 
6653  const requirement_data &reqs = fix.get_requirements();
6654  auto tools = reqs.get_folded_tools_list( fold_width, col, inv );
6655  auto comps = reqs.get_folded_components_list( fold_width, col, inv, is_crafting_component );
6656 
6657  std::string descr = word_rewrap( opt.fault->description(), 80 ) + "\n\n";
6658  for( const fault_id &fid : fix.faults_removed ) {
6659  if( obj->has_fault( fid ) ) {
6660  descr += string_format( _( "Removes fault: <color_green>%s</color>\n" ), fid->name() );
6661  } else {
6662  descr += string_format( _( "Removes fault: <color_light_gray>%s</color>\n" ), fid->name() );
6663  }
6664  }
6665  for( const fault_id &fid : fix.faults_added ) {
6666  descr += string_format( _( "Adds fault: <color_yellow>%s</color>\n" ), fid->name() );
6667  }
6668  if( fix.mod_damage > 0 ) {
6669  descr += string_format( _( "<color_green>Repairs</color> %d damage.\n" ), fix.mod_damage );
6670  } else if( fix.mod_damage < 0 ) {
6671  descr += string_format( _( "<color_red>Applies</color> %d damage.\n" ), -fix.mod_damage );
6672  }
6673 
6674  opt.time_to_fix = fix.time;
6675  // if an item has a time saver flag multiply total time by that flag's time factor
6676  for( const auto &[flag_id, mult] : fix.time_save_flags ) {
6677  if( obj->has_flag( flag_id ) ) {
6678  opt.time_to_fix *= mult;
6679  }
6680  }
6681  // if you have a time saver prof multiply total time by that prof's time factor
6682  for( const auto &[proficiency_id, mult] : fix.time_save_profs ) {
6683  if( has_proficiency( proficiency_id ) ) {
6684  opt.time_to_fix *= mult;
6685  }
6686  }
6687  descr += string_format( _( "Time required: <color_cyan>%s</color>\n" ),
6688  to_string_approx( opt.time_to_fix ) );
6689  if( fix.skills.empty() ) {
6690  descr += string_format( _( "Skills: <color_cyan>none</color>\n" ) );
6691  } else {
6692  descr += string_format( _( "Skills: %s\n" ), enumerate_as_string(
6693  fix.skills.begin(), fix.skills.end(), [this]( const std::pair<skill_id, int> &sk ) {
6694  if( get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( sk.first ) >= sk.second ) {
6695  return string_format( pgettext( "skill requirement",
6696  //~ %1$s: skill name, %2$s: current skill level, %3$s: required skill level
6697  "<color_cyan>%1$s</color> <color_green>(%2$d/%3$d)</color>" ),
6698  sk.first->name(), static_cast<int>( get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( sk.first ) ), sk.second );
6699  } else {
6700  return string_format( pgettext( "skill requirement",
6701  //~ %1$s: skill name, %2$s: current skill level, %3$s: required skill level
6702  "<color_cyan>%1$s</color> <color_red>(%2$d/%3$d)</color>" ),
6703  sk.first->name(), static_cast<int>( get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( sk.first ) ), sk.second );
6704  }
6705  } ) );
6706  }
6707 
6708  for( const std::string &line : tools ) {
6709  descr += line + "\n";
6710  }
6711  for( const std::string &line : comps ) {
6712  descr += line + "\n";
6713  }
6714 
6715  menu.addentry_desc( -1, true, -1, fix.name.translated(), colorize( descr, col ) );
6716  }
6717  menu.query();
6718  if( menu.ret < 0 ) {
6719  add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
6720  return;
6721  }
6722  sel = menu.ret;
6723  }
6724 
6725  if( sel >= 0 ) {
6726  const mending_option &opt = mending_options[sel];
6727  if( !opt.doable ) {
6728  if( interactive ) {
6729  add_msg( m_info, _( "You are currently unable to mend the %s this way." ), obj->tname() );
6730  }
6731  return;
6732  }
6733 
6734  const fault_fix &fix = opt.fix;
6735  assign_activity( ACT_MEND_ITEM, to_moves<int>( opt.time_to_fix ) );
6736  activity.name = opt.fault.str();
6737  activity.str_values.emplace_back( fix.id_ );
6738  activity.targets.push_back( std::move( obj ) );
6739  }
6740 }
6741 
6742 int Character::get_stim() const
6743 {
6744  return stim;
6745 }
6746 
6747 void Character::set_stim( int new_stim )
6748 {
6749  stim = new_stim;
6750 }
6751 
6752 void Character::mod_stim( int mod )
6753 {
6754  stim += mod;
6755 }
6756 
6757 int Character::get_rad() const
6758 {
6759  return radiation;
6760 }
6761 
6762 void Character::set_rad( int new_rad )
6763 {
6764  if( radiation != new_rad ) {
6765  radiation = new_rad;
6766  on_stat_change( "radiation", radiation );
6767  }
6768 }
6769 
6770 void Character::mod_rad( int mod )
6771 {
6772  if( has_flag( json_flag_NO_RADIATION ) ) {
6773  return;
6774  }
6775  set_rad( std::max( 0, get_rad() + mod ) );
6776 }
6777 
6778 void Character::calculate_leak_level()
6779 {
6780  float ret = 0.0f;
6781  // This is bad way to calculate radiation and should be rewritten some day.
6782  for( const item_location &item_loc : const_cast<Character *>( this )->all_items_loc() ) {
6783  const item *it = item_loc.get_item();
6784  if( it->has_flag( flag_RADIOACTIVE ) ) {
6785  if( it->has_flag( flag_LEAK_ALWAYS ) ) {
6786  ret += to_gram( it->weight() ) / 250.f;
6787  } else if( it->has_flag( flag_LEAK_DAM ) ) {
6788  ret += it->damage_level();
6789  }
6790  }
6791  }
6792  leak_level_dirty = false;
6793  leak_level = ret;
6794 }
6795 
6796 float Character::get_leak_level() const
6797 {
6798  return leak_level;
6799 }
6800 
6801 void Character::invalidate_leak_level_cache()
6802 {
6803  leak_level_dirty = true;
6804 }
6805 
6806 int Character::get_stamina() const
6807 {
6808  if( is_npc() ) {
6809  // No point in doing a bunch of checks on NPCs for now since they can't use stamina.
6810  return get_stamina_max();
6811  }
6812  return stamina;
6813 }
6814 
6815 int Character::get_stamina_max() const
6816 {
6817  if( is_npc() ) {
6818  // No point in doing a bunch of checks on NPCs for now since they can't use stamina.
6819  return 10000;
6820  }
6821  // Since adding cardio, 'player_max_stamina' is really 'base max stamina' and gets further modified
6822  // by your CV fitness. Name has been kept this way to avoid needing to change the code.
6823  // Default base maximum stamina and cardio scaling are defined in data/core/game_balance.json
6824  static const std::string player_max_stamina( "PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA_BASE" );
6825  static const std::string player_cardiofit_stamina_scale( "PLAYER_CARDIOFIT_STAMINA_SCALING" );
6826 
6827  // Cardiofit stamina mod defaults to 5, and get_cardiofit() should return a value in the vicinity
6828  // of 1000-3000, so this should add somewhere between 3000 to 15000 stamina.
6829  int max_stamina = get_option<int>( player_max_stamina ) +
6830  get_option<int>( player_cardiofit_stamina_scale ) * get_cardiofit();
6831  max_stamina = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::MAX_STAMINA, max_stamina );
6832 
6833  return max_stamina;
6834 }
6835 
6836 void Character::set_stamina( int new_stamina )
6837 {
6838  stamina = new_stamina;
6839 }
6840 
6841 int Character::get_arms_power_use() const
6842 {
6843  // millijoules
6844  return arms_power_use;
6845 }
6846 
6847 int Character::get_legs_power_use() const
6848 {
6849  // millijoules
6850  return legs_power_use;
6851 }
6852 
6853 float Character::get_arms_stam_mult() const
6854 {
6855  return arms_stam_mult;
6856 }
6857 
6858 float Character::get_legs_stam_mult() const
6859 {
6860  return legs_stam_mult;
6861 }
6862 
6863 void Character::recalc_limb_energy_usage()
6864 {
6865  // calculate energy usage of arms
6866  float total_limb_count = 0.0f;
6867  float bionic_limb_count = 0.0f;
6868  float bionic_powercost = 0;
6869  body_part_type::type arm_type = body_part_type::type::arm;
6870  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts_of_type( arm_type ) ) {
6871  total_limb_count++;
6872  if( bp->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
6873  bionic_powercost += bp->power_efficiency;
6874  bionic_limb_count++;
6875  }
6876  }
6877  arms_power_use = bionic_powercost;
6878  if( bionic_limb_count > 0 ) {
6879  arms_stam_mult = 1 - ( bionic_limb_count / total_limb_count );
6880  } else {
6881  arms_stam_mult = 1.0f;
6882  }
6883  //sanity check ourselves in debug
6884  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Total arms in use: %.1f, Bionic arms: %.1f",
6885  total_limb_count,
6886  bionic_limb_count );
6887  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "bionic power per arms stamina: %d", arms_power_use );
6888  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "arms stam usage mult by %.1f", arms_stam_mult );
6889 
6890  // calculate energy usage of legs
6891  total_limb_count = 0.0f;
6892  bionic_limb_count = 0.0f;
6893  bionic_powercost = 0;
6894  body_part_type::type leg_type = body_part_type::type::leg;
6895  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts_of_type( leg_type ) ) {
6896  total_limb_count++;
6897  if( bp->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
6898  bionic_powercost += bp->power_efficiency;
6899  bionic_limb_count++;
6900  }
6901  }
6902  legs_power_use = bionic_powercost;
6903  if( bionic_limb_count > 0 ) {
6904  legs_stam_mult = 1 - ( bionic_limb_count / total_limb_count );
6905  } else {
6906  legs_stam_mult = 1.0f;
6907  }
6908  //sanity check ourselves in debug
6909  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Total legs in use: %.1f, Bionic legs: %.1f",
6910  total_limb_count,
6911  bionic_limb_count );
6912  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "bionic power per legs stamina: %d", legs_power_use );
6913  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "legs stam usage mult by %.1f", legs_stam_mult );
6914 }
6915 
6916 void Character::burn_energy_arms( int mod )
6917 {
6918  mod_stamina( mod * get_arms_stam_mult() );
6919  if( get_arms_power_use() > 0 ) {
6920  mod_power_level( units::from_millijoule( mod * get_arms_power_use() ) );
6921  }
6922 }
6923 
6924 void Character::burn_energy_legs( int mod )
6925 {
6926  mod_stamina( mod * get_legs_stam_mult() );
6927  if( get_legs_power_use() > 0 ) {
6928  mod_power_level( units::from_millijoule( mod * get_legs_power_use() ) );
6929  }
6930 }
6931 
6932 void Character::burn_energy_all( int mod )
6933 {
6934  mod_stamina( mod * ( get_arms_stam_mult() + get_legs_stam_mult() ) * 0.5f );
6935  if( ( get_arms_power_use() + get_legs_power_use() ) > 0 ) {
6936  mod_power_level( units::from_millijoule( mod * ( get_arms_power_use() + get_legs_power_use() ) ) );
6937  }
6938 }
6939 
6940 void Character::mod_stamina( int mod )
6941 {
6942  // TODO: Make NPCs smart enough to use stamina
6943  if( is_npc() || has_trait( trait_DEBUG_STAMINA ) ) {
6944  return;
6945  }
6946 
6947  float quarter_thresh = 0.25 * get_stamina_max();
6948  float half_thresh = 0.5 * get_stamina_max();
6949 
6950  std::string quarter_stam_counter_str = get_value( "quarter_stam_counter" );
6951  int quarter_stam_counter = quarter_stam_counter_str.empty() ? 0 : std::stoi(
6952  quarter_stam_counter_str );
6953 
6954  if( stamina > half_thresh && stamina + mod < half_thresh ) {
6955  set_value( "got_to_half_stam", "true" );
6956  }
6957 
6958  if( stamina > quarter_thresh && stamina + mod < quarter_thresh && quarter_stam_counter < 5 ) {
6959  quarter_stam_counter++;
6960  set_value( "quarter_stam_counter", std::to_string( quarter_stam_counter ) );
6961  mod_daily_health( 1, 5 );
6962  }
6963 
6964  stamina += mod;
6965  if( stamina < 0 ) {
6966  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
6967  if( !bp->windage_effect.is_null() ) {
6968  add_effect( bp->windage_effect, 10_turns );
6969  }
6970  }
6971  }
6972  stamina = clamp( stamina, 0, get_stamina_max() );
6973 }
6974 
6975 void Character::burn_move_stamina( int moves )
6976 {
6977  int overburden_percentage = 0;
6978  //add half the difference between current stored kcal weight and healthy stored kcal weight to weight of carried gear
6979  units::mass fat_penalty = units::from_kilogram( 0.5f * std::max( 0.0f,
6980  ( get_healthy_kcal() - get_stored_kcal() ) / KCAL_PER_KG ) );
6981  units::mass current_weight = weight_carried() + fat_penalty;
6982  // Make it at least 1 gram to avoid divide-by-zero warning
6983  units::mass max_weight = std::max( weight_capacity(), 1_gram );
6984  if( current_weight > max_weight ) {
6985  overburden_percentage = ( current_weight - max_weight ) * 100 / max_weight;
6986  }
6987 
6988  int burn_ratio = get_option<int>( "PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_BURN_RATE" );
6989  for( const bionic_id &bid : get_bionic_fueled_with_muscle() ) {
6990  if( has_active_bionic( bid ) ) {
6991  burn_ratio = burn_ratio * 2 - 3;
6992  }
6993  }
6994  burn_ratio += overburden_percentage;
6995 
6996  ///\EFFECT_SWIMMING decreases stamina burn when swimming
6997  //Appropriate traits let you walk along the bottom without getting as tired
6998  if( get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, pos() ) &&
6999  ( !has_flag( json_flag_WALK_UNDERWATER ) ||
7000  get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_DOWN, pos() ) ) &&
7001  !get_map().has_flag_furn( "BRIDGE", pos() ) &&
7002  !( in_vehicle && get_map().veh_at( pos() )->vehicle().can_float() ) ) {
7003  burn_ratio += 100 / std::pow( 1.1, get_skill_level( skill_swimming ) );
7004  }
7005 
7006  burn_ratio *= move_mode->stamina_mult();
7007  burn_energy_legs( -( ( moves * burn_ratio ) / 100.0 ) * get_modifier(
7008  character_modifier_stamina_move_cost_mod ) * get_modifier(
7009  character_modifier_move_mode_move_cost_mod ) );
7010  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "Stamina burn: %d", -( ( moves * burn_ratio ) / 100 ) );
7011  // Chance to suffer pain if overburden and stamina runs out or has trait BADBACK
7012  // Starts at 1 in 25, goes down by 5 for every 50% more carried
7013  if( ( current_weight > max_weight ) && ( has_trait( trait_BADBACK ) || get_stamina() == 0 ) &&
7014  one_in( 35 - 5 * current_weight / ( max_weight / 2 ) ) ) {
7015  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your body strains under the weight!" ) );
7016  // 1 more pain for every 800 grams more (5 per extra STR needed)
7017  if( ( ( current_weight - max_weight ) / 800_gram > get_pain() && get_pain() < 100 ) ) {
7018  mod_pain( 1 );
7019  }
7020  }
7021 }
7022 
7023 void Character::update_stamina( int turns )
7024 {
7025  static const std::string player_base_stamina_regen_rate( "PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_REGEN_RATE" );
7026  const float base_regen_rate = get_option<float>( player_base_stamina_regen_rate );
7027  // Your stamina regen rate works as a function of how fit you are compared to your body size.
7028  // This allows it to scale more quickly than your stamina, so that at higher fitness levels you
7029  // recover stamina faster.
7030  const float effective_regen_rate = base_regen_rate * get_cardiofit() / get_cardio_acc_base();
7031  const int current_stim = get_stim();
7032  // Values above or below normal will increase or decrease stamina regen
7033  const float mod_regen = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::STAMINA_REGEN_MOD, 0 );
7034  // Mutated stamina works even when winded
7035  const float base_multiplier = mod_regen + ( has_effect( effect_winded ) ? 0.1f : 1.0f );
7036  // Ensure multiplier is at least 0.1
7037  const float stamina_multiplier = std::max<float>( 0.1f, base_multiplier );
7038 
7039  // Recover some stamina every turn. Start with zero, then increase recovery factor based on
7040  // mutations, stimulants, and bionics before rolling random recovery based on this factor.
7041  float stamina_recovery = 0.0f;
7042  // But mouth encumbrance interferes, even with mutated stamina.
7043  stamina_recovery += stamina_multiplier * std::max( 1.0f,
7044  effective_regen_rate * get_modifier( character_modifier_stamina_recovery_breathing_mod ) );
7045  // only apply stim-related and mutant stamina boosts if you don't have bionic lungs
7046  if( !has_bionic( bio_synlungs ) ) {
7047  stamina_recovery = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::REGEN_STAMINA,
7048  stamina_recovery );
7049  // TODO: recovering stamina causes hunger/thirst/sleepiness.
7050  // TODO: Tiredness slowing recovery
7051 
7052  // stim recovers stamina (or impairs recovery)
7053  if( current_stim > 0 ) {
7054  // TODO: Make stamina recovery with stims cost health
7055  stamina_recovery += std::min( 5.0f, current_stim / 15.0f );
7056  } else if( current_stim < 0 ) {
7057  // Affect it less near 0 and more near full
7058  // Negative stim kill at -200
7059  // At -100 stim it inflicts -20 malus to regen at 100% stamina,
7060  // effectivly countering stamina gain of default 20,
7061  // at 50% stamina its -10 (50%), cuts by 25% at 25% stamina
7062  stamina_recovery += current_stim / 5.0f * get_stamina() / get_stamina_max();
7063  }
7064  }
7065  const int max_stam = get_stamina_max();
7066  if( get_power_level() >= 3_kJ && has_active_bionic( bio_gills ) ) {
7067  int bonus = std::min<int>( units::to_kilojoule( get_power_level() ) / 3,
7068  max_stam - get_stamina() - stamina_recovery * turns );
7069  // so the effective recovery is up to 5x default
7070  bonus = std::min( bonus, 4 * static_cast<int>( effective_regen_rate ) );
7071  if( bonus > 0 ) {
7072  stamina_recovery += bonus;
7073  bonus /= 10;
7074  bonus = std::max( bonus, 1 );
7075  mod_power_level( units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( -bonus ) ) );
7076  }
7077  }
7078 
7079  // Roll to determine actual stamina recovery over this period
7080  int recover_amount = std::ceil( stamina_recovery * turns );
7081  mod_stamina( recover_amount );
7082  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "Stamina recovery: %d", recover_amount );
7083 
7084  // Cap at max
7085  set_stamina( std::min( std::max( get_stamina(), 0 ), max_stam ) );
7086 }
7087 
7088 int Character::get_cardiofit() const
7089 {
7090  if( is_npc() ) {
7091  // No point in doing a bunch of checks on NPCs for now since they can't use cardio.
7092  return 2 * get_cardio_acc_base();
7093  }
7094 
7095  if( has_bionic( bio_synlungs ) ) {
7096  // If you have the synthetic lungs bionic your cardioacc is forced to a specific value
7097  return 3 * get_cardio_acc_base();
7098  }
7099 
7100  const int cardio_base = get_cardio_acc();
7101 
7102  // Mut mod contains the base 1.0f for all modifiers
7103  const float mut_mod = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::CARDIO_MULTIPLIER, 1 );
7104  // 1 point of athletics skill = 1% more cardio, up to 10% cardio
7105  const float athletics_mod = get_skill_level( skill_swimming ) / 100.0f;
7106  // At some point we might have proficiencies that affect this.
7107  const float prof_mod = 0.0f;
7108  // 10 points of health = 1% cardio, up to 20% cardio
7109  float health_mod = get_lifestyle() / 1000.0f;
7110 
7111  // Negative effects of health are doubled, up to 40% cardio
7112  if( health_mod < 0.0f ) {
7113  health_mod *= 2.0f;
7114  }
7115 
7116  // Add up all of our cardio mods.
7117  float cardio_modifier = mut_mod + athletics_mod + prof_mod + health_mod;
7118  // Modify cardio accumulator by our cardio mods.
7119  const int cardio_fitness = static_cast<int>( cardio_base * cardio_modifier );
7120 
7121  return cardio_fitness;
7122 }
7123 
7124 int Character::get_cardio_acc() const
7125 {
7126  return cardio_acc;
7127 }
7128 
7129 void Character::set_cardio_acc( int ncardio_acc )
7130 {
7131  cardio_acc = ncardio_acc;
7132 }
7133 
7134 void Character::reset_cardio_acc()
7135 {
7136  set_cardio_acc( get_cardio_acc_base() );
7137 }
7138 
7139 int Character::get_cardio_acc_base() const
7140 {
7141  return base_cardio_acc;
7142 }
7143 
7144 bool Character::invoke_item( item *used )
7145 {
7146  return invoke_item( used, pos() );
7147 }
7148 
7149 bool Character::invoke_item( item *, const tripoint &, int )
7150 {
7151  return false;
7152 }
7153 
7154 bool Character::invoke_item( item *used, const std::string &method )
7155 {
7156  return invoke_item( used, method, pos() );
7157 }
7158 
7159 bool Character::invoke_item( item *used, const std::string &method, const tripoint &pt,
7160  int pre_obtain_moves )
7161 {
7162  if( method.empty() ) {
7163  return invoke_item( used, pt, pre_obtain_moves );
7164  }
7165 
7166  if( used->is_broken() ) {
7167  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s was broken and won't turn on." ), used->tname() );
7168  return false;
7169  }
7170  if( !used->ammo_sufficient( this, method ) ) {
7171  int ammo_req = used->ammo_required();
7172  std::string it_name = used->tname();
7173  if( used->has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
7174  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
7175  n_gettext( "Your %s needs %d charge from some UPS.",
7176  "Your %s needs %d charges from some UPS.",
7177  ammo_req ),
7178  it_name, ammo_req );
7179  } else if( used->has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
