7180  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
7181  n_gettext( "Your %s needs %d kJ of bionic power.",
7182  "Your %s needs %d kJ of bionic power.",
7183  ammo_req ),
7184  it_name, ammo_req );
7185  } else {
7186  int ammo_rem = used->ammo_remaining();
7187  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
7188  n_gettext( "Your %s has %d charge, but needs %d.",
7189  "Your %s has %d charges, but needs %d.",
7190  ammo_rem ),
7191  it_name, ammo_rem, ammo_req );
7192  }
7193  set_moves( pre_obtain_moves );
7194  return false;
7195  }
7196 
7197  item *actually_used = used->get_usable_item( method );
7198  if( actually_used == nullptr ) {
7199  debugmsg( "Tried to invoke a method %s on item %s, which doesn't have this method",
7200  method.c_str(), used->tname() );
7201  set_moves( pre_obtain_moves );
7202  return false;
7203  }
7204 
7205  std::optional<int> charges_used = actually_used->type->invoke( this, *actually_used,
7206  pt, method );
7207  if( !charges_used.has_value() ) {
7208  set_moves( pre_obtain_moves );
7209  return false;
7210  }
7211 
7212  if( charges_used.value() == 0 ) {
7213  // Not really used.
7214  // The item may also have been deleted
7215  return false;
7216  }
7217 
7218  if( actually_used->is_comestible() ) {
7219  const bool ret = consume_effects( *used );
7220  const int consumed = used->activation_consume( charges_used.value(), pt, this );
7221  if( consumed == 0 ) {
7222  // Nothing was consumed from within the item. "Eat" the item itself away.
7223  i_rem( actually_used );
7224  }
7225  return ret;
7226  }
7227 
7228  actually_used->activation_consume( charges_used.value(), pt, this );
7229 
7230  if( actually_used->has_flag( flag_SINGLE_USE ) || actually_used->is_bionic() ||
7231  actually_used->is_deployable() ) {
7232  i_rem( actually_used );
7233  return true;
7234  }
7235 
7236  return false;
7237 }
7238 
7239 bool Character::consume_charges( item &used, int qty )
7240 {
7241  if( qty < 0 ) {
7242  debugmsg( "Tried to consume negative charges" );
7243  return false;
7244  }
7245 
7246  if( qty == 0 ) {
7247  return false;
7248  }
7249 
7250  if( !used.is_tool() && !used.is_food() && !used.is_medication() ) {
7251  debugmsg( "Tried to consume charges for non-tool, non-food, non-med item" );
7252  return false;
7253  }
7254 
7255  // Consume comestibles destroying them if no charges remain
7256  if( used.is_food() || used.is_medication() ) {
7257  used.charges -= qty;
7258  if( used.charges <= 0 ) {
7259  i_rem( &used );
7260  return true;
7261  }
7262  return false;
7263  }
7264 
7265  // Tools which don't require ammo are instead destroyed
7266  if( used.is_tool() && !used.ammo_required() ) {
7267  if( has_item( used ) ) {
7268  i_rem( &used );
7269  } else {
7270  map_stack items = get_map().i_at( pos() );
7271  for( item_stack::iterator iter = items.begin(); iter != items.end(); iter++ ) {
7272  if( &( *iter ) == &used ) {
7273  iter = items.erase( iter );
7274  break;
7275  }
7276  }
7277  }
7278  return true;
7279  }
7280 
7281  used.ammo_consume( qty, pos(), this );
7282  return false;
7283 }
7284 
7285 int Character::item_handling_cost( const item &it, bool penalties, int base_cost,
7286  int charges_in_it, bool bulk_cost ) const
7287 {
7288  int mv = base_cost;
7289  if( penalties ) {
7290  // 50 moves per liter, up to 200 at 4 liters
7291  mv += std::min( 200, it.volume( false, false, charges_in_it ) / 20_ml );
7292  }
7293 
7294  if( weapon.typeId() == itype_e_handcuffs ) {
7295  mv *= 4;
7296  } else if( penalties && has_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
7297  // Grabbed penalty scales for grabbed arms/hands
7298  int pen = 2;
7299  for( const effect &eff : get_effects_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
7300  if( eff.get_bp()->primary_limb_type() == body_part_type::type::arm ||
7301  eff.get_bp()->primary_limb_type() == body_part_type::type::hand ) {
7302  pen++;
7303  }
7304  }
7305  mv *= pen;
7306  }
7307 
7308  // The following is considered as overhead and is not included in the cost when handling multiple items at once.
7309  if( !bulk_cost ) {
7310  // For single handed items use the least encumbered hand
7311  if( it.is_two_handed( *this ) ) {
7312  for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::hand ) ) {
7313  mv += encumb( part );
7314  }
7315  } else {
7316  int min_encumb = INT_MAX;
7317  for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::hand ) ) {
7318  min_encumb = std::min( min_encumb, encumb( part ) );
7319  }
7320  mv += min_encumb;
7321  }
7322  }
7323 
7324  return std::max( mv, 0 );
7325 }
7326 
7327 int Character::item_store_cost( const item &it, const item & /* container */, bool penalties,
7328  int base_cost ) const
7329 {
7330  /** @EFFECT_PISTOL decreases time taken to store a pistol */
7331  /** @EFFECT_SMG decreases time taken to store an SMG */
7332  /** @EFFECT_RIFLE decreases time taken to store a rifle */
7333  /** @EFFECT_SHOTGUN decreases time taken to store a shotgun */
7334  /** @EFFECT_LAUNCHER decreases time taken to store a launcher */
7335  /** @EFFECT_STABBING decreases time taken to store a stabbing weapon */
7336  /** @EFFECT_CUTTING decreases time taken to store a cutting weapon */
7337  /** @EFFECT_BASHING decreases time taken to store a bashing weapon */
7338  float lvl = get_skill_level( it.is_gun() ? it.gun_skill() : it.melee_skill() );
7339  return item_handling_cost( it, penalties, base_cost ) / ( ( lvl + 10.0f ) / 10.0f );
7340 }
7341 
7342 int Character::item_retrieve_cost( const item &it, const item &container, bool penalties,
7343  int base_cost ) const
7344 {
7345  // Drawing from an holster use the same formula as storing an item for now
7346  /**
7347  * @EFFECT_PISTOL decreases time taken to draw pistols from holsters
7348  * @EFFECT_SMG decreases time taken to draw smgs from holsters
7349  * @EFFECT_RIFLE decreases time taken to draw rifles from holsters
7350  * @EFFECT_SHOTGUN decreases time taken to draw shotguns from holsters
7351  * @EFFECT_LAUNCHER decreases time taken to draw launchers from holsters
7352  * @EFFECT_STABBING decreases time taken to draw stabbing weapons from sheathes
7353  * @EFFECT_CUTTING decreases time taken to draw cutting weapons from scabbards
7354  * @EFFECT_BASHING decreases time taken to draw bashing weapons from holsters
7355  */
7356  return item_store_cost( it, container, penalties, base_cost );
7357 }
7358 
7359 void Character::cough( bool harmful, int loudness )
7360 {
7361  if( has_effect( effect_cough_suppress ) ) {
7362  return;
7363  }
7364 
7365  if( harmful ) {
7366  const int stam = get_stamina();
7367  const int malus = get_stamina_max() * 0.05; // 5% max stamina
7368  mod_stamina( -malus );
7369  if( stam < malus && x_in_y( malus - stam, malus ) && one_in( 6 ) ) {
7370  apply_damage( nullptr, body_part_torso, 1 );
7371  }
7372  }
7373 
7374  if( !is_npc() ) {
7375  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You cough heavily." ) );
7376  }
7377  sounds::sound( pos(), loudness, sounds::sound_t::speech, _( "a hacking cough." ), false, "misc",
7378  "cough" );
7379 
7380  mod_moves( -get_speed() * 0.8 );
7381 
7382  add_effect( effect_disrupted_sleep, 5_minutes );
7383 }
7384 
7385 void Character::wake_up()
7386 {
7387  //Can't wake up if under anesthesia
7388  if( has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
7389  return;
7390  }
7391 
7392  // Do not remove effect_sleep or effect_alarm_clock now otherwise it invalidates an effect
7393  // iterator in player::process_effects().
7394  // We just set it for later removal (also happening in player::process_effects(), so no side
7395  // effects) with a duration of 0 turns.
7396 
7397  if( has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
7398  get_effect( effect_sleep ).set_duration( 0_turns );
7399  get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_wakes_up>( getID() );
7400  }
7401  remove_effect( effect_slept_through_alarm );
7402  remove_effect( effect_lying_down );
7403  if( has_effect( effect_alarm_clock ) ) {
7404  get_effect( effect_alarm_clock ).set_duration( 0_turns );
7405  }
7406  recalc_sight_limits();
7407 
7408  if( movement_mode_is( move_mode_prone ) ) {
7409  set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
7410  }
7411 }
7412 
7413 int Character::get_shout_volume() const
7414 {
7415  int base = 10;
7416  int shout_multiplier = 2;
7417 
7418  base = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SHOUT_NOISE, base );
7419  shout_multiplier = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SHOUT_NOISE_STR_MULT,
7420  shout_multiplier );
7421 
7422  // You can't shout without your face
7423  if( has_trait( trait_PROF_FOODP ) && !( is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask ) ||
7424  is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask_on ) ) ) {
7425  base = 0;
7426  shout_multiplier = 0;
7427  }
7428 
7429  // Masks and such dampen the sound
7430  // Balanced around whisper for wearing bondage mask
7431  // and noise ~= 10 (door smashing) for wearing dust mask for character with strength = 8
7432  /** @EFFECT_STR increases shouting volume */
7433  int noise = ( base + str_cur * shout_multiplier ) * get_limb_score( limb_score_breathing );
7434 
7435  // Minimum noise volume possible after all reductions.
7436  // Volume 1 can't be heard even by player
7437  constexpr int minimum_noise = 2;
7438 
7439  if( noise <= base ) {
7440  noise = std::max( minimum_noise, noise );
7441  }
7442 
7443  // Screaming underwater is not good for oxygen and harder to do overall
7444  if( underwater ) {
7445  noise = std::max( minimum_noise, noise / 2 );
7446  }
7447  return noise;
7448 }
7449 
7450 void Character::shout( std::string msg, bool order )
7451 {
7452  int base = 10;
7453  std::string shout;
7454 
7455  // You can't shout without your face
7456  if( has_trait( trait_PROF_FOODP ) && !( is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask ) ||
7457  is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask_on ) ) ) {
7458  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You try to shout, but you have no face!" ) );
7459  return;
7460  }
7461 
7462  // Mutations make shouting louder, they also define the default message
7463  if( has_trait( trait_SHOUT3 ) ) {
7464  base = 20;
7465  if( msg.empty() ) {
7466  msg = is_avatar() ? _( "yourself let out a piercing howl!" ) : _( "a piercing howl!" );
7467  shout = "howl";
7468  }
7469  } else if( has_trait( trait_SHOUT2 ) ) {
7470  base = 15;
7471  if( msg.empty() ) {
7472  msg = is_avatar() ? _( "yourself scream loudly!" ) : _( "a loud scream!" );
7473  shout = "scream";
7474  }
7475  }
7476 
7477  if( msg.empty() ) {
7478  msg = is_avatar() ? _( "yourself shout loudly!" ) : _( "a loud shout!" );
7479  shout = "default";
7480  }
7481  int noise = get_shout_volume();
7482 
7483  // Minimum noise volume possible after all reductions.
7484  // Volume 1 can't be heard even by player
7485  constexpr int minimum_noise = 2;
7486 
7487  if( noise <= base ) {
7488  std::wstring wstr( utf8_to_wstr( msg ) );
7489  std::transform( wstr.begin(), wstr.end(), wstr.begin(), towlower );
7490  msg = wstr_to_utf8( wstr );
7491  }
7492 
7493  // Screaming underwater is not good for oxygen and harder to do overall
7494  if( underwater ) {
7495  if( !has_trait( trait_GILLS ) && !has_trait( trait_GILLS_CEPH ) ) {
7496  mod_stat( "oxygen", -noise );
7497  }
7498  }
7499 
7500  // TODO: indistinct noise descriptions should be handled in the sounds code
7501  if( noise <= minimum_noise ) {
7502  add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
7503  _( "The sound of your voice is almost completely muffled!" ) );
7504  msg = is_avatar() ? _( "your muffled shout" ) : _( "an indistinct voice" );
7505  } else if( get_limb_score( limb_score_breathing ) < 0.5f ) {
7506  // The shout's volume is 1/2 or lower of what it would be without the penalty
7507  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "The sound of your voice is significantly muffled!" ) );
7508  }
7509 
7510  sounds::sound( pos(), noise, order ? sounds::sound_t::order : sounds::sound_t::alert, msg, false,
7511  "shout", shout );
7512 }
7513 
7514 void Character::signal_nemesis()
7515 {
7516  const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = global_omt_location();
7517  const tripoint_abs_sm smpos = project_to<coords::sm>( ompos );
7518  overmap_buffer.signal_nemesis( smpos );
7519 }
7520 
7521 void Character::vomit()
7522 {
7523  get_event_bus().send<event_type::throws_up>( getID() );
7524 
7525  if( stomach.contains() != 0_ml ) {
7526  get_map().add_field( adjacent_tile(), fd_bile, 1 );
7527  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You throw up heavily!" ), _( "<npcname> throws up heavily!" ) );
7528  }
7529  // needed to ensure digesting vitamin_type::DRUGs are also emptied, even on an empty stomach.
7530  stomach.empty();
7531 
7532 
7533  if( !has_effect( effect_nausea ) ) { // Prevents never-ending nausea
7534  const effect dummy_nausea( effect_source( this ), &effect_nausea.obj(), 0_turns,
7535  bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID(), false, 1, calendar::turn );
7536  add_effect( effect_nausea, std::max( dummy_nausea.get_max_duration() * units::to_milliliter(
7537  stomach.contains() ) / 21, dummy_nausea.get_int_dur_factor() ) );
7538  }
7539 
7540  mod_moves( -100 );
7541  for( auto &elem : *effects ) {
7542  for( auto &_effect_it : elem.second ) {
7543  effect &it = _effect_it.second;
7544  if( it.get_id() == effect_foodpoison ) {
7545  it.mod_duration( -30_minutes );
7546  } else if( it.get_id() == effect_drunk ) {
7547  it.mod_duration( rng( -10_minutes, -50_minutes ) );
7548  }
7549  }
7550  }
7551  remove_effect( effect_pkill1_generic );
7552  remove_effect( effect_pkill1_acetaminophen );
7553  remove_effect( effect_pkill1_nsaid );
7554  remove_effect( effect_pkill2 );
7555  remove_effect( effect_pkill3 );
7556  // Don't wake up when just retching
7557  if( stomach.contains() > 0_ml ) {
7558  wake_up();
7559  }
7560 }
7561 
7562 // adjacent_tile() returns a safe, unoccupied adjacent tile. If there are no such tiles, returns player position instead.
7563 tripoint Character::adjacent_tile() const
7564 {
7565  std::vector<tripoint> ret;
7566  int dangerous_fields = 0;
7567  map &here = get_map();
7568  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
7569  for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
7570  if( p == pos() ) {
7571  // Don't consider player position
7572  continue;
7573  }
7574  if( creatures.creature_at( p ) != nullptr ) {
7575  continue;
7576  }
7577  if( here.impassable( p ) ) {
7578  continue;
7579  }
7580  const trap &curtrap = here.tr_at( p );
7581  // If we don't known a trap here, the spot "appears" to be good, so consider it.
7582  // Same if we know a benign trap (as it's not dangerous).
7583  if( curtrap.can_see( p, *this ) && !curtrap.is_benign() ) {
7584  continue;
7585  }
7586  // Only consider tile if unoccupied, passable and has no traps
7587  dangerous_fields = 0;
7588  field &tmpfld = here.field_at( p );
7589  for( auto &fld : tmpfld ) {
7590  const field_entry &cur = fld.second;
7591  if( cur.is_dangerous() ) {
7592  dangerous_fields++;
7593  }
7594  }
7595 
7596  if( dangerous_fields == 0 ) {
7597  ret.push_back( p );
7598  }
7599  }
7600 
7601  return random_entry( ret, pos() ); // player position if no valid adjacent tiles
7602 }
7603 
7604 void Character::set_fac_id( const std::string &my_fac_id )
7605 {
7606  fac_id = faction_id( my_fac_id );
7607 }
7608 
7609 std::string get_stat_name( character_stat Stat )
7610 {
7611  switch( Stat ) {
7612  // *INDENT-OFF*
7613  case character_stat::STRENGTH: return pgettext( "strength stat", "STR" );
7614  case character_stat::DEXTERITY: return pgettext( "dexterity stat", "DEX" );
7615  case character_stat::INTELLIGENCE: return pgettext( "intelligence stat", "INT" );
7616  case character_stat::PERCEPTION: return pgettext( "perception stat", "PER" );
7617  // *INDENT-ON*
7618  default:
7619  break;
7620  }
7621  return pgettext( "fake stat there's an error", "ERR" );
7622 }
7623 
7624 int Character::mutation_height( const trait_id &mut ) const
7625 {
7626  const mutation_branch &mdata = mut.obj();
7627  int height_prereqs = 0;
7628  int height_prereqs2 = 0;
7629  for( const trait_id &prereq : mdata.prereqs ) {
7630  height_prereqs = std::max( mutation_height( prereq ), height_prereqs );
7631  }
7632  for( const trait_id &prereq : mdata.prereqs2 ) {
7633  height_prereqs2 = std::max( mutation_height( prereq ), height_prereqs2 );
7634  }
7635  return std::max( height_prereqs, height_prereqs2 ) + 1;
7636 }
7637 
7638 void Character::calc_mutation_levels()
7639 {
7640  mutation_category_level.clear();
7641  // This intentionally counts multiple leads_to mutations
7642  // from the same root mutation as having full height
7643 
7644  // For each of our mutations...
7645  for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
7646  const mutation_branch &mdata = mut.obj();
7647  if( mdata.threshold ) {
7648  // Thresholds are worth 10, and technically support multiple categories
7649  for( const mutation_category_id &cat : mdata.category ) {
7650  mutation_category_level[cat] += 10;
7651  }
7652  continue;
7653  }
7654  // ... if we don't have a valid addititive version...
7655  bool have_upgrade = false;
7656  for( const trait_id &upgrade : mdata.additions ) {
7657  const mutation_branch &upgradedata = upgrade.obj();
7658  if( has_trait( upgrade ) && !upgradedata.flags.count( json_flag_NON_THRESH ) ) {
7659  have_upgrade = true;
7660  break;
7661  }
7662  }
7663  if( !have_upgrade && !mdata.flags.count( json_flag_NON_THRESH ) ) {
7664  // ... find the mutations distance from normalcy...
7665  int mut_height = mutation_height( mut );
7666  // ... and for each category it falls in...
7667  for( const mutation_category_id &cat : mdata.category ) {
7668  // ... add the height and a constant value
7669  mutation_category_level[cat] += mut_height + 2;
7670  }
7671  }
7672  }
7673 }
7674 
7675 void Character::drench_mut_calc()
7676 {
7677  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
7678  int ignored = 0;
7679  int neutral = 0;
7680  int good = 0;
7681 
7682  for( const trait_id &iter : get_mutations() ) {
7683  const mutation_branch &mdata = iter.obj();
7684  const auto wp_iter = mdata.protection.find( bp.id() );
7685  if( wp_iter != mdata.protection.end() ) {
7686  ignored += wp_iter->second.x;
7687  neutral += wp_iter->second.y;
7688  good += wp_iter->second.z;
7689  }
7690  }
7691  set_part_mut_drench( bp, { WT_GOOD, good } );
7692  set_part_mut_drench( bp, { WT_NEUTRAL, neutral } );
7693  set_part_mut_drench( bp, { WT_IGNORED, ignored } );
7694  }
7695 }
7696 
7697 /// Returns a weighted list of all mutation categories with current blood vitamin levels
7698 weighted_int_list<mutation_category_id> Character::get_vitamin_weighted_categories() const
7699 {
7700  weighted_int_list<mutation_category_id> weighted_output;
7701  const std::map<mutation_category_id, mutation_category_trait> &mutation_categories =
7702  mutation_category_trait::get_all();
7703  for( const auto &elem : mutation_categories ) {
7704  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MUTATION, "get_vitamin_weighted_categories: category %s weight %d",
7705  elem.second.id.c_str(), vitamin_get( elem.second.vitamin ) );
7706  weighted_output.add( elem.first, vitamin_get( elem.second.vitamin ) );
7707  }
7708  return weighted_output;
7709 }
7710 
7711 int Character::vitamin_RDA( const vitamin_id &vitamin, int ammount ) const
7712 {
7713  const double multiplier = vitamin_rate( vitamin ) / 1_days * 100;
7714  return std::lround( ammount * multiplier );
7715 }
7716 
7717 void Character::recalculate_bodyparts()
7718 {
7719  body_part_set body_set;
7720  for( const bodypart_id &bp : creature_anatomy->get_bodyparts() ) {
7721  body_set.set( bp.id() );
7722  }
7723  body_set = enchantment_cache->modify_bodyparts( body_set );
7724  // first come up with the bodyparts that need to be removed from body
7725  for( auto bp_iter = body.begin(); bp_iter != body.end(); ) {
7726  if( !body_set.test( bp_iter->first ) ) {
7727  bp_iter = body.erase( bp_iter );
7728  } else {
7729  ++bp_iter;
7730  }
7731  }
7732  // then add the parts in bodyset that are missing from body
7733  for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : body_set ) {
7734  if( body.find( bp ) == body.end() ) {
7735  body[bp] = bodypart( bp );
7736  }
7737  }
7738  tally_organic_size();
7739  recalc_limb_energy_usage();
7740 
7741  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ANATOMY_BP, "New healthy kcal %d",
7742  get_healthy_kcal() );
7743  calc_encumbrance();
7744  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ANATOMY_BP, "New stored kcal %d",
7745  get_stored_kcal() );
7746  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ANATOMY_BP, "New organic size %.1f",
7747  get_cached_organic_size() );
7748 }
7749 
7750 void Character::recalculate_enchantment_cache()
7751 {
7752  // start by resetting the cache to all inventory items
7753  *enchantment_cache = inv->get_active_enchantment_cache( *this );
7754 
7755  cache_visit_items_with( "is_relic", &item::is_relic, [this]( const item & it ) {
7756  for( const enchant_cache &ench : it.get_proc_enchantments() ) {
7757  if( ench.is_active( *this, it ) ) {
7758  enchantment_cache->force_add( ench );
7759  }
7760  }
7761  for( const enchantment &ench : it.get_defined_enchantments() ) {
7762  if( ench.is_active( *this, it ) ) {
7763  enchantment_cache->force_add( ench, *this );
7764  }
7765  }
7766  } );
7767 
7768  // get from traits/ mutations
7769  for( const std::pair<const trait_id, trait_data> &mut_map : my_mutations ) {
7770  const mutation_branch &mut = mut_map.first.obj();
7771 
7772  for( const enchantment_id &ench_id : mut.enchantments ) {
7773  const enchantment &ench = ench_id.obj();
7774  if( ench.is_active( *this, mut.activated && mut_map.second.powered ) ) {
7775  enchantment_cache->force_add( ench, *this );
7776  }
7777  }
7778  }
7779 
7780  for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
7781  const bionic_id &bid = bio.id;
7782 
7783  for( const enchantment_id &ench_id : bid->enchantments ) {
7784  const enchantment &ench = ench_id.obj();
7785  if( ench.is_active( *this, bio.powered &&
7786  bid->has_flag( STATIC( json_character_flag( "BIONIC_TOGGLED" ) ) ) ) ) {
7787  enchantment_cache->force_add( ench, *this );
7788  }
7789  }
7790  }
7791 
7792  for( const auto &elem : *effects ) {
7793  for( const enchantment_id &ench_id : elem.first->enchantments ) {
7794  const enchantment &ench = ench_id.obj();
7795  if( ench.is_active( *this, true ) ) {
7796  enchantment_cache->force_add( ench, *this );
7797  }
7798  }
7799  }
7800 
7801  if( enchantment_cache->modifies_bodyparts() ) {
7802  recalculate_bodyparts();
7803  }
7804  recalc_hp();
7805 }
7806 
7807 double Character::calculate_by_enchantment( double modify, enchant_vals::mod value,
7808  bool round_output ) const
7809 {
7810  modify += enchantment_cache->get_value_add( value );
7811  modify *= 1.0 + enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( value );
7812  if( round_output ) {
7813  modify = std::round( modify );
7814  }
7815  return modify;
7816 }
7817 
7818 void Character::passive_absorb_hit( const bodypart_id &bp, damage_unit &du ) const
7819 {
7820  // >0 check because some mutations provide negative armor
7821  // Thin skin check goes before subdermal armor plates because SUBdermal
7822  if( du.amount > 0.0f ) {
7823  du.amount -= mutation_armor( bp, du );
7824  du.amount -= bp->damage_resistance( du );
7825  }
7826  du.amount -= bionic_armor_bonus( bp, du.type ); //Check for passive armor bionics
7827  du.amount -= mabuff_armor_bonus( du.type );
7828  du.amount = std::max( 0.0f, du.amount );
7829 }
7830 
7831 void Character::did_hit( Creature &target )
7832 {
7833  enchantment_cache->cast_hit_you( *this, target );
7834 }
7835 
7836 ret_val<void> Character::can_wield( const item &it ) const
7837 {
7838  if( has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
7839  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't wield anything while incorporeal." ) );
7840  }
7841  if( !has_min_manipulators() ) {
7842  return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
7843  _( "You need at least one arm available to even consider wielding something." ) );
7844  }
7845  if( it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
7846  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't wield spilt liquids." ) );
7847  }
7848  if( it.made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
7849  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't wield loose gases." ) );
7850  }
7851  if( it.is_frozen_liquid() && !it.has_flag( flag_SHREDDED ) ) {
7852  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't wield unbroken frozen liquids." ) );
7853  }
7854  if( it.has_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD ) ) {
7855  if( get_wielded_item() && get_wielded_item().get_item() == &it ) {
7856  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't unwield this." ) );
7857  }
7858  return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
7859  _( "You can't wield this. Wielding it would make it impossible to unwield it." ) );
7860  }
7861  if( it.has_flag( flag_BIONIC_WEAPON ) ) {
7862  return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
7863  _( "You can't wield this. It looks like it has to be attached to a bionic." ) );
7864  }
7865 
7866  if( is_armed() && !can_unwield( weapon ).success() ) {
7867  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "The %s prevents you from wielding the %s." ),
7868  weapname(), it.tname() );
7869  }
7870  monster *mount = mounted_creature.get();
7871  if( it.is_two_handed( *this ) && ( !has_two_arms_lifting() ||
7872  worn_with_flag( flag_RESTRICT_HANDS ) ) &&
7873  !( is_mounted() && mount->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
7874  mount->type->mech_weapon && it.typeId() == mount->type->mech_weapon ) ) {
7875  if( worn_with_flag( flag_RESTRICT_HANDS ) ) {
7876  return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
7877  _( "Something you are wearing hinders the use of both hands." ) );
7878  } else if( it.has_flag( flag_ALWAYS_TWOHAND ) ) {
7879  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't wield the %s with only one arm." ),
7880  it.tname() );
7881  } else {
7882  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You are too weak to wield the %s with only one arm." ),
7883  it.tname() );
7884  }
7885  }
7886  if( is_mounted() && mount->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
7887  mount->type->mech_weapon && it.typeId() != mount->type->mech_weapon ) {
7888  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You cannot wield anything while piloting a mech." ) );
7889  }
7890 
7891  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
7892 }
7893 
7894 bool Character::has_wield_conflicts( const item &it ) const
7895 {
7896  return is_wielding( it ) || ( is_armed() && !it.can_combine( weapon ) );
7897 }
7898 
7899 bool Character::unwield()
7900 {
7901  if( weapon.is_null() ) {
7902  return true;
7903  }
7904 
7905  if( !can_unwield( weapon ).success() ) {
7906  return false;
7907  }
7908 
7909  // currently the only way to unwield NO_UNWIELD weapon is if it's a bionic that can be deactivated
7910  if( weapon.has_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD ) ) {
7911  std::optional<bionic *> bio_opt = find_bionic_by_uid( get_weapon_bionic_uid() );
7912  return bio_opt ? deactivate_bionic( **bio_opt ) : false;
7913  }
7914 
7915  const std::string query = string_format( _( "Stop wielding %s?" ), weapon.tname() );
7916 
7917  if( !dispose_item( item_location( *this, &weapon ), query ) ) {
7918  return false;
7919  }
7920 
7921  inv->unsort();
7922 
7923  return true;
7924 }
7925 
7926 std::string Character::weapname() const
7927 {
7928  std::string name = weapname_simple();
7929  const std::string mode = weapname_mode();
7930  const std::string ammo = weapname_ammo();
7931 
7932  if( !mode.empty() ) {
7933  name = string_format( "%s %s", mode, name );
7934  }
7935  if( !ammo.empty() ) {
7936  name = string_format( "%s %s", name, ammo );
7937  }
7938 
7939  return name;
7940 }
7941 
7942 std::string Character::weapname_simple() const
7943 {
7944  //To make wield state consistent, gun_nam; when calling tname, is disabling 'with_collapsed' flag
7945  if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
7946  gun_mode current_mode = weapon.gun_current_mode();
7947  const bool no_mode = !current_mode.target;
7948  tname::segment_bitset segs( tname::default_tname );
7949  segs.set( tname::segments::TAGS, false );
7950  std::string gun_name = no_mode ? weapon.display_name() : current_mode->tname( 1, segs );
7951  return gun_name;
7952 
7953  } else if( !is_armed() ) {
7954  return _( "fists" );
7955  } else {
7956  return weapon.tname();
7957  }
7958 }
7959 
7960 std::string Character::weapname_mode() const
7961 {
7962  if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
7963  gun_mode current_mode = weapon.gun_current_mode();
7964  const bool no_mode = !current_mode.target;
7965  std::string gunmode;
7966  if( !no_mode && current_mode->gun_all_modes().size() > 1 ) {
7967  gunmode = current_mode.tname();
7968  }
7969  return gunmode;
7970  } else {
7971  return "";
7972  }
7973 }
7974 
7975 std::string Character::weapname_ammo() const
7976 {
7977  if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
7978  gun_mode current_mode = weapon.gun_current_mode();
7979  const bool no_mode = !current_mode.target;
7980  // only required for empty mags and empty guns
7981  std::string mag_ammo;
7982 
7983  if( !no_mode && ( current_mode->uses_magazine() || current_mode->magazine_integral() ) ) {
7984  if( current_mode->uses_magazine() && !current_mode->magazine_current() ) {
7985  mag_ammo = _( "(empty)" );
7986  } else {
7987  int cur_ammo = current_mode->ammo_remaining();
7988  int max_ammo;
7989  if( cur_ammo == 0 ) {
7990  max_ammo = current_mode->ammo_capacity( item( current_mode->ammo_default() ).ammo_type() );
7991  } else {
7992  max_ammo = current_mode->ammo_capacity( current_mode->loaded_ammo().ammo_type() );
7993  }
7994 
7995  const double ratio = static_cast<double>( cur_ammo ) / static_cast<double>( max_ammo );
7996  nc_color charges_color;
7997  if( cur_ammo == 0 ) {
7998  charges_color = c_light_red;
7999  } else if( cur_ammo == max_ammo ) {
8000  charges_color = c_white;
8001  } else if( ratio < 1.0 / 3.0 ) {
8002  charges_color = c_red;
8003  } else if( ratio < 2.0 / 3.0 ) {
8004  charges_color = c_yellow;
8005  } else {
8006  charges_color = c_light_green;
8007  }
8008  mag_ammo = string_format( "(%s)", colorize( string_format( "%i/%i", cur_ammo, max_ammo ),
8009  charges_color ) );
8010  }
8011  }
8012 
8013  return mag_ammo;
8014 
8015  } else {
8016  return "";
8017  }
8018 }
8019 
8020 // Tests to see if a character has room to enter a vehicle tile.
8021 bool Character::move_in_vehicle( Creature *c, const tripoint &dest_loc ) const
8022 {
8023  map &m = get_map();
8024  const optional_vpart_position vp_there = m.veh_at( dest_loc );
8025  if( vp_there ) {
8026  vehicle &veh = vp_there->vehicle();
8027  units::volume capacity = 0_ml;
8028  units::volume free_cargo = 0_ml;
8029  auto cargo_parts = veh.get_parts_at( dest_loc, "CARGO", part_status_flag::any );
8030  for( vehicle_part *&part : cargo_parts ) {
8031  vehicle_stack contents = veh.get_items( *part );
8032  const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( dest_loc );
8033  // Check for obstacles and appliances to prevent squishing when the part is
8034  // not a vehicle or when the player is not actually entering the tile IE grabbing.
8035  if( !vp.part_with_feature( "CARGO_PASSABLE", false ) &&
8036  !vp.part_with_feature( "APPLIANCE", false ) && !vp.part_with_feature( "OBSTACLE", false ) ) {
8037  capacity += contents.max_volume();
8038  free_cargo += contents.free_volume();
8039  }
8040  }
8041  if( capacity > 0_ml ) {
8042  // First, we'll try to squeeze in. Open-topped vehicle parts have more room for us.
8043  if( !veh.enclosed_at( dest_loc ) ) {
8044  free_cargo *= 1.2;
8045  }
8046  const creature_size size = get_size();
8047  if( ( size == creature_size::tiny && free_cargo < 15625_ml ) ||
8048  ( size == creature_size::small && free_cargo < 31250_ml ) ||
8049  ( size == creature_size::medium && free_cargo < 62500_ml ) ||
8050  ( size == creature_size::large && free_cargo < 125000_ml ) ||
8051  ( size == creature_size::huge && free_cargo < 250000_ml ) ) {
8052  if( ( size == creature_size::tiny && free_cargo < 11719_ml ) ||
8053  ( size == creature_size::small && free_cargo < 23438_ml ) ||
8054  ( size == creature_size::medium && free_cargo < 46875_ml ) ||
8055  ( size == creature_size::large && free_cargo < 93750_ml ) ||
8056  ( size == creature_size::huge && free_cargo < 187500_ml ) ) {
8057  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "There's not enough room for you to fit there." ) );
8058  return false; // Even if we squeeze, there's no room.
8059  }
8060  c->add_effect( effect_cramped_space, 2_turns, true );
8061  return true;
8062  }
8063  }
8064  const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( dest_loc );
8065  // Sufficiently gigantic characters aren't comfortable in stock seats, roof or no.
8066  if( in_vehicle && get_size() == creature_size::huge && !vp.part_with_feature( "AISLE", false ) &&
8067  !vp.part_with_feature( "HUGE_OK", false ) && !has_effect( effect_cramped_space ) ) {
8068  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You barely fit in this tiny human vehicle." ) );
8069  add_msg_if_npc( m_warning, _( "%s has to really cram their huge body to fit." ), c->disp_name() );
8070  c->add_effect( effect_cramped_space, 2_turns, true );
8071  return true;
8072  }
8073  }
8074  return true;
8075 }
8076 
8077 void Character::on_hit( Creature *source, bodypart_id bp_hit,
8078  float /*difficulty*/, dealt_projectile_attack const *const proj )
8079 {
8080  check_dead_state();
8081  if( source == nullptr || proj != nullptr ) {
8082  return;
8083  }
8084 
8085  // Creature attacking an invisible player will remain aware of their location as long as they keep hitting something
8086  if( is_avatar() && source->is_monster() && source->has_effect( effect_stumbled_into_invisible ) ) {
8087  source->as_monster()->stumble_invis( *this, false );
8088  }
8089 
8090  if( is_npc() ) {
8091  as_npc()->on_attacked( *source );
8092  }
8093 
8094  bool u_see = get_player_view().sees( *this );
8095  const units::energy trigger_cost_base = bio_ods->power_trigger;
8096  if( has_active_bionic( bio_ods ) && get_power_level() > ( 5 * trigger_cost_base ) ) {
8097  if( is_avatar() ) {
8098  add_msg( m_good, _( "Your offensive defense system shocks %s in mid-attack!" ),
8099  source->disp_name() );
8100  } else if( u_see ) {
8101  add_msg( _( "%1$s's offensive defense system shocks %2$s in mid-attack!" ),
8102  disp_name(),
8103  source->disp_name() );
8104  }
8105  int shock = rng( 1, 4 );
8106  mod_power_level( -shock * trigger_cost_base );
8107  damage_instance ods_shock_damage;
8108  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8109  ods_shock_damage.add_damage( damage_electric, shock * 5 );
8110  // Should hit body part used for attack
8111  source->deal_damage( this, body_part_torso, ods_shock_damage );
8112  }
8113  if( !wearing_something_on( bp_hit ) &&
8114  ( has_trait( trait_SPINES ) || has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ) ) {
8115  int spine = rng( 1, has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ? 20 : 8 );
8116  if( !is_avatar() ) {
8117  if( u_see ) {
8118  add_msg( _( "%1$s's %2$s puncture %3$s in mid-attack!" ), get_name(),
8119  ( has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ? _( "quills" ) : _( "spines" ) ),
8120  source->disp_name() );
8121  }
8122  } else {
8123  add_msg( m_good, _( "Your %1$s puncture %2$s in mid-attack!" ),
8124  ( has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ? _( "quills" ) : _( "spines" ) ),
8125  source->disp_name() );
8126  }
8127  damage_instance spine_damage;
8128  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8129  spine_damage.add_damage( damage_stab, spine );
8130  source->deal_damage( this, body_part_torso, spine_damage );
8131  }
8132  if( ( !wearing_something_on( bp_hit ) ) && has_trait( trait_THORNS ) &&
8133  ( !source->has_weapon() ) ) {
8134  if( !is_avatar() ) {
8135  if( u_see ) {
8136  add_msg( _( "%1$s's %2$s scrape %3$s in mid-attack!" ), get_name(),
8137  _( "thorns" ), source->disp_name() );
8138  }
8139  } else {
8140  add_msg( m_good, _( "Your thorns scrape %s in mid-attack!" ), source->disp_name() );
8141  }
8142  int thorn = rng( 1, 4 );
8143  damage_instance thorn_damage;
8144  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8145  thorn_damage.add_damage( damage_cut, thorn );
8146  // In general, critters don't have separate limbs
8147  // so safer to target the torso
8148  source->deal_damage( this, body_part_torso, thorn_damage );
8149  }
8150  if( ( !wearing_something_on( bp_hit ) ) && has_trait( trait_CF_HAIR ) ) {
8151  if( !is_avatar() ) {
8152  if( u_see ) {
8153  add_msg( _( "%1$s gets a load of %2$s's %3$s stuck in!" ), source->disp_name(),
8154  get_name(), _( "hair" ) );
8155  }
8156  } else {
8157  add_msg( m_good, _( "Your hairs detach into %s!" ), source->disp_name() );
8158  }
8159  source->add_effect( effect_stunned, 2_turns );
8160  if( one_in( 3 ) ) { // In the eyes!
8161  source->add_effect( effect_blind, 2_turns );
8162  }
8163  }
8164 
8165  map &here = get_map();
8166  const optional_vpart_position veh_part = here.veh_at( pos() );
8167  bool in_skater_vehicle = in_vehicle && veh_part.part_with_feature( "SEAT_REQUIRES_BALANCE", false );
8168 
8169  if( ( worn_with_flag( flag_REQUIRES_BALANCE ) || in_skater_vehicle ) && !is_on_ground() ) {
8170  int rolls = 4;
8171  if( worn_with_flag( flag_ROLLER_ONE ) && !in_skater_vehicle ) {
8172  rolls += 2;
8173  }
8174  if( has_trait( trait_PROF_SKATER ) ) {
8175  rolls--;
8176  }
8177  if( has_trait( trait_DEFT ) ) {
8178  rolls--;
8179  }
8180  if( has_trait( trait_CLUMSY ) ) {
8181  rolls++;
8182  }
8183 
8184  if( stability_roll() < dice( rolls, 10 ) ) {
8185  if( !is_avatar() ) {
8186  if( u_see ) {
8187  add_msg( _( "%1$s loses their balance while being hit!" ), get_name() );
8188  }
8189  } else {
8190  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You lose your balance while being hit!" ) );
8191  }
8192  if( in_skater_vehicle ) {
8193  g->fling_creature( this, rng_float( 0_degrees, 360_degrees ), 10 );
8194  }
8195  // This kind of downing is not subject to immunity.
8196  add_effect( effect_downed, 2_turns, false, 0, true );
8197  }
8198  }
8199 
8200  enchantment_cache->cast_hit_me( *this, source );
8201 }
8202 
8203 /*
8204  Where damage to character is actually applied to hit body parts
8205  Might be where to put bleed stuff rather than in player::deal_damage()
8206  */
8207 void Character::apply_damage( Creature *source, bodypart_id hurt, int dam,
8208  const bool bypass_med )
8209 {
8210  if( is_dead_state() || has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NODMG ) || has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
8211  // don't do any more damage if we're already dead
8212  // Or if we're debugging and don't want to die
8213  // Or we are intangible
8214  return;
8215  }
8216 
8217  if( hurt == bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
8218  debugmsg( "Wacky body part hurt!" );
8219  hurt = body_part_torso;
8220  }
8221 
8222  if( !hurt->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
8223  mod_pain( dam / 2 );
8224  }
8225 
8226  const bodypart_id &part_to_damage = hurt->main_part;
8227 
8228  const int dam_to_bodypart = std::min( dam, get_part_hp_cur( part_to_damage ) );
8229 
8230  mod_part_hp_cur( part_to_damage, - dam_to_bodypart );
8231  get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_takes_damage>( getID(), dam_to_bodypart );
8232 
8233  if( !weapon.is_null() && !can_wield( weapon ).success() &&
8234  can_drop( weapon ).success() ) {
8235  add_msg_if_player( _( "You are no longer able to wield your %s and drop it!" ),
8236  weapon.display_name() );
8237  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::tumbling, { weapon } );
8238  i_rem( &weapon );
8239  }
8240  if( has_effect( effect_mending, part_to_damage.id() ) && ( source == nullptr ||
8241  !source->is_hallucination() ) ) {
8242  effect &e = get_effect( effect_mending, part_to_damage );
8243  float remove_mend = dam / 20.0f;
8244  e.mod_duration( -e.get_max_duration() * remove_mend );
8245  }
8246 
8247  if( dam > get_painkiller() ) {
8248  on_hurt( source );
8249  }
8250 
8251  if( !bypass_med ) {
8252  // remove healing effects if damaged
8253  int remove_med = roll_remainder( dam / 5.0f );
8254  if( remove_med > 0 && has_effect( effect_bandaged, part_to_damage.id() ) ) {
8255  remove_med -= reduce_healing_effect( effect_bandaged, remove_med, part_to_damage );
8256  }
8257  if( remove_med > 0 && has_effect( effect_disinfected, part_to_damage.id() ) ) {
8258  reduce_healing_effect( effect_disinfected, remove_med, part_to_damage );
8259  }
8260  }
8261 }
8262 
8263 dealt_damage_instance Character::deal_damage( Creature *source, bodypart_id bp,
8264  const damage_instance &d, const weakpoint_attack &attack )
8265 {
8266  if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NODMG ) || has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
8267  return dealt_damage_instance();
8268  }
8269 
8270  //damage applied here
8271  dealt_damage_instance dealt_dams = Creature::deal_damage( source, bp, d, attack );
8272  //block reduction should be by applied this point
8273  int dam = dealt_dams.total_damage();
8274 
8275  // TODO: Pre or post blit hit tile onto "this"'s location here
8276  if( dam > 0 && get_player_view().sees( pos() ) ) {
8277  g->draw_hit_player( *this, dam );
8278 
8279  if( is_avatar() && source ) {
8280  //monster hits player melee
8281  SCT.add( point( posx(), posy() ),
8282  direction_from( point_zero, point( posx() - source->posx(), posy() - source->posy() ) ),
8283  get_hp_bar( dam, get_hp_max( bp ) ).first, m_bad, body_part_name( bp ), m_neutral );
8284  }
8285  }
8286 
8287  // And slimespawners too
8288  if( has_trait( trait_SLIMESPAWNER ) && ( dam >= 10 ) && one_in( 20 - dam ) ) {
8289  if( monster *const slime = g->place_critter_around( mon_player_blob, pos(), 1 ) ) {
8290  slime->friendly = -1;
8291  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "A mass of slime is torn from you, and moves on its own!" ) );
8292  }
8293  }
8294 
8295  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
8296  //Acid blood effects.
8297  bool u_see = player_character.sees( *this );
8298  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8299  int cut_dam = dealt_dams.type_damage( damage_cut );
8300  if( source && has_flag( json_flag_ACIDBLOOD ) && !bp->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) &&
8301  !one_in( 3 ) &&
8302  ( dam >= 4 || cut_dam > 0 ) && ( rl_dist( player_character.pos(), source->pos() ) <= 1 ) ) {
8303  if( is_avatar() ) {
8304  add_msg( m_good, _( "Your acidic blood splashes %s in mid-attack!" ),
8305  source->disp_name() );
8306  } else if( u_see ) {
8307  add_msg( _( "%1$s's acidic blood splashes on %2$s in mid-attack!" ),
8308  disp_name(), source->disp_name() );
8309  }
8310  damage_instance acidblood_damage;
8311  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8312  acidblood_damage.add_damage( damage_acid, rng( 4, 16 ) );
8313  if( !one_in( 4 ) ) {
8314  source->deal_damage( this, body_part_arm_l, acidblood_damage );
8315  source->deal_damage( this, body_part_arm_r, acidblood_damage );
8316  } else {
8317  source->deal_damage( this, body_part_torso, acidblood_damage );
8318  source->deal_damage( this, body_part_head, acidblood_damage );
8319  }
8320  }
8321 
8322  int recoil_mul = 100;
8323 
8324  if( bp == body_part_hand_l || bp == body_part_arm_l ||
8325  bp == body_part_hand_r || bp == body_part_arm_r ) {
8326  recoil_mul = 200;
8327  } else if( bp == bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
8328  debugmsg( "Wacky body part hit!" );
8329  }
8330 
8331  // TODO: Scale with damage in a way that makes sense for power armors, plate armor and naked skin.
8332  recoil += recoil_mul * weapon.volume() / 250_ml;
8333  recoil = std::min( MAX_RECOIL, recoil );
8334 
8335  int sum_cover = 0;
8336  bool dealt_melee = false;
8337  bool dealt_ranged = false;
8338  for( const damage_unit &du : d ) {
8339  if( !du.type->physical ) {
8340  continue;
8341  }
8342  // Assume that ranged == getting shot
8343  if( !du.type->melee_only ) {
8344  dealt_ranged = true;
8345  } else {
8346  dealt_melee = true;
8347  }
8348  }
8349  sum_cover += worn.sum_filthy_cover( dealt_ranged, dealt_melee, bp );
8350 
8351  // Chance of infection is damage (with cut and stab x4) * sum of coverage on affected body part, in percent.
8352  // i.e. if the body part has a sum of 100 coverage from filthy clothing,
8353  // each point of damage has a 1% change of causing infection.
8354  // if the bodypart doesn't bleed, it doesn't have blood, and cannot get infected
8355  if( sum_cover > 0 && !bp->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
8356  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage types
8357  const int cut_type_dam = dealt_dams.type_damage( damage_cut ) +
8358  dealt_dams.type_damage( damage_stab );
8359  const int combined_dam = dealt_dams.type_damage( damage_bash ) + ( cut_type_dam * 4 );
8360  const int infection_chance = ( combined_dam * sum_cover ) / 100;
8361  if( x_in_y( infection_chance, 100 ) ) {
8362  if( has_effect( effect_bite, bp.id() ) ) {
8363  add_effect( effect_bite, 40_minutes, bp, true );
8364  } else if( has_effect( effect_infected, bp.id() ) ) {
8365  add_effect( effect_infected, 25_minutes, bp, true );
8366  } else {
8367  add_effect( effect_bite, 1_turns, bp, true );
8368  }
8369  add_msg_if_player( _( "Filth from your clothing has been embedded deep in the wound." ) );
8370  }
8371  }
8372 
8373  on_hurt( source );
8374  return dealt_dams;
8375 }
8376 
8377 int Character::reduce_healing_effect( const efftype_id &eff_id, int remove_med,
8378  const bodypart_id &hurt )
8379 {
8380  effect &e = get_effect( eff_id, hurt );
8381  int intensity = e.get_intensity();
8382  if( remove_med < intensity ) {
8383  if( eff_id == effect_bandaged ) {
8384  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Bandages on your %s were damaged!" ), body_part_name( hurt ) );
8385  } else if( eff_id == effect_disinfected ) {
8386  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You got some filth on your disinfected %s!" ),
8387  body_part_name( hurt ) );
8388  }
8389  } else {
8390  if( eff_id == effect_bandaged ) {
8391  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Bandages on your %s were destroyed!" ),
8392  body_part_name( hurt ) );
8393  } else if( eff_id == effect_disinfected ) {
8394  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s is no longer disinfected!" ), body_part_name( hurt ) );
8395  }
8396  }
8397  e.mod_duration( -6_hours * remove_med );
8398  return intensity;
8399 }
8400 
8401 void Character::heal_bp( bodypart_id bp, int dam )
8402 {
8403  heal( bp, dam );
8404 }
8405 
8406 void Character::heal( const bodypart_id &healed, int dam )
8407 {
8408  if( !is_limb_broken( healed ) && ( dam != 0 || healed->has_flag( json_flag_ALWAYS_HEAL ) ) ) {
8409  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Base healing of %s = %d", body_part_name( healed ),
8410  dam );
8411  if( healed->has_flag( json_flag_HEAL_OVERRIDE ) ) {
8412  dam = healed->heal_bonus;
8413  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Heal override, new healing %d", dam );
8414  } else {
8415  dam += healed->heal_bonus;
8416  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Healing after bodypart heal bonus %d", dam );
8417  }
8418  int effective_heal = std::min( dam,
8419  get_part_hp_max( healed ) - get_part_hp_cur( healed ) ) ;
8420  mod_part_hp_cur( healed, effective_heal );
8421  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Final healing of %s = %d", body_part_name( healed ),
8422  dam );
8423  get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_heals_damage>( getID(), effective_heal );
8424  }
8425 }
8426 
8427 void Character::healall( int dam )
8428 {
8429  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
8430  heal( bp, dam );
8431  mod_part_healed_total( bp, dam );
8432  }
8433 }
8434 
8435 void Character::hurtall( int dam, Creature *source, bool disturb /*= true*/ )
8436 {
8437  if( is_dead_state() || has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NODMG ) || has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ||
8438  dam <= 0 ) {
8439  return;
8440  }
8441 
8442  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
8443  // Don't use apply_damage here or it will annoy the player with 6 queries
8444  const int dam_to_bodypart = std::min( dam, get_part_hp_cur( bp ) );
8445  mod_part_hp_cur( bp, - dam_to_bodypart );
8446  get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_takes_damage>( getID(), dam_to_bodypart );
8447  }
8448 
8449  // Low pain: damage is spread all over the body, so not as painful as 6 hits in one part
8450  mod_pain( dam );
8451  on_hurt( source, disturb );
8452 }
8453 
8454 int Character::hitall( int dam, int vary, Creature *source )
8455 {
8456  int damage_taken = 0;
8457  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
8458  int ddam = vary ? dam * rng( 100 - vary, 100 ) / 100 : dam;
8459  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8460  damage_instance damage( damage_bash, ddam );
8461  damage_taken += deal_damage( source, bp, damage ).total_damage();
8462  }
8463  return damage_taken;
8464 }
8465 
8466 void Character::on_hurt( Creature *source, bool disturb /*= true*/ )
8467 {
8468  if( has_trait( trait_ADRENALINE ) && !has_effect( effect_adrenaline ) &&
8469  ( get_part_hp_cur( body_part_head ) < 25 ||
8470  get_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso ) < 15 ) ) {
8471  add_effect( effect_adrenaline, 20_minutes );
8472  }
8473 
8474  if( disturb ) {
8475  if( has_effect( effect_sleep ) && !has_bionic( bio_sleep_shutdown ) ) {
8476  wake_up();
8477  }
8478  if( uistate.distraction_attack && !is_npc() && !has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
8479  if( source != nullptr ) {
8480  if( sees( *source ) ) {
8481  g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::attacked,
8482  string_format( _( "You were attacked by %s!" ), source->disp_name() ) );
8483  } else {
8484  g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::attacked,
8485  _( "You were attacked by something you can't see!" ) );
8486  }
8487  } else {
8488  g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::attacked, _( "You were hurt!" ) );
8489  }
8490  }
8491  }
8492 
8493  if( is_dead_state() ) {
8494  set_killer( source );
8495  }
8496 }
8497 
8498 bool Character::crossed_threshold() const
8499 {
8500  for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
8501  if( mut->threshold ) {
8502  return true;
8503  }
8504  }
8505  return false;
8506 }
8507 
8508 mutation_category_id Character::get_threshold_category() const
8509 {
8510  for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
8511  if( mut->threshold && !mut->category.empty() ) {
8512  return mut->category[0];
8513  }
8514  }
8515  return mutation_category_id::NULL_ID();
8516 }
8517 
8518 void Character::update_type_of_scent( bool init )
8519 {
8520  scenttype_id new_scent = scent_sc_human;
8521  for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
8522  if( mut.obj().scent_typeid ) {
8523  new_scent = mut.obj().scent_typeid.value();
8524  }
8525  }
8526 
8527  if( !init && new_scent != get_type_of_scent() ) {
8528  get_scent().reset();
8529  }
8530  set_type_of_scent( new_scent );
8531 }
8532 
8533 void Character::update_type_of_scent( const trait_id &mut, bool gain )
8534 {
8535  const std::optional<scenttype_id> &mut_scent = mut->scent_typeid;
8536  if( mut_scent ) {
8537  if( gain && mut_scent.value() != get_type_of_scent() ) {
8538  set_type_of_scent( mut_scent.value() );
8539  get_scent().reset();
8540  } else {
8541  update_type_of_scent();
8542  }
8543  }
8544 }
8545 
8546 void Character::set_type_of_scent( const scenttype_id &id )
8547 {
8548  type_of_scent = id;
8549 }
8550 
8551 scenttype_id Character::get_type_of_scent() const
8552 {
8553  return type_of_scent;
8554 }
8555 
8556 void Character::restore_scent()
8557 {
8558  const std::string prev_scent = get_value( "prev_scent" );
8559  if( !prev_scent.empty() ) {
8560  remove_effect( effect_masked_scent );
8561  set_type_of_scent( scenttype_id( prev_scent ) );
8562  remove_value( "prev_scent" );
8563  remove_value( "waterproof_scent" );
8564  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You smell like yourself again." ) );
8565  }
8566 }
8567 
8568 void Character::spores()
8569 {
8570  map &here = get_map();
8571  fungal_effects fe;
8572  //~spore-release sound
8573  sounds::sound( pos(), 10, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Pouf!" ), false, "misc", "puff" );
8574  for( const tripoint &sporep : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
8575  if( sporep == pos() ) {
8576  continue;
8577  }
8578  fe.fungalize( sporep, this, 0.25 );
8579  }
8580 }
8581 
8582 void Character::blossoms()
8583 {
8584  // Player blossoms are shorter-ranged, but you can fire much more frequently if you like.
8585  sounds::sound( pos(), 10, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Pouf!" ), false, "misc", "puff" );
8586  map &here = get_map();
8587  for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 2 ) ) {
8588  here.add_field( tmp, fd_fungal_haze, rng( 1, 2 ) );
8589  }
8590 }
8591 
8592 void Character::update_vitamins( const vitamin_id &vit )
8593 {
8594  if( !needs_food() ) {
8595  return; // NPCs can only develop vitamin diseases if their needs are enabled
8596  }
8597 
8598  efftype_id def = vit.obj().deficiency();
8599  efftype_id exc = vit.obj().excess();
8600 
8601  int lvl = vit.obj().severity( vitamin_get( vit ) );
8602  if( lvl <= 0 ) {
8603  remove_effect( def );
8604  }
8605  if( lvl >= 0 ) {
8606  remove_effect( exc );
8607  }
8608  if( lvl > 0 ) {
8609  if( has_effect( def ) ) {
8610  get_effect( def ).set_intensity( lvl, is_avatar() );
8611  } else {
8612  add_effect( def, 1_turns, true, lvl );
8613  }
8614  }
8615  if( lvl < 0 ) {
8616  if( has_effect( exc ) ) {
8617  get_effect( exc ).set_intensity( -lvl, is_avatar() );
8618  } else {
8619  add_effect( exc, 1_turns, true, -lvl );
8620  }
8621  }
8622 }
8623 
8624 void Character::rooted_message() const
8625 {
8626  if( ( has_trait( trait_ROOTS2 ) || has_trait( trait_ROOTS3 ) || has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) &&
8627  get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLOWABLE, pos() ) &&
8628  is_barefoot() ) {
8629  add_msg( m_info, _( "You sink your roots into the soil." ) );
8630  }
8631 }
8632 
8633 void Character::rooted()
8634 // This assumes that daily Iron, Calcium, and Thirst needs should be filled at the same rate.
8635 // Baseline humans need 96 Iron and Calcium, and 288 Thirst per day.
8636 // Thirst level -40 puts it right in the middle of the 'Hydrated' zone.
8637 // TODO: The rates for iron, calcium, and thirst should probably be pulled from the nutritional data rather than being hardcoded here, so that future balance changes don't break this.
8638 {
8639  if( ( has_trait( trait_ROOTS2 ) || has_trait( trait_ROOTS3 ) || has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) &&
8640  get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLOWABLE, pos() ) && is_barefoot() ) {
8641  int time_to_full = 43200; // 12 hours
8642  if( has_trait( trait_ROOTS3 ) || has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) {
8643  time_to_full += -14400; // -4 hours
8644  }
8645  if( x_in_y( 96, time_to_full ) ) {
8646  vitamin_mod( vitamin_iron, 1 );
8647  vitamin_mod( vitamin_calcium, 1 );
8648  mod_daily_health( 5, 50 );
8649  }
8650  if( get_thirst() > -40 && x_in_y( 288, time_to_full ) ) {
8651  mod_thirst( -1 );
8652  }
8653  }
8654 }
8655 
8656 std::vector<item *> Character::inv_dump()
8657 {
8658  std::vector<item *> ret;
8659  if( is_armed() && can_drop( weapon ).success() ) {
8660  ret.push_back( &weapon );
8661  }
8662  worn.inv_dump( ret );
8663  inv->dump( ret );
8664  return ret;
8665 }
8666 
8667 std::vector<const item *> Character::inv_dump() const
8668 {
8669  std::vector<const item *> ret;
8670  if( is_armed() && can_drop( weapon ).success() ) {
8671  ret.push_back( &weapon );
8672  }
8673  worn.inv_dump( ret );
8674  inv->dump( ret );
8675  return ret;
8676 }
8677 
8678 bool Character::covered_with_flag( const flag_id &f, const body_part_set &parts ) const
8679 {
8680  if( parts.none() ) {
8681  return true;
8682  }
8683 
8684  return worn.covered_with_flag( f, parts );
8685 }
8686 
8687 bool Character::is_waterproof( const body_part_set &parts ) const
8688 {
8689  return covered_with_flag( flag_WATERPROOF, parts );
8690 }
8691 
8692 units::volume Character::free_space() const
8693 {
8694  units::volume volume_capacity = 0_ml;
8695  volume_capacity += weapon.get_total_capacity();
8696  for( const item_pocket *pocket : weapon.get_all_contained_pockets() ) {
8697  if( pocket->contains_phase( phase_id::SOLID ) ) {
8698  for( const item *it : pocket->all_items_top() ) {
8699  volume_capacity -= it->volume();
8700  }
8701  } else if( !pocket->empty() ) {
8702  volume_capacity -= pocket->volume_capacity();
8703  }
8704  }
8705  volume_capacity += weapon.check_for_free_space();
8706  volume_capacity += worn.free_space();
8707  return volume_capacity;
8708 }
8709 
8710 units::mass Character::free_weight_capacity() const
8711 {
8712  units::mass weight_capacity = 0_gram;
8713  weight_capacity += weapon.get_remaining_weight_capacity();
8714  weight_capacity += worn.free_weight_capacity();
8715  return weight_capacity;
8716 }
8717 
8718 units::volume Character::holster_volume() const
8719 {
8720  units::volume holster_volume = 0_ml;
8721  if( weapon.is_holster() ) {
8722  holster_volume += weapon.get_total_capacity();
8723  }
8724  holster_volume += worn.holster_volume();
8725  return holster_volume;
8726 }
8727 
8728 int Character::empty_holsters() const
8729 {
8730  int e_holsters = 0;
8731  if( weapon.is_holster() ) {
8732  e_holsters += 1;
8733  }
8734  e_holsters += worn.empty_holsters();
8735  return e_holsters;
8736 }
8737 
8738 int Character::used_holsters() const
8739 {
8740  int e_holsters = 0;
8741  if( weapon.is_holster() ) {
8742  e_holsters += weapon.get_used_holsters();
8743  }
8744  e_holsters += worn.used_holsters();
8745  return e_holsters;
8746 }
8747 
8748 int Character::total_holsters() const
8749 {
8750  int e_holsters = 0;
8751  if( weapon.is_holster() ) {
8752  e_holsters += weapon.get_total_holsters();
8753  }
8754  e_holsters += worn.total_holsters();
8755  return e_holsters;
8756 }
8757 
8758 units::volume Character::free_holster_volume() const
8759 {
8760  units::volume holster_volume = 0_ml;
8761  if( weapon.is_holster() ) {
8762  holster_volume += weapon.get_total_holster_volume() - weapon.get_used_holster_volume();
8763  }
8764  holster_volume += worn.free_holster_volume();
8765  return holster_volume;
8766 }
8767 
8768 units::volume Character::small_pocket_volume( const units::volume &threshold ) const
8769 {
8770  units::volume small_spaces = 0_ml;
8771  if( weapon.get_total_capacity() <= threshold ) {
8772  small_spaces += weapon.get_total_capacity();
8773  }
8774  small_spaces += worn.small_pocket_volume( threshold );
8775  return small_spaces;
8776 }
8777 
8778 units::volume Character::volume_capacity() const
8779 {
8780  units::volume volume_capacity = 0_ml;
8781  volume_capacity += weapon.get_total_capacity();
8782  volume_capacity += worn.volume_capacity();
8783  return volume_capacity;
8784 }
8785 
8786 units::volume Character::volume_capacity_with_tweaks( const
8787  std::vector<std::pair<item_location, int>>
8788  &locations ) const
8789 {
8790  std::map<const item *, int> dropping;
8791  for( const std::pair<item_location, int> &location_pair : locations ) {
8792  dropping.emplace( location_pair.first.get_item(), location_pair.second );
8793  }
8794  return volume_capacity_with_tweaks( item_tweaks( { dropping } ) );
8795 }
8796 
8797 units::volume Character::volume_capacity_with_tweaks( const item_tweaks &tweaks ) const
8798 {
8799  const std::map<const item *, int> empty;
8800  const std::map<const item *, int> &without = tweaks.without_items ? tweaks.without_items->get() :
8801  empty;
8802 
8803  units::volume volume_capacity = 0_ml;
8804 
8805  if( !without.count( &weapon ) ) {
8806  volume_capacity += weapon.get_total_capacity();
8807  }
8808 
8809  volume_capacity += worn.volume_capacity_with_tweaks( without );
8810 
8811  return volume_capacity;
8812 }
8813 
8814 units::volume Character::volume_carried() const
8815 {
8816  return volume_capacity() - free_space();
8817 }
8818 
8819 void Character::toggle_hauling()
8820 {
8821  map &here = get_map();
8822 
8823  if( hauling ) {
8824  stop_hauling();
8825  } else {
8826  std::vector<item_location> items = here.get_haulable_items( pos() );
8827  if( items.empty() ) {
8828  add_msg( m_info, _( "There are no items to haul here." ) );
8829  return;
8830  }
8831  start_hauling( items );
8832  start_autohaul();
8833  }
8834 }
8835 
8836 void Character::start_hauling( const std::vector<item_location> &items_to_haul = {} )
8837 {
8838  map &here = get_map();
8839 
8840  if( here.veh_at( pos() ) ) {
8841  add_msg( m_info, _( "You cannot haul inside vehicles." ) );
8842  return;
8843  } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, pos() ) ) {
8844  add_msg( m_info, _( "You cannot haul while in deep water." ) );
8845  return;
8846  } else if( !here.can_put_items( pos() ) ) {
8847  add_msg( m_info, _( "You cannot haul items here." ) );
8848  return;
8849  }
8850 
8851  add_msg( _( "You start hauling items along the ground." ) );
8852  if( is_armed() ) {
8853  add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your hands are not free, which makes hauling slower." ) );
8854  }
8855 
8856  hauling = true;
8857  haul_list = items_to_haul;
8858 }
8859 
8860 void Character::stop_hauling()
8861 {
8862  if( hauling ) {
8863  add_msg( _( "You stop hauling items." ) );
8864  hauling = false;
8865  autohaul = false;
8866  haul_list.clear();
8867  }
8868  if( has_activity( ACT_MOVE_ITEMS ) ) {
8869  cancel_activity();
8870  }
8871 }
8872 
8873 bool Character::is_hauling() const
8874 {
8875  return hauling;
8876 }
8877 
8878 void Character::start_autohaul()
8879 {
8880  autohaul = true;
8881  if( !is_hauling() ) {
8882  start_hauling();
8883  }
8884 }
8885 
8886 void Character::stop_autohaul()
8887 {
8888  autohaul = false;
8889  if( haul_list.empty() ) {
8890  stop_hauling();
8891  }
8892 }
8893 
8894 bool Character::is_autohauling() const
8895 {
8896  return autohaul;
8897 }
8898 
8899 bool Character::trim_haul_list( const std::vector<item_location> &valid_items )
8900 {
8901  size_t qty_before = haul_list.size();
8902  haul_list.erase( std::remove_if( haul_list.begin(),
8903  haul_list.end(), [&valid_items]( const item_location & it ) {
8904  return std::count( valid_items.begin(), valid_items.end(), it ) == 0;
8905  } ), haul_list.end() );
8906 
8907  return qty_before != haul_list.size();
8908 }
8909 
8910 bool Character::knows_creature_type( const Creature *c ) const
8911 {
8912  if( const monster *mon = dynamic_cast<const monster *>( c ) ) {
8913  return knows_creature_type( mon->type->id );
8914  }
8915  return false;
8916 }
8917 
8918 bool Character::knows_creature_type( const mtype_id &c ) const
8919 {
8920  return known_monsters.count( c ) > 0;
8921 }
8922 
8923 void Character::set_knows_creature_type( const Creature *c )
8924 {
8925  if( const monster *mon = dynamic_cast<const monster *>( c ) ) {
8926  set_knows_creature_type( mon->type->id );
8927  }
8928 }
8929 
8930 void Character::set_knows_creature_type( const mtype_id &c )
8931 {
8932  known_monsters.emplace( c );
8933 }
8934 
8935 void Character::assign_activity( const activity_id &type, int moves, int index, int pos,
8936  const std::string &name )
8937 {
8938  assign_activity( player_activity( type, moves, index, pos, name ) );
8939 }
8940 
8941 void Character::assign_activity( const activity_actor &actor )
8942 {
8943  assign_activity( player_activity( actor ) );
8944 }
8945 
8946 void Character::assign_activity( const player_activity &act )
8947 {
8948  bool resuming = false;
8949  if( !backlog.empty() && backlog.front().can_resume_with( act, *this ) ) {
8950  resuming = true;
8951  add_msg_if_player( _( "You resume your task." ) );
8952  activity = backlog.front();
8953  backlog.pop_front();
8954  } else {
8955  if( activity ) {
8956  backlog.push_front( activity );
8957  }
8958 
8959  activity = act;
8960  }
8961 
8962  activity.start_or_resume( *this, resuming );
8963 
8964  if( is_npc() ) {
8965  cancel_stashed_activity();
8966  npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( this );
8967  guy->set_attitude( NPCATT_ACTIVITY );
8968  guy->set_mission( NPC_MISSION_ACTIVITY );
8969  guy->current_activity_id = activity.id();
8970  }
8971 }
8972 
8973 bool Character::has_activity( const activity_id &type ) const
8974 {
8975  return activity.id() == type;
8976 }
8977 
8978 bool Character::has_activity( const std::vector<activity_id> &types ) const
8979 {
8980  return std::find( types.begin(), types.end(), activity.id() ) != types.end();
8981 }
8982 
8983 void Character::cancel_activity()
8984 {
8985  activity.canceled( *this );
8986  if( has_activity( ACT_MOVE_ITEMS ) && is_hauling() ) {
8987  stop_hauling();
8988  }
8989  // Clear any backlog items that aren't auto-resume.
8990  // but keep only one instance of ACT_ADV_INVENTORY
8991  // FIXME: this is required by the legacy code in advanced_inventory::move_all_items()
8992  bool has_adv_inv = has_activity( ACT_ADV_INVENTORY );
8993  for( auto backlog_item = backlog.begin(); backlog_item != backlog.end(); ) {
8994  if( backlog_item->auto_resume &&
8995  ( !has_adv_inv || backlog_item->id() != ACT_ADV_INVENTORY ) ) {
8996  has_adv_inv |= backlog_item->id() == ACT_ADV_INVENTORY;
8997  backlog_item++;
8998  } else {
8999  backlog_item = backlog.erase( backlog_item );
9000  }
9001  }
9002 
9003  // act wait stamina interrupts an ongoing activity.
9004  // and automatically puts auto_resume = true on it
9005  // we don't want that to persist if there is another interruption.
9006  // and player moves elsewhere.
9007  if( has_activity( ACT_WAIT_STAMINA ) && !backlog.empty() &&
9008  backlog.front().auto_resume ) {
9009  backlog.front().auto_resume = false;
9010  }
9011  if( activity && activity.can_resume() ) {
9012  activity.allow_distractions();
9013  backlog.push_front( activity );
9014  }
9015  sfx::end_activity_sounds(); // kill activity sounds when canceled
9016  activity = player_activity();
9017 }
9018 
9019 void Character::resume_backlog_activity()
9020 {
9021  if( !backlog.empty() && backlog.front().auto_resume ) {
9022  activity = backlog.front();
9023  activity.auto_resume = false;
9024  activity.allow_distractions();
9025  backlog.pop_front();
9026  }
9027 }
9028 
9029 void Character::fall_asleep()
9030 {
9031  // Communicate to the player that he is using items on the floor
9032  std::string item_name = is_snuggling();
9033  if( item_name == "many" ) {
9034  if( one_in( 15 ) ) {
9035  add_msg_if_player( _( "You nestle into your pile of clothes for warmth." ) );
9036  } else {
9037  add_msg_if_player( _( "You use your pile of clothes for warmth." ) );
9038  }
9039  } else if( item_name != "nothing" ) {
9040  if( one_in( 15 ) ) {
9041  add_msg_if_player( _( "You snuggle your %s to keep warm." ), item_name );
9042  } else {
9043  add_msg_if_player( _( "You use your %s to keep warm." ), item_name );
9044  }
9045  }
9046  if( has_bionic( bio_sleep_shutdown ) ) {
9047  add_msg_if_player( _( "Sleep Mode activated. Disabling sensory response." ) );
9048  }
9049  if( has_active_mutation( trait_HIBERNATE ) &&
9050  get_kcal_percent() > 0.8f ) {
9051  if( is_avatar() ) {
9052  get_memorial().add( pgettext( "memorial_male", "Entered hibernation." ),
9053  pgettext( "memorial_female", "Entered hibernation." ) );
9054  }
9055  // some days worth of round-the-clock Snooze. Cata seasons default to 91 days.
9056  fall_asleep( 10_days );
9057  // If you're not sleepinessd enough for 10 days, you won't sleep the whole thing.
9058  // In practice, the sleepiness from filling the tank from (no msg) to Time For Bed
9059  // will last about 8 days.
9060  } else {
9061  fall_asleep( 10_hours ); // default max sleep time.
9062  }
9063 }
9064 
9065 void Character::fall_asleep( const time_duration &duration )
9066 {
9067  if( activity ) {
9068  if( activity.id() == ACT_TRY_SLEEP ) {
9069  activity.set_to_null();
9070  } else {
9071  cancel_activity();
9072  }
9073  }
9074  add_effect( effect_sleep, duration );
9075  get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_falls_asleep>( getID(), to_seconds<int>( duration ) );
9076 }
9077 
9078 void Character::migrate_items_to_storage( bool disintegrate )
9079 {
9080  inv->visit_items( [&]( const item * it, item * ) {
9081  if( disintegrate ) {
9082  if( try_add( *it, /*avoid=*/nullptr, it ) == item_location::nowhere ) {
9083  std::string profession_id = prof->ident().str();
9084  debugmsg( "ERROR: Could not put %s (%s) into inventory. Check if the "
9085  "profession (%s) has enough space.",
9086  it->tname(), it->typeId().str(), profession_id );
9087  return VisitResponse::ABORT;
9088  }
9089  } else {
9090  item_location added = i_add( *it, true, /*avoid=*/nullptr,
9091  it, /*allow_drop=*/false, /*allow_wield=*/!has_wield_conflicts( *it ) );
9092  if( added == item_location::nowhere ) {
9093  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::tumbling, { *it } );
9094  }
9095  }
9096  return VisitResponse::SKIP;
9097  } );
9098  inv->clear();
9099 }
9100 
9101 std::string Character::is_snuggling() const
9102 {
9103  map &here = get_map();
9104  map_stack items_here = here.i_at( pos() );
9105  item_stack::const_iterator begin = items_here.begin();
9106  item_stack::const_iterator end = items_here.end();
9107 
9108  if( in_vehicle ) {
9109  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = here.veh_at( pos() ).cargo() ) {
9110  const vehicle_stack vs = ovp->items();
9111  begin = vs.begin();
9112  end = vs.end();
9113  }
9114  }
9115  const item *floor_armor = nullptr;
9116  int ticker = 0;
9117 
9118  // If there are no items on the floor, return nothing
9119  if( begin == end ) {
9120  return "nothing";
9121  }
9122 
9123  for( auto candidate = begin; candidate != end; ++candidate ) {
9124  if( !candidate->is_armor() ) {
9125  continue;
9126  } else if( candidate->volume() > 250_ml && candidate->get_warmth() > 0 &&
9127  ( candidate->covers( body_part_torso ) || candidate->covers( body_part_leg_l ) ||
9128  candidate->covers( body_part_leg_r ) ) ) {
9129  floor_armor = &*candidate;
9130  ticker++;
9131  }
9132  }
9133 
9134  if( ticker == 0 ) {
9135  return "nothing";
9136  } else if( ticker == 1 ) {
9137  return floor_armor->type_name();
9138  } else if( ticker > 1 ) {
9139  return "many";
9140  }
9141 
9142  return "nothing";
9143 }
9144 
9145 // If the player is not wielding anything big, check if hands can be put in pockets
9146 bool Character::can_use_pockets() const
9147 {
9148  // TODO Check that the pocket actually has enough space for the wielded item?
9149  return weapon.volume() < 500_ml;
9150 }
9151 
9152 // If the player's head is not encumbered, check if hood can be put up
9153 bool Character::can_use_hood() const
9154 {
9155  return encumb( body_part_head ) < 10;
9156 }
9157 
9158 // If the player's mouth is not encumbered, check if collar can be put up
9159 bool Character::can_use_collar() const
9160 {
9161  return encumb( body_part_mouth ) < 10;
9162 }
9163 
9164 std::map<bodypart_id, int> Character::bonus_item_warmth() const
9165 {
9166  const int pocket_warmth = worn.pocket_warmth();
9167  const int hood_warmth = worn.hood_warmth();
9168  const int collar_warmth = worn.collar_warmth();
9169 
9170  std::map<bodypart_id, int> ret;
9171  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
9172  ret.emplace( bp, 0 );
9173 
9174  if( ( bp == body_part_hand_l || bp == body_part_hand_r ) && can_use_pockets() ) {
9175  ret[bp] += pocket_warmth;
9176  }
9177 
9178  if( bp == body_part_head && can_use_hood() ) {
9179  ret[bp] += hood_warmth;
9180  }
9181 
9182  if( bp == body_part_mouth && can_use_collar() ) {
9183  ret[bp] += collar_warmth;
9184  }
9185  }
9186 
9187  return ret;
9188 }
9189 
9190 bool Character::can_use_floor_warmth() const
9191 {
9192  return in_sleep_state() ||
9193  has_activity( ACT_WAIT ) ||
9194  has_activity( ACT_WAIT_NPC ) ||
9195  has_activity( ACT_WAIT_STAMINA ) ||
9196  has_activity( ACT_AUTODRIVE ) ||
9197  has_activity( ACT_READ ) ||
9198  has_activity( ACT_SOCIALIZE ) ||
9199  has_activity( ACT_MEDITATE ) ||
9200  has_activity( ACT_FISH ) ||
9201  has_activity( ACT_GAME ) ||
9202  has_activity( ACT_HAND_CRANK ) ||
9203  has_activity( ACT_HEATING ) ||
9204  has_activity( ACT_VIBE ) ||
9205  has_activity( ACT_TRY_SLEEP ) ||
9206  has_activity( ACT_OPERATION ) ||
9207  has_activity( ACT_TREE_COMMUNION ) ||
9208  has_activity( ACT_EAT_MENU ) ||
9209  has_activity( ACT_CONSUME_FOOD_MENU ) ||
9210  has_activity( ACT_CONSUME_DRINK_MENU ) ||
9211  has_activity( ACT_CONSUME_MEDS_MENU ) ||
9212  has_activity( ACT_VIEW_RECIPE ) ||
9213  has_activity( ACT_STUDY_SPELL );
9214 }
9215 
9216 units::temperature_delta Character::floor_bedding_warmth( const tripoint &pos )
9217 {
9218  map &here = get_map();
9219  const trap &trap_at_pos = here.tr_at( pos );
9220  const ter_id ter_at_pos = here.ter( pos );
9221  const furn_id furn_at_pos = here.furn( pos );
9222 
9223  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( pos );
9224  const std::optional<vpart_reference> boardable = vp.part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true );
9225  // Search the floor for bedding
9226  if( furn_at_pos != furn_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
9227  return furn_at_pos.obj().floor_bedding_warmth;
9228  } else if( !trap_at_pos.is_null() ) {
9229  return trap_at_pos.floor_bedding_warmth;
9230  } else if( boardable ) {
9231  return boardable->info().floor_bedding_warmth;
9232  } else {
9233  return ter_at_pos.obj().floor_bedding_warmth - 4_C_delta;
9234  }
9235 }
9236 
9237 units::temperature_delta Character::floor_item_warmth( const tripoint &pos )
9238 {
9239  units::temperature_delta item_warmth = 0_C_delta;
9240 
9241  const auto warm = [&item_warmth]( const auto & stack ) {
9242  for( const item &elem : stack ) {
9243  if( !elem.is_armor() ) {
9244  continue;
9245  }
9246  // Items that are big enough and covers the torso are used to keep warm.
9247  // Smaller items don't do as good a job
9248  if( elem.volume() > 250_ml &&
9249  ( elem.covers( body_part_torso ) || elem.covers( body_part_leg_l ) ||
9250  elem.covers( body_part_leg_r ) ) ) {
9251  item_warmth += 0.12_C_delta * elem.get_warmth() * ( elem.volume() / 2500_ml );
9252  }
9253  }
9254  };
9255 
9256  map &here = get_map();
9257 
9258  if( const optional_vpart_position veh_here = here.veh_at( pos ) ) {
9259  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = veh_here.cargo() ) {
9260  warm( ovp->items() );
9261  }
9262  } else {
9263  warm( here.i_at( pos ) );
9264  }
9265  return item_warmth;
9266 }
9267 
9268 units::temperature_delta Character::floor_warmth( const tripoint &pos ) const
9269 {
9270  const units::temperature_delta item_warmth = floor_item_warmth( pos );
9271  units::temperature_delta bedding_warmth = floor_bedding_warmth( pos );
9272 
9273  // If the PC has fur, etc, that will apply too
9274  const units::temperature_delta floor_mut_warmth = enchantment_cache->modify_value(
9275  enchant_vals::mod::BODYTEMP_SLEEP, units::from_kelvin_delta( 0.0f ) );
9276  // DOWN does not provide floor insulation, though.
9277  // Better-than-light fur or being in one's shell does.
9278  if( ( !has_trait( trait_DOWN ) ) && ( floor_mut_warmth >= 2_C_delta ) ) {
9279  bedding_warmth = std::max( 0_C_delta, bedding_warmth );
9280  }
9281  return item_warmth + bedding_warmth + floor_mut_warmth;
9282 }
9283 
9284 units::temperature_delta Character::bodytemp_modifier_traits( bool overheated ) const
9285 {
9286  units::temperature_delta mod = 0_C_delta;
9287  for( const trait_id &iter : get_mutations() ) {
9288  mod += overheated ? iter->bodytemp_min : iter->bodytemp_max;
9289  }
9290  return mod;
9291 }
9292 
9293 units::temperature Character::temp_corrected_by_climate_control( units::temperature temperature,
9294  int heat_strength, int chill_strength ) const
9295 {
9296  const units::temperature_delta base_variation = BODYTEMP_NORM - 27_C;
9297  const units::temperature_delta variation_heat = base_variation * ( heat_strength / 100.0f );
9298  const units::temperature_delta variation_chill = -base_variation * ( chill_strength / 100.0f );
9299 
9300  if( temperature > BODYTEMP_NORM ) {
9301  return std::max( BODYTEMP_NORM, temperature + variation_chill );
9302  } else {
9303  return std::min( BODYTEMP_NORM, temperature + variation_heat );
9304  }
9305 }
9306 
9307 bool Character::in_sleep_state() const
9308 {
9309  return Creature::in_sleep_state() || activity.id() == ACT_TRY_SLEEP;
9310 }
9311 
9312 void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const itype_id &type,
9313  const std::function<void( item & )> &do_func )
9314 {
9315  cache_visit_items_with( "HAS TYPE " + type.str(), type, {}, nullptr, do_func );
9316 }
9317 
9318 void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const flag_id &type_flag,
9319  const std::function<void( item & )> &do_func )
9320 {
9321  cache_visit_items_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr, do_func );
9322 }
9323 
9324 void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const std::string &key, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9325  const std::function<void( item & )> &do_func )
9326 {
9327  cache_visit_items_with( key, {}, {}, filter_func, do_func );
9328 }
9329 
9330 void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const std::string &key, const itype_id &type,
9331  const flag_id &type_flag, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9332  const std::function<void( item & )> &do_func )
9333 {
9334  // If the cache already exists, use it. Remove all invalid item references.
9335  auto found_cache = inv_search_caches.find( key );
9336  if( found_cache != inv_search_caches.end() ) {
9337  inv_search_caches[key].items.erase( std::remove_if( inv_search_caches[key].items.begin(),
9338  inv_search_caches[key].items.end(), [&do_func]( const safe_reference<item> &it ) {
9339  if( it ) {
9340  do_func( *it );
9341  return false;
9342  }
9343  return true;
9344  } ), inv_search_caches[key].items.end() );
9345  return;
9346  } else {
9347  // Otherwise, add a new cache and populate with all appropriate items in the inventory. Empty lists are still created.
9348  inv_search_caches[key].type = type;
9349  inv_search_caches[key].type_flag = type_flag;
9350  inv_search_caches[key].filter_func = filter_func;
9351  visit_items( [&]( item * it, item * ) {
9352  if( ( !type.is_valid() || it->typeId() == type ) &&
9353  ( !type_flag.is_valid() || it->type->has_flag( type_flag ) ) &&
9354  ( filter_func == nullptr || ( it->*filter_func )() ) ) {
9355 
9356  inv_search_caches[key].items.push_back( it->get_safe_reference() );
9357  do_func( *it );
9358  }
9359  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
9360  } );
9361  }
9362 }
9363 
9364 void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const itype_id &type,
9365  const std::function<void( const item & )> &do_func ) const
9366 {
9367  cache_visit_items_with( "HAS TYPE " + type.str(), type, {}, nullptr, do_func );
9368 }
9369 
9370 void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const flag_id &type_flag,
9371  const std::function<void( const item & )> &do_func ) const
9372 {
9373  cache_visit_items_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr, do_func );
9374 }
9375 
9376 void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const std::string &key, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9377  const std::function<void( const item & )> &do_func ) const
9378 {
9379  cache_visit_items_with( key, {}, {}, filter_func, do_func );
9380 }
9381 
9382 void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const std::string &key, const itype_id &type,
9383  const flag_id &type_flag, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9384  const std::function<void( const item & )> &do_func ) const
9385 {
9386  // If the cache already exists, use it. Remove all invalid item references.
9387  auto found_cache = inv_search_caches.find( key );
9388  if( found_cache != inv_search_caches.end() ) {
9389  inv_search_caches[key].items.erase( std::remove_if( inv_search_caches[key].items.begin(),
9390  inv_search_caches[key].items.end(), [&do_func]( const safe_reference<item> &it ) {
9391  if( it ) {
9392  do_func( *it );
9393  return false;
9394  }
9395  return true;
9396  } ), inv_search_caches[key].items.end() );
9397  return;
9398  } else {
9399  // Otherwise, add a new cache and populate with all appropriate items in the inventory. Empty lists are still created.
9400  inv_search_caches[key].type = type;
9401  inv_search_caches[key].type_flag = type_flag;
9402  inv_search_caches[key].filter_func = filter_func;
9403  visit_items( [&]( item * it, item * ) {
9404  if( ( !type.is_valid() || it->typeId() == type ) &&
