9405  ( !type_flag.is_valid() || it->type->has_flag( type_flag ) ) &&
9406  ( filter_func == nullptr || ( it->*filter_func )() ) ) {
9407 
9408  inv_search_caches[key].items.push_back( it->get_safe_reference() );
9409  do_func( *it );
9410  }
9411  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
9412  } );
9413  }
9414 }
9415 
9416 bool Character::cache_has_item_with( const itype_id &type,
9417  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9418 {
9419  return cache_has_item_with( "HAS TYPE " + type.str(), type, {}, nullptr, check_func );
9420 }
9421 
9422 bool Character::cache_has_item_with( const flag_id &type_flag,
9423  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9424 {
9425  return cache_has_item_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr, check_func );
9426 }
9427 
9428 bool Character::cache_has_item_with( const std::string &key, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9429  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9430 {
9431  return cache_has_item_with( key, {}, {}, filter_func, check_func );
9432 }
9433 
9434 bool Character::cache_has_item_with( const std::string &key, const itype_id &type,
9435  const flag_id &type_flag, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9436  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9437 {
9438  bool aborted = false;
9439 
9440  // If the cache already exists, use it. Stop iterating if the check_func ever returns true. Remove any invalid item references encountered.
9441  auto found_cache = inv_search_caches.find( key );
9442  if( found_cache != inv_search_caches.end() ) {
9443  for( auto iter = found_cache->second.items.begin();
9444  iter != found_cache->second.items.end(); ) {
9445  if( *iter ) {
9446  if( check_func( **iter ) ) {
9447  aborted = true;
9448  break;
9449  }
9450  ++iter;
9451  } else {
9452  iter = inv_search_caches[found_cache->first].items.erase( iter );
9453  }
9454  }
9455  } else {
9456  // Otherwise, add a new cache and populate with all appropriate items in the inventory. Empty lists are still created.
9457  inv_search_caches[key].type = type;
9458  inv_search_caches[key].type_flag = type_flag;
9459  inv_search_caches[key].filter_func = filter_func;
9460  visit_items( [&]( item * it, item * ) {
9461  if( ( !type.is_valid() || it->typeId() == type ) &&
9462  ( !type_flag.is_valid() || it->type->has_flag( type_flag ) ) &&
9463  ( filter_func == nullptr || ( it->*filter_func )() ) ) {
9464 
9465  inv_search_caches[key].items.push_back( it->get_safe_reference() );
9466  // If check_func returns true, stop running it but keep populating the cache.
9467  if( !aborted && check_func( *it ) ) {
9468  aborted = true;
9469  }
9470  }
9471  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
9472  } );
9473  }
9474  return aborted;
9475 }
9476 
9477 bool Character::has_item_with_flag( const flag_id &flag, bool need_charges ) const
9478 {
9479  return has_item_with( [&flag, &need_charges, this]( const item & it ) {
9480  return it.has_flag( flag ) && ( !need_charges || !it.is_tool() ||
9481  it.type->tool->max_charges == 0 || it.ammo_remaining( this ) > 0 );
9482  } );
9483 }
9484 
9485 bool Character::cache_has_item_with_flag( const flag_id &type_flag, bool need_charges ) const
9486 {
9487  return cache_has_item_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr,
9488  [this, &need_charges]( const item & it ) {
9489  return !need_charges || !it.is_tool() || it.type->tool->max_charges == 0 ||
9490  it.ammo_remaining( this ) > 0;
9491  } );
9492 }
9493 
9494 std::vector<item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const itype_id &type,
9495  const std::function<bool( item & )> &do_and_check_func )
9496 {
9497  return cache_get_items_with( "HAS TYPE " + type.str(), type, {}, nullptr, do_and_check_func );
9498 }
9499 
9500 std::vector<item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const flag_id &type_flag,
9501  const std::function<bool( item & )> &do_and_check_func )
9502 {
9503  return cache_get_items_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr,
9504  do_and_check_func );
9505 }
9506 
9507 std::vector<item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const std::string &key,
9508  bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9509  const std::function<bool( item & )> &do_and_check_func )
9510 {
9511  return cache_get_items_with( key, {}, {}, filter_func, do_and_check_func );
9512 }
9513 
9514 std::vector<item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const std::string &key, const itype_id &type,
9515  const flag_id &type_flag, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9516  const std::function<bool( item & )> &do_and_check_func )
9517 {
9518  std::vector<item *> ret;
9519  cache_visit_items_with( key, type, type_flag, filter_func, [&ret, &do_and_check_func]( item & it ) {
9520  if( do_and_check_func( it ) ) {
9521  ret.push_back( &it );
9522  }
9523  } );
9524  return ret;
9525 }
9526 
9527 std::vector<const item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const itype_id &type,
9528  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9529 {
9530  return cache_get_items_with( "HAS TYPE " + type.str(), type, {}, nullptr, check_func );
9531 }
9532 
9533 std::vector<const item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const flag_id &type_flag,
9534  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9535 {
9536  return cache_get_items_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr, check_func );
9537 }
9538 
9539 std::vector<const item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const std::string &key,
9540  bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9541  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9542 {
9543  return cache_get_items_with( key, {}, {}, filter_func, check_func );
9544 }
9545 
9546 std::vector<const item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const std::string &key,
9547  const itype_id &type, const flag_id &type_flag, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9548  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9549 {
9550  std::vector<const item *> ret;
9551  cache_visit_items_with( key, type, type_flag, filter_func, [&ret, &check_func]( const item & it ) {
9552  if( check_func( it ) ) {
9553  ret.push_back( &it );
9554  }
9555  } );
9556  return ret;
9557 }
9558 
9559 void Character::add_to_inv_search_caches( item &it ) const
9560 {
9561  for( auto &cache : inv_search_caches ) {
9562  if( ( cache.second.type.is_valid() && it.typeId() != cache.second.type ) ||
9563  ( cache.second.type_flag.is_valid() && !it.type->has_flag( cache.second.type_flag ) ) ||
9564  ( cache.second.filter_func && !( it.*cache.second.filter_func )() ) ) {
9565  continue;
9566  }
9567 
9568  // If item is already in the cache, remove it so it can be re-added in its current state.
9569  for( auto iter = cache.second.items.begin(); iter != cache.second.items.end(); ) {
9570  if( *iter && iter->get() == &it ) {
9571  iter = inv_search_caches[cache.first].items.erase( iter );
9572  } else {
9573  ++iter;
9574  }
9575  }
9576 
9577  cache.second.items.push_back( it.get_safe_reference() );
9578  }
9579 }
9580 
9581 void Character::clear_inventory_search_cache()
9582 {
9583  inv_search_caches.clear();
9584 }
9585 
9586 bool Character::has_charges( const itype_id &it, int quantity,
9587  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter ) const
9588 {
9589  if( it == itype_fire || it == itype_apparatus ) {
9590  return has_fire( quantity );
9591  }
9592  return charges_of( it, quantity, filter ) == quantity;
9593 }
9594 
9595 std::list<item> Character::use_amount( const itype_id &it, int quantity,
9596  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter, bool select_ind )
9597 {
9598  std::list<item> ret;
9599  if( select_ind && !it->count_by_charges() ) {
9600  std::vector<item *> tmp = items_with( [&it, &filter]( const item & itm ) -> bool {
9601  return filter( itm ) && itm.typeId() == it;
9602  } );
9603  while( quantity != static_cast<int>( tmp.size() ) && quantity > 0 && !tmp.empty() ) {
9604  uilist imenu;
9605  //~ Select components from inventory to consume. %d = number of components left to consume.
9606  imenu.title = string_format( _( "Select which component to use (%d left)" ), quantity );
9607  for( const item *itm : tmp ) {
9608  imenu.addentry( itm->display_name() );
9609  }
9610  imenu.query();
9611  if( imenu.ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( imenu.ret ) >= tmp.size() ) {
9612  break;
9613  }
9614  if( tmp[imenu.ret]->use_amount( it, quantity, ret, filter ) ) {
9615  remove_item( *tmp[imenu.ret] );
9616  }
9617  tmp.erase( tmp.begin() + imenu.ret );
9618  }
9619  }
9620  if( quantity > 0 && weapon.use_amount( it, quantity, ret ) ) {
9621  remove_weapon();
9622  }
9623  ret = worn.use_amount( it, quantity, ret, filter, *this );
9624 
9625  if( quantity <= 0 ) {
9626  return ret;
9627  }
9628  std::list<item> tmp = inv->use_amount( it, quantity, filter );
9629  ret.splice( ret.end(), tmp );
9630  return ret;
9631 }
9632 
9633 bool Character::use_charges_if_avail( const itype_id &it, int quantity )
9634 {
9635  if( has_charges( it, quantity ) ) {
9636  use_charges( it, quantity );
9637  return true;
9638  }
9639  return false;
9640 }
9641 
9642 units::energy Character::available_ups() const
9643 {
9644  units::energy available_charges = 0_kJ;
9645 
9646  if( is_mounted() && mounted_creature.get()->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
9647  auto *mons = mounted_creature.get();
9648  available_charges += units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>
9649  ( mons->battery_item->ammo_remaining() ) );
9650  }
9651 
9652  bool has_bio_powered_ups = false;
9653  cache_visit_items_with( flag_IS_UPS, [&has_bio_powered_ups]( const item & it ) {
9654  if( it.has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) && !has_bio_powered_ups ) {
9655  has_bio_powered_ups = true;
9656  }
9657  } );
9658  if( has_active_bionic( bio_ups ) || has_bio_powered_ups ) {
9659  available_charges += get_power_level();
9660  }
9661 
9662  cache_visit_items_with( flag_IS_UPS, [&available_charges]( const item & it ) {
9663  available_charges += units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( it.ammo_remaining() ) );
9664  } );
9665 
9666  return available_charges;
9667 }
9668 
9669 units::energy Character::consume_ups( units::energy qty, const int radius )
9670 {
9671  const units::energy wanted_qty = qty;
9672 
9673  // UPS from mounted mech
9674  if( qty != 0_kJ && is_mounted() && mounted_creature.get()->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
9675  mounted_creature.get()->battery_item ) {
9676  auto *mons = mounted_creature.get();
9677  qty -= mons->use_mech_power( qty );
9678  }
9679 
9680  // UPS from bionic
9681  bool has_bio_powered_ups = false;
9682  cache_visit_items_with( flag_IS_UPS, [&has_bio_powered_ups]( const item & it ) {
9683  if( it.has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) && !has_bio_powered_ups ) {
9684  has_bio_powered_ups = true;
9685  }
9686  } );
9687  if( qty != 0_kJ && has_power() && ( has_active_bionic( bio_ups ) || has_bio_powered_ups ) ) {
9688  units::energy bio = std::min( get_power_level(), qty );
9689  mod_power_level( -bio );
9690  qty -= std::min( qty, bio );
9691  }
9692 
9693  // UPS from inventory
9694  if( qty != 0_kJ ) {
9695  cache_visit_items_with( flag_IS_UPS, [&qty]( item & it ) {
9696  if( it.is_tool() && it.type->tool->fuel_efficiency >= 0 ) {
9697  qty -= it.energy_consume( qty, tripoint_zero, nullptr,
9698  it.type->tool->fuel_efficiency );
9699  } else {
9700  qty -= it.energy_consume( qty, tripoint_zero, nullptr );
9701  }
9702  } );
9703  }
9704 
9705  // UPS from nearby map
9706  if( qty != 0_kJ && radius > 0 ) {
9707  qty -= get_map().consume_ups( pos(), radius, qty );
9708  }
9709 
9710  return wanted_qty - qty;
9711 }
9712 
9713 std::list<item> Character::use_charges( const itype_id &what, int qty, const int radius,
9714  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter, bool in_tools )
9715 {
9716  std::list<item> res;
9717  inventory inv = crafting_inventory( pos(), radius, true );
9718 
9719  if( qty <= 0 ) {
9720  return res;
9721  }
9722 
9723  if( what == itype_fire ) {
9724  use_fire( qty );
9725  return res;
9726 
9727  } else if( what == itype_UPS ) {
9728  // Fairly sure that nothing comes here. But handle it anyways.
9729  debugmsg( _( "This UPS use needs updating. Create issue on github." ) );
9730  consume_ups( units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( qty ) ), radius );
9731  return res;
9732  }
9733 
9734  std::vector<item *> del;
9735 
9736  bool has_tool_with_UPS = false;
9737  // Detection of UPS tool
9738  inv.visit_items( [ &what, &qty, &has_tool_with_UPS, &filter]( item * e, item * ) {
9739  if( filter( *e ) && e->typeId() == what && e->has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
9740  has_tool_with_UPS = true;
9741  return VisitResponse::ABORT;
9742  }
9743  return qty > 0 ? VisitResponse::NEXT : VisitResponse::ABORT;
9744  } );
9745 
9746  if( radius >= 0 ) {
9747  get_map().use_charges( pos(), radius, what, qty, return_true<item>, nullptr, in_tools );
9748  }
9749  if( qty > 0 ) {
9750  visit_items( [this, &what, &qty, &res, &del, &filter, &in_tools]( item * e, item * ) {
9751  if( e->use_charges( what, qty, res, pos(), filter, this, in_tools ) ) {
9752  del.push_back( e );
9753  }
9754  return qty > 0 ? VisitResponse::NEXT : VisitResponse::ABORT;
9755  } );
9756  }
9757 
9758  for( item *e : del ) {
9759  remove_item( *e );
9760  }
9761 
9762  if( has_tool_with_UPS ) {
9763  consume_ups( units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( qty ) ), radius );
9764  }
9765 
9766  return res;
9767 }
9768 
9769 std::list<item> Character::use_charges( const itype_id &what, int qty,
9770  const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter )
9771 {
9772  return use_charges( what, qty, -1, filter );
9773 }
9774 
9775 item Character::find_firestarter_with_charges( const int quantity ) const
9776 {
9777  item ret;
9778  cache_has_item_with( flag_FIRESTARTER, [&]( const item & it ) {
9779  if( !it.typeId()->can_have_charges() ) {
9780  const use_function *usef = it.type->get_use( "firestarter" );
9781  if( usef != nullptr && usef->get_actor_ptr() != nullptr ) {
9782  const firestarter_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>( usef->get_actor_ptr() );
9783  if( actor->can_use( *this->as_character(), it, tripoint_zero ).success() ) {
9784  ret = it;
9785  return true;
9786  }
9787  }
9788  } else if( it.ammo_sufficient( this, quantity ) ) {
9789  ret = it;
9790  return true;
9791  }
9792  return false;
9793  } );
9794  return ret;
9795 }
9796 
9797 bool Character::has_fire( const int quantity ) const
9798 {
9799  // TODO: Replace this with a "tool produces fire" flag.
9800 
9801  if( get_map().has_nearby_fire( pos() ) ) {
9802  return true;
9803  }
9804  if( cache_has_item_with( flag_FIRE ) ) {
9805  return true;
9806  }
9807  if( !find_firestarter_with_charges( quantity ).is_null() ) {
9808  return true;
9809  }
9810  if( is_npc() ) {
9811  // HACK: A hack to make NPCs use their Molotovs
9812  return true;
9813  }
9814 
9815  return false;
9816 }
9817 
9818 void Character::mod_painkiller( int npkill )
9819 {
9820  set_painkiller( pkill + npkill );
9821 }
9822 
9823 void Character::set_painkiller( int npkill )
9824 {
9825  npkill = std::max( npkill, 0 );
9826  if( pkill != npkill ) {
9827  const int prev_pain = get_perceived_pain();
9828  pkill = npkill;
9829  on_stat_change( "pkill", pkill );
9830  const int cur_pain = get_perceived_pain();
9831 
9832  if( cur_pain != prev_pain ) {
9833  react_to_felt_pain( cur_pain - prev_pain );
9834  on_stat_change( "perceived_pain", cur_pain );
9835  }
9836  }
9837 }
9838 
9839 int Character::get_painkiller() const
9840 {
9841  return pkill;
9842 }
9843 
9844 void Character::clear_moncams()
9845 {
9846  moncams.clear();
9847 }
9848 
9849 void Character::remove_moncam( const mtype_id &moncam_id )
9850 {
9851  moncams.erase( moncam_id );
9852 }
9853 
9854 void Character::add_moncam( const std::pair<mtype_id, int> &moncam )
9855 {
9856  moncams.insert( moncam );
9857 }
9858 
9859 void Character::set_moncams( std::map<mtype_id, int> nmoncams )
9860 {
9861  moncams = std::move( nmoncams );
9862 }
9863 
9864 std::map<mtype_id, int> const &Character::get_moncams() const
9865 {
9866  return moncams;
9867 }
9868 
9869 Character::moncam_cache_t Character::get_active_moncams() const
9870 {
9871  moncam_cache_t ret;
9872  for( monster const &mon : g->all_monsters() ) {
9873  for( std::pair<mtype_id, int> const moncam : get_moncams() ) {
9874  if( mon.type->id == moncam.first && mon.friendly != 0 &&
9875  rl_dist( get_avatar().get_location(), mon.get_location() ) < moncam.second ) {
9876  ret.insert( { &mon, mon.get_location() } );
9877  }
9878  }
9879  }
9880  return ret;
9881 }
9882 
9883 void Character::use_fire( const int quantity )
9884 {
9885  //Okay, so checks for nearby fires first,
9886  //then held lit torch or candle, bionic tool/lighter/laser
9887  //tries to use 1 charge of lighters, matches, flame throwers
9888  //If there is enough power, will use power of one activation of the bio_lighter, bio_tools and bio_laser
9889  // (home made, military), hotplate, welder in that order.
9890  // bio_lighter, bio_laser, bio_tools, has_active_bionic("bio_tools"
9891 
9892  if( get_map().has_nearby_fire( pos() ) ) {
9893  return;
9894  }
9895  if( cache_has_item_with( flag_FIRE ) ) {
9896  return;
9897  }
9898 
9899  const item firestarter = find_firestarter_with_charges( quantity );
9900  if( firestarter.is_null() ) {
9901  return;
9902  }
9903  if( firestarter.type->has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
9904  mod_power_level( -quantity * 5_kJ );
9905  return;
9906  }
9907  if( firestarter.ammo_sufficient( this, quantity ) ) {
9908  use_charges( firestarter.typeId(), quantity );
9909  return;
9910  }
9911 }
9912 
9913 int Character::heartrate_bpm() const
9914 {
9915  //Dead have no heartbeat usually and no heartbeat in omnicell
9916  if( is_dead_state() || has_trait( trait_SLIMESPAWNER ) ) {
9917  return 0;
9918  }
9919 
9920  int average_heartbeat = avg_nat_bpm * get_heartrate_index();
9921 
9922  // minor moment-to-moment variation
9923  average_heartbeat += rng( -5, 5 );
9924 
9925  //Chemical imbalance makes this less predictable. It's possible this range needs tweaking
9926  if( has_trait( trait_CHEMIMBALANCE ) ) {
9927  average_heartbeat += rng( -15, 15 );
9928  }
9929 
9930  return average_heartbeat;
9931 }
9932 
9933 void Character::on_worn_item_washed( const item &it )
9934 {
9935  if( is_worn( it ) ) {
9936  morale->on_worn_item_washed( it );
9937  }
9938 }
9939 
9940 void Character::on_item_wear( const item &it )
9941 {
9942  invalidate_inventory_validity_cache();
9943  invalidate_leak_level_cache();
9944  for( const trait_id &mut : it.mutations_from_wearing( *this ) ) {
9945  // flag these mutations to be added at the start of the next turn
9946  // without doing this you still count as wearing the item providing
9947  // the traits so most the calcs don't work in mutation_loss_effect
9948  mutations_to_add.push_back( mut );
9949  }
9950  morale->on_item_wear( it );
9951 }
9952 
9953 void Character::on_item_takeoff( const item &it )
9954 {
9955  invalidate_inventory_validity_cache();
9956  invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
9957  invalidate_leak_level_cache();
9958  for( const trait_id &mut : it.mutations_from_wearing( *this, true ) ) {
9959  // flag these mutations to be removed at the start of the next turn
9960  // without doing this you still count as wearing the item providing
9961  // the traitssdd so most the calcs don't work in mutation_loss_effect
9962  mutations_to_remove.push_back( mut );
9963 
9964  }
9965  morale->on_item_takeoff( it );
9966 }
9967 
9968 void Character::enchantment_wear_change()
9969 {
9970  recalc_sight_limits();
9971  calc_encumbrance();
9972  if( get_stamina() > get_stamina_max() ) {
9973  set_stamina( get_stamina_max() );
9974  }
9975 }
9976 
9977 void Character::on_item_acquire( const item &it )
9978 {
9979  bool check_for_zoom = is_avatar();
9980  bool update_overmap_seen = false;
9981 
9982  it.visit_items( [this, &check_for_zoom, &update_overmap_seen]( item * cont_it, item * ) {
9983  add_to_inv_search_caches( *cont_it );
9984  if( check_for_zoom && !update_overmap_seen && cont_it->has_flag( flag_ZOOM ) ) {
9985  update_overmap_seen = true;
9986  }
9987  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
9988  } );
9989 
9990  invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
9991 
9992  if( update_overmap_seen ) {
9993  g->update_overmap_seen();
9994  }
9995 }
9996 
9997 void Character::on_effect_int_change( const efftype_id &eid, int intensity,
9998  const bodypart_id &bp )
9999 {
10000  // Adrenaline can reduce perceived pain (or increase it when you enter comedown).
10001  // See @ref get_perceived_pain()
10002  if( eid == effect_adrenaline ) {
10003  // Note that calling this does no harm if it wasn't changed.
10004  on_stat_change( "perceived_pain", get_perceived_pain() );
10005  }
10006 
10007  morale->on_effect_int_change( eid, intensity, bp );
10008 }
10009 
10010 void Character::on_mutation_gain( const trait_id &mid )
10011 {
10012  morale->on_mutation_gain( mid );
10013  magic->on_mutation_gain( mid, *this );
10014  update_type_of_scent( mid );
10015  recalculate_enchantment_cache(); // mutations can have enchantments
10016  effect_on_conditions::process_reactivate( *this );
10017  if( is_avatar() ) {
10018  as_avatar()->character_mood_face( true );
10019  }
10020 }
10021 
10022 void Character::on_mutation_loss( const trait_id &mid )
10023 {
10024  morale->on_mutation_loss( mid );
10025  magic->on_mutation_loss( mid );
10026  update_type_of_scent( mid, false );
10027  recalculate_enchantment_cache(); // mutations can have enchantments
10028  effect_on_conditions::process_reactivate( *this );
10029  if( is_avatar() ) {
10030  as_avatar()->character_mood_face( true );
10031  }
10032 }
10033 
10034 void Character::on_stat_change( const std::string &stat, int value )
10035 {
10036  morale->on_stat_change( stat, value );
10037 }
10038 
10039 bool Character::has_opposite_trait( const trait_id &flag ) const
10040 {
10041  return !get_opposite_traits( flag ).empty();
10042 }
10043 
10044 std::unordered_set<trait_id> Character::get_opposite_traits( const trait_id &flag ) const
10045 {
10046  std::unordered_set<trait_id> traits;
10047  for( const trait_id &i : flag->cancels ) {
10048  if( has_trait( i ) ) {
10049  traits.insert( i );
10050  }
10051  }
10052  for( const std::pair<const trait_id, trait_data> &mut : my_mutations ) {
10053  for( const trait_id &canceled_trait : mut.first->cancels ) {
10054  if( canceled_trait == flag ) {
10055  traits.insert( mut.first );
10056  }
10057  }
10058  }
10059  return traits;
10060 }
10061 
10062 float Character::adjust_for_focus( float amount ) const
10063 {
10064  int effective_focus = get_focus();
10065  effective_focus = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::LEARNING_FOCUS,
10066  effective_focus );
10067  effective_focus *= 1.0 + ( 0.01f * ( get_int() -
10068  get_option<int>( "INT_BASED_LEARNING_BASE_VALUE" ) ) *
10069  get_option<int>( "INT_BASED_LEARNING_FOCUS_ADJUSTMENT" ) );
10070  effective_focus = std::max( effective_focus, 1 );
10071  return amount * ( effective_focus / 100.0f );
10072 }
10073 
10074 std::unordered_set<tripoint> Character::get_path_avoid() const
10075 {
10076  std::unordered_set<tripoint> ret;
10077  for( npc &guy : g->all_npcs() ) {
10078  if( sees( guy ) ) {
10079  ret.insert( guy.pos() );
10080  }
10081  }
10082 
10083  // TODO: Add known traps in a way that doesn't destroy performance
10084 
10085  return ret;
10086 }
10087 
10088 const pathfinding_settings &Character::get_pathfinding_settings() const
10089 {
10090  return *path_settings;
10091 }
10092 
10093 ret_val<crush_tool_type> Character::can_crush_frozen_liquid( item_location const &loc ) const
10094 {
10095  crush_tool_type tool_type = CRUSH_NO_TOOL;
10096  bool success = false;
10097  if( !loc.has_parent() || !loc.parent_pocket()->get_pocket_data()->rigid ) {
10098  tool_type = CRUSH_HAMMER;
10099  success = has_quality( qual_HAMMER );
10100  } else {
10101  bool enough_quality = false;
10102  tool_type = CRUSH_DRILL_OR_HAMMER_AND_SCREW;
10103  if( has_quality( qual_DRILL ) ) {
10104  enough_quality = true;
10105  } else if( has_quality( qual_HAMMER ) && has_quality( qual_SCREW ) ) {
10106  int num_hammer_tools = 0;
10107  int num_screw_tools = 0;
10108  int num_both_tools = 0;
10109  for( item_location &tool : const_cast<Character *>( this )->all_items_loc() ) {
10110  bool can_hammer = false;
10111  bool can_screw = false;
10112  if( tool->has_quality_nonrecursive( qual_HAMMER ) ) {
10113  can_hammer = true;
10114  num_hammer_tools++;
10115  }
10116  if( tool->has_quality_nonrecursive( qual_SCREW ) ) {
10117  can_screw = true;
10118  num_screw_tools++;
10119  }
10120  if( can_hammer && can_screw ) {
10121  num_both_tools++;
10122  }
10123  }
10124  if( num_hammer_tools > 0 && num_screw_tools > 0 &&
10125  // Only one tool that fulfils both requirements: can't hammer itself
10126  !( num_hammer_tools == 1 && num_screw_tools == 1 && num_both_tools == 1 ) ) {
10127  enough_quality = true;
10128  }
10129  }
10130  success = enough_quality;
10131  }
10132  if( success ) {
10133  return ret_val<crush_tool_type>::make_success( tool_type );
10134  } else {
10135  return ret_val<crush_tool_type>::make_failure( tool_type,
10136  _( "You don't have the tools to crush frozen liquids." ) );;
10137  }
10138 }
10139 
10140 bool Character::crush_frozen_liquid( item_location loc )
10141 {
10142  ret_val<crush_tool_type> can_crush = can_crush_frozen_liquid( loc );
10143  bool done_crush = false;
10144  if( can_crush.success() ) {
10145  done_crush = true;
10146  if( can_crush.value() == CRUSH_HAMMER ) {
10147  item &hammering_item = best_item_with_quality( qual_HAMMER );
10148  //~ %1$s: item to be crushed, %2$s: hammer name
10149  if( query_yn( _( "Do you want to crush up %1$s with your %2$s?\n"
10150  "<color_red>Be wary of fragile items nearby!</color>" ),
10151  loc.get_item()->display_name(), hammering_item.tname() ) ) {
10152 
10153  //Risk smashing tile with hammering tool, risk is lower with higher dex, damage lower with lower strength
10154  if( one_in( 1 + dex_cur / 4 ) ) {
10155  add_msg_if_player( colorize( _( "You swing your %s wildly!" ), c_red ),
10156  hammering_item.tname() );
10157  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
10158  const int smashskill = get_arm_str() + hammering_item.damage_melee( damage_bash );
10159  get_map().bash( loc.position(), smashskill );
10160  }
10161  } else {
10162  done_crush = false;
10163  }
10164  }
10165  } else {
10166  std::string need_str = _( "somethings" );
10167 
10168  switch( can_crush.value() ) {
10169  case CRUSH_HAMMER:
10170  need_str = _( "a hammering tool" );
10171  break;
10172  case CRUSH_DRILL_OR_HAMMER_AND_SCREW:
10173  need_str = _( "a drill or both hammering tool and screwdriver" );
10174  break;
10175  default:
10176  break;
10177  }
10178  add_msg_if_player( string_format( _( "You need %s to crush up frozen liquids in rigid container!" ),
10179  need_str ) );
10180  }
10181  if( done_crush ) {
10182  add_msg_if_player( _( "You crush up %s." ), loc.get_item()->display_name() );
10183  }
10184  return done_crush;
10185 }
10186 
10187 float Character::power_rating() const
10188 {
10189  int dmg = 0;
10190  for( const damage_type &dt : damage_type::get_all() ) {
10191  if( dt.melee_only ) {
10192  int tdmg = weapon.damage_melee( dt.id );
10193  dmg = dmg < tdmg ? tdmg : dmg;
10194  }
10195  }
10196 
10197  int ret = 2;
10198  // Small guns can be easily hidden from view
10199  if( weapon.volume() <= 250_ml ) {
10200  ret = 2;
10201  } else if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
10202  ret = 4;
10203  } else if( dmg > 12 ) {
10204  ret = 3; // Melee weapon or weapon-y tool
10205  }
10206  if( get_size() == creature_size::huge ) {
10207  ret += 1;
10208  }
10209  if( is_wearing_power_armor( nullptr ) ) {
10210  ret = 5; // No mercy!
10211  }
10212  return ret;
10213 }
10214 
10215 float Character::speed_rating() const
10216 {
10217  float ret = get_speed() / 100.0f;
10218  ret *= 100.0f / run_cost( 100, false );
10219  // Adjustment for player being able to run, but not doing so at the moment
10220  if( !is_running() ) {
10221  ret *= 1.0f + ( static_cast<float>( get_stamina() ) / static_cast<float>( get_stamina_max() ) );
10222  }
10223  return ret;
10224 }
10225 
10226 item &Character::best_item_with_quality( const quality_id &qid )
10227 {
10228  int max_lvl_found = INT_MIN;
10229  std::vector<item *> items = items_with( [qid, &max_lvl_found]( const item & it ) {
10230  int qlvl = it.get_quality_nonrecursive( qid );
10231  if( qlvl > max_lvl_found ) {
10232  max_lvl_found = qlvl;
10233  return true;
10234  }
10235  return false;
10236  } );
10237  if( max_lvl_found > INT_MIN ) {
10238  return *items.back();
10239  }
10240  return null_item_reference();
10241 }
10242 
10243 int Character::run_cost( int base_cost, bool diag ) const
10244 {
10245  float movecost = static_cast<float>( base_cost );
10246  if( diag ) {
10247  movecost /= M_SQRT2; // because effect logic assumes 100 base cost
10248  }
10249  run_cost_effects( movecost );
10250  if( diag ) {
10251  movecost *= M_SQRT2;
10252  }
10253  return static_cast<int>( movecost );
10254 }
10255 
10256 std::vector<run_cost_effect> Character::run_cost_effects( float &movecost ) const
10257 {
10258  std::vector<run_cost_effect> effects;
10259 
10260  auto run_cost_effect_add = [&movecost, &effects]( float mod, const std::string & desc ) {
10261  if( mod != 0 ) {
10262  run_cost_effect effect { desc, 1.0, mod };
10263  effects.push_back( effect );
10264  movecost += mod;
10265  }
10266  };
10267 
10268  auto run_cost_effect_mul = [&movecost, &effects]( float mod, const std::string & desc ) {
10269  if( mod != 1.0 ) {
10270  run_cost_effect effect { desc, mod, 0.0 };
10271  effects.push_back( effect );
10272  movecost *= mod;
10273  }
10274  };
10275 
10276  const bool flatground = movecost < 105;
10277  map &here = get_map();
10278  // The "FLAT" tag includes soft surfaces, so not a good fit.
10279  const bool on_road = flatground && here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ROAD, pos() );
10280  const bool on_fungus = here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FUNGUS, pos() );
10281 
10282  if( is_mounted() ) {
10283  return effects;
10284  }
10285 
10286  if( movecost > 105 ) {
10287  float obstacle_mult = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::MOVECOST_OBSTACLE_MOD,
10288  1 );
10289  run_cost_effect_mul( obstacle_mult, _( "Obstacle Muts." ) );
10290 
10291  if( has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour ) ) {
10292  run_cost_effect_mul( 0.5, _( "Parkour" ) );
10293  }
10294 
10295  if( movecost < 100 ) {
10296  run_cost_effect effect { _( "Bonuses Capped" ) };
10297  effects.push_back( effect );
10298  movecost = 100;
10299  }
10300  }
10301  if( has_trait( trait_M_IMMUNE ) && on_fungus ) {
10302  if( movecost > 75 ) {
10303  // Mycal characters are faster on their home territory, even through things like shrubs
10304  run_cost_effect_add( 75 - movecost, _( "Mycus on Fungus" ) );
10305  }
10306  }
10307 
10308  if( is_prone() ) {
10309  run_cost_effect_mul( get_modifier( character_modifier_crawl_speed_movecost_mod ),
10310  _( "Crawling" ) );
10311  } else {
10312  run_cost_effect_mul( get_modifier( character_modifier_limb_run_cost_mod ),
10313  _( "Encum./Wounds" ) );
10314  }
10315 
10316  if( flatground ) {
10317  float flatground_mult = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::MOVECOST_FLATGROUND_MOD,
10318  1 );
10319  run_cost_effect_mul( flatground_mult, _( "Flat Ground Mut." ) );
10320  }
10321 
10322  if( worn_with_flag( flag_FIN ) ) {
10323  run_cost_effect_mul( 1.5f, _( "Swim Fins" ) );
10324  }
10325 
10326  if( worn_with_flag( flag_ROLLER_INLINE ) ) {
10327  if( on_road ) {
10328  if( is_running() ) {
10329  run_cost_effect_mul( 0.5f, _( "Inline Skates" ) );
10330  } else if( is_walking() ) {
10331  run_cost_effect_mul( 0.85f, _( "Inline Skates" ) );
10332  }
10333  } else {
10334  run_cost_effect_mul( 1.5f, _( "Inline Skates" ) );
10335  }
10336  }
10337 
10338  // Quad skates might be more stable than inlines,
10339  // but that also translates into a slower speed when on good surfaces.
10340  if( worn_with_flag( flag_ROLLER_QUAD ) ) {
10341  if( on_road ) {
10342  if( is_running() ) {
10343  run_cost_effect_mul( 0.7f, _( "Roller Skates" ) );
10344  } else if( is_walking() ) {
10345  run_cost_effect_mul( 0.85f, _( "Roller Skates" ) );
10346  }
10347  } else {
10348  run_cost_effect_mul( 1.3f, _( "Roller Skates" ) );
10349  }
10350  }
10351 
10352  // Skates with only one wheel (roller shoes) are fairly less stable
10353  // and fairly slower as well
10354  if( worn_with_flag( flag_ROLLER_ONE ) ) {
10355  if( on_road ) {
10356  if( is_running() ) {
10357  run_cost_effect_mul( 0.85f, _( "Heelys" ) );
10358  } else if( is_walking() ) {
10359  run_cost_effect_mul( 0.9f, _( "Heelys" ) );
10360  }
10361  } else {
10362  run_cost_effect_mul( 1.1f, _( "Heelys" ) );
10363  }
10364  }
10365 
10366  // ROOTS3 does slow you down as your roots are probing around for nutrients,
10367  // whether you want them to or not. ROOTS1 is just too squiggly without shoes
10368  // to give you some stability. Plants are a bit of a slow-mover. Deal.
10369  const bool mutfeet = has_flag( json_flag_TOUGH_FEET ) || worn_with_flag( flag_TOUGH_FEET );
10370  bool no_left_shoe = false;
10371  bool no_right_shoe = false;
10372  if( !is_wearing_shoes( side::LEFT ) && !mutfeet ) {
10373  no_left_shoe = true;
10374  }
10375  if( !is_wearing_shoes( side::RIGHT ) && !mutfeet ) {
10376  no_right_shoe = true;
10377  }
10378  if( no_left_shoe && no_right_shoe ) {
10379  run_cost_effect_add( 16, _( "No Shoes" ) );
10380  } else if( no_left_shoe ) {
10381  run_cost_effect_add( 8, _( "No Left Shoe" ) );
10382  } else if( no_right_shoe ) {
10383  run_cost_effect_add( 8, _( "No Right Shoe" ) );
10384  }
10385 
10386  if( ( has_trait( trait_ROOTS3 ) || has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) &&
10387  here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DIGGABLE, pos() ) && is_barefoot() ) {
10388  run_cost_effect_add( 10, _( "Roots" ) );
10389  }
10390 
10391  run_cost_effect_add( enchantment_cache->get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::MOVE_COST ),
10392  _( "Enchantments" ) );
10393  run_cost_effect_mul( 1.0 + enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( enchant_vals::mod::MOVE_COST ),
10394  _( "Enchantments" ) );
10395 
10396  run_cost_effect_mul( 1.0 / get_modifier( character_modifier_stamina_move_cost_mod ),
10397  _( "Stamina" ) );
10398 
10399  run_cost_effect_mul( 1.0 / get_modifier( character_modifier_move_mode_move_cost_mod ),
10400  //TODO get these strings from elsewhere
10401  is_running() ? _( "Running" ) :
10402  is_crouching() ? _( "Crouching" ) :
10403  is_prone() ? _( "Prone" ) : _( "Walking" )
10404  );
10405 
10406  if( !is_mounted() && !is_prone() && has_effect( effect_downed ) ) {
10407  run_cost_effect_mul( get_modifier( character_modifier_crawl_speed_movecost_mod ) * 2.5,
10408  _( "Downed" ) );
10409  }
10410 
10411  return effects;
10412 }
10413 
10414 void Character::place_corpse()
10415 {
10416  //If the character/NPC is on a distant mission, don't drop their their gear when they die since they still have a local pos
10417  if( !death_drops ) {
10418  return;
10419  }
10420  std::vector<item *> tmp = inv_dump();
10421  item body = item::make_corpse( mtype_id::NULL_ID(), calendar::turn, get_name() );
10422  body.set_item_temperature( units::from_celsius( 37 ) );
10423  map &here = get_map();
10424  for( item *itm : tmp ) {
10425  body.force_insert_item( *itm, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
10426  }
10427  // One sample, as you would get from dissecting any other human.
10428  body.put_in( item( "human_sample" ), pocket_type::CORPSE );
10429 
10430  for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
10431  if( item::type_is_defined( bio.info().itype() ) ) {
10432  item cbm( bio.id.str(), calendar::turn );
10433  cbm.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
10434  cbm.set_flag( flag_NO_STERILE );
10435  cbm.set_flag( flag_NO_PACKED );
10436  cbm.faults.emplace( fault_bionic_salvaged );
10437  body.put_in( cbm, pocket_type::CORPSE );
10438  }
10439  }
10440 
10441  here.add_item_or_charges( pos(), body );
10442 }
10443 
10444 void Character::place_corpse( const tripoint_abs_omt &om_target )
10445 {
10446  tinymap bay;
10447  bay.load( om_target, false );
10448  point fin( rng( 1, SEEX * 2 - 2 ), rng( 1, SEEX * 2 - 2 ) );
10449  // This makes no sense at all. It may find a random tile without furniture, but
10450  // if the first try to find one fails, it will go through all tiles of the map
10451  // and essentially select the last one that has no furniture.
10452  // Q: Why check for furniture? (Check for passable or can-place-items seems more useful.) A: Furniture blocks revival?
10453  // Q: Why not grep a random point out of all the possible points (e.g. via random_entry)?
10454  // TODO: fix it, see above.
10455  if( bay.furn( fin ) != furn_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
10456  for( const tripoint &p : bay.points_on_zlevel() ) {
10457  if( bay.furn( p ) == furn_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
10458  fin.x = p.x;
10459  fin.y = p.y;
10460  }
10461  }
10462  }
10463 
10464  std::vector<item *> tmp = inv_dump();
10465  item body = item::make_corpse( mtype_id::NULL_ID(), calendar::turn, get_name() );
10466  for( item *itm : tmp ) {
10467  body.force_insert_item( *itm, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
10468  }
10469  // One sample, as you would get from dissecting any other human.
10470  body.put_in( item( "human_sample" ), pocket_type::CORPSE );
10471 
10472  for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
10473  if( item::type_is_defined( bio.info().itype() ) ) {
10474  body.put_in( item( bio.id.str(), calendar::turn ), pocket_type::CORPSE );
10475  }
10476  }
10477 
10478  bay.add_item_or_charges( fin, body );
10479 }
10480 
10481 bool Character::sees_with_infrared( const Creature &critter ) const
10482 {
10483  if( !vision_mode_cache[IR_VISION] || !critter.is_warm() ) {
10484  return false;
10485  }
10486 
10487  map &here = get_map();
10488 
10489  return here.sees( pos(), critter.pos(), unimpaired_range(), false );
10490 }
10491 
10492 bool Character::is_visible_in_range( const Creature &critter, const int range ) const
10493 {
10494  return sees( critter ) && rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= range;
10495 }
10496 
10497 std::vector<Creature *> Character::get_visible_creatures( const int range ) const
10498 {
10499  return g->get_creatures_if( [this, range]( const Creature & critter ) -> bool {
10500  return this != &critter && pos() != critter.pos() && // TODO: get rid of fake npcs (pos() check)
10501  rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= range && sees( critter );
10502  } );
10503 }
10504 
10505 std::vector<Creature *> Character::get_targetable_creatures( const int range, bool melee ) const
10506 {
10507  map &here = get_map();
10508  return g->get_creatures_if( [this, range, melee, &here]( const Creature & critter ) -> bool {
10509  //the call to map.sees is to make sure that even if we can see it through walls
10510  //via a mutation or cbm we only attack targets with a line of sight
10511  bool can_see = ( ( sees( critter ) || sees_with_infrared( critter ) ) && here.sees( pos(), critter.pos(), 100 ) );
10512  if( can_see && melee ) //handles the case where we can see something with glass in the way for melee attacks
10513  {
10514  std::vector<tripoint> path = here.find_clear_path( pos(), critter.pos() );
10515  for( const tripoint &point : path ) {
10516  if( here.impassable( point ) &&
10517  !( weapon.has_flag( flag_SPEAR ) && // Fences etc. Spears can stab through those
10518  here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_THIN_OBSTACLE,
10519  point ) ) ) { //this mirrors melee.cpp function reach_attack
10520  can_see = false;
10521  break;
10522  }
10523  }
10524  }
10525  bool in_range = std::round( rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) ) <= range;
10526  // TODO: get rid of fake npcs (pos() check)
10527  bool valid_target = this != &critter && pos() != critter.pos() && attitude_to( critter ) != Creature::Attitude::FRIENDLY;
10528  return valid_target && in_range && can_see;
10529  } );
10530 }
10531 
10532 int Character::get_mutation_visibility_cap( const Character *observed ) const
10533 {
10534  // as of now, visibility of mutations is between 0 and 10
10535  // 10 perception and 10 distance would see all mutations - cap 0
10536  // 10 perception and 30 distance - cap 5, some mutations visible
10537  // 3 perception and 3 distance would see all mutations - cap 0
10538  // 3 perception and 15 distance - cap 5, some mutations visible
10539  // 3 perception and 20 distance would be barely able to discern huge antlers on a person - cap 10
10540  const int dist = rl_dist( pos(), observed->pos() );
10541  int visibility_cap;
10542  if( per_cur <= 1 ) {
10543  visibility_cap = INT_MAX;
10544  } else {
10545  visibility_cap = std::round( dist * dist / 20.0 / ( per_cur - 1 ) );
10546  }
10547  return visibility_cap;
10548 }
10549 
10550 std::vector<Creature *> Character::get_hostile_creatures( int range ) const
10551 {
10552  return g->get_creatures_if( [this, range]( const Creature & critter ) -> bool {
10553  // Fixes circular distance range for ranged attacks
10554  float dist_to_creature = std::round( rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) );
10555  return this != &critter && pos() != critter.pos() && // TODO: get rid of fake npcs (pos() check)
10556  dist_to_creature <= range && critter.attitude_to( *this ) == Creature::Attitude::HOSTILE
10557  && sees( critter );
10558  } );
10559 }
10560 
10561 void Character::echo_pulse()
10562 {
10563  map &here = get_map();
10564  int echo_volume = 0;
10565  int pulse_range = 10;
10566  // Sound travels farther underwater
10567  if( has_effect( effect_subaquatic_sonar ) && is_underwater() ) {
10568  pulse_range = 16;
10569  sounds::sound( this->pos(), 5, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "boop." ), true,
10570  "none", "none" );
10571  } else if( !has_effect( effect_subaquatic_sonar ) && is_underwater() ) {
10572  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You can't echolocate underwater!" ) );
10573  return;
10574  } else {
10575  sounds::sound( this->pos(), 5, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "chirp." ), true,
10576  "none", "none" );
10577  }
10578  for( tripoint origin : points_in_radius( pos(), pulse_range ) ) {
10579  if( here.move_cost( origin ) == 0 && here.sees( pos(), origin, pulse_range, false ) ) {
10580  sounds::sound( origin, 5, sounds::sound_t::sensory, _( "clack." ), true,
10581  "none", "none" );
10582  // This only counts obstacles which can be moved through, so the echo is pretty quiet.
10583  } else if( is_obstacle( origin ) && here.sees( pos(), origin, pulse_range, false ) ) {
10584  sounds::sound( origin, 1, sounds::sound_t::sensory, _( "click." ), true,
10585  "none", "none" );
10586  }
10587  const trap &tr = here.tr_at( origin );
10588  if( !knows_trap( origin ) && tr.detected_by_echolocation() ) {
10589  const std::string direction = direction_name( direction_from( pos(), origin ) );
10590  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You detect a %1$s to the %2$s!" ),
10591  tr.name(), direction );
10592  add_known_trap( origin, tr );
10593  }
10594  Creature *critter = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( origin, true );
10595  if( critter && here.sees( pos(), origin, pulse_range, false ) ) {
10596  switch( critter->get_size() ) {
10597  case creature_size::tiny:
10598  echo_volume = 1;
10599  break;
10600  case creature_size::small:
10601  echo_volume = 2;
10602  break;
10603  case creature_size::medium:
10604  echo_volume = 3;
10605  break;
10606  case creature_size::large:
10607  echo_volume = 4;
10608  break;
10609  case creature_size::huge:
10610  echo_volume = 5;
10611  break;
10612  case creature_size::num_sizes:
10613  debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid Creature size class." );
10614  break;
10615  }
10616  // Some monsters are harder to get a read on
10617  if( critter->has_flag( mon_flag_PLASTIC ) ) {
10618  echo_volume -= std::max( 1, 1 );
10619  }
10620  if( critter->has_flag( mon_flag_HARDTOSHOOT ) ) {
10621  echo_volume -= std::max( 1, 1 );
10622  }
10623  const char *echo_string = nullptr;
10624  // bio_targeting has a visual HUD and automatically interprets the raw audio data,
10625  // but only for electronic SONAR. Its designers didn't anticipate bat mutations
10626  if( has_bionic( bio_targeting ) && has_effect( effect_subaquatic_sonar ) ) {
10627  switch( echo_volume ) {
10628  case 1:
10629  echo_string = _( "Target [Tiny]." );
10630  break;
10631  case 2:
10632  echo_string = _( "Target [Small]." );
10633  break;
10634  case 3:
10635  echo_string = _( "Target [Medium]." );
10636  break;
10637  case 4:
10638  echo_string = _( "Warning! Target [Large]." );
10639  break;
10640  case 5:
10641  echo_string = _( "Warning! Target [Huge]." );
10642  break;
10643  default:
10644  debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid echo string." );
10645  break;
10646  }
10647  } else if( !has_bionic( bio_targeting ) && has_effect( effect_subaquatic_sonar ) ) {
10648  switch( echo_volume ) {
10649  case 1:
10650  echo_string = _( "tick." );
10651  break;
10652  case 2:
10653  echo_string = _( "pii." );
10654  break;
10655  case 3:
10656  echo_string = _( "ping." );
10657  break;
10658  case 4:
10659  echo_string = _( "pong." );
10660  break;
10661  case 5:
10662  echo_string = _( "bloop." );
10663  break;
10664  default:
10665  debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid echo string." );
10666  break;
10667  }
10668  } else {
10669  switch( echo_volume ) {
10670  case 1:
10671  echo_string = _( "ch." );
10672  break;
10673  case 2:
10674  echo_string = _( "chk." );
10675  break;
10676  case 3:
10677  echo_string = _( "chhk." );
10678  break;
10679  case 4:
10680  echo_string = _( "chkch." );
10681  break;
10682  case 5:
10683  echo_string = _( "chkchh." );
10684  break;
10685  default:
10686  debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid echo string." );
10687  break;
10688  }
10689  }
10690  // It's not moving. Must be an obstacle
10691  if( critter->has_flag( mon_flag_IMMOBILE ) ) {
10692  echo_string = _( "click." );
10693  }
10694  sounds::sound( origin, echo_volume, sounds::sound_t::sensory, _( echo_string ), false,
10695  "none", "none" );
10696  }
10697  }
10698 }
10699 
10700 bool Character::knows_trap( const tripoint &pos ) const
10701 {
10702  const tripoint p = get_map().getabs( pos );
10703  return known_traps.count( p ) > 0;
10704 }
10705 
10706 void Character::add_known_trap( const tripoint &pos, const trap &t )
10707 {
10708  const tripoint p = get_map().getabs( pos );
10709  if( t.is_null() ) {
10710  known_traps.erase( p );
10711  } else {
10712  // TODO: known_traps should map to a trap_str_id
10713  known_traps[p] = t.id.str();
10714  }
10715 }
10716 
10717 bool Character::can_hear( const tripoint &source, const int volume ) const
10718 {
10719  if( is_deaf() ) {
10720  return false;
10721  }
10722 
10723  // source is in-ear and at our square, we can hear it
10724  if( source == pos() && volume == 0 ) {
10725  return true;
10726  }
10727  const int dist = rl_dist( source, pos() );
10728  const float volume_multiplier = hearing_ability();
10729  return ( volume - get_weather().weather_id->sound_attn ) * volume_multiplier >= dist;
10730 }
10731 
10732 float Character::hearing_ability() const
10733 {
10734  float volume_multiplier = 1.0f;
10735 
10736  volume_multiplier = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::HEARING_MULT,
10737  volume_multiplier );
10738 
10739  if( has_effect( effect_deaf ) ) {
10740  // Scale linearly up to 30 minutes
10741  volume_multiplier *= ( 30_minutes - get_effect_dur( effect_deaf ) ) / 30_minutes;
10742  }
10743 
10744  return volume_multiplier;
10745 }
10746 
10747 std::vector<std::string> Character::short_description_parts() const
10748 {
10749  std::vector<std::string> result;
10750 
10751  if( is_armed() ) {
10752  result.push_back( _( "Wielding: " ) + weapon.tname() );
10753  }
10754  const std::list<item> visible_worn_items = get_visible_worn_items();
10755  const std::string worn_str = enumerate_as_string( visible_worn_items.begin(),
10756  visible_worn_items.end(),
10757  []( const item & it ) {
10758  return it.tname();
10759  } );
10760  if( !worn_str.empty() ) {
10761  result.push_back( _( "Wearing: " ) + worn_str );
10762  }
10763  const int visibility_cap = 0; // no cap
10764  const std::string trait_str = visible_mutations( visibility_cap );
10765  if( !trait_str.empty() ) {
10766  result.push_back( _( "Traits: " ) + trait_str );
10767  }
10768  return result;
10769 }
10770 
10771 std::string Character::short_description() const
10772 {
10773  return string_join( short_description_parts(), "; " );
10774 }
10775 
10776 void Character::process_one_effect( effect &it, bool is_new )
10777 {
10778  bool reduced = resists_effect( it );
10779  double mod = 1;
10780  const bodypart_id &bp = it.get_bp();
10781  int val = 0;
10782 
10783  // Still hardcoded stuff, do this first since some modify their other traits
10784  int str = get_str_bonus();
10785  int dex = get_dex_bonus();
10786  int intl = get_int_bonus();
10787  int per = get_per_bonus();
10788  hardcoded_effects( it );
10789  str_bonus_hardcoded += get_str_bonus() - str;
10790  dex_bonus_hardcoded += get_dex_bonus() - dex;
10791  int_bonus_hardcoded += get_int_bonus() - intl;
10792  per_bonus_hardcoded += get_per_bonus() - per;
10793 
10794  const auto get_effect = [&it, is_new]( const std::string & arg, bool reduced ) {
10795  if( is_new ) {
10796  return it.get_amount( arg, reduced );
10797  }
10798  return it.get_mod( arg, reduced );
10799  };
10800 
10801  // Handle miss messages
10802  const std::vector<std::pair<translation, int>> &msgs = it.get_miss_msgs();
10803  for( const auto &i : msgs ) {
10804  add_miss_reason( i.first.translated(), static_cast<unsigned>( i.second ) );
10805  }
10806 
10807  // Handle vitamins
10808  for( const vitamin_applied_effect &vit : it.vit_effects( reduced ) ) {
10809  if( vit.tick && vit.rate && calendar::once_every( *vit.tick ) ) {
10810  const int mod = rng( vit.rate->first, vit.rate->second );
10811  vitamin_mod( vit.vitamin, mod );
10812  }
10813  }
10814 
10815  // Handle health mod
10816  val = get_effect( "H_MOD", reduced );
10817  if( val != 0 ) {
10818  mod = 1;
10819  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "H_MOD", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10820  int bounded = bound_mod_to_vals(
10821  get_daily_health(), val, it.get_max_val( "H_MOD", reduced ),
10822  it.get_min_val( "H_MOD", reduced ) );
10823  // This already applies bounds, so we pass them through.
10824  mod_daily_health( bounded, get_daily_health() + bounded );
10825  }
10826  }
10827 
10828  // Handle health
10829  val = get_effect( "HEALTH", reduced );
10830  if( val != 0 ) {
10831  mod = 1;
10832  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HEALTH", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10833  mod_livestyle( bound_mod_to_vals( get_lifestyle(), val,
10834  it.get_max_val( "HEALTH", reduced ), it.get_min_val( "HEALTH", reduced ) ) );
10835  }
10836  }
10837 
10838  // Handle stim
10839  val = get_effect( "STIM", reduced );
10840  if( val != 0 ) {
10841  mod = 1;
10842  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "STIM", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10843  mod_stim( bound_mod_to_vals( get_stim(), val, it.get_max_val( "STIM", reduced ),
10844  it.get_min_val( "STIM", reduced ) ) );
10845  }
10846  }
10847 
10848  // Handle hunger
10849  val = get_effect( "HUNGER", reduced );
10850  if( val != 0 ) {
10851  mod = 1;
10852  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HUNGER", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10853  mod_hunger( bound_mod_to_vals( get_hunger(), val, it.get_max_val( "HUNGER", reduced ),
10854  it.get_min_val( "HUNGER", reduced ) ) );
10855  }
10856  }
10857 
10858  // Handle thirst
10859  val = get_effect( "THIRST", reduced );
10860  if( val != 0 ) {
10861  mod = 1;
10862  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "THIRST", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10863  mod_thirst( bound_mod_to_vals( get_thirst(), val, it.get_max_val( "THIRST", reduced ),
10864  it.get_min_val( "THIRST", reduced ) ) );
10865  }
10866  }
10867 
10868  // Handle perspiration
10869  val = get_effect( "PERSPIRATION", reduced );
10870  if( val != 0 ) {
10871  mod = 1;
10872  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "PERSPIRATION", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10873  // multiplier to balance values around drench capacity of different body parts
10874  int mult = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SWEAT_MULTIPLIER,
10875  1 ) * get_part_drench_capacity( bp ) / 100;
10876  mod_part_wetness( bp, bound_mod_to_vals( get_part_wetness( bp ), val * mult,
10877  it.get_max_val( "PERSPIRATION", reduced ) * mult,
10878  it.get_min_val( "PERSPIRATION", reduced ) * mult ) );
10879  }
10880  }
10881 
10882  // Handle sleepiness
10883  val = get_effect( "SLEEPINESS", reduced );
10884  // Prevent ongoing sleepiness effects while asleep.
10885  // These are meant to change how fast you get tired, not how long you sleep.
10886  if( val != 0 && !in_sleep_state() ) {
10887  mod = 1;
10888  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "SLEEPINESS", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10889  mod_sleepiness( bound_mod_to_vals( get_sleepiness(), val, it.get_max_val( "SLEEPINESS", reduced ),
10890  it.get_min_val( "SLEEPINESS", reduced ) ) );
10891  }
10892  }
10893 
10894  // Handle Radiation
10895  val = get_effect( "RAD", reduced );
10896  if( val != 0 ) {
10897  mod = 1;
10898  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "RAD", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10899  mod_rad( bound_mod_to_vals( get_rad(), val, it.get_max_val( "RAD", reduced ), 0 ) );
10900  // Radiation can't go negative
10901  if( get_rad() < 0 ) {
10902  set_rad( 0 );
10903  }
10904  }
10905  }
10906 
10907  // Handle Pain
10908  val = get_effect( "PAIN", reduced );
10909  if( val != 0 ) {
10910  mod = 1;
10911  if( it.get_sizing( "PAIN" ) ) {
10912  if( has_trait( trait_FAT ) ) {
10913  mod *= 1.5;
10914  }
10915  if( get_size() == creature_size::large ) {
10916  mod *= 2;
10917  }
10918  if( get_size() == creature_size::huge ) {
10919  mod *= 3;
10920  }
10921  }
10922  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "PAIN", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10923  int pain_inc = bound_mod_to_vals( get_pain(), val, it.get_max_val( "PAIN", reduced ), 0 );
10924  mod_pain( pain_inc );
10925  if( pain_inc > 0 ) {
10926  add_pain_msg( val, bp );
10927  }
10928  }
10929  }
10930 
10931  // Handle Damage
10932  val = get_effect( "HURT", reduced );
10933  if( val != 0 ) {
10934  mod = 1;
10935  if( it.get_sizing( "HURT" ) ) {
10936  if( has_trait( trait_FAT ) ) {
10937  mod *= 1.5;
10938  }
10939  if( get_size() == creature_size::large ) {
10940  mod *= 2;
10941  }
10942  if( get_size() == creature_size::huge ) {
10943  mod *= 3;
10944  }
10945  }
10946  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HURT", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10947  if( bp == bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
10948  if( val > 5 ) {
10949  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s HURTS!" ), body_part_name( body_part_torso ) );
10950  } else if( val > 0 ) {
10951  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s hurts!" ), body_part_name( body_part_torso ) );
10952  }
10953  apply_damage( nullptr, body_part_torso, val, true );
10954  } else {
10955  if( val > 5 ) {
10956  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s HURTS!" ), body_part_name( bp ) );
10957  } else if( val > 0 ) {
10958  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s hurts!" ), body_part_name( bp ) );
10959  }
10960  apply_damage( nullptr, bp, val, true );
10961  }
10962  }
10963  }
10964 
10965  // Handle Sleep
10966  val = get_effect( "SLEEP", reduced );
10967  if( val != 0 ) {
10968  mod = 1;
10969  if( ( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "SLEEP", val, reduced, mod ) ) &&
10970  !has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
10971  add_msg_if_player( _( "You pass out!" ) );
10972  fall_asleep( time_duration::from_turns( val ) );
10973  }
10974  }
10975 
10976  // Handle painkillers
10977  val = get_effect( "PKILL", reduced );
10978  if( val != 0 ) {
10979  mod = it.get_addict_mod( "PKILL", addiction_level( addiction_opiate ) );
10980  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "PKILL", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10981  mod_painkiller( bound_mod_to_vals( get_painkiller(), val, it.get_max_val( "PKILL", reduced ), 0 ) );
10982  }
10983  }
10984 
10985  // Handle Blood Pressure
10986  val = get_effect( "BLOOD_PRESSURE", reduced );
10987  if( val != 0 ) {
10988  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "BLOOD_PRESSURE", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10989  modify_bp_effect_mod( bound_mod_to_vals( get_bp_effect_mod(), val, it.get_max_val( "BLOOD_PRESSURE",
10990  reduced ), 0 ) );
10991  }
10992  }
10993 
10994  // handle heart rate
10995  val = get_effect( "HEART_RATE", reduced );
10996  if( val != 0 ) {
10997  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HEART_RATE", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10998  modify_heartrate_effect_mod( bound_mod_to_vals( get_heartrate_effect_mod(), val,
10999  it.get_max_val( "HEART_RATE", reduced ), 0 ) );
11000  }
11001  }
11002  // handle perspiration rate
11003  val = get_effect( "RESPIRATION_RATE", reduced );
11004  if( val != 0 ) {
11005  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "RESPIRATION_RATE", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11006  modify_respiration_effect_mod( bound_mod_to_vals( get_respiration_effect_mod(), val,
11007  it.get_max_val( "RESPIRATION_RATE", reduced ), 0 ) );
11008  }
11009  }
11010 
11011 
11012  // Handle coughing
11013  mod = 1;
11014  val = 0;
11015  if( it.activated( calendar::turn, "COUGH", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11016  cough( it.get_harmful_cough() );
11017  }
11018 
11019  // Handle vomiting
11020  mod = vomit_mod();
11021  val = 0;
11022  if( it.activated( calendar::turn, "VOMIT", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11023  vomit();
11024  }
11025 
11026  // Handle stamina
11027  val = get_effect( "STAMINA", reduced );
11028  if( val != 0 ) {
11029  mod = 1;
11030  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "STAMINA", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11031  mod_stamina( bound_mod_to_vals( get_stamina(), val,
11032  it.get_max_val( "STAMINA", reduced ),
11033  it.get_min_val( "STAMINA", reduced ) ) );
11034  }
11035  }
11036 
11037  // Speed and stats are handled in recalc_speed_bonus and reset_stats respectively
11038 }
11039 
11040 void Character::process_effects()
11041 {
11042  //Special Removals
11043  if( has_effect( effect_darkness ) && g->is_in_sunlight( pos() ) ) {
11044  remove_effect( effect_darkness );
11045  }
11046  if( has_trait( trait_M_IMMUNE ) && has_effect( effect_fungus ) ) {
11047  vomit();
11048  remove_effect( effect_fungus );
11049  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "We have mistakenly colonized a local guide! Purging now." ) );
11050  }
11051  if( has_trait( trait_PARAIMMUNE ) && ( has_effect( effect_dermatik ) ||
11052  has_effect( effect_tapeworm ) ||
11053  has_effect( effect_blood_spiders ) ||
11054  has_effect( effect_bloodworms ) || has_effect( effect_brainworms ) ||
11055  has_effect( effect_paincysts ) ) ) {
11056  remove_effect( effect_dermatik );
11057  remove_effect( effect_tapeworm );
11058  remove_effect( effect_bloodworms );
11059  remove_effect( effect_blood_spiders );
11060  remove_effect( effect_brainworms );
11061  remove_effect( effect_paincysts );
11062  add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Something writhes inside of you as it dies." ) );
11063  }
11064  if( has_flag( json_flag_ACIDBLOOD ) && ( has_effect( effect_dermatik ) ||
11065  has_effect( effect_bloodworms ) ||
11066  has_effect( effect_blood_spiders ) ||
11067  has_effect( effect_brainworms ) ) ) {
11068  remove_effect( effect_dermatik );
11069  remove_effect( effect_bloodworms );
11070  remove_effect( effect_blood_spiders );
11071  remove_effect( effect_brainworms );
11072  }
11073  if( has_trait( trait_EATHEALTH ) && has_effect( effect_tapeworm ) ) {
11074  remove_effect( effect_tapeworm );
11075  add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your bowels gurgle as something inside them dies." ) );
11076  }
11077  if( has_flag( json_flag_INFECTION_IMMUNE ) && ( has_effect( effect_bite ) ||
11078  has_effect( effect_infected ) ||
11079  has_effect( effect_recover ) ) ) {
11080  remove_effect( effect_bite );
11081  remove_effect( effect_infected );
11082  remove_effect( effect_recover );
11083  }
11084 
11085  //Clear hardcoded bonuses from last turn
11086  //Recalculated in process_one_effect
11087  str_bonus_hardcoded = 0;
11088  dex_bonus_hardcoded = 0;
11089  int_bonus_hardcoded = 0;
11090  per_bonus_hardcoded = 0;
11091  //Human only effects
11092  for( std::pair<const efftype_id, std::map<bodypart_id, effect>> &elem : *effects ) {
11093  for( std::pair<const bodypart_id, effect> &_effect_it : elem.second ) {
11094  process_one_effect( _effect_it.second, false );
11095  }
11096  }
11097 
11098  // Apply new effects from effect->effect chains
11099  while( !scheduled_effects.empty() ) {
11100  const scheduled_effect_t &effect = scheduled_effects.front();
11101 
11102  add_effect( effect_source::empty(),
11103  effect.eff_id,
11104  effect.dur,
11105  effect.bp,
11106  effect.permanent,
11107  effect.intensity,
11108  effect.force,
11109  effect.deferred );
11110 
11111  scheduled_effects.pop();
11112  }
11113 
11114  // Perform immediate effect removals
11115  while( !terminating_effects.empty() ) {
11116 
11117  const terminating_effect_t &effect = terminating_effects.front();
11118 
11119  remove_effect( effect.eff_id, effect.bp );
11120 
11121  terminating_effects.pop();
11122  }
11123 
11124  // Being stuck in tight spaces sucks. TODO: could be expanded to apply to non-vehicle conditions.
11125  if( has_effect( effect_cramped_space ) ) {
11126  map &here = get_map();
11127  const tripoint your_pos = pos();
11128  const optional_vpart_position vp_there = here.veh_at( your_pos );
11129  if( !vp_there ) {
11130  remove_effect( effect_cramped_space );
11131  return;
11132  }
11133  if( is_npc() && !has_effect( effect_narcosis ) && has_effect( effect_cramped_space ) ) {
11134  npc &as_npc = dynamic_cast<npc &>( *this );
11135  as_npc.complain_about( "cramped_vehicle", 30_minutes, "<cramped_vehicle>", false );
11136  }
11137  bool is_cramped_space = false;
11138  vehicle &veh = vp_there->vehicle();
11139  units::volume capacity = 0_ml;
11140  units::volume free_cargo = 0_ml;
11141  auto cargo_parts = veh.get_parts_at( your_pos, "CARGO", part_status_flag::any );
11142  for( vehicle_part *&part : cargo_parts ) {
11143  vehicle_stack contents = veh.get_items( *part );
11144  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( your_pos );
11145  if( !vp.part_with_feature( "CARGO_PASSABLE", false ) ) {
11146  capacity += contents.max_volume();
11147  free_cargo += contents.free_volume();
11148  }
11149  const creature_size size = get_size();
11150  if( capacity > 0_ml ) {
11151  // Open-topped vehicle parts have more room.
11152  if( !veh.enclosed_at( your_pos ) ) {
11153  free_cargo *= 1.2;
11154  }
11155  if( ( size == creature_size::tiny && free_cargo < 15625_ml ) ||
11156  ( size == creature_size::small && free_cargo < 31250_ml ) ||
11157  ( size == creature_size::medium && free_cargo < 62500_ml ) ||
11158  ( size == creature_size::large && free_cargo < 125000_ml ) ||
11159  ( size == creature_size::huge && free_cargo < 250000_ml ) ) {
11160  is_cramped_space = true;
11161  }
11162  }
11163  if( get_size() == creature_size::huge && !vp.part_with_feature( "AISLE", false ) &&
11164  !vp.part_with_feature( "HUGE_OK", false ) ) {
11165  is_cramped_space = true;
11166  }
11167  }
11168  if( !is_cramped_space ) {
11169  remove_effect( effect_cramped_space );
11170  }
11171  }
11172 
11173  Creature::process_effects();
11174 }
11175 
11176 void Character::gravity_check()
11177 {
11178  if( get_map().tr_at( pos() ) == tr_ledge && !has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_GLIDING ) ) {
11179  get_map().tr_at( pos() ).trigger( pos(), *this );
11180  get_map().update_visibility_cache( pos().z );
11181  }
11182 }
11183 
11184 void Character::stagger()
11185 {
11186  map &here = get_map();
11187  std::vector<tripoint> valid_stumbles;
11188  valid_stumbles.reserve( 11 );
11189  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
11190  if( dest != pos() ) {
11191  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_DOWN, dest ) ) {
11192  valid_stumbles.emplace_back( dest.xy(), dest.z - 1 );
11193  } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_UP, dest ) ) {
11194  valid_stumbles.emplace_back( dest.xy(), dest.z + 1 );
11195  } else {
11196  valid_stumbles.push_back( dest );
11197  }
11198  }
11199  }
11200  const tripoint below( posx(), posy(), posz() - 1 );
11201  if( here.valid_move( pos(), below, false, true ) ) {
11202  valid_stumbles.push_back( below );
11203  }
11204  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
11205  while( !valid_stumbles.empty() ) {
11206  bool blocked = false;
11207  const tripoint dest = random_entry_removed( valid_stumbles );
11208  const optional_vpart_position vp_there = here.veh_at( dest );
11209  if( vp_there ) {
11210  vehicle &veh = vp_there->vehicle();
11211  if( veh.enclosed_at( dest ) ) {
11212  blocked = true;
11213  }
11214  }
11215  if( here.passable( dest ) && !blocked &&
11216  ( creatures.creature_at( dest, is_hallucination() ) == nullptr ) ) {
11217  avatar &player_avatar = get_avatar();
11218  if( is_avatar() && player_avatar.get_grab_type() != object_type::NONE ) {
11219  player_avatar.grab( object_type::NONE );
11220  }
11221  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
11222  _( "You stumble!" ),
11223  _( "<npcname> stumbles!" ) );
11224  setpos( dest );
11225  mod_moves( -100 );
11226  break;
11227  }
11228  }
11229 }
11230 
11231 double Character::vomit_mod()
11232 {
11233  double mod = 1;
11234 
11235  mod = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::VOMIT_MUL, mod );
11236 
11237  // If you're already nauseous, any food in your stomach greatly
11238  // increases chance of vomiting. Liquids don't provoke vomiting, though.
11239  if( stomach.contains() != 0_ml && has_effect( effect_nausea ) ) {
11240  mod *= get_effect_int( effect_nausea );
11241  }
11242  return mod;
11243 }
11244 
11245 int Character::sleep_spot( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
11246 {
11247  const int current_stim = get_stim();
11248  const comfort_response_t comfort_info = base_comfort_value( p );
11249  if( comfort_info.aid != nullptr ) {
11250  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You use your %s for comfort." ), comfort_info.aid->tname() );
11251  }
11252 
11253  int sleepy = static_cast<int>( comfort_info.level );
11254  bool watersleep = has_trait( trait_WATERSLEEP ) || has_trait( trait_UNDINE_SLEEP_WATER );
11255 
11256  if( has_addiction( addiction_sleeping_pill ) ) {
11257  sleepy -= 4;
11258  }
11259 
11260  sleepy = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SLEEPY, sleepy );
11261 
11262  if( watersleep && get_map().has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, p.raw() ) ) {
11263  sleepy += 10; //comfy water!
11264  }
11265 
11266  if( get_sleepiness() < sleepiness_levels::TIRED + 1 ) {
11267  sleepy -= static_cast<int>( ( sleepiness_levels::TIRED + 1 - get_sleepiness() ) / 4 );
11268  } else {
11269  sleepy += static_cast<int>( ( get_sleepiness() - sleepiness_levels::TIRED + 1 ) / 16 );
11270  }
11271 
11272  if( current_stim > 0 || !has_trait( trait_INSOMNIA ) ) {
11273  sleepy -= 2 * current_stim;
11274  } else {
11275  // Make it harder for insomniac to get around the trait
11276  sleepy -= current_stim;
11277  }
11278 
11279  return sleepy;
11280 }
11281 
11282 bool Character::can_sleep()
11283 {
11284  if( has_effect( effect_meth ) ) {
11285  // Sleep ain't happening until that meth wears off completely.
11286  return false;
11287  }
11288 
11289  // Since there's a bit of randomness to falling asleep, we want to
11290  // prevent exploiting this if can_sleep() gets called over and over.
11291  // Only actually check if we can fall asleep no more frequently than
11292  // every 30 minutes. We're assuming that if we return true, we'll
11293  // immediately be falling asleep after that.
11294  //
11295  // Also if player debug menu'd time backwards this breaks, just do the
11296  // check anyway, this will reset the timer if 'dur' is negative.
11297  const time_point now = calendar::turn;
11298  const time_duration dur = now - last_sleep_check;
11299  if( dur >= 0_turns && dur < 30_minutes ) {
11300  return false;
11301  }
11302  last_sleep_check = now;
11303 
11304  int sleepy = sleep_spot( pos_bub() );
11305  sleepy += rng( -8, 8 );
11306  bool result = sleepy > 0;
11307 
11308  if( has_active_bionic( bio_soporific ) ) {
11309  if( bio_soporific_powered_at_last_sleep_check && !has_power() ) {
11310  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your soporific inducer runs out of power!" ) );
11311  } else if( !bio_soporific_powered_at_last_sleep_check && has_power() ) {
11312  add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your soporific inducer starts back up." ) );
11313  }
11314  bio_soporific_powered_at_last_sleep_check = has_power();
11315  }
11316 
11317  return result;
11318 }
11319 
11320 void Character::shift_destination( const point &shift )
11321 {
11322  if( next_expected_position ) {
11323  *next_expected_position += shift;
11324  }
11325 
11326  for( tripoint_bub_ms &elem : auto_move_route ) {
11327  elem += shift;
11328  }
11329 }
11330 
11331 bool Character::has_weapon() const
11332 {
11333  return !unarmed_attack();
11334 }
11335 
11336 int Character::get_lowest_hp() const
11337 {
11338  // Set lowest_hp to an arbitrarily large number.
11339  int lowest_hp = 999;
11340  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : get_body() ) {
11341  const int cur_hp = elem.second.get_hp_cur();
11342  if( cur_hp < lowest_hp ) {
11343  lowest_hp = cur_hp;
11344  }
11345  }
11346  return lowest_hp;
11347 }
11348 
11349 Creature::Attitude Character::attitude_to( const Creature &other ) const
11350 {
11351  const monster *m = dynamic_cast<const monster *>( &other );
11352  if( m != nullptr ) {
11353  if( m->friendly != 0 ) {
11354  return Attitude::FRIENDLY;
11355  }
11356  switch( m->attitude( const_cast<Character *>( this ) ) ) {
11357  // player probably does not want to harm them, but doesn't care much at all.
11358  case MATT_FOLLOW:
11359  case MATT_FPASSIVE:
11360  case MATT_IGNORE:
11361  case MATT_FLEE:
11362  return Attitude::NEUTRAL;
11363  // player does not want to harm those.
11364  case MATT_FRIEND:
11365  return Attitude::FRIENDLY;
11366  case MATT_ATTACK:
11367  return Attitude::HOSTILE;
11368  case MATT_NULL:
11369  case NUM_MONSTER_ATTITUDES:
11370  break;
11371  }
11372 
11373  return Attitude::NEUTRAL;
11374  }
11375 
11376  const npc *p = dynamic_cast<const npc *>( &other );
11377  if( p != nullptr ) {
11378  if( p->is_enemy() ) {
11379  return Attitude::HOSTILE;
11380  } else if( p->is_player_ally() ) {
11381  return Attitude::FRIENDLY;
11382  } else {
11383  return Attitude::NEUTRAL;
11384  }
11385  } else if( &other == this ) {
11386  return Attitude::FRIENDLY;
11387  }
11388 
11389  return Attitude::NEUTRAL;
11390 }
11391 
11392 npc_attitude Character::get_attitude() const
11393 {
11394  return NPCATT_NULL;
11395 }
11396 
11397 bool Character::sees( const tripoint &t, bool, int ) const
11398 {
11399  const int wanted_range = rl_dist( pos(), t );
11400  bool can_see = is_avatar() ? get_map().pl_sees( t, std::min( sight_max, wanted_range ) ) :
11401  Creature::sees( t );
11402  // Clairvoyance is now pretty cheap, so we can check it early
11403  if( wanted_range < MAX_CLAIRVOYANCE && wanted_range < clairvoyance() ) {
11404  return true;
11405  }
11406 
11407  return can_see;
11408 }
11409 
11410 bool Character::sees( const tripoint_bub_ms &t, bool is_avatar, int range_mod ) const
11411 {
11412  return sees( t.raw(), is_avatar, range_mod );
11413 }
11414 
11415 bool Character::sees( const Creature &critter ) const
11416 {
11417  // This handles only the player/npc specific stuff (monsters don't have traits or bionics).
11418  const int dist = rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() );
11419  if( std::abs( pos().z - critter.pos().z ) > fov_3d_z_range ) {
11420  return false;
11421  }
11422  if( dist <= 3 && has_active_mutation( trait_ANTENNAE ) ) {
11423  return true;
11424  }
11425  if( dist < MAX_CLAIRVOYANCE && dist < clairvoyance() ) {
11426  return true;
11427  }
11428  // Only players can spot creatures through clairvoyance fields
11429  if( is_avatar() && field_fd_clairvoyant.is_valid() &&
11430  get_map().get_field( critter.pos(), field_fd_clairvoyant ) ) {
11431  return true;
11432  }
11433  return Creature::sees( critter );
11434 }
11435 
11436 void Character::set_destination( const std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> &route,
11437  const player_activity &new_destination_activity )
11438 {
11439  auto_move_route = route;
11440  set_destination_activity( new_destination_activity );
11441  destination_point.emplace( get_map().getabs( route.back() ) );
11442 }
11443 
11444 void Character::clear_destination()
11445 {
11446  auto_move_route.clear();
11447  clear_destination_activity();
11448  destination_point = std::nullopt;
11449  next_expected_position = std::nullopt;
11450 }
11451 
11452 bool Character::has_distant_destination() const
11453 {
11454  return has_destination() && !get_destination_activity().is_null() &&
11455  get_destination_activity().id() == ACT_TRAVELLING && !omt_path.empty();
11456 }
11457 
11458 bool Character::is_auto_moving() const
11459 {
11460  return destination_point.has_value();
11461 }
11462 
11463 bool Character::has_destination() const
11464 {
11465  return !auto_move_route.empty();
11466 }
11467 
11468 bool Character::has_destination_activity() const
11469 {
11470  return !get_destination_activity().is_null() && destination_point &&
11471  pos() == get_map().getlocal( *destination_point );
11472 }
11473 
11474 void Character::start_destination_activity()
11475 {
11476  if( !has_destination_activity() ) {
11477  debugmsg( "Tried to start invalid destination activity" );
11478  return;
11479  }
11480 
11481  assign_activity( get_destination_activity() );
11482  clear_destination();
11483 }
11484 
11485 std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> &Character::get_auto_move_route()
11486 {
11487  return auto_move_route;
11488 }
11489 
11490 action_id Character::get_next_auto_move_direction()
11491 {
11492  if( !has_destination() ) {
11493  return ACTION_NULL;
11494  }
11495 
11496  if( next_expected_position ) {
11497  if( pos_bub() != *next_expected_position ) {
11498  // We're off course, possibly stumbling or stuck, cancel auto move
11499  return ACTION_NULL;
11500  }
11501  }
11502 
11503  next_expected_position.emplace( auto_move_route.front() );
11504  auto_move_route.erase( auto_move_route.begin() );
11505 
11506  tripoint_rel_ms dp = *next_expected_position - pos_bub();
11507 
11508  // Make sure the direction is just one step and that
11509  // all diagonal moves have 0 z component
11510  if( std::abs( dp.x() ) > 1 || std::abs( dp.y() ) > 1 || std::abs( dp.z() ) > 1 ||
11511  ( dp.z() != 0 && ( dp.x() != 0 || dp.y() != 0 ) ) ) {
11512  // Should never happen, but check just in case
11513  return ACTION_NULL;
11514  }
11515  // TODO: fix point types
11516  return get_movement_action_from_delta( dp.raw(), iso_rotate::yes );
11517 }
11518 
11519 int Character::persuade_skill() const
11520 {
11521  /** @EFFECT_INT slightly increases talking skill */
11522  /** @EFFECT_PER slightly increases talking skill */
11523  /** @EFFECT_SPEECH increases talking skill */
11524  float ret = get_int() + get_per() + get_skill_level( skill_speech ) * 3;
11525  ret = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SOCIAL_PERSUADE, ret );
11526  return round( ret );
11527 }
11528 
11529 int Character::lie_skill() const
11530 {
11531  /** @EFFECT_INT slightly increases talking skill */
11532  /** @EFFECT_PER slightly increases talking skill */
11533  /** @EFFECT_SPEECH increases talking skill */
11534  float ret = get_int() + get_per() + get_skill_level( skill_speech ) * 3;
11535  ret = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SOCIAL_LIE, ret );
11536  return round( ret );
11537 }
11538 
11539 int Character::intimidation() const
11540 {
11541  /** @EFFECT_STR increases intimidation factor */
11542  int ret = get_str() * 2;
11543  if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
11544  ret += 10;
11545  }
11546  for( const damage_type &dt : damage_type::get_all() ) {
11547  if( dt.melee_only && weapon.damage_melee( dt.id ) >= 12 ) {
11548  ret += 5;
11549  break;
11550  }
11551  }
11552 
11553  if( get_stim() > 20 ) {
11554  ret += 2;
11555  }
11556  if( has_effect( effect_drunk ) ) {
11557  ret -= 4;
11558  }
11559  ret = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SOCIAL_INTIMIDATE, ret );
11560  return ret;
11561 }
11562 
11563 bool Character::defer_move( const tripoint &next )
11564 {
11565  // next must be adjacent to current pos
11566  if( square_dist( next, pos() ) != 1 ) {
11567  return false;
11568  }
11569  // next must be adjacent to subsequent move in any preexisting automove route
11570  // TODO: fix point types
11571  if( has_destination() && square_dist( auto_move_route.front().raw(), next ) != 1 ) {
11572  return false;
11573  }
11574  // TODO: fix point types
11575  auto_move_route.insert( auto_move_route.begin(), tripoint_bub_ms( next ) );
11576  next_expected_position = pos_bub();
11577  return true;
11578 }
11579 
11580 bool Character::add_or_drop_with_msg( item &it, const bool /*unloading*/, const item *avoid,
11581  const item *original_inventory_item )
11582 {
11583  if( it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
11584  liquid_handler::consume_liquid( it, 1, avoid );
11585  return it.charges <= 0;
11586  }
11587  if( !this->can_pickVolume( it, false, avoid ) ) {
11588  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::too_large, { it } );
11589  } else if( !this->can_pickWeight( it, !get_option<bool>( "DANGEROUS_PICKUPS" ) ) ) {
11590  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::too_heavy, { it } );
11591  } else {
11592  bool wielded_has_it = false;
11593  // Cannot use weapon.has_item(it) because it skips any pockets that
11594  // are not containers such as magazines and magazine wells.
11595  for( const item *scan_contents : weapon.all_items_top() ) {
11596  if( scan_contents == &it ) {
11597  wielded_has_it = true;
11598  break;
11599  }
11600  }
11601  const bool allow_wield = !wielded_has_it && weapon.magazine_current() != &it;
11602  const int prev_charges = it.charges;
11603  item_location ni = i_add( it, true, avoid,
11604  original_inventory_item, /*allow_drop=*/false, /*allow_wield=*/allow_wield );
11605  if( ni == item_location::nowhere ) {
11606  // failed to add
11607  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::tumbling, { it } );
11608  } else if( &*ni == &it ) {
11609  // merged into the original stack, restore original charges
11610  it.charges = prev_charges;
11611  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::tumbling, { it } );
11612  } else {
11613  // successfully added
11614  add_msg( _( "You put the %s in your inventory." ), ni->tname() );
11615  add_msg( m_info, "%c - %s", ni->invlet == 0 ? ' ' : ni->invlet, ni->tname() );
11616  }
11617  }
11618  return true;
11619 }
11620 
11621 bool Character::unload( item_location &loc, bool bypass_activity,
11622  const item_location &new_container )
11623 {
11624  item &it = *loc;
11625  drop_locations locs;
11626  // Unload a container consuming moves per item successfully removed
11627  if( it.is_container() ) {
11628  if( it.empty() ) {
11629  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is already empty!" ), it.tname() );
11630  return false;
11631  }
11632  if( !it.can_unload_liquid() ) {
11633  add_msg( m_info, _( "The liquid can't be unloaded in its current state!" ) );
11634  return false;
11635  }
11636 
11637  int moves = 0;
11638  item *prev_contained = nullptr;
11639 
11640  for( pocket_type ptype : {
11641  pocket_type::CONTAINER,
11642  pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL,
11643  pocket_type::MAGAZINE
11644  } ) {
11645
