11646  for( item *contained : it.all_items_top( ptype, true ) ) {
11647  if( new_container == item_location::nowhere ) {
11648  if( prev_contained && prev_contained->stacks_with( *contained ) ) {
11649  moves += std::max( this->item_handling_cost( *contained, true, 0, -1, true ), 1 );
11650  } else {
11651  moves += this->item_handling_cost( *contained );
11652  }
11653  prev_contained = contained;
11654  } else {
11655  // redirect to insert actor
11656  const int count = contained->count_by_charges() ? contained->charges : 1;
11657  locs.emplace_back( item_location( loc, contained ), count );
11658  }
11659  }
11660 
11661  }
11662  if( new_container == item_location::nowhere ) {
11663  assign_activity( unload_activity_actor( moves, loc ) );
11664  } else if( !locs.empty() ) {
11665  assign_activity( insert_item_activity_actor( new_container, locs, true ) );
11666  }
11667 
11668  return true;
11669  }
11670 
11671  // If item can be unloaded more than once (currently only guns) prompt user to choose
11672  std::vector<std::string> msgs( 1, it.tname() );
11673  std::vector<item *> opts( 1, &it );
11674 
11675  for( item *e : it.gunmods() ) {
11676  if( ( e->is_gun() && !e->has_flag( flag_NO_UNLOAD ) &&
11677  ( e->magazine_current() || e->ammo_remaining() > 0 || e->casings_count() > 0 ) ) ||
11678  ( e->has_flag( flag_BRASS_CATCHER ) && !e->is_container_empty() ) ) {
11679  msgs.emplace_back( e->tname() );
11680  opts.emplace_back( e );
11681  }
11682  }
11683 
11684  item *target = nullptr;
11685  item_location targloc;
11686  if( opts.size() > 1 ) {
11687  const int ret = uilist( _( "Unload what?" ), msgs );
11688  if( ret >= 0 ) {
11689  target = opts[ret];
11690  targloc = item_location( loc, opts[ret] );
11691  }
11692  } else {
11693  target = &it;
11694  targloc = loc;
11695  }
11696 
11697  if( target == nullptr ) {
11698  return false;
11699  }
11700 
11701  // Next check for any reasons why the item cannot be unloaded
11702  if( !target->has_flag( flag_BRASS_CATCHER ) ) {
11703  if( !target->is_magazine() && !target->uses_magazine() ) {
11704  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't unload a %s!" ), target->tname() );
11705  return false;
11706  }
11707 
11708  if( target->has_flag( flag_NO_UNLOAD ) ) {
11709  if( target->has_flag( flag_RECHARGE ) || target->has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
11710  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't unload a rechargeable %s!" ), target->tname() );
11711  } else {
11712  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't unload a %s!" ), target->tname() );
11713  }
11714  return false;
11715  }
11716 
11717  if( !target->magazine_current() && target->ammo_remaining() <= 0 && target->casings_count() <= 0 ) {
11718  if( target->is_tool() ) {
11719  add_msg( m_info, _( "Your %s isn't charged." ), target->tname() );
11720  } else {
11721  add_msg( m_info, _( "Your %s isn't loaded." ), target->tname() );
11722  }
11723  return false;
11724  }
11725  }
11726 
11727  target->casings_handle( [&]( item & e ) {
11728  return this->i_add_or_drop( e );
11729  } );
11730 
11731  invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
11732 
11733  if( target->is_magazine() ) {
11734  if( bypass_activity ) {
11735  unload_activity_actor::unload( *this, targloc );
11736  } else {
11737  int mv = 0;
11738  for( const item *content : target->all_items_top() ) {
11739  // We use the same cost for both reloading and unloading
11740  mv += this->item_reload_cost( it, *content, content->charges );
11741  }
11742  if( it.is_ammo_belt() ) {
11743  // Disassembling ammo belts is easier than assembling them
11744  mv /= 2;
11745  }
11746  assign_activity( unload_activity_actor( mv, targloc ) );
11747  }
11748  return true;
11749 
11750  } else if( target->magazine_current() ) {
11751  if( !this->add_or_drop_with_msg( *target->magazine_current(), true, nullptr,
11752  target->magazine_current() ) ) {
11753  return false;
11754  }
11755  // Eject magazine consuming half as much time as required to insert it
11756  this->mod_moves( -this->item_reload_cost( *target, *target->magazine_current(), -1 ) / 2 );
11757 
11758  target->remove_items_with( [&target]( const item & e ) {
11759  return target->magazine_current() == &e;
11760  } );
11761 
11762  } else if( target->ammo_remaining() ) {
11763  int qty = target->ammo_remaining();
11764 
11765  // Construct a new ammo item and try to drop it
11766  item ammo( target->ammo_current(), calendar::turn, qty );
11767  if( target->is_filthy() ) {
11768  ammo.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
11769  }
11770 
11771  if( ammo.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
11772  if( !this->add_or_drop_with_msg( ammo ) ) {
11773  qty -= ammo.charges; // only handled part (or none) of the liquid
11774  }
11775  if( qty <= 0 ) {
11776  return false; // no liquid was moved
11777  }
11778 
11779  } else if( !this->add_or_drop_with_msg( ammo, qty > 1 ) ) {
11780  return false;
11781  }
11782 
11783  // If successful remove appropriate qty of ammo consuming half as much time as required to load it
11784  this->mod_moves( -this->item_reload_cost( *target, ammo, qty ) / 2 );
11785 
11786  target->ammo_set( target->ammo_current(), target->ammo_remaining() - qty );
11787  } else if( target->has_flag( flag_BRASS_CATCHER ) ) {
11788  target->spill_contents( get_player_character() );
11789  }
11790 
11791  // Turn off any active tools
11792  if( target->is_tool() && target->active && target->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
11793  target->type->invoke( this, *target, this->pos() );
11794  }
11795 
11796  add_msg( _( "You unload your %s." ), target->tname() );
11797 
11798  if( it.has_flag( flag_MAG_DESTROY ) && it.ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
11799  loc.remove_item();
11800  }
11801 
11802  get_player_character().recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
11803 
11804  return true;
11805 }
11806 
11807 book_mastery Character::get_book_mastery( const item &book ) const
11808 {
11809  if( !book.is_book() || !has_identified( book.typeId() ) ) {
11810  return book_mastery::CANT_DETERMINE;
11811  }
11812  // TODO: add illiterate check?
11813 
11814  const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &type = book.type->book;
11815  const skill_id &skill = type->skill;
11816 
11817  if( !skill ) {
11818  // book gives no skill
11819  return book_mastery::MASTERED;
11820  }
11821 
11822  const int skill_level = get_knowledge_level( skill );
11823  const int skill_requirement = type->req;
11824  const int max_skill_learnable = type->level;
11825 
11826  if( skill_requirement > skill_level ) {
11827  return book_mastery::CANT_UNDERSTAND;
11828  }
11829  if( skill_level >= max_skill_learnable ) {
11830  return book_mastery::MASTERED;
11831  }
11832  return book_mastery::LEARNING;
11833 }
11834 
11835 bool Character::fun_to_read( const item &book ) const
11836 {
11837  return book_fun_for( book, *this ) > 0;
11838 }
11839 
11840 int Character::book_fun_for( const item &book, const Character &p ) const
11841 {
11842  int fun_bonus = book.type->book->fun;
11843  if( !book.is_book() ) {
11844  debugmsg( "called avatar::book_fun_for with non-book" );
11845  return 0;
11846  }
11847 
11848  // If you don't have a problem with eating humans, To Serve Man becomes rewarding
11849  if( ( p.has_trait( trait_CANNIBAL ) || p.has_trait( trait_PSYCHOPATH ) ||
11850  p.has_trait( trait_SAPIOVORE ) ) &&
11851  book.typeId() == itype_cookbook_human ) {
11852  fun_bonus = std::abs( fun_bonus );
11853  } else if( p.has_trait( trait_SPIRITUAL ) && book.has_flag( flag_INSPIRATIONAL ) ) {
11854  fun_bonus = std::abs( fun_bonus * 3 );
11855  }
11856 
11857  if( has_trait( trait_LOVES_BOOKS ) ) {
11858  fun_bonus++;
11859  } else if( has_trait( trait_HATES_BOOKS ) ) {
11860  if( book.type->book->fun > 0 ) {
11861  fun_bonus = 0;
11862  } else {
11863  fun_bonus--;
11864  }
11865  }
11866 
11867  if( fun_bonus > 1 && book.get_chapters() > 0 && book.get_remaining_chapters( p ) == 0 ) {
11868  fun_bonus /= 2;
11869  }
11870 
11871  return fun_bonus;
11872 }
11873 
11874 bool Character::has_bionic_with_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
11875 {
11876  auto iter = bio_flag_cache.find( flag );
11877  if( iter != bio_flag_cache.end() ) {
11878  return iter->second;
11879  }
11880  for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
11881  if( bio.info().has_flag( flag ) ) {
11882  bio_flag_cache[flag] = true;
11883  return true;
11884  }
11885  if( bio.info().activated ) {
11886  if( ( bio.info().has_active_flag( flag ) && has_active_bionic( bio.id ) ) ||
11887  ( bio.info().has_inactive_flag( flag ) && !has_active_bionic( bio.id ) ) ) {
11888  bio_flag_cache[flag] = true;
11889  return true;
11890  }
11891  }
11892  }
11893  bio_flag_cache[flag] = false;
11894  return false;
11895 }
11896 
11897 int Character::count_bionic_with_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
11898 {
11899  int ret = 0;
11900  for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
11901  if( bio.info().has_flag( flag ) ) {
11902  ret++;
11903  }
11904  if( bio.info().activated ) {
11905  if( ( bio.info().has_active_flag( flag ) && has_active_bionic( bio.id ) ) ||
11906  ( bio.info().has_inactive_flag( flag ) && !has_active_bionic( bio.id ) ) ) {
11907  ret++;
11908  }
11909  }
11910  }
11911 
11912  return ret;
11913 }
11914 
11915 bool Character::has_bodypart_with_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
11916 {
11917  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : get_body() ) {
11918  if( elem.first->has_flag( flag ) ) {
11919  return true;
11920  }
11921  if( elem.second.has_conditional_flag( flag ) ) {
11922  // Checking for disabling effects is a bit convoluted
11923  bool disabled = false;
11924  if( has_effect_with_flag( flag_EFFECT_LIMB_DISABLE_CONDITIONAL_FLAGS ) ) {
11925  for( const effect &eff : get_effects_from_bp( elem.first ) ) {
11926  if( eff.has_flag( flag_EFFECT_LIMB_DISABLE_CONDITIONAL_FLAGS ) ) {
11927  disabled = true;
11928  break;
11929 
11930  }
11931  }
11932  }
11933  if( !disabled ) {
11934  return true;
11935 
11936  }
11937  }
11938  }
11939  return false;
11940 }
11941 
11942 int Character::count_bodypart_with_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
11943 {
11944  int ret = 0;
11945  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
11946  if( bp->has_flag( flag ) ) {
11947  ret++;
11948  }
11949  if( get_part( bp )->has_conditional_flag( flag ) ) {
11950  bool disabled = false;
11951  if( has_effect_with_flag( flag_EFFECT_LIMB_DISABLE_CONDITIONAL_FLAGS ) ) {
11952  for( const effect &eff : get_effects_from_bp( bp ) ) {
11953  if( eff.has_flag( flag_EFFECT_LIMB_DISABLE_CONDITIONAL_FLAGS ) ) {
11954  disabled = true;
11955  break;
11956  }
11957  }
11958  }
11959  if( !disabled ) {
11960  ret++;
11961  }
11962  }
11963  }
11964  return ret;
11965 }
11966 
11967 bool Character::has_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
11968 {
11969  // If this is a performance problem create a map of flags stored for a character and updated on trait, mutation, bionic add/remove, activate/deactivate, effect gain/loss
11970  return has_trait_flag( flag ) ||
11971  has_bionic_with_flag( flag ) ||
11972  has_effect_with_flag( flag ) ||
11973  has_bodypart_with_flag( flag ) ||
11974  has_mabuff_flag( flag );
11975 }
11976 
11977 int Character::count_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
11978 {
11979  // If this is a performance problem create a map of flags stored for a character and updated on trait, mutation, bionic add/remove, activate/deactivate, effect gain/loss
11980  return count_trait_flag( flag ) +
11981  count_bionic_with_flag( flag ) +
11982  has_effect_with_flag( flag ) +
11983  count_bodypart_with_flag( flag ) +
11984  count_mabuff_flag( flag );
11985 }
11986 
11987 bool Character::is_driving() const
11988 {
11989  const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( pos() );
11990  return vp && vp->vehicle().is_moving() && vp->vehicle().player_in_control( *this );
11991 }
11992 
11993 time_duration Character::estimate_effect_dur( const skill_id &relevant_skill,
11994  const efftype_id &effect, const time_duration &error_magnitude,
11995  const time_duration &minimum_error, int threshold, const Creature &target ) const
11996 {
11997  const time_duration zero_duration = 0_turns;
11998 
11999  int skill_lvl = get_skill_level( relevant_skill );
12000 
12001  time_duration estimate = std::max( zero_duration, target.get_effect_dur( effect ) +
12002  rng_float( -1, 1 ) * ( minimum_error + ( error_magnitude - minimum_error ) *
12003  std::max( 0.0, static_cast<double>( threshold - skill_lvl ) / threshold ) ) );
12004  return estimate;
12005 }
12006 
12007 void Character::invalidate_pseudo_items()
12008 {
12009  pseudo_items_valid = false;
12010 }
12011 
12012 bool Character::avoid_trap( const tripoint &pos, const trap &tr ) const
12013 {
12014  /** @EFFECT_DEX increases chance to avoid traps */
12015 
12016  /** @EFFECT_DODGE increases chance to avoid traps */
12017  int myroll = dice( 3, round( dex_cur + get_skill_level( skill_dodge ) * 1.5 ) );
12018  int traproll;
12019  if( tr.can_see( pos, *this ) ) {
12020  traproll = dice( 3, tr.get_avoidance() );
12021  } else {
12022  traproll = dice( 6, tr.get_avoidance() );
12023  }
12024 
12025  if( has_trait( trait_LIGHTSTEP ) ) {
12026  myroll += dice( 2, 6 );
12027  }
12028 
12029  if( has_trait( trait_CLUMSY ) ) {
12030  myroll -= dice( 2, 6 );
12031  }
12032 
12033  return myroll >= traproll;
12034 }
12035 
12036 bool Character::add_faction_warning( const faction_id &id ) const
12037 {
12038  const auto it = warning_record.find( id );
12039  if( it != warning_record.end() ) {
12040  it->second.first += 1;
12041  if( it->second.second - calendar::turn > 5_minutes ) {
12042  it->second.first -= 1;
12043  }
12044  it->second.second = calendar::turn;
12045  if( it->second.first > 3 ) {
12046  return true;
12047  }
12048  } else {
12049  warning_record[id] = std::make_pair( 1, calendar::turn );
12050  }
12051  faction *fac = g->faction_manager_ptr->get( id );
12052  if( fac != nullptr && is_avatar() && fac->id != faction_no_faction ) {
12053  fac->likes_u -= 1;
12054  fac->respects_u -= 1;
12055  fac->trusts_u -= 1;
12056  }
12057  return false;
12058 }
12059 
12060 int Character::current_warnings_fac( const faction_id &id )
12061 {
12062  const auto it = warning_record.find( id );
12063  if( it != warning_record.end() ) {
12064  if( it->second.second - calendar::turn > 5_minutes ) {
12065  it->second.first = std::max( 0,
12066  it->second.first - 1 );
12067  }
12068  return it->second.first;
12069  }
12070  return 0;
12071 }
12072 
12073 bool Character::beyond_final_warning( const faction_id &id )
12074 {
12075  const auto it = warning_record.find( id );
12076  if( it != warning_record.end() ) {
12077  if( it->second.second - calendar::turn > 5_minutes ) {
12078  it->second.first = std::max( 0,
12079  it->second.first - 1 );
12080  }
12081  return it->second.first > 3;
12082  }
12083  return false;
12084 }
12085 
12086 read_condition_result Character::check_read_condition( const item &book ) const
12087 {
12088  read_condition_result result = read_condition_result::SUCCESS;
12089  if( !book.is_book() ) {
12090  result |= read_condition_result::NOT_BOOK;
12091  } else {
12092  const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( pos() );
12093  if( vp && vp->vehicle().player_in_control( *this ) ) {
12094  result |= read_condition_result::DRIVING;
12095  }
12096 
12097  if( !fun_to_read( book ) && !has_morale_to_read() && has_identified( book.typeId() ) ) {
12098  result |= read_condition_result::MORALE_LOW;
12099  }
12100 
12101  const book_mastery mastery = get_book_mastery( book );
12102  if( mastery == book_mastery::CANT_UNDERSTAND ) {
12103  result |= read_condition_result::CANT_UNDERSTAND;
12104  }
12105  if( mastery == book_mastery::MASTERED ) {
12106  result |= read_condition_result::MASTERED;
12107  }
12108 
12109  const bool book_requires_intelligence = book.type->book->intel > 0;
12110  if( book_requires_intelligence && has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
12111  result |= read_condition_result::ILLITERATE;
12112  }
12113  if( has_flag( json_flag_HYPEROPIC ) &&
12114  !worn_with_flag( STATIC( flag_id( "FIX_FARSIGHT" ) ) ) &&
12115  !has_effect( effect_contacts ) &&
12116  !has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) &&
12117  !has_flag( STATIC( json_character_flag( "ENHANCED_VISION" ) ) ) ) {
12118  result |= read_condition_result::NEED_GLASSES;
12119  }
12120  if( fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
12121  result |= read_condition_result::TOO_DARK;
12122  }
12123  if( is_blind() ) {
12124  result |= read_condition_result::BLIND;
12125  }
12126  }
12127  return result;
12128 }
12129 
12130 const Character *Character::get_book_reader( const item &book,
12131  std::vector<std::string> &reasons ) const
12132 {
12133  const Character *reader = nullptr;
12134 
12135  if( !book.is_book() ) {
12136  reasons.push_back( is_avatar() ? string_format( _( "Your %s is not good reading material." ),
12137  book.tname() ) :
12138  string_format( _( "The %s is not good reading material." ), book.tname() )
12139  );
12140  return nullptr;
12141  }
12142 
12143  const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &type = book.type->book;
12144  const skill_id &book_skill = type->skill;
12145  const int book_skill_requirement = type->req;
12146 
12147  // Check for conditions that immediately disqualify the player from reading:
12148  read_condition_result condition = check_read_condition( book );
12149  if( condition & read_condition_result::DRIVING ) {
12150  reasons.emplace_back( _( "It's a bad idea to read while driving!" ) );
12151  return nullptr;
12152  }
12153  if( condition & read_condition_result::MORALE_LOW ) {
12154  // Low morale still permits skimming
12155  reasons.emplace_back( is_avatar() ?
12156  _( "What's the point of studying? (Your morale is too low!)" ) :
12157  string_format( _( "What's the point of studying? (%s)'s morale is too low!)" ), disp_name() ) );
12158  return nullptr;
12159  }
12160  if( condition & read_condition_result::CANT_UNDERSTAND ) {
12161  reasons.push_back( is_avatar() ? string_format( _( "%s %d needed to understand. You have %d" ),
12162  book_skill->name(), book_skill_requirement, get_knowledge_level( book_skill ) ) :
12163  string_format( _( "%s %d needed to understand. %s has %d" ), book_skill->name(),
12164  book_skill_requirement, disp_name(), get_knowledge_level( book_skill ) ) );
12165  return nullptr;
12166  }
12167 
12168  // Check for conditions that disqualify us only if no other Characters can read to us
12169  if( condition & read_condition_result::ILLITERATE ) {
12170  reasons.emplace_back( is_avatar() ? _( "You're illiterate!" ) : string_format(
12171  _( "%s is illiterate!" ), disp_name() ) );
12172  } else if( condition & read_condition_result::NEED_GLASSES ) {
12173  reasons.emplace_back( is_avatar() ? _( "Your eyes won't focus without reading glasses." ) :
12174  string_format( _( "%s's eyes won't focus without reading glasses." ), disp_name() ) );
12175  } else if( condition & read_condition_result::TOO_DARK ) {
12176  // Too dark to read only applies if the player can read to himself
12177  reasons.emplace_back( _( "It's too dark to read!" ) );
12178  return nullptr;
12179  } else {
12180  return this;
12181  }
12182 
12183  if( ! is_avatar() ) {
12184  // NPCs are too proud to ask for help, perhaps someday they will not be
12185  return nullptr;
12186  }
12187 
12188  //Check for other Characters to read for you, negates Illiterate and Far Sighted
12189  //The fastest-reading Character is chosen
12190  if( is_deaf() ) {
12191  reasons.emplace_back( _( "Maybe someone could read that to you, but you're deaf!" ) );
12192  return nullptr;
12193  }
12194 
12195  time_duration time_taken = time_duration::from_turns( INT_MAX );
12196  std::vector<Character *> candidates = get_crafting_helpers();
12197 
12198  for( const Character *elem : candidates ) {
12199  // Check for disqualifying factors:
12200  condition = elem->check_read_condition( book );
12201  if( condition & read_condition_result::ILLITERATE ) {
12202  reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s is illiterate!" ),
12203  elem->disp_name() ) );
12204  } else if( condition & read_condition_result::CANT_UNDERSTAND ) {
12205  reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s %d needed to understand. %s has %d" ),
12206  book_skill->name(), book_skill_requirement, elem->disp_name(),
12207  elem->get_knowledge_level( book_skill ) ) );
12208  } else if( condition & read_condition_result::NEED_GLASSES ) {
12209  reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s needs reading glasses!" ),
12210  elem->disp_name() ) );
12211  } else if( condition & read_condition_result::TOO_DARK ) {
12212  reasons.push_back( string_format(
12213  _( "It's too dark for %s to read!" ),
12214  elem->disp_name() ) );
12215  } else if( !elem->sees( *this ) ) {
12216  reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s could read that to you, but they can't see you." ),
12217  elem->disp_name() ) );
12218  } else if( condition & read_condition_result::MORALE_LOW ) {
12219  // Low morale still permits skimming
12220  reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s morale is too low!" ), elem->disp_name( true ) ) );
12221  } else if( condition & read_condition_result::BLIND ) {
12222  reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s is blind." ), elem->disp_name() ) );
12223  } else {
12224  time_duration proj_time = time_to_read( book, *elem );
12225  if( proj_time < time_taken ) {
12226  reader = elem;
12227  time_taken = proj_time;
12228  }
12229  }
12230  }
12231  //end for all candidates
12232  return reader;
12233 }
12234 
12235 time_duration Character::time_to_read( const item &book, const Character &reader,
12236  const Character *learner ) const
12237 {
12238  const auto &type = book.type->book;
12239  const skill_id &skill = type->skill;
12240  // The reader's reading speed has an effect only if they're trying to understand the book as they read it
12241  // Reading speed is assumed to be how well you learn from books (as opposed to hands-on experience)
12242  const bool try_understand = reader.fun_to_read( book ) ||
12243  reader.get_knowledge_level( skill ) < type->level;
12244  int reading_speed = try_understand ? std::max( reader.read_speed(), read_speed() ) : read_speed();
12245  if( learner ) {
12246  reading_speed = std::max( reading_speed, learner->read_speed() );
12247  }
12248 
12249  time_duration retval = type->time * reading_speed / 100;
12250  retval *= std::min( fine_detail_vision_mod(), reader.fine_detail_vision_mod() );
12251 
12252  const int effective_int = std::min( { get_int(), reader.get_int(), learner ? learner->get_int() : INT_MAX } );
12253  if( type->intel > effective_int && !reader.has_trait( trait_PROF_DICEMASTER ) ) {
12254  retval += type->time * ( time_duration::from_seconds( type->intel - effective_int ) / 1_minutes );
12255  }
12256  if( !has_identified( book.typeId() ) ) {
12257  //skimming
12258  retval /= 10;
12259  }
12260  return retval;
12261 }
12262 
12263 int Character::thirst_speed_penalty( int thirst )
12264 {
12265  // We die at 1200 thirst
12266  // Start by dropping speed really fast, but then level it off a bit
12267  static const std::vector<std::pair<float, float>> thirst_thresholds = {{
12268  std::make_pair( 40.0f, 0.0f ),
12269  std::make_pair( 300.0f, -25.0f ),
12270  std::make_pair( 600.0f, -50.0f ),
12271  std::make_pair( 1200.0f, -75.0f )
12272  }
12273  };
12274  return static_cast<int>( multi_lerp( thirst_thresholds, thirst ) );
12275 }
12276 
12277 std::vector<speed_bonus_effect> Character::get_speed_bonus_effects() const
12278 {
12279  return speed_bonus_effects;
12280 }
12281 
12282 void Character::mod_speed_bonus( int nspeed, const std::string &desc )
12283 {
12284  if( nspeed != 0 ) {
12285  speed_bonus_effect effect { desc, nspeed };
12286  speed_bonus_effects.push_back( effect );
12287  speed_bonus += nspeed;
12288  }
12289 }
12290 
12291 void Character::recalc_speed_bonus()
12292 {
12293  speed_bonus_effects.clear();
12294  // Minus some for weight...
12295  int carry_penalty = 0;
12296  units::mass weight_cap = weight_capacity();
12297  if( weight_cap < 1_milligram ) {
12298  weight_cap = 1_milligram; //Prevent Clang warning about divide by zero
12299  }
12300  if( weight_carried() > weight_cap ) {
12301  carry_penalty = 25 * ( weight_carried() - weight_cap ) / weight_cap;
12302  }
12303  mod_speed_bonus( -carry_penalty, _( "Weight Carried" ) );
12304 
12305  mod_speed_bonus( +get_speedydex_bonus( get_dex() ), _( "Dexterity" ) );
12306 
12307  mod_speed_bonus( -get_pain_penalty().speed, _( "Pain" ) );
12308 
12309  if( get_thirst() > 40 ) {
12310  mod_speed_bonus( thirst_speed_penalty( get_thirst() ), _( "Thirst" ) );
12311  }
12312  // when underweight, you get slower. cumulative with hunger
12313  mod_speed_bonus( kcal_speed_penalty(), _( "Underweight" ) );
12314 
12315  for( const auto &maps : *effects ) {
12316  for( const auto &i : maps.second ) {
12317  bool reduced = resists_effect( i.second );
12318  //TODO try disp_short_desc() or disp_short_desc(true) if disp_name doesn't work well
12319  mod_speed_bonus( i.second.get_mod( "SPEED", reduced ), i.second.disp_name() );
12320  }
12321  }
12322 
12323  // add martial arts speed bonus
12324  mod_speed_bonus( mabuff_speed_bonus(), _( "Martial Art" ) );
12325 
12326  // Not sure why Sunlight Dependent is here, but OK
12327  // Ectothermic/COLDBLOOD4 is intended to buff folks in the Summer
12328  // Threshold-crossing has its charms ;-)
12329  if( g != nullptr ) {
12330  if( has_trait( trait_SUNLIGHT_DEPENDENT ) && !g->is_in_sunlight( pos() ) ) {
12331  //FIXME get trait name directly
12332  mod_speed_bonus( -( g->light_level( posz() ) >= 12 ? 5 : 10 ), _( "Sunlight Dependent" ) );
12333  }
12334  }
12335  const int prev_speed_bonus = get_speed_bonus();
12336  const int speed_bonus_with_enchant = std::round( enchantment_cache->modify_value(
12337  enchant_vals::mod::SPEED,
12338  get_speed() ) - get_speed_base() );
12339  enchantment_speed_bonus = speed_bonus_with_enchant - prev_speed_bonus;
12340  mod_speed_bonus( enchantment_speed_bonus, _( "Bio/Mut/Etc Effects" ) );
12341  // Speed cannot be less than 25% of base speed, so minimal speed bonus is -75% base speed.
12342  const int min_speed_bonus = static_cast<int>( -0.75 * get_speed_base() );
12343  if( get_speed_bonus() < min_speed_bonus ) {
12344  mod_speed_bonus( min_speed_bonus - get_speed_bonus(), _( "Penalty Cap" ) );
12345  }
12346 }
12347 
12348 double Character::recoil_vehicle() const
12349 {
12350  // TODO: vary penalty dependent upon vehicle part on which player is boarded
12351 
12352  if( in_vehicle ) {
12353  if( const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( pos() ) ) {
12354  return static_cast<double>( std::abs( vp->vehicle().velocity ) ) * 3 / 100;
12355  }
12356  }
12357  return 0;
12358 }
12359 
12360 double Character::recoil_total() const
12361 {
12362  return recoil + recoil_vehicle();
12363 }
12364 
12365 bool Character::is_hallucination() const
12366 {
12367  return false;
12368 }
12369 
12370 bool Character::is_electrical() const
12371 {
12372  // for now this is false. In the future should have rules
12373  return false;
12374 }
12375 
12376 bool Character::is_fae() const
12377 {
12378  if( has_trait( trait_FAERIECREATURE ) ) {
12379  return true;
12380  }
12381  return false;
12382 }
12383 
12384 bool Character::is_nether() const
12385 {
12386  // for now this is false. In the future should have rules
12387  return false;
12388 }
12389 
12390 bool Character::has_mind() const
12391 {
12392  // Characters are all humans and thus have minds
12393  return true;
12394 }
12395 
12396 void Character::set_underwater( bool u )
12397 {
12398  if( underwater != u ) {
12399  underwater = u;
12400  recalc_sight_limits();
12401  }
12402 }
12403 
12404 stat_mod Character::get_pain_penalty() const
12405 {
12406  stat_mod ret;
12407  int pain = get_perceived_pain();
12408  // if less than 10 pain, do not apply any penalties
12409  if( pain <= 10 ) {
12410  return ret;
12411  }
12412 
12413  float penalty_str = pain * get_option<float>( "PAIN_PENALTY_MOD_STR" );
12414  float penalty_dex = pain * get_option<float>( "PAIN_PENALTY_MOD_DEX" );
12415  float penalty_int = pain * get_option<float>( "PAIN_PENALTY_MOD_INT" );
12416  float penalty_per = pain * get_option<float>( "PAIN_PENALTY_MOD_PER" );
12417 
12418 
12419  ret.strength = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::PAIN_PENALTY_MOD_STR,
12420  get_str() * penalty_str );
12421 
12422  ret.dexterity = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::PAIN_PENALTY_MOD_DEX,
12423  get_dex() * penalty_dex );
12424 
12425  ret.intelligence = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::PAIN_PENALTY_MOD_INT,
12426  get_int() * penalty_int );
12427 
12428  ret.perception = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::PAIN_PENALTY_MOD_PER,
12429  get_per() * penalty_per );
12430 
12431 
12432  // Prevent negative penalties, there is better ways to give bonuses for pain
12433  // Also not make character has 0 stats
12434  ret.strength = std::max( ret.strength, 1 );
12435  ret.dexterity = std::max( ret.dexterity, 1 );
12436  ret.intelligence = std::max( ret.intelligence, 1 );
12437  ret.perception = std::max( ret.perception, 1 );
12438 
12439 
12440  int speed_penalty = std::pow( pain, 0.7f );
12441 
12442  ret.speed = std::max( enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::PAIN_PENALTY_MOD_SPEED,
12443  speed_penalty ), 0.0 );
12444 
12445  ret.speed = std::min( ret.speed, 50 );
12446  return ret;
12447 }
12448 
12449 int Character::get_lift_str() const
12450 {
12451  int str = get_arm_str();
12452  if( has_trait( trait_STRONGBACK ) ) {
12453  str *= 1.35;
12454  } else if( has_trait( trait_BADBACK ) ) {
12455  str /= 1.35;
12456  }
12457  return str;
12458 }
12459 
12460 int Character::get_lift_assist() const
12461 {
12462  int result = 0;
12463  for( const Character *guy : get_crafting_helpers() ) {
12464  result += guy->get_lift_str();
12465  }
12466  return result;
12467 }
12468 
12469 bool Character::immune_to( const bodypart_id &bp, damage_unit dam ) const
12470 {
12471  if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NODMG ) || is_immune_damage( dam.type ) ||
12472  has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
12473  return true;
12474  }
12475 
12476  passive_absorb_hit( bp, dam );
12477 
12478  worn.damage_mitigate( bp, dam );
12479 
12480  return dam.amount <= 0;
12481 }
12482 
12483 void Character::mod_pain( int npain )
12484 {
12485  if( npain > 0 ) {
12486  double mult = enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( enchant_vals::mod::PAIN );
12487  if( has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) || has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
12488  return;
12489  }
12490  // if there is a positive multiplier we always want to add at least 1 pain
12491  if( mult > 0 ) {
12492  npain += std::max( 1, roll_remainder( npain * mult ) );
12493  }
12494  if( mult < 0 ) {
12495  npain = roll_remainder( npain * ( 1 + mult ) );
12496  }
12497  npain += enchantment_cache->get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::PAIN );
12498 
12499  // no matter how powerful the enchantment if we are gaining pain we don't lose any
12500  npain = std::max( 0, npain );
12501  }
12502  Creature::mod_pain( npain );
12503 }
12504 
12505 void Character::set_pain( int npain )
12506 {
12507  const int prev_pain = get_perceived_pain();
12508  Creature::set_pain( npain );
12509  const int cur_pain = get_perceived_pain();
12510 
12511  if( cur_pain != prev_pain ) {
12512  react_to_felt_pain( cur_pain - prev_pain );
12513  on_stat_change( "perceived_pain", cur_pain );
12514  }
12515 }
12516 
12517 int Character::get_perceived_pain() const
12518 {
12519  if( get_effect_int( effect_adrenaline ) > 1 ) {
12520  return 0;
12521  }
12522 
12523  return std::max( get_pain() - get_painkiller(), 0 );
12524 }
12525 
12526 float Character::fall_damage_mod() const
12527 {
12528  if( has_flag( json_flag_FEATHER_FALL ) ) {
12529  return 0.0f;
12530  }
12531  float ret = 1.0f;
12532 
12533  // Ability to land properly is 2x as important as dexterity itself
12534  /** @EFFECT_DEX decreases damage from falling */
12535 
12536  /** @EFFECT_DODGE decreases damage from falling */
12537  float dex_dodge = dex_cur / 2.0 + get_skill_level( skill_dodge );
12538  // Reactions, legwork and footing determine your landing
12539  dex_dodge *= get_modifier( character_modifier_limb_fall_mod );
12540  // But prevent it from increasing damage
12541  dex_dodge = std::max( 0.0f, dex_dodge ); // 0
12542  // 100% damage at 0, 75% at 10, 50% at 20 and so on
12543  ret *= ( 100.0f - ( dex_dodge * 4.0f ) ) / 100.0f;
12544 
12545  if( has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour ) ) {
12546  ret *= 2.0f / 3.0f;
12547  }
12548 
12549  // TODO: Bonus for Judo, mutations. Penalty for heavy weight (including mutations)
12550 
12551  ret = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::FALL_DAMAGE, ret );
12552 
12553  return std::max( 0.0f, ret );
12554 }
12555 
12556 // force is maximum damage to hp before scaling
12557 int Character::impact( const int force, const tripoint &p )
12558 {
12559  // Falls over ~30m are fatal more often than not
12560  // But that would be quite a lot considering 21 z-levels in game
12561  // so let's assume 1 z-level is comparable to 30 force
12562 
12563  if( force <= 0 ) {
12564  return force;
12565  }
12566 
12567  // Damage modifier (post armor)
12568  float mod = 1.0f;
12569  int effective_force = force;
12570  int cut = 0;
12571  // Percentage armor penetration - armor won't help much here
12572  // TODO: Make cushioned items like bike helmets help more
12573  float armor_eff = 1.0f;
12574  // Shock Absorber CBM heavily reduces damage
12575  const bool shock_absorbers = has_active_bionic( bio_shock_absorber );
12576 
12577  // Being slammed against things rather than landing means we can't
12578  // control the impact as well
12579  const bool slam = p != pos();
12580  std::string target_name = "a swarm of bugs";
12581  Creature *critter = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( p );
12582  map &here = get_map();
12583  if( critter != this && critter != nullptr ) {
12584  target_name = critter->disp_name();
12585  // Slamming into creatures and NPCs
12586  // TODO: Handle spikes/horns and hard materials
12587  armor_eff = 0.5f; // 2x as much as with the ground
12588  // TODO: Modify based on something?
12589  mod = 1.0f;
12590  effective_force = force;
12591  } else if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( p ) ) {
12592  // Slamming into vehicles
12593  // TODO: Integrate it with vehicle collision function somehow
12594  target_name = vp->vehicle().disp_name();
12595  if( vp.part_with_feature( "SHARP", true ) ) {
12596  // Now we're actually getting impaled
12597  cut = force; // Lots of fun
12598  }
12599 
12600  mod = slam ? 1.0f : fall_damage_mod();
12601  armor_eff = 0.25f; // Not much
12602  if( !slam && vp->part_with_feature( "ROOF", true ) ) {
12603  // Roof offers better landing than frame or pavement
12604  // TODO: Make this not happen with heavy-duty/plated roof
12605  effective_force /= 2;
12606  }
12607  } else {
12608  // Slamming into terrain/furniture
12609  target_name = here.disp_name( p );
12610  int hard_ground = here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DIGGABLE, p ) ? 0 : 3;
12611  armor_eff = 0.25f; // Not much
12612  // Get cut by stuff
12613  // This isn't impalement on metal wreckage, more like flying through a closed window
12614  cut = here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHARP, p ) ? 5 : 0;
12615  effective_force = force + hard_ground;
12616  mod = slam ? 1.0f : fall_damage_mod();
12617  if( here.has_furn( p ) ) {
12618  // TODO: Make furniture matter
12619  } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, p ) ) {
12620  const float swim_skill = get_skill_level( skill_swimming );
12621  effective_force /= 4.0f + 0.1f * swim_skill;
12622  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, p ) ) {
12623  effective_force /= 1.5f;
12624  mod /= 1.0f + ( 0.1f * swim_skill );
12625  }
12626  }
12627  }
12628 
12629  // Rescale for huge force
12630  // At >30 force, proper landing is impossible and armor helps way less
12631  if( effective_force > 30 ) {
12632  // Armor simply helps way less
12633  armor_eff *= 30.0f / effective_force;
12634  if( mod < 1.0f ) {
12635  // Everything past 30 damage gets a worse modifier
12636  const float scaled_mod = std::pow( mod, 30.0f / effective_force );
12637  const float scaled_damage = ( 30.0f * mod ) + scaled_mod * ( effective_force - 30.0f );
12638  mod = scaled_damage / effective_force;
12639  }
12640  }
12641 
12642  if( !slam && mod < 1.0f && mod * force < 5 ) {
12643  // Perfect landing, no damage (regardless of armor)
12644  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You land on %s." ), target_name );
12645  return 0;
12646  }
12647 
12648  // Shock absorbers kick in only when they need to, so if our other protections fail, fall back on them
12649  if( shock_absorbers ) {
12650  effective_force -= 15; // Provide a flat reduction to force
12651  if( mod > 0.25f ) {
12652  mod = 0.25f; // And provide a 75% reduction against that force if we don't have it already
12653  }
12654  if( effective_force < 0 ) {
12655  effective_force = 0;
12656  }
12657  }
12658 
12659  int total_dealt = 0;
12660  if( mod * effective_force >= 5 ) {
12661  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
12662  const int bash = effective_force * rng( 60, 100 ) / 100;
12663  damage_instance di;
12664  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage types
12665  di.add_damage( damage_bash, bash, 0, armor_eff, mod );
12666  // No good way to land on sharp stuff, so here modifier == 1.0f
12667  di.add_damage( damage_cut, cut, 0, armor_eff, 1.0f );
12668  total_dealt += deal_damage( nullptr, bp, di ).total_damage();
12669  }
12670  }
12671 
12672  if( total_dealt > 0 && is_avatar() ) {
12673  // "You slam against the dirt" is fine
12674  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You are slammed against %1$s for %2$d damage." ),
12675  target_name, total_dealt );
12676  } else if( is_avatar() && shock_absorbers ) {
12677  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You are slammed against %s!" ),
12678  target_name, total_dealt );
12679  add_msg( m_good, _( "…but your shock absorbers negate the damage!" ) );
12680  } else if( slam ) {
12681  // Only print this line if it is a slam and not a landing
12682  // Non-players should only get this one: player doesn't know how much damage was dealt
12683  // and landing messages for each slammed creature would be too much
12684  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
12685  _( "You are slammed against %s." ),
12686  _( "<npcname> is slammed against %s." ),
12687  target_name );
12688  } else {
12689  // No landing message for NPCs
12690  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You land on %s." ), target_name );
12691  }
12692 
12693  if( x_in_y( mod, 1.0f ) && !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, p ) ) {
12694  add_effect( effect_downed, rng( 1_turns, 1_turns + mod * 3_turns ) );
12695  }
12696 
12697  return total_dealt;
12698 }
12699 
12700 bool Character::can_fly()
12701 {
12702  if( !move_effects( false ) || has_effect( effect_stunned ) ) {
12703  return false;
12704  }
12705  // GLIDE is for artifacts or things like jetpacks that don't care if you're tired or hurt.
12706  if( has_flag( json_flag_GLIDE ) ) {
12707  return true;
12708  }
12709  // TODO: Remove grandfathering traits in after Limb Stuff
12710  if( has_flag( json_flag_WINGS_2 ) ||
12711  has_flag( json_flag_WING_GLIDE ) || count_flag( json_flag_WING_ARMS ) >= 2 ) {
12712 
12713  if( 100 * weight_carried() / weight_capacity() > 50 || !has_two_arms_lifting() ) {
12714  return false;
12715  }
12716  return true;
12717  }
12718  return false;
12719 }
12720 
12721 // FIXME: Relies on hardcoded bash damage type
12722 void Character::knock_back_to( const tripoint &to )
12723 {
12724  if( to == pos() ) {
12725  return;
12726  }
12727 
12728  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
12729  // First, see if we hit a monster
12730  if( monster *const critter = creatures.creature_at<monster>( to ) ) {
12731  deal_damage( critter, bodypart_id( "torso" ), damage_instance( damage_bash,
12732  static_cast<float>( critter->type->size ) ) );
12733  add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
12734  /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX allows knocked back player to knock back, damage, stun some monsters */
12735  if( ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 > critter->type->size ) {
12736  critter->knock_back_from( pos() ); // Chain reaction!
12737  critter->apply_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 );
12738  critter->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
12739  } else if( ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 == critter->type->size ) {
12740  critter->apply_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 );
12741  critter->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
12742  }
12743  critter->check_dead_state();
12744 
12745  add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You bounce off a %s!" ), _( "<npcname> bounces off a %s!" ),
12746  critter->name() );
12747  return;
12748  }
12749 
12750  if( npc *const np = creatures.creature_at<npc>( to ) ) {
12751  deal_damage( np, bodypart_id( "torso" ),
12752  damage_instance( damage_bash, static_cast<float>( np->get_size() ) ) );
12753  add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
12754  np->deal_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), damage_instance( damage_bash, 3 ) );
12755  add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You bounce off %s!" ), _( "<npcname> bounces off %s!" ),
12756  np->get_name() );
12757  np->check_dead_state();
12758  return;
12759  }
12760 
12761  map &here = get_map();
12762  // If we're still in the function at this point, we're actually moving a tile!
12763  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LIQUID, to ) &&
12764  here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, to ) ) {
12765  if( !is_npc() ) {
12766  avatar_action::swim( here, get_avatar(), to );
12767  }
12768  // TODO: NPCs can't swim!
12769  } else if( here.impassable( to ) ) { // Wait, it's a wall
12770 
12771  // It's some kind of wall.
12772  // TODO: who knocked us back? Maybe that creature should be the source of the damage?
12773  apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), 3 );
12774  add_effect( effect_stunned, 2_turns );
12775  add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You bounce off a %s!" ), _( "<npcname> bounces off a %s!" ),
12776  here.obstacle_name( to ) );
12777 
12778  } else { // It's no wall
12779  setpos( to );
12780  }
12781 }
12782 
12783 int Character::hp_percentage() const
12784 {
12785  const bodypart_id head_id = bodypart_id( "head" );
12786  const bodypart_id torso_id = bodypart_id( "torso" );
12787  int total_cur = 0;
12788  int total_max = 0;
12789  // Head and torso HP are weighted 3x and 2x, respectively
12790  total_cur = get_part_hp_cur( head_id ) * 3 + get_part_hp_cur( torso_id ) * 2;
12791  total_max = get_part_hp_max( head_id ) * 3 + get_part_hp_max( torso_id ) * 2;
12792  for( const std::pair< const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : get_body() ) {
12793  total_cur += elem.second.get_hp_cur();
12794  total_max += elem.second.get_hp_max();
12795  }
12796 
12797  return ( 100 * total_cur ) / total_max;
12798 }
12799 
12800 void Character::on_worn_item_transform( const item &old_it, const item &new_it )
12801 {
12802  morale->on_worn_item_transform( old_it, new_it );
12803 }
12804 
12805 void Character::leak_items()
12806 {
12807  std::vector<item_location> removed_items;
12808  if( weapon.is_container() ) {
12809  if( weapon.leak( get_map(), this, pos() ) ) {
12810  weapon.spill_contents( pos() );
12811  }
12812  } else if( weapon.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
12813  if( weapon.leak( get_map(), this, pos() ) ) {
12814  get_map().add_item_or_charges( pos(), weapon );
12815  removed_items.emplace_back( *this, &weapon );
12816  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "%s spilled from your hand." ), weapon.tname() );
12817  }
12818  }
12819 
12820  for( item_location it : top_items_loc() ) {
12821  if( !it || ( !it->is_container() && !it->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) ) {
12822  continue;
12823  }
12824  if( it->leak( get_map(), this, pos() ) ) {
12825  it->spill_contents( pos() );
12826  removed_items.push_back( it );
12827  }
12828  }
12829  for( item_location removed : removed_items ) {
12830  removed.remove_item();
12831  }
12832 }
12833 
12834 void Character::process_items()
12835 {
12836  if( weapon.process( get_map(), this, pos() ) ) {
12837  weapon.spill_contents( pos() );
12838  remove_weapon();
12839  }
12840 
12841  std::vector<item_location> removed_items;
12842  for( item_location it : top_items_loc() ) {
12843  if( !it ) {
12844  continue;
12845  }
12846  if( it->process( get_map(), this, pos() ) ) {
12847  it->spill_contents( pos() );
12848  removed_items.push_back( it );
12849  }
12850  }
12851  for( item_location removed : removed_items ) {
12852  removed.remove_item();
12853  }
12854 
12855  // Active item processing done, now we're recharging.
12856  if( worn.check_item_encumbrance_flag( get_check_encumbrance() ) ) {
12857  calc_encumbrance();
12858  set_check_encumbrance( false );
12859  }
12860 
12861  // Load all items that use the UPS and have their own battery to their minimal functional charge,
12862  // The tool is not really useful if its charges are below charges_to_use
12863  std::vector<item *> inv_use_ups = cache_get_items_with( flag_USE_UPS, []( item & it ) {
12864  return ( it.ammo_capacity( ammo_battery ) > it.ammo_remaining() ||
12865  ( it.type->battery && it.type->battery->max_capacity > it.energy_remaining( nullptr ) ) );
12866  } );
12867  if( !inv_use_ups.empty() ) {
12868  const units::energy available_charges = available_ups();
12869  units::energy ups_used = 0_kJ;
12870  for( item * const &it : inv_use_ups ) {
12871  // For powered armor, an armor-powering bionic should always be preferred over UPS usage.
12872  if( it->is_power_armor() && can_interface_armor() && has_power() ) {
12873  // Bionic power costs are handled elsewhere
12874  continue;
12875  } else if( it->active && !it->ammo_sufficient( this ) ) {
12876  it->deactivate();
12877  } else if( available_charges - ups_used >= 1_kJ &&
12878  it->ammo_remaining() < it->ammo_capacity( ammo_battery ) ) {
12879  // Charge the battery in the UPS modded tool
12880  ups_used += 1_kJ;
12881  it->ammo_set( itype_battery, it->ammo_remaining() + 1 );
12882  }
12883  }
12884  if( ups_used > 0_kJ ) {
12885  consume_ups( ups_used );
12886  }
12887  }
12888 }
12889 
12890 void Character::search_surroundings()
12891 {
12892  if( controlling_vehicle ) {
12893  return;
12894  }
12895  if( has_effect( effect_subaquatic_sonar ) && is_underwater() && calendar::once_every( 4_turns ) ) {
12896  echo_pulse();
12897  }
12898  map &here = get_map();
12899  // Search for traps in a larger area than before because this is the only
12900  // way we can "find" traps that aren't marked as visible.
12901  // Detection formula takes care of likelihood of seeing within this range.
12902  for( const tripoint &tp : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 5 ) ) {
12903  const trap &tr = here.tr_at( tp );
12904  if( tr.is_null() || tp == pos() ) {
12905  continue;
12906  }
12907  // Note that echolocation and SONAR also do this separately in echo_pulse()
12908  if( has_active_bionic( bio_ground_sonar ) && !knows_trap( tp ) && tr.detected_by_ground_sonar() ) {
12909  const std::string direction = direction_name( direction_from( pos(), tp ) );
12910  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Your ground sonar detected a %1$s to the %2$s!" ),
12911  tr.name(), direction );
12912  add_known_trap( tp, tr );
12913  }
12914  if( !sees( tp ) ) {
12915  continue;
12916  }
12917  if( tr.can_see( tp, *this ) ) {
12918  // Already seen, or can never be seen
12919  continue;
12920  }
12921  // Chance to detect traps we haven't yet seen.
12922  if( tr.detect_trap( tp, *this ) ) {
12923  if( !tr.is_trivial_to_spot() ) {
12924  // Only bug player about traps that aren't trivial to spot.
12925  const std::string direction = direction_name(
12926  direction_from( pos(), tp ) );
12927  practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_spotting, 1_minutes );
12928  // Seeing a trap set properly gives you a little bonus to trapsetting profs.
12929  practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_traps, 10_seconds );
12930  practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_trapsetting, 10_seconds );
12931  add_msg_if_player( _( "You've spotted a %1$s to the %2$s!" ),
12932  tr.name(), direction );
12933  }
12934  add_known_trap( tp, tr );
12935  }
12936  }
12937 }
12938 
12939 bool Character::wield_contents( item &container, item *internal_item, bool penalties,
12940  int base_cost )
12941 {
12942  // if index not specified and container has multiple items then ask the player to choose one
12943  if( internal_item == nullptr ) {
12944  debugmsg( "No valid target for wield contents." );
12945  return false;
12946  }
12947 
12948  if( !container.has_item( *internal_item ) ) {
12949  debugmsg( "Tried to wield non-existent item from container (Character::wield_contents)" );
12950  return false;
12951  }
12952 
12953  const ret_val<void> ret = can_wield( *internal_item );
12954  if( !ret.success() ) {
12955  add_msg_if_player( m_info, "%s", ret.c_str() );
12956  return false;
12957  }
12958 
12959  int mv = 0;
12960 
12961  if( has_wield_conflicts( *internal_item ) ) {
12962  if( !unwield() ) {
12963  return false;
12964  }
12965  inv->unsort();
12966  }
12967 
12968  // for holsters, we should not include the cost of wielding the holster itself
12969  // The cost of wielding the holster was already added earlier in avatar_action::use_item.
12970  // As we couldn't make sure back then what action was going to be used, we remove the cost now.
12971  item_location il = item_location( *this, &container );
12972  mv -= il.obtain_cost( *this );
12973  mv += item_retrieve_cost( *internal_item, container, penalties, base_cost );
12974 
12975  if( internal_item->stacks_with( weapon, true ) ) {
12976  weapon.combine( *internal_item );
12977  } else {
12978  weapon = std::move( *internal_item );
12979  }
12980  container.remove_item( *internal_item );
12981  container.on_contents_changed();
12982 
12983  inv->update_invlet( weapon );
12984  inv->update_cache_with_item( weapon );
12985  last_item = weapon.typeId();
12986 
12987  mod_moves( -mv );
12988 
12989  weapon.on_wield( *this );
12990 
12991  item_location loc( *this, &weapon );
12992  cata::event e = cata::event::make<event_type::character_wields_item>( getID(), weapon.typeId() );
12993  get_event_bus().send_with_talker( this, &loc, e );
12994 
12995  return true;
12996 }
12997 
12998 void Character::store( item &container, item &put, bool penalties, int base_cost,
12999  pocket_type pk_type, bool check_best_pkt )
13000 {
13001  mod_moves( -item_store_cost( put, container, penalties, base_cost ) );
13002  if( check_best_pkt && pk_type == pocket_type::CONTAINER &&
13003  container.get_all_contained_pockets().size() > 1 ) {
13004  // Bypass pocket settings (assuming the item is manually stored)
13005  int charges = put.count_by_charges() ? put.charges : 1;
13006  container.fill_with( i_rem( &put ), charges, false, false, true );
13007  } else {
13008  container.put_in( i_rem( &put ), pk_type );
13009  }
13010  calc_encumbrance();
13011 }
13012 
13013 void Character::store( item_pocket *pocket, item &put, bool penalties, int base_cost )
13014 {
13015  if( !pocket ) {
13016  return;
13017  }
13018 
13019  item_location char_item( *this, &null_item_reference() );
13020  item_pocket *pkt_best = pocket->best_pocket_in_contents( char_item, put, nullptr, false,
13021  false ).second;
13022  if( !!pkt_best && pocket->better_pocket( *pkt_best, put, true ) ) {
13023  pocket = pkt_best;
13024  }
13025  mod_moves( -std::max( item_store_cost( put, null_item_reference(), penalties, base_cost ),
13026  pocket->obtain_cost( put ) ) );
13027  ret_val<item *> result = pocket->insert_item( i_rem( &put ) );
13028  result.value()->on_pickup( *this );
13029  calc_encumbrance();
13030 }
13031 
13032 void Character::use_wielded()
13033 {
13034  use( -1 );
13035 }
13036 
13037 void Character::use( int inventory_position )
13038 {
13039  item &used = i_at( inventory_position );
13040  item_location loc = item_location( *this, &used );
13041 
13042  use( loc );
13043 }
13044 
13045 void Character::use( item_location loc, int pre_obtain_moves, std::string const &method )
13046 {
13047  if( has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
13048  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You can't use anything while incorporeal." ) );
13049  return;
13050  }
13051 
13052  // if -1 is passed in we don't want to change moves at all
13053  if( pre_obtain_moves == -1 ) {
13054  pre_obtain_moves = get_moves();
13055  }
13056  if( !loc ) {
13057  add_msg( m_info, _( "You do not have that item." ) );
13058  set_moves( pre_obtain_moves );
13059  return;
13060  }
13061 
13062  item &used = *loc;
13063  last_item = used.typeId();
13064 
13065  if( used.is_tool() ) {
13066  if( !used.type->has_use() ) {
13067  add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't do anything interesting with your %s." ), used.tname() );
13068  set_moves( pre_obtain_moves );
13069  return;
13070  }
13071  invoke_item( &used, method, loc.position(), pre_obtain_moves );
13072 
13073  } else if( used.type->can_use( "PETFOOD" ) ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
13074  invoke_item( &used, method, loc.position(), pre_obtain_moves );
13075 
13076  } else if( !used.is_craft() && ( used.is_medication() || ( !used.type->has_use() &&
13077  used.is_food() ) ) ) {
13078 
13079  if( used.is_medication() && !can_use_heal_item( used ) ) {
13080  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your biology is not compatible with that healing item." ) );
13081  set_moves( pre_obtain_moves );
13082  return;
13083  }
13084 
13085  if( avatar *u = as_avatar() ) {
13086  const ret_val<edible_rating> ret = u->will_eat( used, true );
13087  if( !ret.success() ) {
13088  set_moves( pre_obtain_moves );
13089  return;
13090  }
13091  u->assign_activity( consume_activity_actor( loc ) );
13092  } else {
13093  const time_duration &consume_time = get_consume_time( used );
13094  mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( consume_time ) );
13095  consume( loc );
13096  }
13097  } else if( used.is_book() ) {
13098  // TODO: Handle this with dynamic dispatch.
13099  if( avatar *u = as_avatar() ) {
13100  u->read( loc );
13101  }
13102  } else if( used.type->has_use() ) {
13103  invoke_item( &used, method, loc.position(), pre_obtain_moves );
13104  } else if( used.has_flag( flag_SPLINT ) ) {
13105  ret_val<void> need_splint = can_wear( *loc );
13106  if( need_splint.success() ) {
13107  wear_item( used );
13108  loc.remove_item();
13109  } else {
13110  add_msg( m_info, need_splint.str() );
13111  }
13112  } else if( used.is_relic() ) {
13113  invoke_item( &used, method, loc.position(), pre_obtain_moves );
13114  } else {
13115  if( !is_armed() ) {
13116  add_msg( m_info, _( "You are not wielding anything you could use." ) );
13117  } else {
13118  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't do anything interesting with your %s." ), used.tname() );
13119  }
13120  set_moves( pre_obtain_moves );
13121  }
13122 }
13123 
13124 int Character::climbing_cost( const tripoint &from, const tripoint &to ) const
13125 {
13126  map &here = get_map();
13127  if( !here.valid_move( from, to, false, true ) ) {
13128  return 0;
13129  }
13130 
13131  const int diff = here.climb_difficulty( from );
13132 
13133  if( diff > 5 ) {
13134  return 0;
13135  }
13136 
13137  return 50 + diff * 100;
13138  // TODO: All sorts of mutations, equipment weight etc.
13139 }
13140 
13141 void Character::environmental_revert_effect()
13142 {
13143  addictions.clear();
13144  morale->clear();
13145 
13146  set_all_parts_hp_to_max();
13147  set_hunger( 0 );
13148  set_thirst( 0 );
13149  set_sleepiness( 0 );
13150  set_lifestyle( 0 );
13151  set_daily_health( 0 );
13152  set_stim( 0 );
13153  set_pain( 0 );
13154  set_painkiller( 0 );
13155  set_rad( 0 );
13156 
13157  recalc_sight_limits();
13158  calc_encumbrance();
13159 }
13160 
13161 bodypart_id Character::most_staunchable_bp()
13162 {
13163  int max;
13164  return most_staunchable_bp( max );
13165 }
13166 
13167 bodypart_id Character::most_staunchable_bp( int &max_staunch )
13168 {
13169  // Calculate max staunchable bleed level
13170  // Top out at 20 intensity for base, unencumbered survivors
13171  max_staunch = 20;
13172  max_staunch *= get_modifier( character_modifier_bleed_staunch_mod );
13173  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "Staunch limit after limb score modifier %d", max_staunch );
13174 
13175  // +5 bonus if you know your first aid
13176  if( has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ||
13177  has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert ) ) {
13178  max_staunch += 5;
13179  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "Wound care proficiency found, new limit %d", max_staunch );
13180  }
13181 
13182  int num_broken_arms = get_num_broken_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::arm );
13183  int num_arms = get_num_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::arm );
13184 
13185  // Don't warn about encumbrance if your arms are broken
13186  if( num_broken_arms ) {
13187  // Handle multiple arms
13188  max_staunch *= ( 1.0f - num_broken_arms / static_cast<float>( num_arms ) );
13189  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "%d out of %d arms broken, staunch limit %d",
13190  num_broken_arms, num_arms, max_staunch );
13191  }
13192 
13193  int most = 0;
13194  int intensity = 0;
13195  bodypart_id bp_id = bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID();
13196  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
13197  intensity = get_effect_int( effect_bleed, bp );
13198  // Staunching a bleeding on one of your arms is hard (handle multiple arms)
13199  if( bp->has_type( body_part_type::type::arm ) ) {
13200  intensity /= ( 1.0f - 1.0f / num_arms );
13201  }
13202  // Tourniquets make staunching easier, letting you treat arterial bleeds on your legs
13203  if( worn_with_flag( flag_TOURNIQUET, bp ) ) {
13204  intensity /= 2;
13205  }
13206  if( most < get_effect_int( effect_bleed, bp ) && intensity <= max_staunch ) {
13207  // Don't use intensity here, we might have increased it for the arm penalty
13208  most = get_effect_int( effect_bleed, bp );
13209  bp_id = bp;
13210  }
13211  }
13212  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER,
13213  "Selected %s to staunch (base intensity %d, modified intensity %d)", bp_id->name, intensity, most );
13214 
13215  return bp_id;
13216 }
13217 
13218 void Character::pause()
13219 {
13220  set_moves( 0 );
13221  recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
13222  map &here = get_map();
13223 
13224  // effects of being partially/fully underwater
13225  if( !in_vehicle && !get_map().has_flag_furn( "BRIDGE", pos( ) ) ) {
13226  if( underwater ) {
13227  // TODO: gain "swimming" proficiency but not "athletics" skill
13228  drench( 100, get_drenching_body_parts(), false );
13229  } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, pos() ) ) {
13230  // TODO: gain "swimming" proficiency but not "athletics" skill
13231  // Same as above, except no head/eyes/mouth
13232  drench( 100, get_drenching_body_parts( false ), false );
13233  } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, pos() ) ) {
13234  drench( 80, get_drenching_body_parts( false, false ),
13235  false );
13236  }
13237  }
13238 
13239  // Try to put out clothing/hair fire
13240  if( has_effect( effect_onfire ) ) {
13241  time_duration total_removed = 0_turns;
13242  time_duration total_left = 0_turns;
13243  bool on_ground = is_prone();
13244  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
13245  effect &eff = get_effect( effect_onfire, bp );
13246  if( eff.is_null() ) {
13247  continue;
13248  }
13249 
13250  // TODO: Tools and skills
13251  total_left += eff.get_duration();
13252  // Being on the ground will smother the fire much faster because you can roll
13253  const time_duration dur_removed = on_ground ? eff.get_duration() / 2 + 2_turns : 1_turns;
13254  eff.mod_duration( -dur_removed );
13255  total_removed += dur_removed;
13256  }
13257 
13258  // Don't drop on the ground when the ground is on fire
13259  if( total_left > 1_minutes && !is_dangerous_fields( here.field_at( pos() ) ) ) {
13260  add_effect( effect_downed, 2_turns, false, 0, true );
13261  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13262  _( "You roll on the ground, trying to smother the fire!" ),
13263  _( "<npcname> rolls on the ground!" ) );
13264  } else if( total_removed > 0_turns ) {
13265  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13266  _( "You attempt to put out the fire on you!" ),
13267  _( "<npcname> attempts to put out the fire on them!" ) );
13268  }
13269  }
13270 
13271  // put pressure on bleeding wound, prioritizing most severe bleeding that you can compress
13272  if( !controlling_vehicle && !is_armed() && has_effect( effect_bleed ) ) {
13273  int max = 0;
13274  bodypart_id bp_id = most_staunchable_bp( max );
13275 
13276  // Don't warn about encumbrance if your arms are broken
13277  int num_broken_arms = get_num_broken_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::arm );
13278  if( num_broken_arms ) {
13279  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13280  _( "Your broken limb significantly hampers your efforts to put pressure on a bleeding wound!" ),
13281  _( "<npcname>'s broken limb significantly hampers their effort to put pressure on a bleeding wound!" ) );
13282  } else if( max < 10 ) {
13283  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13284  _( "Your hands are too encumbered to effectively put pressure on a bleeding wound!" ),
13285  _( "<npcname>'s hands are too encumbered to effectively put pressure on a bleeding wound!" ) );
13286  }
13287 
13288  if( bp_id == bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
13289  // We're bleeding, but couldn't find any bp we can staunch
13290  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13291  _( "Your bleeding is beyond staunching barehanded! A tourniquet might help." ),
13292  _( "<npcname>'s bleeding is beyond staunching barehanded!" ) );
13293  } else {
13294  // 5 - 30 sec per turn (with standard hands)
13295  time_duration benefit = 5_turns + 1_turns * max;
13296  effect &e = get_effect( effect_bleed, bp_id );
13297  e.mod_duration( - benefit );
13298  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13299  _( "You put pressure on the bleeding wound…" ),
13300  _( "<npcname> puts pressure on the bleeding wound…" ) );
13301  practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care, 1_turns );
13302  }
13303  }
13304  // on-pause effects for martial arts
13305  martial_arts_data->ma_onpause_effects( *this );
13306 
13307  if( is_npc() ) {
13308  // The stuff below doesn't apply to NPCs
13309  // search_surroundings should eventually do, though
13310  return;
13311  }
13312 
13313  if( in_vehicle && one_in( 8 ) ) {
13314  VehicleList vehs = here.get_vehicles();
13315  vehicle *veh = nullptr;
13316  for( wrapped_vehicle &v : vehs ) {
13317  veh = v.v;
13318  if( veh && veh->is_moving() && veh->player_in_control( *this ) ) {
13319  double exp_temp = 1 + veh->total_mass() / 400.0_kilogram +
13320  std::abs( veh->velocity / 3200.0 );
13321  int experience = static_cast<int>( exp_temp );
13322  if( exp_temp - experience > 0 && x_in_y( exp_temp - experience, 1.0 ) ) {
13323  experience++;
13324  }
13325  practice( skill_driving, experience );
13326  break;
13327  }
13328  }
13329  }
13330 
13331  search_surroundings();
13332  wait_effects();
13333 }
13334 
13335 template <typename T>
13336 bool Character::can_lift( const T &obj ) const
13337 {
13338  // avoid comparing by weight as different objects use differing scales (grams vs kilograms etc)
13339  int str = get_lift_str();
13340  if( mounted_creature ) {
13341  auto *const mons = mounted_creature.get();
13342  str = mons->mech_str_addition() == 0 ? str : mons->mech_str_addition();
13343  }
13344  const int npc_str = get_lift_assist();
13345  return str + npc_str >= obj.lift_strength();
13346 }
13347 template bool Character::can_lift<item>( const item &obj ) const;
13348 template bool Character::can_lift<vehicle>( const vehicle &obj ) const;
13349 
13350 bool character_martial_arts::pick_style( const Character &you ) // Style selection menu
13351 {
13352  enum style_selection {
13353  KEEP_HANDS_FREE = 0,
13354  STYLE_OFFSET
13355  };
13356 
13357  // Check for martial art styles known from active bionics
13358  std::set<matype_id> bio_styles;
13359  for( const bionic &bio : *you.my_bionics ) {
13360  const std::vector<matype_id> &bio_ma_list = bio.id->ma_styles;
13361  if( !bio_ma_list.empty() && you.has_active_bionic( bio.id ) ) {
13362  bio_styles.insert( bio_ma_list.begin(), bio_ma_list.end() );
13363  }
13364  }
13365  std::vector<matype_id> selectable_styles;
13366  if( bio_styles.empty() ) {
13367  selectable_styles = ma_styles;
13368  } else {
13369  selectable_styles.insert( selectable_styles.begin(), bio_styles.begin(), bio_styles.end() );
13370  }
13371 
13372  // If there are style already, cursor starts there
13373  // if no selected styles, cursor starts from no-style
13374 
13375  // Any other keys quit the menu
13376  input_context ctxt( "MELEE_STYLE_PICKER", keyboard_mode::keycode );
13377  ctxt.register_action( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION" );
13378 
13379  uilist kmenu;
13380  kmenu.text = string_format( _( "Select a style.\n"
13381  "\n"
13382  "STR: <color_white>%d</color>, DEX: <color_white>%d</color>, "
13383  "PER: <color_white>%d</color>, INT: <color_white>%d</color>\n"
13384  "Press [<color_yellow>%s</color>] for technique details and compatible weapons.\n" ),
13385  you.get_str(), you.get_dex(), you.get_per(), you.get_int(),
13386  ctxt.get_desc( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION" ) );
13387  ma_style_callback callback( static_cast<size_t>( STYLE_OFFSET ), selectable_styles );
13388  kmenu.callback = &callback;
13389  kmenu.input_category = "MELEE_STYLE_PICKER";
13390  kmenu.additional_actions.emplace_back( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION", translation() );
13391  kmenu.desc_enabled = true;
13392  kmenu.addentry_desc( KEEP_HANDS_FREE, true, 'h',
13393  keep_hands_free ? _( "Keep hands free (on)" ) : _( "Keep hands free (off)" ),
13394  _( "When this is enabled, player won't wield things unless explicitly told to." ) );
13395 
13396  kmenu.selected = STYLE_OFFSET;
13397 
13398  // +1 to keep "No Style" at top
13399  std::sort( selectable_styles.begin() + 1, selectable_styles.end(),
13400  []( const matype_id & a, const matype_id & b ) {
13401  return localized_compare( a->name.translated(), b->name.translated() );
13402  } );
13403 
13404  for( size_t i = 0; i < selectable_styles.size(); i++ ) {
13405  const martialart &style = selectable_styles[i].obj();
13406  //Check if this style is currently selected
13407  const bool selected = selectable_styles[i] == style_selected;
13408  std::string entry_text = style.name.translated();
13409  if( selected ) {
13410  kmenu.selected = i + STYLE_OFFSET;
13411  entry_text = colorize( entry_text, c_pink );
13412  }
13413  kmenu.addentry_desc( i + STYLE_OFFSET, true, -1, entry_text, style.description.translated() );
13414  }
13415 
13416  kmenu.query();
13417  int selection = kmenu.ret;
13418 
13419  if( selection >= STYLE_OFFSET ) {
13420  // If the currect style is selected, do not change styles
13421 
13422  Character &u = const_cast<Character &>( you );
13423  style_selected->remove_all_buffs( u );
13424  style_selected = selectable_styles[selection - STYLE_OFFSET];
13425  ma_static_effects( u );
13426  martialart_use_message( you );
13427  } else if( selection == KEEP_HANDS_FREE ) {
13428  keep_hands_free = !keep_hands_free;
13429  } else {
13430  return false;
13431  }
13432 
13433  return true;
13434 }
